name: Enjoy Waterfall Pool at Luxury Getaway
title: Austin, Texas

gallery.caption: Enjoy the heated saltwater pool. Generous pool hours are 7 AM to 10 PM at night. Pool is heated at 95° year-round.

hosts.about: Hello my name is Bill and I am originally from Rhode Island. I love Austin and my neighborhood in Travis Heights. I hope you enjoy the place and I promise to work hard to make your stay enjoyable. Cordially yours.

recent.comments: We loved staying here! The property is beautiful. It was a great getaway.

items.comments: We loved staying here! The property is beautiful. It was a great getaway.
Bills place felt like a resort. I posted pictures of the pool/patio area on social media and people couldn't believe I was in austin. Great location also!
Nice place and great pool.
Loved it! Beautiful room and perfect location.
Excellent location lovely property very helpful host as described definitely worth booking.
What a wonderful place to stay!

Bill was super accommodating and pleasant to work with. Our unit was immaculate, tastefully decorated and more spacious than I was expecting! The espresso machine was a plus. And the shower was amazing with the multiple shower heads. Also the pool and grounds in general were so nice and stylish. It was really nice relaxing by the pool after a busy day exploring. And the location was perfect for us. Right in Travis heights (super cute neighborhood) right next to So Co with a bunch of cute shops and restaurants you could walk to. If your looking for something outside of the hustle and bustle of the city, but still super close- this is it.

description.summary:
Kick back on a plush day bed at this deluxe getaway in coveted Travis Heights.
The Getaway was awarded by internationally known travel publication, AFAR Media, as one of the top Airbnb’s in the World. 
Relax in a waterfall salt water pool. Perfect for cooling off during summer and heated during the winter! Just four blocks to vibrant South Congress.
description.space:
Welcome to The Getaway, a luxury experience located in coveted Travis Heights right in the heart of South Congress.  

Why choose the Getaway?  Premier location, High end design delights, tranquil and private resort like setting, waterfall salt water swimming pool and waterfall, tropical landscaping and luxury amenities!  Our pool is perfect for cooling off during the summer and heated in the winter! 

Premier Location!  Only 4 short blocks to vibrant South Congress shopping and restaurants, Stacy Park and wooded walking/biking trails.

At The Getaway, you are surrounded by a carefully curated mix of custom furnishings and eclectic art work.  

The Getaway provides a compound like experience featuring a lovely heated salt water swimming pool surrounded by tropical plants, limestone, Brazilian decking and mature landscaping. 

Luxury amenities including bedding linens from Frette and Restoration Hardware. 

Details, Details, Details!: Perks, extras and amenities include gourmet espresso, Turkish robes, moisturizers, tooth brush and shaving kits, elevating your stay to a tranquil and luxurious experience. 

Enjoy a tranquil resort like vacation in a luxury guest suite of over 550 square feet and a massive spa like bathroom with five shower heads and dual vanities.  The Getaway is a private separate wing of a beautiful Travis Heights Home with its own private entrance and backyard.  The Getaway is furnished with a microwave, under counter fridge, glassware and cutlery.  Note there is no kitchen area, stove or cook top included. 

The Getaway interior was created by the owner who is a designer combining a bold sense of color, luxurious use of textures and an eye for detail.  

The owner is a successful Airbnb host with over 2700 five star reviews and over a decade of experience, ensuring you will have a high quality vacation experience.  

Maximum occupancy is two guests.  Visitors are not permitted.  

Outdoor patio and pool use hours are 7am - 10pm.   

No pets allowed.

Property details and house rules:
The Getaway is part of a four unit compound on a lovely ¼ acre lot in the beautiful Travis Heights neighborhood.  All units have private entrances.  The Pool area is shared with each unit on the same property.  Pool hours are 7am-10pm.  Each unit has a maximum occupancy of two guests. Visitors are not permitted on the property.
description.neighborhood: This luxury home is located in coveted Travis Heights—right in the heart of South Congress. It's only four short blocks to vibrant South Congress shopping and restaurants, Stacy Park, and wooded walking and biking trails.
description.house_rules:
- Minimum guest reservation age is 25 years old.  
- Maximum occupancy is TWO guests.  
- Visitors are not permitted anywhere on the property. 
- There are NO EXCEPTIONS to these house rules. 
- Violation of house rules will result in EVICTION without any refund. 
- Pool is shared with another rental unit on the property, up to two additional people.  
- The Owner lives full time on the property.  
- The pool and patio hours are from 7am - 10pm.  
- Outdoor gatherings by the pool are NOT permitted after 10pm.   
- Absolutely No pets are allowed.  
- Early Check-in is not available due to cleaning time required for set up from previous guest.  Luggage storage in the property garage is available upon request.  
- Multiple unit buyouts are not permitted.  Only a single unit is available to rent for two guests only.  
- Professional Photography Shoots are not permitted anywhere on the property.  
- Smoking is NOT allowed anywhere on the property.    
- If you are found to have smoked inside the property, you will incur a $250.00 charge. 
- The owner is not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners is not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise.
- Keep the property and all furnishings in good order.  Guests are responsible for all costs related to repair or replacement of any damaged furnishing.  
- Housekeeping:  There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate.   We do not permit towels or linens to be taken from the units.
- No loud music is permitted.

name: Industrial-Chic Old Scottsdale Home with Private Pool
title: Scottsdale, Arizona

recent.comments: Holly and her team are VERY responsive. We had just a couple of simple things that they immediately responded to. They even followed up after we left! They are just great people and the house is beautiful and clean!!

items.comments: Holly and her team are VERY responsive. We had just a couple of simple things that they immediately responded to. They even followed up after we left! They are just great people and the house is beautiful and clean!!

After our family's first stay at Holly's place, we were excited to return! On our second visit, we found all the features we had liked the first time, plus the dishwasher seemed new.  We also appreciated the ample supply of towels, kitchen ware, and delicious coffee.  As before, it was extremely clean. This time, we missed the monsoons, and were able to swim most evenings in a very pleasant and large pool. I loved looking up at the night sky and the bistro lights lighting up the pool and patio. The location, in a nice neighborhood,  was perfect for appointments in Scottsdale and for dining out.

This is our second time staying here. We went back for a reason! It’s wonderful! All you can ask for. Exactly as pictured and described. Open concept kitchen/living area is wonderful. You will live in the pool. Comfy beds and everything is very, very clean. Host is responsive and makes you feel so welcome. Highly recommend
The house was a perfect place to stay for our few days in town.  Easy Peasy from check in to check out.
Spot on what we expected. Photos do a great job. It was clean and a well run property. Great location and had everything we needed. We would absolutely recommend this place and would stay here again!

Great property for a large group in a peaceful neighborhood. Nice pool and outdoor space for relaxing and fun with family and friends. Kitchen was well stocked and perfect for making a big meal. I’d stay here again for sure!

We are a regular Airbnb travelers and would rate Holly’s place as one of the nicest, cleanest, and real value of all the places we have stayed. The place was very clean, modern, had everything we needed to feel at home

description.summary:
This impressive property was recently renovated, offering a brand-new interior throughout. The open floor plan features a large and inviting living space with new wood laminate flooring. Beautiful quartz countertops and new cabinets complete the kitchen, which is fully equipped with everything you need to cook while you’re on vacation. From stainless steel appliances (oven, microwave, toaster, etc.) to brand new dishes, silverware, and cookware, you’ll feel right at home in your vacation kitchen. We invite you to help yourself to anything in the pantry or fridge, including plenty of condiments, coffee, and tea. 

The two main bathrooms have been expanded to include double vanities so you have plenty of space to get ready. The powder room has fun mosaic tile and is conveniently located right inside the door from the pool for easy access when you’re enjoying the backyard. All bathrooms are stocked with towels, soaps, shampoo, conditioner, and a hair dryer so you have everything you need within reach.

This house has all new furniture, including a brand new sofa sectional sleeper sofa, comfortable brand new tuft and needle mattresses in all 4 bedrooms, and smart TVs. If you need to do laundry, you’ll appreciate the LG front loading washer and dryer (and detergent) in the laundry room. 

Our home is perfect for outdoor entertaining. With a beautiful backyard, you’ll enjoy the large swimming pool, chaise lounge chairs, a new grill, outdoor couch, umbrella, and an outdoor dining table and benches. 

There is a two car garage available for you to park your car or rental. Grab a new JUMP bike by UBER for nearby trails or take for a quick ride to a spring training game.

Guest will have full access to the entire house. 

There is a two car garage which is available for upon request can be used to park your vehicle if you have rented a car.

We will be here for you to ensure you have an great stay.

The property is located in an established neighborhood just minutes away from shopping and restaurants in Old Town Scottsdale. It is also close to Chaparral Park and the Greenbelt which has miles of biking trails.

Arizona TPT Licences Number # Two One Four Five Three Eight Four Five 21453845

Nearby Attractions and Activities

2.9 miles 
Approximately 8 minute drive or Uber/Lyft

Approximately 15 minute drive or Uber/Lyft

Approximately 15 minute drive or Uber/Lyft

description.house_rules: There is not a pool fence so this property is not ideal for young children or for children who are not strong swimmers.

name: Beautiful Lake Travis Waterfront Retreat
title: Austin, Texas

gallery.caption: Relax and revitalise in the spa-like walk-in shower.
Watch boats out on the lake from the comfort of a shaded outdoor sectional.
Laze with a book on a sun lounger overlooking the picturesque lake.
Swim a few relaxing evening laps as the sun drops below the horizon.

hosts.about: Hi, my name is Kim.  I live in Austin, Texas part-time with my husband and 4 children.  We love the Austin sunny and warm weather, going out on the lake, eating at great restaurants, and live music.  We really like the Austin relaxed lifestyle. We enjoy traveling all over the US and the world.  My favorite destination is Kauai.  We enjoy sharing our newly remodeled vacation home situated on Lake Travis with others and hope to make your stay the best ever.

recent.comments: Great place to stay for a big group. We did my bachelor party here and they were incredibly accommodating to our party. I would recommend this place to anybody.

items.comments: Great place to stay for a big group. We did my bachelor party here and they were incredibly accommodating to our party. I would recommend this place to anybody.
Kimberly made our family vacation everything and more! We can’t thank her enough for allowing us to stay in her beautiful home.

I hosted my bachelorette party at Kimberly’s house and we had the best weekend! The pool is the perfect place to be on a hot day in Austin, and the house was so convenient to get to Lake Travis. Kimberly was also a fantastic host with incredibly helpful tips for navigating the area. Would absolutely recommend for a fun weekend!

My family and I had an amazing weekend at this home! The view was stunning and the home was very clean. There were plenty of towels and the pool was nice and clear. Kim is an AMAZING host! She let us check in an hour early and even offered to let us stay as late as we wanted on check out! She is very kind and has amazing recommendations! I have stayed in numerous Airbnbs and this is the best experience I have ever had!

This was the perfect gateway for our family and friends for the weekend! Kim is such a friendly and accommodating host and the house is so beautiful! We really enjoyed the pool and the view of Lake Travis.

Kimberly was an excellent host! She coordinated early check-in and was onsite to greet us upon our arrival. She was extremely communicative and always responded to questions effectively and quickly. The house and surroundings were absolutely gorgeous and also very secluded and peaceful. 

The only challenge we experienced was ordering Ubers for transportation. The house location/directions are not correct within the Uber map system which caused confusion and delays. Kimberly is not at fault for this, but more a heads up for guests looking to get around.

Overall, we had an amazing stay!

Kimberley is very kind, has lots of recommendations, and is responsive. Unfortunately, some of the amenities weren’t up to what we paid for (sheets had stains/hair, one toilet wasn’t working, no body wash in some bathrooms, not enough toilet paper for the weekend). I accidentally didn’t schedule the right amount of people in the app when booking so we owed her more money and while we were working on that with air BnB she would show up at the house unannounced which made us feel uncomfortable.

description.summary:
Experience indoor-outdoor living at a two-acre lakeside retreat with reclaimed hardwood floors and floor-to-ceiling sliding doors. Relax in the infinity swimming pool or the heated spa (pool not heated), then dine out on the large terrace overlooking the water. The property includes direct lake access with private boat dock, including slip to tie up a boat (no lift). The house can sleep up to 22 guests (please note there is a $40 per night, per guest charge with each guest over 6 in number).

This home is situated on nearly 2 acres on the south shore of Lake Travis. It has both indoor and outdoor space. The home has 3 bedrooms with king size beds in each, as well as a lower level (bedroom) with built in bunk beds (3 twin beds and 1 full bed); in addition, there are two comfortable chairs that fold out into twin beds.  The living room also has a sleeper sofa pull out bed in the sectional.  The outdoor space has room for multiple vehicles.  The home also is also equipped with a gas grill, as well as a ping pong table, volleyball net, tether ball, horse shoes, canoe, etc.  The spacious outdoor deck area includes a built in pool (not heated) and spa (heated).  There is also a dock.

Guests will have full access to the entire home and property.  Lake Travis, while deep, is not a constant level lake and trek to water and dock can be rocky and longer depending on lake level.  While it is our intent to provide privacy, owner reserves right to conduct maintenance on yard, pool, dock and other systems.

We aim to provide privacy, but live 10 minutes from property and are available when needed.

The property is very private and sits on nearly two acres on the south shore of Lake Travis, with a dock for swimming and tying up a boat. It's located just 35-40 minutes from downtown Austin.

There is a dock on the property that is fine for swimming and tying up a boat; the dock does not have a lift.  There are several public boat ramps nearby to launch boats.

description.house_rules:
- Only the number of guests on the reservation are allowed on the property unless a separate contract has been signed (additional fees apply if there are day guests - insurance, cleaning, trash, etc.) 
- All guests will need to sign Visitor Agreement immediately upon entering home and property.
- No shoes worn in the house.
- Parents/guardians must watch and be responsible for children at all times; there is a pool and lake which is a safety hazard.
- No wild, loud, or large parties.  We welcome family oriented get togethers such as family reunions, bachelorette parties, small wedding parties. (Subject to rules for events and additional day guests noted above.)
- Please only bring pets (two maximum, dogs and/or cats only) that are house trained and do not sleep in beds. There is a pet fee of $100 for the stay that is used to clean/deodorize and clean any fur, etc. that a pet may leave behind. Additional fees may be applied if warranted. 
- No glass bottles or glass of any type on the pool deck or near the pool.
- No climbing on the rock walls or negative edge pool.
- No climbing or jumping off the balcony.
- Please contain eating/meals to the kitchen, dining table, or outside.
- No parking on the grass.
- The Nest thermostats have a minimum AC setting of 72 degrees and maximum heat setting of 78 degrees.
- Due to amount of technology and amenities in the house, items or systems can malfunction.  Therefore we cannot guarantee that everything will work all of the time.  Repairs, especially on weekends, can be time consuming, often multiple days for pool related repairs.
- Given property's size and amenities, occasional access by maintenance personnel may be required for pool and yard maintenance.  If privacy is of utmost concern please close bedroom blinds and front gate.  On check-in days, with normal check-in of 4PM, owner reserves right to continue yard-work until dusk.
- Guests are expected to clean dishes and utensils before leaving.
- Utmost care in use of the pool by children must be taken, including adult supervision at all times.  Do not swim alone.
- While a BBQ grill is provided, we cannot guarantee that propane will not run out during your stay.  Normally there is an extra tank behind the garage.  If not, tanks can be exchanged at 7-Eleven nearby.
- The home has a Ring system (outside by front door).
- Additional guidelines will be provided prior to your visit

name: Serene Cottage with Beautiful Garden and Heated Po
title: Charleston, South Carolina

hosts.about: Traveling is my passion, and I've loved staying at Airbnb's around the world. This is why I started hosting, and I've thoroughly enjoyed sharing my city with guests.

recent.comments:
This rental was perfect for our family of three. The location is perfect—just a block off King Street, minutes to great shopping, and many excellent restaurants right in the neighborhood. Beaches (Sullivan’s Island, Isle of Palms, etc. are about 20-25 minutes away).

We enjoyed access to the pool which, although shared, was never in use when we wanted to wade in. We also enjoyed access to the courtyard, which felt like a serene oasis in the middle of downtown.

A couple notes for families with infants:
-This rental has many beautiful windows, but that means it doesn’t get very dark, even in the evening. We brought a Slumber Pod for our travel crib and it worked wonders.
-The property is extremely well maintained, but that means that groundskeepers frequented the property (daily in the late morning). Our baby didn’t have any trouble sleeping through it.
-The pool was a great temperature for our baby!

items.comments:

-The property is extremely well maintained, but that means that groundskeepers frequented the property (daily in the late morning). Our baby didn’t have any trouble sleeping through it.
-The pool was a great temperature for our baby!

Charming little guest house! Such a cool space and great hosts. Easy to communicate with, even reached out when something was left behind! Check out was very easy and there was no list of cleaning duties for the guests to complete which I truly appreciate. Location was amazing and the bed very comfortable. Would definitely stay here again- thank you!
Loved this place - already want to go back.

This property was perfect for my wife and I’s stay in Charleston for our honeymoon. The location just a block off King St was perfect for quick and easy access to everything on downtown, and also the bridges across the harbor over to Mt. Pleasant and to Folly Island. We loved how private the house felt, even with the shared courtyard. The owners were quick to respond to any messages, which made us feel very cared for. We can’t wait to come back here and stay again!

This is not a fault of the space, but if you need complete darkness to sleep you might have issues. The the window coverings aren't blackout and let in a lot of light. We did enjoy our stay, it was very close to king street built still felt private.
Loved our stay! Location is perfect, pool and courtyard are lovely and relaxing. Can’t wait to come back!
We loved our stay and will be back on our trips to Charleston!

description.summary:
This unique inviting light filled space boasts beautiful french doors throughout with an unmatched view into the lush courtyard. Plus 1 off-street parking spot! 

Please note this unit is handicap inaccessible. 
Courtyard & Heated Pool are shared.
description.space:
This rental is a two story villa and an incredibly serene and relaxing space. 

On the first floor there is a small kitchenette, large living area with pull out sofa, and half bath. The kitchenette includes a full size fridge, toaster oven, microwave, pots & pans, dinnerware, basic cooks tools, and a stove top with two burners. There is no traditional oven or dishwasher. There is a dining table for two but no formal dining area. 

Sleep comfortably in the king size bed upstairs and enjoy the peaceful natural light that beams through the windows surrounding the entire second floor.

AirBNB is a re-seller, not our website. We list openings not already booked on here and other booking portals that re-sell available nights at a higher rate to cover surcharges & booking fees. With Air BnB: You get an easy to use mobile platform and a quality assurance guarantee.
description.access: Entire rental to yourself. The courtyard and heated pool are shared.
description.notes:
• Please note our strict cancellation policy
• Wifi and Roku streaming device available (no standard cable)
• Please be considerate of our surrounding neighbors and keep noise to a minimum after 10 PM
• 1 off-street parking space provided at no additional cost
• No Smoking
• City of Charleston Operation Permit #OP2023-03447
description.neighborhood: The property is located in the Cannonborough Elliotborough neighborhood of Downtown Charleston, which is considered the most upcoming area on the peninsula. The neighborhood is perfect for a couple or a group who is looking to fully embrace Charleston's unique charm. Step right outside your door and find a wonderfully curated mix of shops, bars, bakeries, and dining. We recommend grabbing a coffee at Brown's Court Bakery before exploring King Street, Charleston's ultimate epicenter of shops and
description.transit: Charleston is a walking city! Uber is widely available. If guests do have a car, we provide ONE (1) off-street parking space. We suggest to bring an economy size vehicle to help with getting around Charleston's narrow downtown streets.
description.interaction: We are onsite and just a phone call away!
description.house_rules:
•Noise is to be kept to a minimum after 10 PM. If this rule is violated guests will be immediately ejected. 
•Our check-in time (4 PM) and check-out time (11 AM). It is rare that we are able to modify these times, please keep this in mind when planning travel. 
•No smoking inside the home. An additional cleaning fee to remove odor will be applied. 
•Please note that our pool and courtyard are a shared space with 4 other units that all sleep a maximum of 2 guests. 
•We are fortunate to be able to provide off-street parking for our guests however please note that parking spaces throughout downtown Charleston tend to be on the smaller side. We recommend an economy size vehicle. 
•Parties and/or events are NOT allowed. If this rule is violated guests will be immediately ejected.
•No pets allowed. 
•Above all, please treat our home with respect.

name: Luxury Spanish-Style Retreat with Pool and Spa
title: Austin, Texas

gallery.caption: Lower level living room/kitchen combo with view of pool area. Sleeps +2 on futon & couch (bedding provided).
Multiple seating areas to enjoy BBQ and relax in main house back yard/pool area. Gas firepit
Large BBQ outdoor kitchen and grilling supplies provided
full size bed in sleeping loft in second floor sleeping area has  privacy curtains.  King bed & single bed also pictured.
Lots of high quality fluffy towels, make up wipes, hair dryers and high end amenities provided.

hosts.about:
Hi it's Sue, welcome!  I have traveled extensively for business and pleasure and know the formula for a successful and pleasurable travel experience.  Reliability, comfort, convenience, and exceeding expectations is how you do it right.  

I love my home and this gorgeous setting and want to share the best of it with you!  If you love sunshine, outdoor activities, exploring historic iconic sites,  fine dining and entertainment, this town is full of fun things to do and explore.  

Anything worth doing, is worth doing right.  As your host, I'll make sure I understand what is important to you during your visit and provide you with tips, recommendations or amenities to make it a success.    Whether here for business or pleasure, we look forward to having you as our guest and making your stay a great one!

recent.comments: My friends and I had the best staycation at Sue’s beautiful space. The guest house had everything we needed and more. The pool was perfect during these grueling hot temps and I think we spent most of our time there. I can’t recommend this enough for a peaceful retreat!

items.comments: My friends and I had the best staycation at Sue’s beautiful space. The guest house had everything we needed and more. The pool was perfect during these grueling hot temps and I think we spent most of our time there. I can’t recommend this enough for a peaceful retreat!

the place is just outstanding, just the way I love it. 

Incredible home, great communication, Just peaceful,clean,great location,safe location, comfortable and feels right at home. 

Definitely coking back.

This is a repeat stay since we enjoyed our time at Sue’s on a previous visit.  Last stay was shortly after Covid & there were still a lot of restrictions in place, but this time we really got to enjoy the surroundings more.  The pool alone is SO nice to relax in & feel like you are away from everything b/c the neighborhood is a beautiful tucked away quiet oasis, but right outside the gate is all the shopping, attractions & conveniences you could possibly want at your fingertips.  Thank you again for another relaxing getaway in your wonderful guest home!
Beautiful summer staycation spot for my family! Very enjoyable for kids and adults.

We really enjoyed our stay!  Pool was great.  Guest house was exactly like it looked in the pictures.  Host was very informative- she gave local recommendations, communicated ahead of time, was very flexible.  Highly recommend.

I stayed here with several of my friends for a chill girl's weekend. Check in was easy, the place was clean, the pool was awesome, and Sue was nice enough to let us hire a massage therapist to come by and give us massages. Overall, we had a great time!
Excellent Airbnb! The property was gorgeous in a super private and peaceful neighborhood. Very much enjoyed the hot tub!

description.summary:
Enjoy exclusive use of this private pool & spa and entire pool area shown in the cover photo. This cozy 850 sq/ft stand-alone, open-concept, guest house has a private entrance and is adjacent to the main house where the host lives. So private does not mean secluded. Small kitchenette, large outdoor dining & grilling area. The open-concept 2nd level (like a large hotel room) sleeps 5 in beds, 1 King, one Twin, and one Full in sleeping loft with privacy curtain. The lower level living room couch can sleep 2 singles(bedding provided). For confirmed guests only, please no parties or visitors.

Private guest house located adjacent to main house located in a quiet upscale neighborhood west of downtown Austin. 

The is a free standing 2 story guest house with 1 King, 2 full beds + 1 full futon, couch sleep 2 more, maximum 7-8 people.  Short drive to Zilker (ACL), Downtown Austin, Circut of the Americas (F1), Austin Bergstrom International Airport. New fresh linens, bath towels and pool towels provided.

Our guests enjoy a private entrance to the two story guest house adjacent to the main house and our guests also enjoy private use of the shared outdoor  living area amenities of the pool, lounge areas, outdoor dining and heated spa.

Host lives in main house adjacent to the guest house.  I welcome guests for check in upon arrival and will be there to answer any questions throughout your stay.  Although the pool/outdoor living area is shared, we are respectful to allow our guests to enjoy this area privately.

The home is situated in the peaceful hill country of Austin with shopping, dining, and a Whole Foods supermarket just one mile away at the Hill Country Galleria. Enjoy the convenience of downtown Austin and easy access to the airport.

There is secure parking available for up to 3 cars should you be arriving by car or renting one.  Uber is convenient for transport to and from the city and easier than seeking parking during special event weekends. Uber from the airport to the home is also a good way to go.  There are presently no public transit routes to the neighborhood.

Because this is a quiet residential area and our private home, please know this is not a party house.  While our guests are welcome to enjoy the shared outdoor space, and we recommend evening use of the spa after a long day. Late night noise, especially outdoors, is not permitted.  Use of the heated spa at night is encouraged, but we ask that our guest be mindful of the noise level in respect of the host and next door neighbor.

description.house_rules:
No smoking, no glass in pool area, be a good neighbor by maintaining a reasonable the noise level when in the common areas and upon exiting and entering the home, especially late at night. No pool use after 11 please. Park in designated area in front of green cones. Not a rental for pool parties, sorry! If you are decorating, use only wall safe blue painters tape on walls.  

Absolutely no confetti /confetti filled balloon inside or outside.  You will be billed for any wall damage incurred during your visit, there will be a $100 additional cleaning fee for confetti.

name: Charming, Cozy Casita with Desert Garden and Pool
title: Tucson, Arizona

hosts.about: My family and I are are British-American and have loved living overseas as we've had the opportunity. We enjoy traveling and adventuring with our little ones, though it is more low key these days! I love good food, experiencing new cultures, photography, and (above all) quality time with my family.  Airbnb has been a great resource for us to have more privacy and flexibility as a traveling family, and I've loved becoming a host and providing a space I'd enjoy staying in myself!

recent.comments: Britt’s guest cottage was absolutely wonderful, clean, and tastefully decorated. We fell in love with the charm immediately and enjoyed the spacious and clean pool on hot summer days. Perfect location if visiting UofA or downtown Tucson, and plenty of restaurants nearby. Would love to stay here again. Definitely recommend.

items.comments: Britt’s guest cottage was absolutely wonderful, clean, and tastefully decorated. We fell in love with the charm immediately and enjoyed the spacious and clean pool on hot summer days. Perfect location if visiting UofA or downtown Tucson, and plenty of restaurants nearby. Would love to stay here again. Definitely recommend.

I could not have asked for a more perfect place to celebrate my birthday. Every need I might have,  thought of, and provided. I so appreciated the natural beauty outside, and the exquisitely decorated inside the casita offered. I also appreciated the quiet, and peace, aware that if I had a need, my gracious hosts were close by, and quick to help and respond. Thank you for the privilege of staying with you.

We loved our stay in this beautiful casita in central Tucson. The entire property is beautiful and our space was clean and decorated very tastefully. The location is great and central to many local restaurants and various activities. We loved having pool access and appreciated Britt being flexible in guest use. Britt was very communicative, quick to reply, and helpful. We would definitely stay here again.

I had a great stay at this Airbnb. It was just as pictured and made for a really comfy spot to come back to at the end of the day. It was ridiculously hot, so having the pool to cool off in was key. Some welcome treats from Estrella Bakery and pre-ground coffee from Presta were great touches (both are well known Tucson spots). The only bummer I had (which wasn't the hosts fault) was that I had some clothes get snacked on by moths when I hung them in the closet. No issues with the dresser or anywhere else! I had a great stay and would stay again! Just would put my clothes elsewhere in the spacious apt :)
Wir haben uns in der Casita sehr wohl gefühlt. Alles war war perfekt!

We loved our stay in the casita!  Space was even nicer than shown in photos.  Great location in Tucson, central to so many restaurants.  Really appreciated the Presta coffee she left for us to enjoy.  The morning light is beautiful but also, bring your sleep mask if you’d like to sleep past sunrise.
Thank you so much!  Lovely place and wish we could have met!  Jan

description.summary:
Step inside the adobe casita, where cool terra cotta tiles and Southwestern decor create a welcoming and authentic atmosphere. During the hot months, get refreshed with a dip into a turquoise pool. In the cooler months, enjoy the very best of Tucson, and come back to the modern desert outdoor spaces to relax- catch rays under a deep blue Arizona sun or find a hammock in the shade. The Casita offers you a thoughtfully designed but laid back space convenient for exploring Tucson, with vintage southwest and mid century style. *Newly improved high speed WiFi 11/1/2021

Our casita is a stand alone guest house that has it's own parking and entrance and enjoys total privacy from the 1930's Spanish Colonial house and pool house on the property. The modern take on South West decor is right at home in this sweet historic property, embracing our desert city's personality. A full kitchen with fridge, oven, gas range, has all you need to cook, and the bathroom is fully stocked with bath towels, soaps, and hairdryer.  There is a comfortable queen sized bed and sitting chair in each bedroom. The simple living area has a small sofa, armchair, and a table and chairs for eating. For your use there is WiFi and TV with access to streaming services.

Guests have exclusive use of the casita and the casita’s walled desert landscapes yard with table, seating, and fire pit. Guests are also welcome to enjoy the pool, grill, and other outdoor spaces that are shared with the main house and pool house on the property. The pool is not heated, and so is best enjoyed late April - October. Guests are free to use the pool at any time of year, but when the night time temperatures are still cool, expect that the water will also be cool accordingly!

My family and I live in the main house on the property, and so are easily accessible by text or in person for any needs or to give tips on enjoying Tucson. Outside of being available and helpful, we will try to stay out of your way and the homes do not overlook one another. In the shared pool, laundry, and central courtyard on the property, you may cross paths with my family or the guests staying in the pool house (when occupied). I provide treats and good local coffee for your enjoyment. I will try to accommodate your needs and can provide things such as a twin mattress or small kitchen appliances.  If you need something you don't see- don't hesitate to ask!

The casita shares the property with the host family's home, and a pool house also available on Air BNB.  Casita guests have their own private yard and seating area, but also can enjoy the shared spaces on the property- A beautiful pool and courtyard. The casita is on a quiet street in Jefferson Park, a classic midtown neighborhood on the National Historic Register. Walk to the streetcar at the close-by University hospital that takes you through the University District, 4th Ave, and downtown.

A car is best for exploring all parts of the city and surrounding areas- a trip up Mount Lemmon or through Gates Pass should not be missed! Tucson is fairly sprawling and parking is not a problem. The street car is accessible by foot (taking you through the uUniversity District, 4th Ave, downtown, the Convention Center and on to the Mercado). If you bring your bike, the neighborhood runs into the Mountain Ave bike path, a good central point to access Tucson by bike. There is a bus stop for Suntran around the corner on Campbell Ave.

Because of our proximity to the hospital, there are occasional sirens/helicopter landings that can be heard in the distance from outside or if windows are open.

The pool is not heated, and so is best enjoyed late April - October. Guests are free to use the pool at any time of year, but when the night time temperatures are still cool, expect that the water will also be cool accordingly!

We also have another listing for our pool house.

description.house_rules: - We want you to enjoy and respect the beautiful indoor and outdoor space. We love families, but please realize there is a pool on the property, and although it is fenced, all guests are responsible for their own safety and that of their children. The pool is not heated, and so is mostly enjoyed between April/May and September/October. Please discuss prior to arrival of outside guests. Expect privacy, but realize there are shared space on the property- if you choose to use the pool, you may see our family or pool house guests (we will communicate regarding pool use to avoid disruption). No drunkenness or loudness permitted. This is a great space for relaxing, enjoying, and accessing the best of Tucson

name: Enjoy View of Creek from Relaxing Poolside Retreat
title: Round Rock, Texas

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: Hello! I'm a single mom of two kids and I love to cook. I'm a RN since 2005. I'm a native Austinite and I'm very interested in holistic nutrition and live a simple lifestyle.

Hi, I'm Shanna! My husband Craig and I are native Texans but we're beach lovers at heart. We enjoy eating out and trying new local foods, coffee, beers and wine. We love traveling and trying new things. Our hobbies include fixing up houses, gardening, aquariums, snorkeling, cooking, painting and arts & crafts.

recent.comments: Shanna’s house was the perfect spot for our 4 family trip to Round Rock for a dance competition at Kalahari Conference Center. The home was less than a 10 minute drive from the Conference Center - right off the main road. The house had plenty of beds and rooms to accommodate our group of 8 adults and 7 children. Amenities like pool, extra large fridge/freezer, two dishwashers, washer/dryer kept everyone comfortable. With many guests showering, we never ran out of hot water. The house has 3 full bathrooms with 3 showers and is stocked with everything you need from pool floaties, to margarita glasses to Bluetooth speakers, coffee, swim towels and snacks. Beyond the pool which was enjoyed by all, the kids and dad’s enjoyed catching fish out of the creek that runs behind the house. We would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for something in the area!

items.comments: Shanna’s house was the perfect spot for our 4 family trip to Round Rock for a dance competition at Kalahari Conference Center. The home was less than a 10 minute drive from the Conference Center - right off the main road. The house had plenty of beds and rooms to accommodate our group of 8 adults and 7 children. Amenities like pool, extra large fridge/freezer, two dishwashers, washer/dryer kept everyone comfortable. With many guests showering, we never ran out of hot water. The house has 3 full bathrooms with 3 showers and is stocked with everything you need from pool floaties, to margarita glasses to Bluetooth speakers, coffee, swim towels and snacks. Beyond the pool which was enjoyed by all, the kids and dad’s enjoyed catching fish out of the creek that runs behind the house. We would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for something in the area!
Very convenient to historic Round Rock.  Great place for a large family.
Shanna was an extraordinary host! This house has everything you need. Very comfortable, very well designed for large groups. Just book it!!

Great house very spacious for a large group of people! Kitchen fridge was dirty when we arrived so had to clean ourselves as well as crumbs of food on the living room floor. Overall beautiful place and hosts were responsive!

What a wonderful last minute find for our family. We were will taken care of by Shanna with her kind and helpful updates and responses to our questions. 
We enjoyed the backyard and the river.
Pictures in the back yard were beautiful. 
The neighborhood is peaceful 
The rooms are nice and they come equipped with just what you need but no clutter. Nice welcoming decor. 
The fridge was huge and we had plenty cooking to do which was easy in this kitchen. 

Small kids need constant supervision because there is an open pool and river out back but the main door has a latch to keep them from opening on their own. The bedroom door did not have a latch and it goes straight to the pool also. Just remember small kids need more attention at this place but we had small kids and did fine with our supervision.

The upstairs loft is so cozy and spacious 
The master bedroom is nice and spacious for multiple sleeping guests 
We will absolutely look this place up again for our next visit! Thank you!

It was amazing staying here with my big group for my bachelorette party! We were able to enjoy the pool but also take 45-ish minute Ubers downtown and to Lake Travis. The hosts were amazing at answering questions leading up to the stay as well as during, very quick at it also!! It accommodated 15 of us nicely! Would definitely recommend!!
We enjoyed our stay so much for the perfect bachelorette trip!! Everything was easily accessible, clean, and very roomy! Would recommend to anyone!

description.summary:
The possibilities are endless in this one of a kind Central Texas home! Swim a few laps in the pool or sit back and enjoy the great view of Brushy Creek. You can even go fishing right from the back yard! This house was absolutely made for entertaining and enjoying life with it's huge covered patio, large open living room & magazine worthy kitchen. It even has it's own bar area! Grill out on the big patio with family & friends or sample nearby bars & restaurants just blocks away. An ideal space for family travelers, ladies/guys weekend, bachelorette gathering, company retreat or business group.

This home was absolutely made for entertaining family and friends with the big beautiful kitchen, picturesque back yard, giant pool, huge outdoor patio, bar, and a giant open living room featuring a 4K HDTV. This is a great space for a bridal party, tasteful bachelor or bachelorette gathering, anniversary dinner, family reunion, ladies groups or birthday celebration! 
This is no cookie cutter house in a sea of suburbs, it's a real central Texas home full of character and charm and has been furnished exclusively for your comfort and enjoyment. House was totally remodeled in 2017 and furnished with a pleasant spa like interior. We put a lot of effort into making it clean, bright and luxurious but still comfortable and fun.
Enjoy a one of a kind back yard where you can nature watch or even fish right from the creek bank. When you're next to the creek it feels like you're in the hillcountry even though you're right in the middle of downtown Round Rock! Prepare a beautiful lunch for your friends and family in the big beautiful kitchen and have lunch alfresco on the patio while enjoying the view. Maybe turn on some music, grab a glass of wine and unwind by the beautiful blue swimming pool. You may even see the local wild parrots fly by. Walk or drive to bars and restaurants from the house and enjoy delicious food, live music and locally made craft beers. Sleeps 12 comfortably or more if you utilize air mattresses & sofa beds.

You will have exclusive access to the entire house and yard including the pool and patio areas. We try and provide everything you need for a comfortable stay including bath towels and beach towels, extra bedding, a fully stocked kitchen. You may host family and friends here for small events. This is really a great deal for big families and executive business travelers. You get an entire house with a private pool, yard and furnished kitchen for less than the cost of a couple hotel rooms.

We offer self check in but owners live locally in town if you need assistance.

Downtown Round Rock has lots of great bars & eateries. Located approx 15-20 from downtown Austin or Domain. If you need additional space & beds, you may be interested in also booking our other space just across the street- https://abnb.me/9JuxUWnKl0

We're 20-30 mins from Austin Bergstrom Airport and about 20 mins to downtown Austin. Main Street & Downtown Round Rock is less than a mile from the house. There is also a beautiful Veteran's Park that has a playscape you can walk to 0.5 mile away. We're a 3 miles drive to Rabb House, 2.5 miles to Old Settler's Park & Dell Diamond or Dell Round Rock. 
There's a bus stop at the end of the street that runs between Round Rock and Austin and Uber & Lyft are available.

We recently enlarged the hall bathroom door to a 32" opening to increase accessibility.

Downtown Round Rock has lots of great bars & eateries. Located approx 15-20 from downtown Austin or Domain. Visitors looking for exercise or time outdoors can explore Round Rock via nearby trail system that runs along Brushy Creek.

description.house_rules:
-Be aware- there is a swimming pool and river on the property
-Children must be supervised at all times
-We ask that you only invite people to the home that you know personally.
-Outside Music must be turned down after 10:00 pm.
-All guests must be courteous and respectful of our neighbors. Please do not block the driveways our mailboxes.
-Be aware, there is a pool and creek on the property **swim at your own risk  
-Please no food or drinks in bedrooms. 
-You must agree to be safe and responsible at all times for yourself & your guests..
-Do not move furniture unless you have permission. Chairs and small tables are okay but please don't move beds, sofas and large furniture around as they can get damaged.
-Please contact me before booking if you plan on hosting anyone not accounted for in the reservation. You will be responsible for any damages to the home by you or your guests.

name: Ultimate Lake Travis getaway!  Pool Spa Kayaks
title: Leander, Texas

gallery.caption: New Crystal Kayaks - Enjoy viewing the underwater lake life on Lake Travis!
Newly decorated master bedroom suite with private bathroom.  Sleep number bed, organic bamboo topper and luxury bedding including 600 thread count sheets.

Sink into this luxurious bed and get the best night of sleep!  Tuft & Needle mint queen mattress with extra cooling a adaptive foam, ceramic cooling gel and edge support, organic bamboo topper and soft cotton sheets.
Two double Zinus green tea cooling beds with organic bamboo toppers and luxurious cotton linens.  (There is also a comfy rollaway bed tucked away in the closet.)
Master bathroom includes a deep soaking tub, rain shower and soft cotton spa robes.
We've just added two 2 person Crystal Kayaks to our collection.  Enjoy viewing the underwater lake life while you kayak on Lake Travis!
EV charger

recent.comments: We had a great family week at the house!  The home itself was beautiful.  Check-in went very smoothly and communication was easy with Kathryn.  The house was very clean, and had everything we needed (including a pack-and-play and high chair for our 1 year old daughter).  The views from the back porch were great, overlooking the pool and Lake Travis.  Hope to come back again.

items.comments: We had a great family week at the house!  The home itself was beautiful.  Check-in went very smoothly and communication was easy with Kathryn.  The house was very clean, and had everything we needed (including a pack-and-play and high chair for our 1 year old daughter).  The views from the back porch were great, overlooking the pool and Lake Travis.  Hope to come back again.

Beautiful place. Awesome pool, hot tub, amazing views, host was great. Kitchen is really well stocked with all the supplies you need. Only negative it is very far from Austin 45 minutes away. Very secluded from any restaurants or shopping.
Excellent host! Incredibly responsive and proactive!!

My friends and I couldn't have had a better weekend. The house was large, clean, and situated perfectly on the lake. We loved the open concept kitchen and large living area. The pool and hot tub provided us with endless fun. Thanks!
Our 2nd time staying here and it was perfect yet again for our families. The most gorgeous views, very peaceful, fully stocked home, easy communication, a wonderful July 4th trip!  Thank you, Kathy!!

Kathryn was amazing with responding to any questions I had within a few minutes. The location is 10/10. We didn't want to leave. Got to see an Armadillo too which was a bonus for me (Im aussie and only ever get to see snakes)
A dream of a place!

description.summary:
* Deep Water Lake Home*

Welcome to GetawayTX Lake Travis Treehouse!  Stunning elegant lake front house nestled in more than an acre of trees. High quality amenities including granite counters and top of the line appliances.  Outdoor grills--Traeger, Big Green Egg and Kitchenaid propane!  Relax in the salt water pool & hot tub (with multi-colored lights) and enjoy watching the sun set over the lake.  Bring along your boat, wave runner & fishing poles, too ... you'll have your own private dock!
description.space:
Enjoy awesome sunset views right from one of our decks, while lounging in the pool or spa, cooking in the gourmet chefs kitchen or while watching the game on one of the flatscreen smart TV's. If going out is your preference, dine al fresco at The Oasis, just minutes down the road. The downtown Austin nightlife is a little over 20 miles away. 

To enhance your stay, we have partnered with local chefs, massage services, boat rentals and even captained boat tours that will pick you up directly on our dock.  To make your trip seamless and experience the best of Austin, let us handle the details so you can arrive and relax.
description.notes:
No security deposit is necessary, however a $79 travel damage insurance policy is required.

Complimentary hot tub.  Pool may be heated for an additional fee.
description.neighborhood:
** Deep water lake front!**

The treehouse is nestled on a quiet private street, but there is still plenty to do nearby. There are boat rentals, Beachside Billy's waterpark, restaurants including The Oasis, the Lake Travis zipline, Miraval Spa, wine & chocolate tasting, and more.
description.transit: Car, Uber, Lyft
description.interaction: I am available by phone, text and email 24/7!
description.house_rules:
*Due to the relaxed lake lifestyle, outdoor quiet hours are 11 pm - 7 am.  (You are more than welcome to be as loud as you want indoors!)

*Guest will not hold the owner liable for losses, damages, or other legal issues.

name: Commodious Condo Close to Old Town Nightlife
title: Scottsdale, Arizona

hosts.about: Hi!  We're Absolute Vacation Rental Services, the hospitality team that supports the best possible trip to Arizona.  We take pride in providing the best service possible - we always strive for 5 star service.

I'm a quick responder and very easy to get along with.  I spent 14 years living in Scottsdale and know the town very well.  

I love to get out and enjoy a sporting event and a great meal!  

I'd like to make your stay enjoyable and stress free.

recent.comments: Este lugar es excelente, encuentras muchas amenidades cerca y a un viaje en scooter o una caminata del centro de diversión de Scottsdale.

items.comments: Este lugar es excelente, encuentras muchas amenidades cerca y a un viaje en scooter o una caminata del centro de diversión de Scottsdale.
Great location. Comfortable bed. Responsive host. I enjoyed my stay.
My daughter and I were in Arizona to visit family. Sean's place was perfect. It had everything we needed. He responded quickly if we had questions. We had a great stay!
Everything was great!
Great stay! Will be back when I’m in town.
Everything was nice an the apt was beautiful, just a few cat hair in some places my wife is allergic to cats but overall it was a beautiful secure place thank you for having us!!!!
Very comfortable and cozy place! Would definitely come back 😁 also Sean was super helpful !!

description.summary:
Log in to Hulu and Netflix on the Smart TV and settle on the sectional sofa to watch a show. Have breakfast on the private patio before heading down for dips in the shared pool and hot tub below. There is also desk with plenty of room in the master.

#21392583

Restaurants and nightlife close by.  This condo has plenty of room.  It has a smart tv you can easily log into your hulu and netflix accounts. It's on the 2nd of two stories.  It has a patio out front if you just want to sit outside.  The pool is located just below the unit.

All access to apartment and community pool.

I’m available by text, phone, or email. My 23 year old son lives a miles away if something urgent comes up. I'm quick to respond.

Stroll to stores and a supermarket, as well as a wide range of restaurants, cafes, and bars nearby, with the host always ready with recommendations. The buzzing nightclubs and other attractions of Old Town Scottsdale are within a couple of miles.

Short walks to most of the things in Scottsdale you want. Quick Uber rides or $1.00 lime bike rides.

There is a lockbox on the front door.  I'll give you the code typically the day before your stay.

There is no cable there so be prepared to login to your own Hulu and Netflix accounts. Don’t forget to sign-out when you leave.

name: 15:38 Sunny Luxury Condo
title: Playa del Carmen, Mexico

location.address: Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico

hosts.about: Hi! My name is Matt, I am Italian and I have been living in Playa del Carmen since 2008. I work in art and architecture, I love to create unique emotions and I will be more than happy to host you! I enjoy meeting and hosting Guests from all over the world. I love to travel, I have a real passion for modern art and culture and I will be pleased to provide you with the best vacation during your stay!

recent.comments: This was our first Airbnb experience. And overall a good one. Thank you. The place was nicely located on a side street just away from the action. It was quiet which was nice and walkable to everything. We felt secure & safe. The apartment was bright and comfortable and the space sufficient. The welcome package of fruit, water coffees and goodies was appreciated. The bed was comfy and although it did not have a full size blanket, we seemed to manage with just sheets and I am sure if requested it would have been provided. We had a couple glitches that were resolved quickly. Maria was very helpful, although we initially had a language barrier issue, technology helped with that.  We could have used a broom for when we came back from the beach. The pool area is small and for us we learned we would have appreciated a better pool area. This is no reflection on Matt. It is a small plunge pool and the roof is tight.

items.comments: This was our first Airbnb experience. And overall a good one. Thank you. The place was nicely located on a side street just away from the action. It was quiet which was nice and walkable to everything. We felt secure & safe. The apartment was bright and comfortable and the space sufficient. The welcome package of fruit, water coffees and goodies was appreciated. The bed was comfy and although it did not have a full size blanket, we seemed to manage with just sheets and I am sure if requested it would have been provided. We had a couple glitches that were resolved quickly. Maria was very helpful, although we initially had a language barrier issue, technology helped with that.  We could have used a broom for when we came back from the beach. The pool area is small and for us we learned we would have appreciated a better pool area. This is no reflection on Matt. It is a small plunge pool and the roof is tight.

this was the best Airbnb I've had so far in Mexico! They include cleaning evey other day in the price and they even make sure you always have water which I've never seen in an Airbnb in Mexico. the location also can't be beat!

We spent almost 2 months living & working remotely in Matt's lovely apartment. He had a couple hiccups in the first few days related to hot water & getting the AC working but Matt was super responsive in getting someone to resolve these issues. However, the apartment was very well-suited for both of us to live & work. We were able to cook lots of meals at home in the kitchen. We also enjoyed the Dolce Gusto espresso machine and sitting on our private balcony sipping our espressos each morning. I also want to say we were especially appreciative of the wonderful housekeeping & water delivery from Maria! She's a true gem and really made our stay feel special!! Finally, the location is great because you're located so close to lots of great restaurants & cafes between Constituyentes & CTM. We really love this area. Thanks Matt!!

pros:
communication from matt, easy access instructions, great housekeeping from maria, location, quiet, welcome snacks, and clean!

cons: smaller kitchen, but not a big deal given the sheer volume of amazing restaurants near by!

This was a convenient, homely, and clean place to stay! Easy to check-in and check-out of, and great access to the beach and restaurants - what more do you need!? Matt was very responsive and helpful with any questions we had.

A really good apartment, and Matt is a great host. Having Maria to take care of the apartment was a big benefit much appreciated. It's was generally quiet minus some barking dogs. The wifi was mostly stable and had a good speed, I was able to work there for a week with a few minor issues. The safe is big enough to fit a couple of laptops and a bunch of other stuff which we appreciated for extra peace of mind. The area is safe in any case.

The location is good, walking distance to the touristy area but far enough to be quiet. It doesn't have an upscale feel yet but it looks like new luxury apartments are coming up in the are all the time. The parking spot was a big plus. We enjoyed getting coffee at Quadra Cafe nearby, and food at COA and El Fogon.

Matt’s place was perfect for our short stay and would also do well for anyone wanting long term. It’s very clean, close to the beach, quite bit close enough to shops and food. Great WIFI for remote workers like my love and myself. We actually worked so much we didn’t have a full chance to enjoy one of the perks like the rooftop pool. Next time. The super plus is Matt’s place is pet friendly.

description.summary:
Look out across Playa del Carmen while enjoying a dip in the rooftop pool of this new Pet Friendly boutique block. The apartment is bright and welcoming (including pets), and the balcony is a perfect place for enjoying the complimentary snacks and drinks.

The condo is just two blocks away from the famous 5th Avenue, where there are numerous shops, restaurants, bars, and clubs. There are also shops and supermarkets that are closer still. In addition, the beach is just a couple of blocks away.
description.space:
The apartment is cozy and comfortable, in a contemporary boutique condo. 

It is fully furnished with modern and trendy decoration for a sophisticated atmosphere you will find nowhere else.

The building has a small but lovely swimming pool.
description.access: The condo offers to our guests a peaceful rooftop where you may cook or simply relax in the swimming pool with friends.
description.notes: We strive for excellence and we will go above and beyond to make sure you will be 100% satisfied.
description.neighborhood: The condo is just two blocks away from the famous 5th Avenue, where there are numerous shops, restaurants, bars, and clubs. There are also shops and supermarkets that are closer still. In addition, the beach is just a couple of blocks away.
description.transit:
Since your are in the center of Playa del Carmen getting around on foot is really simple, you may also get a taxi anywhere for a reasonable price.

If you wish to visit Cancun downtown or Tulum, there is an ADO bus station within a walking distance from the condominium.

Xcaret / Xplor / Xel-Ha theme parks are at 15 minutes drive, while Cancun International Airport is at 40 minutes drive from Playa.
description.interaction: The apartment has a spacious bedroom with a King size bed and a sofa bed in the living room for 1 or 2 more guests, air conditioning, ceiling fans, closet, private balcony, functional and equipped kitchen, coffee machine, luxury bathroom with a large marble shower, parking space... LCD Smart Television, 100Mb High Speed Wi-Fi internet connection...
description.house_rules:
Check in from 12:00 p.m., check out at 6:00 p.m.
We are flexible to times based on reservations.

name: Chic Old Town Scottsdale Condo with Pool, Walk
title: Scottsdale, Arizona

hosts.about:
My wife and I have traveled the world together and have spent a fortune staying at some of the finest hotels. We wanted to offer visitors of Scottsdale a high end, affordable vacation rental that is walking distance to all the greatest places in Old Town. So, we purchased a property, completely renovated it with the highest end finishes and hired a decorator to furnish it to the 9's.  

We have lived in Scottsdale for 5 years so if you need any restaurant recommendations, sporting tickets, golf info, activities - anything you can think of we have probably done it and can help point you in the right direction.  We want you to have a great vacation in our property, we live 2 miles away and can accommodate almost anything you can dream of. 

Mark is a licensed Realtor in Arizona and a professional Air B&B host.   You have nothing to worry about, relax and enjoy your stay in our property.

recent.comments:
Lovely home, exactly as pictured. Very clean, the beds were very comfortable. A/C worked very well. We found the home very quiet. The kids enjoyed a late night swim, right up to 10pm. 

It’s been super hot, so we drove everywhere. 
Phoenix is only a 20 minute drive, Trader Joes is 6 mins drive, old town is a few minutes away as well.

items.comments:
Lovely home, exactly as pictured. Very clean, the beds were very comfortable. A/C worked very well. We found the home very quiet. The kids enjoyed a late night swim, right up to 10pm. 

It’s been super hot, so we drove everywhere. 
Phoenix is only a 20 minute drive, Trader Joes is 6 mins drive, old town is a few minutes away as well.
Todo fue excelente
Great place to stay in Scottsdale
Mark was very kind, attentive and his place was great! Everything was walkable and convenient.
Mark was very responsive and a great host!

Was a great stay! Did have an A/C problem, but Mark was on top of it within minutes at 7am! The condo was better then the pictures! Comfortable bed, great shower pressure, had more amenities then every other place I’ve stayed! Would rent again, highly recommend!

This rental was nice and clean. The neighborhood was safe too. The only downside was the washer and dryer are not in the unit, I think that should be specified in the listing so it is obvious that it’s a community pay to use laundry. Mark helped accommodate a last minute reservation and that was appreciated!

description.summary:
This is our premier property, our designer went all out with a boho chic luxury concept! Everything is brand new and ready for you to enjoy.  King in master, Queen in guest room.  Queen pull out couch in the living room and a high end raised queen air mattress in the closet should you choose to use it.  Property has an open concept layout, 2 big bedrooms and 2 full beautiful bathrooms. You can sleep up to 8. The sheets are all 1200 thread count, comes with soap/shampoo, hair dryer, soft towels etc -  only the best for our guests!  The heated pool is about 20 steps from your door. Unit comes with private parking spot and plenty of visitor parking.  

Living room has a brand new 55 inch LED TV with Netflix and Cable channels, all furniture is brand new and very comfortable (we gave our decorator no budget, she did a great job!). The entire condo is serviced with free lightening fast Wi-Fi.

Entire property

If you need anything, we are available. We only live 2 miles from this Air B & B.

The condo is walking distance to hiking, golf, 5-star restaurants, casual breakfast spots, Spring Training, and nightlife in Old Town Scottsdale. It's a few minutes to Talking Stick Casino, Salt River Fields, Westworld Arabian Horse Show, and Barrett Jackson Auto Auction.

TPT#21403520

There is a free Scottsdale Trolley that picks up across the street from the condo and will take you all over Old Town. There are also bikes or electric scooters you can rent by the hour; you really don't need a car! However, if you do choose to come by car, there is a designated parking spot just for our unit.

This property has a brand new AC unit and Heater - no worries whether it is 100 degrees or 40, you will be comfortable!  Pool is heated. Common BBQ's in the pool area; we provide the grilling accessories. Pack n' play and other baby items available upon request.

No Bachelor/Bachelorette parties, no parties in general. 

Owner/Property Manager lives only 2 miles away and has lived in Old Town Scottsdale for over 5 years. If you need anything or are looking for suggestions just ask!   Front door has a digital keypad lock for easy entry. 

Owner is a licensed Realtor in Arizona and will accommodate your every need, we want you to be happy and come back to visit again!

name: Sleek Downtown Condo w/ Free Parking and Pool
title: Austin, Texas

hosts.about: Adventurous traveler that enjoys life and cultural exchanges. Now have relocated to warm South Florida with my wife Helen and our little ones Sebastian and Victoria

Thank for choosing our home.  Its an honor to host you! Our home has been designed with you in mind, whether you are here for pleasure or for work, we want you to feel like home away from home.  

East Austin is known for its vibrant atmosphere filled with art, museums, bar, lounges, restaurants, live music venues and many more.   Take a stroll on 6th Street any day of the week and experience the true Austin vibes or take the MetroRail  and head to downtown for some additional fun!

recent.comments:
Two out of our four full day stay, the smoke detector kept saying “low battery” every 45sec to 1minute. Even after changing the batteries, this continued. Though not the biggest deal, it was quite frustrating and doesn’t seem as though this was a one-time occurrence. 
Other than that, the unit and stay went well.

items.comments:
Two out of our four full day stay, the smoke detector kept saying “low battery” every 45sec to 1minute. Even after changing the batteries, this continued. Though not the biggest deal, it was quite frustrating and doesn’t seem as though this was a one-time occurrence. 
Other than that, the unit and stay went well.

Great place for all kinds of travelers - families, couples, friends, etc. 
Helen was super responsive for anything we needed.
The condo is clean, organized and it has everything you need to make yourself at home.
100% recommended!
What a great place! Location was perfect. We enjoyed East Austin. Restaurants nearby are some of the best in the City. Great view of the pool. Relaxing and everything we needed. Hope to stay again!
Beautiful home, close to everything, comfy furniture. Will definitely stay again.
Excellent option, great location, and felt very safe!

Helen’s place was 10/10 would definitely recommend staying there- very clear instructions on how to navigate the building. Helen was very responsive. The pull out bed in the living space was also much larger than anticipated which was a plus. Very clean!

A good spot for my work trip. Easy and flexible check-in, as advertised, had what I needed. It's in a big complex that's a little short on character (you'll have to leave the condo to find weird Austin), but it was spotless, comfortable, in a good location for my needs, and had everything I needed (except cable for the sportsball broadcast I wanted to watch). Would stay again.

description.summary:
Enjoy amazing up to 25% DISCOUNT rates for extended stays (30+ days) ideal for DIGITAL NOMADS and free cancellation 

Whether you come to play or work - this modern 1/1 unit includes lots of features:

- Open Floor Plan
- Digital Keypad Access
- High Speed WiFi
- Co-Working Spaces
- Balcony with pool view 
- Dedicated washer and drier 
- Assigned garage parking 
- Outdoor dinning Areas and BBQ
- Luxurious property pool 
- On-site property management 
- Walking distance light rail station

Bold Texas-inspired artwork enlivens the cool gray decor of this chilled abode with a balcony above the shared pool and retro striped loungers. If you are visiting for pleasure or work, take a seat in the community lounge which features an open-plan urban oasis filled with natural light.

Brand new condo for you to enjoy! Near downtown Austin with access to Austin's greater areas also via light rail, bicycle, car or plain walking

Guest can have access and enjoy freely to the entire property limited. This is limited kkto the number of people staying in property (4) maximum per the STR permit.


Guest Parking: There is guest parking on 2 near the doors to go into the south elevator area.  Spots 89-92 and 98-101

The complex is walkable to must-visit Austin hotspots in East Downtown including chic cocktail bars and unique Tex-Mex cuisine. Light rail connections are within walking distance, making it easy to explore further afield.

Minutes away from downtown Austin. Access via Metro Rail (4th Street - Saltillo Plaza) serving the greater Austin area, walking distance from Downtown, on-site Jump Bike station or via car as well

description.house_rules:
We hope you enjoy your stay in your little home away from home. 

Before checking out please be sure to review and follow the instructions below to help welcome the next guests checking in:   

-Place all garbage in trash bins.
-Load all dishes in dishwasher and leave then washing 
-Return anything moved back to its originsl location 
-Leave white towels only washing 
-Leave linens and pillows on top of bed
-Be sure to check for any items that may have left behind 
-Turnoff lights & AC
- Lock door

Lastly, please kindly depart by 11am so we can prepare the house for our next set of guests. Have a safe journey home!

name: New Single Level Ranch Home by Highland Park with Pool
title: Dallas, Texas

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
We have been hosting and traveling on Airbnb for many years now, and love every bit of it. We truly believe its a chance to see the city you are visiting like a local, and we make sure to help with that. 

Dallas has been our home for over a decade and we think it has so much to offer. We are always willing to help find a cool place to eat or a fun local bar. 

Hosting guests started out as a side hobby but has turned into a full-time gig, and we wouldn't have it any other way. We are passionate about making sure you have a seamless comfortable stay and if it's your first time booking on Airbnb we aim to make you an Airbnb booker for life. We have hosted celebrities, workgroups, families, weddings, and everything in-between. 

We are excited to host you and your group, please reach out with any questions at all!

recent.comments: Great property and great host!

items.comments: Great property and great host!

We were 6 adults staying here and it was roomy and everyone had enough space. The main room was terrific and the kitchen especially was stocked well enough that we could cook and have several doing food prep as the island was so large!
We could have used a few more towels but the washing machine and dryer were convenient and easy to use. 

Other than that the place was great and would totally rent this again - Just in a little cooler weather!!!!!
I’ll also note that the owners were very responsive to any of my questions and we really appreciated that!!!

The house is centrally located and close to Love Field airport. Easy access to most Dallas highways. Pictures are accurate and house has been decorated very tastefully.  The housekeeping staff did a great job of cleaning and everything was spic and span.  There are lots of eateries within a reasonable driving distance.
Keith communicated all throughout the process and was very responsive with our queries.  Unlike other AirBnbs where rules are galore with fines for every small actions Keiths place had basic common sense rules that every guest should know and adhere to. The pool was an added bonus to cool off in the Texas heat. Will definitely stay here again if the opportunity presents itself.
LOVED THE HOUSE! IT WAS SUPER CLEAN AND THE HOST WAS SUPER AWESOME FOR HAVING THE HOUSE READY AT SUCH SHORT NOTICE! THE HOUSE IS BEAUTIFUL! THANK YOU!
Beautiful home, quick weekend family trip was a success the boys loved the pool each got their own bedroom it was amazing

What a great place!  Besides the beautiful accommodations that had everything we needed (and I do mean everything!), Keith was a great host who went the extra mile.  When someone booked the place for the day before us, we thought we had lost the  the ability to check-in early, which was going to be a problem for my unique circumstances -- until Keith  rearranged his cleaning crew to accommodate my needs!   Wow!  I can't thank you enough!  Soon after check-in, Keith brought over MORE pool toys for my grandson. Keith was a great communicator every step of the way. It was obvious he wanted our stay to be awesome - and it was. I also appreciated how Keith cares about his neighbors and makes sure his guests are never a nuisance.  I will gladly stay in any of Keith's properties in the future.
Kieth was great! I am booking my next business trip as I write this review. This will be the only place we stay in Dallas

description.summary: Step through one of the 12-foot-wide sliding glass doors to watch the sunset from the patio while the built-in BBQ cooks dinner by synthetic grass and a private heated spa/pool. An open-concept interior means space galore while the master bathroom has a big double-head rain shower and twin vanity. The kitchen is fully stocked with double ovens, a Jura espresso/coffee machine, and a huge kitchen island. Relax and enjoy the large open-concept living area or work hard on the Peloton bike.
description.space: The printed house manual includes how to operate all 5 smart TVs, wifi password, and checkout procedures. Pre-wired smart home with Nest, Alexa/echo, and Sonos equipment.
description.access: You will have full access to the home. Rooms, bathrooms, and laundry room. Please make yourself at home!
description.notes:
You have access to the 2-car garage, and it is very quick and easy to Uber to all the hot spots in Dallas. There's easy access to Highland Park Village and Love Field. Plus, it's right next to Inwood Village, which is home to some of the best restaurants that Dallas has to offer. Both downtown and uptown are easily reachable as well: 
- 1 mile from Inwood Village
- 1.6 miles from Highland Park Village
- 2.4 miles from Dallas Love Field Airport
- 4 miles from Downtown Dallas
- 5 miles from Lower Greenville
- 6 miles from Trinity Groves
Enjoy your escape!
description.neighborhood: From here, there's easy access to Highland Park Village and Love Field. Plus, it's right next to Inwood Village, which is home to some of the best restaurants that Dallas has to offer. Both downtown and uptown are easily reachable as well.
description.transit: You have access to the 2 car garage, and it is very quick and easy to uber to all the hot spots in Dallas
description.interaction: I love to meet guests when they arrive, but when I can’t it is very easy to self check in. I am always available for texts and calls with any questions
description.house_rules:
Past midnight, Please respect the neighbors
No smoking inside the property $250 fine 
No parties- $500 fine
No unbooked guests at home- $300 fine
No confetti, glitter, or hanging things on walls- $200 fine 
No glass in the backyard- $200 fine (monitored by the outdoor camera)
Must disclose pets PRIOR to the booking (unauthorized pet $300)
$75 one-time pet fee per pet for your entire stay. $150 if we have to clean up after your dog. 

No one in the pool or hot tub past 10 pm


Pool/Hot Tub Heating offering:
If you would like to utilize our heating amenity for the pool and spa, please let us know 24 hours before check-in. The fee will need to be paid then as well. Pool heating requires a three consecutive day minimum. Additional fees will be collected through Airbnb after your booking is confirmed, and are listed below:
Summer Pool/Hot Tub Heating (June-September): $50 per day
Winter Pool/Hot Tub Heating (October-May): $95 per day

gallery.caption: Sparkling clean walk in shower. Hairdryer, shampoo, condiitioner, body wash all provided.
Watch Netflix, Roku and YouTube TV  on our Smart large size TV screen.
Sparkling heated pool in the winter! Grills to BBQ and outdoor tables.
