hosts.about: Hi!  My husband and I have travelled extensively and have lived overseas for several years in Italy, and Abu Dhabi, in the Middle East. Some favorite places that we have traveled to are; The Maldives, South Africa, the Far East and anyplace off the beat and path! We have a good feel for what makes people comfortable when they are traveling and have incorporated these things into our condo. We've been in Phoenix for 33 years now and love Arizona. I am a metalsmith, love gardening, decorating, the outdoors and rescue animals. I am originally from Vancouver, BC and my husband is originally from New York City.

recent.comments: Great place. Great location. Great host!

items.comments: Great place. Great location. Great host!
Excellent host, great location, quiet neighborhood
Everything was perfect! It was very clean, the pool area was nice and Kris made sure we had everything we needed ! Will book for our next trip to Scottsdale !

Despite the weather being 110+ our entire trip, we absolutely loved our stay in Scottsdale!  The condo was gorgeous and Kris was quick to respond to any questions we had.  The AC and beautiful pool kept us nice and cool :).  I would highly recommend staying at Kris’ place and hope you enjoy it as much as my fiancé and I did!

This was a great place to stay for a few days. The air conditioner works great and there’s a pool in the area so the weather wasn’t too big of a problem. It’s great to have all the amenities you may need to live for a few days including a nice washer and dryer as well as the dishwasher. I have absolutely no complaints about our stay here and would happily stay here again – in fact, I probably will stay here again if it’s available when I need it. The location is also unparalleled in old town Scottsdale.
Everything I needed for a week stay was there. No complaints whatsoever. Good place to stay. Go eat some Cornish Pasty and Malees Thai nearby. :)

We loved our stay!! It’s an awesome space in a great area and Kris is wonderful and very communicative and helped us out when we needed help! Within walking distance of a lot of good shops and food places. Would recommend

description.summary:
We provide Roku with subscriptions to Netflix & YouTubeTV, which gives you lots of movies, TV, football, basketball, golf, & screen mirroring. The condo is equipped with fast internet so you can work remotely in your dedicated work space. This airy hideaway features a shared heated pool and BBQ patio for leisurely evenings. Just a short 5-minute walk to the heart of Old Town where you'll want to explore some of the best restaurants, museums, bars and shopping. Then head back to this tranquil, landscaped complex and relax under the shaded patio with a drink at the cherry-red patio bistro set.

Please check out our other condos. One more 1 bedroom and a newly remodeled 2 bedroom. All in the same complex! 
https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/23668036  https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/32311594
HERE'S WHAT GUESTS ARE SAYING:
Jeff from Ohio -
We had the best time and LOVED both the unit and the location. We had high hopes but the reality was even better. The pool towels, the hair dryer, the full array of kitchen implements, two televisions and etc. and etc. All the amazing little details added to the total experience. This was 10 times better than the commercial hotel chain we stayed with last year. Thank you!

Veronica from California - 
“Just perfect. I loved everything about this place. It’s stylish, extremely clean, safe, quiet and comfortable. Everything was easy, and extras like snacks, charging station, toiletries, pillows, much appreciated...This host obviously used her own experiences from traveling to create such a thoughtful and welcoming space. There’s a legit fully equipped kitchen, and it’s THE best location in Scottsdale. I walked alone to bars, restaurants, grocery, circle K, and never waited longer than 3 minutes for an uber. The grounds were lovely, and my fellow over-packers will be thrilled to have a parking space 5 feet from the back door. Thank you Kris, I’m already planning my return!”

About our condo:
- Everything is new, modern and bright! Custom designer details throughout.
- Self check-in with keypad
- Back and front access to condo. 
- Choice of pillows - Down, Foam, Alternative Down
- Luxury King size bed in Master
- Queen size high-end mattress in sofa pull out. 
- Business desk with plug ins and a charging station. 
- 50" Samsung Smart TV in livingroom
- 43" Samsung Smart TV in bedroom
- Walking distance to great restaurants, nightclubs, Scottsdale Art School, Farmer's Market, museums, art galleries, Fashion Square Mall, SF Giants spring training, Hiking, biking and much more. 
- Washer and dryer in condo.
- Iron, ironing board
- Bochures and maps of the area. 
- Dishwasher
- Fully stocked kitchen
- Coffee, Tea, Sugar and Creamer


About the complex:

Relax and enjoy some peaceful time in this beautifully landscaped quiet complex. Perfectly located in the heart of Old Town Scottsdale.

- Reserved covered parking space #25, with back door and front door access to our first floor condo. 
 - Free parking on the street. 
- Mid-century modern complex built in 1958 that houses just 31 condos. Lushly planted and beautifully maintained. 
- Heated pool
- Grills and dining areas off the pool.

Guests are welcome to use the pool, full condo, grills, outdoor dining areas, reserved parking space and extra free parking on the street.

I invite you to have as much or as little interaction with me as you like.

I live within 10 minutes of the condo. If you need anything during your stay please contact me by phone or text, I will get back to you as soon as possible. Usually within the hour or less. If you need help with anything please feel free to contact me. If I am unable to help you my assistant will contact you. I want you to have the best experience possible!

This small (30 condos), quiet condo complex is around a block and a half away from Old Town Scottsdale, among the most vibrant, unique urban downtown centers in the American Southwest. Pedestrian-friendly streets are home to world-class art galleries, fine dining, and nightclubs. Home of the San Francisco Giants Spring training field at Scottsdale Stadium is just a 15-20 minute walk. Lots of golf courses, hiking, Phoenix Zoo and Botanical Gardens are all close by.

Easy to get around by walking, bike rentals, electric scooters, golf carts or take the FREE Trolley that runs every 10 minutes throughout Old Town.

We are excited to share our condo with you! We hope you have an enjoyable stay. If there is anything we can do to make your stay more pleasant please don't hesitate to contact me.

NOTE: Winter rates change from current rates.

name: Comfy Bijou Studio in Trendy East Austin
title: Austin, Texas

hosts.about:
Travel is my passion and my favorite thing about it is meeting new people and new walks of life.  Sharing our home is a way to keep that connection open when I'm not traveling myself.  Austin offers everything I love to do, festivals, music, movies, hiking and a very easy going and laid back population that loves good food, good drinks and fun company.

Follow us on IG: @austincoolstays

recent.comments: Absolutely stunning and quiet treasure near downtown. The condo felt like home and I would consider staying here again the next time I visit Austin. It was walkable to many great nightlife spots. The host is very attentive and responsive to all my questions. Overall, staying with Rocio’s condo and the vacation was a 10/10 experience. ❤️

items.comments: Absolutely stunning and quiet treasure near downtown. The condo felt like home and I would consider staying here again the next time I visit Austin. It was walkable to many great nightlife spots. The host is very attentive and responsive to all my questions. Overall, staying with Rocio’s condo and the vacation was a 10/10 experience. ❤️
Clean linens, comfy but more firm bed, nice complex. Great stay!
Excellent location. Perfectly clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay here again. Rocio was super responsive and helpful.

Don’t think twice,  just book it. Absolutely perfect location just at the east end of all the action on 6th. 

Pristine apartment, squeaky clean!

Rocio was super responsive and allowed us to check in early and also store our bags after check out time which helped us massively. 

Perfect stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at this studio. The space had a fully stocked kitchen and it was walkable to restaurants and bars.  Rocio was a great host and quick to respond. I would recommend this space and would stay here again.
It was close to 6th street. Check in process was very easy. Definitely would recommend.
Rocio’s place was great. We had a small hiccup getting in, and she went above and beyond to make it right. We truly enjoyed our stay and location. Thank you!  We look forward to visiting again

description.summary:
If you need a quiet get away from the current state of affairs, we have been cleaning our condo with hospital grade cleaners and following the airbnb protocol during the Covid-19 state. This allows us to disinfect everything and clean things under procedure that protects us and our guests. 
 
During your time, take in leafy views from a gray sectional sofa on a vintage-style rug. Make home cooked meals in the fully prepared kitchen and have peace from the chaos. Enjoy walks in the eclectic neighborhood and nearby park. Try local restaurants or simply, stay in and relax.

This studio holds up to four people and comes with free parking for one vehicle.  There is a queen size bed, and the sofa bed sleeps two people.  

This location is ideal for visiting Austin for events; ACL, SXSW, Formula 1, corporate apartment living.  Or simply to come to Austin for exploring and enjoying our city.

Guest can use the on-site pool, Reserved Parking, and washer & Dryer.

The home is in the heart of East Austin, walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, markets, and nightlife. Visit Attabar and Lazarus Brewing. It’s a short walk, even shorter drive to downtown, and 2 blocks to the metro. Rent scooters and bikes right outside.

Two blocks away is the metro, catch the train up north or next stop over to the convention center.

title: Austin, Texas

hosts.about: We are a family with two teenage children that enjoys to travel to explore new places. We love hosting people at our beautiful Airbnb located in Austin Texas.

recent.comments: We had a great stay at Chris and Vanessa’s place! It was squeaky clean, we loved the pool, and wonderful location. It was private enough to feel secluded, but only about 10 min Uber ride to Rainey st. Great restaurants nearby. We enjoyed the house and the wonderful pool for a girls bachelorette trip. The hosts were very friendly and responsive, would be a wonderful house for families! I would definitely recommend this house to others

Beautiful home!

All-around great stay at Chris and Vanessa's for my family. The house, the pool and the location were all standouts for adults and kids alike -- as was the pinball machine! As described, the location is an ideal combination of quiet neighborhood and walkable/very accessible to key areas.

Chris and Vanessa were very responsive, and made the whole process easy from start to finish.

Hope to stay again!

The house felt like you were in a cool tree house. Great place to gather and location was good and central to everything. Pool was nice and refreshing. House was comfortable and quiet for all us. Definitely a very nice stay.
The home is well kept and very clean! Super close to local parks & pools! A perfect stay for summer vacations!

Everything about our stay was perfect.  The house was phenomenal; beautifully decorated with top of the line linens and towels, a very well equipped kitchen, and a lovely, private pool.  Also, all the beds and pillows were extremely comfortable!  The location was amazing. We walked to Barton Springs, Zilker Park and restaurants/coffee shops on Barton Springs Rd.  The ping pong machine was tons of fun!   Chris and Vanessa were wonderful hosts.  We highly recommend this house!

We had a great stay here. The space was spacious, tranquil and had many amenities to offer. Vanessa was able to let us check in early and was very responsive to all inquiries we had prior to our arrival

description.summary:
Head out for breakfast tacos on foot, walk to Zilker Park, take a dip in the private pool or just stay inside and rest in a light-filled living space with high ceilings, hardwood floors and smart tv's.

The house is just two miles from downtown in a safe, quiet neighborhood. Walk to Zilker Park, the Town Lake hike and bike trail, and great restaurants and bars on Barton Springs Road and South Lamar. All major ride-share companies operate here.

This is a non-smoking and pet free home.
description.space:
This spacious home is in the very heart of Austin - just a few blocks away from Zilker Park and 2 miles from downtown. 

The home offers 4 bedrooms and three full baths to accommodate a family or large group. A swimming pool in the backyard, large screened-in porch, full size piano, smart tv's and even a pinball machine are there for your entertainment. 

The house is tastefully furnished and decorated, and the home is in perfect condition.
description.access: The home sits on over 1/4 acre with a gated backyard, and you will have access to it all. The swimming pool in the backyard is gated as well for safety. We provide you with a key code to the house and passwords to the wifi and then hope you enjoy your stay!
description.notes: This is a non-smoking and pet free home.
description.neighborhood: The house is just two miles from downtown in the safe, quiet neighborhood of Barton Hill/Zilker. Walk to Zilker Park, the Town Lake hike and bike trail, and numerous restaurants and bars on Barton Springs Road or South Lamar.
description.transit: Many of Austin's top attractions are within walking distance, but a car is very helpful to get around the city. Bicycle rentals are available a few blocks away as well.
description.interaction: Our professional property manager is available as needed.
description.house_rules:
Please review rental rules before confirming. Confirmation of reservation conveys acceptance of rental rules. Thanks! :-)

1.	The following are NOT allowed at this property: 
   a.	Use of glitter, confetti, and tape on the walls, furniture, or any other part of the house inside or out. If any of these items are found after check out, a minimum of $100 will be charged.
   b.	Smoking, vaping and illegal substances
2.	POOL RULES:
   a.	Swim at your own risk and no diving
   b.	No glass containers in or around the pool
   c.	Do not remove pool robot from the water 
3.	No people other than those in the Guest party set forth above may not stay overnight. 
4.	No parties or loud noise. The homeowners reserve the right to terminate the rental early if there is a party or noise violation.
5.	PETS are NOT allowed at this property.
6.	Do not flush anything other than toilet paper. If you cause a plumbing problem by this, you will be charged for the plumbing repair.
7.	AGE REQUIREMENT - Minimum age requirement. Inquire BEFORE booking.
8.	PARKING – Driveway parking is available. Street parking is also allowed.
9.	HOUSEKEEPING: There is no daily housekeeping service. Bath towels and pool towels are provided. Towels and linens may not be taken from the house.
10.	The Homeowners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise.

description.summary:
Embrace the luxury of this tastefully appointed condo. The residence features unique artwork, cheerful colors, contrasting motifs, wood finishes, and access to shared amenities including hot tubs, a BBQ patio, and a pool, all on the rooftop.

Lunada is located in the heart of Playa del Carmen, close to all the best activities and amenities of Playa and 1/2 way between Cancun and Tulum.  

Once you arrive at Lunada you will be impressed as soon as you walk in the door.  Walk into the fully equipped kitchen with adjacent dining area and drink bar and start to unwind.  As you open the double patio doors the hammock looks inviting while you look at the peaceful courtyard.  Watch a movie on the 55" smart flat screen TV or enjoy your music via blutooth on the stereo while you relax on the comfortable couch with a refreshing beverage.  

Down the hall you will find two relaxing bedrooms both with their own full tile bathroom and rain shower heads in both showers to start your day right.  The master bedroom has a king size bed and a 48" smart flatscreen tv.  The second bedroom has 2 double beds and a walk in closet complete with a safe for your valuables and electronics.

When its time to cool down, head up to the rooftop.  This is in one of the best rooftops around with a pool, lots of loungers, 2 hot tubs a and a BBQ grill.  There are plenty of tables for socializing and meeting people from around the world.  Later head down to the gym for a cardio workout or utilize the multiple free weights or machines to keep fit, even while your away.

Of course you will want to go to the beach, so a 10 minute walk down 38 ave gets you right in the middle of one of the nicest beaches in Playa.  White sand and warm water will have you reaching for your camera for that postcard picture in paradise.

Just a 5 minute walk from world famous 5th ave brings you to world class restaurants and shopping.  Bars, dancing and entertainment are endless here as there is something for everyone.

Also within a 30 minute drive of the Condo:

Multiple golf courses
Cirque de soleil
Wet and Wild Cancun/Ventura Park
Xcaret, Xplor, and the new Xsenses
Xoximilco
Xel-ha (40 min)
Akumal for snorkelling with turtles

After all those activities and a long day you need one thing:  a quiet location so you can get a good nights sleep.  Lunada is close to the action but also tranquil and quiet.  Enjoy the comfy beds with quality bedding so you are rested to do it all again tomorrow.

Stay with us and and start creating your memories!

Full access to rooftop pools and Jacuzzis.  There is a full gym for workouts and common areas for sitting/tanning.

A property manager is available for any questions, needs or concerns.  He speaks Spanish, English and Italian.

Perfectly situated between 5th Avenue and 30th Avenue, there are a multitude of restaurants, grocery stores, and shops close to the apartment. It is also an easy walk to the beach through one of the nicest neighborhoods in the city.

The condo is in walking distance to everything.  Cabs if you need one are plentiful and go by the front door every few minutes.

recent.comments: It was exactly like described and great location.  It’s perfect for a group or large family. The 4 bedroom and 4 bath was exactly what we needed.  The groceries were all ready and stocked that we ordered when we got to the apartment. The front desk was very accommodating seeing if we needed anything. We will for sure stay again.

items.comments: It was exactly like described and great location.  It’s perfect for a group or large family. The 4 bedroom and 4 bath was exactly what we needed.  The groceries were all ready and stocked that we ordered when we got to the apartment. The front desk was very accommodating seeing if we needed anything. We will for sure stay again.

We stayed in the Natchez 3301 - great location for my group of 9 guys. Nicely furnished place and great walkable location within 5-10 min walk to Bourbon/French Quarters in one direction and the casino in the other direction. Clean and safe location with secure access and easy check-in with a front desk. Nice courtyard with pool and several hot tubs. Will be back soon!
We had a great experience at The Natchez! Everything was as described and pictured. They were also the BEST host communicator I’ve ever had on Airbnb. No issues.
Loved this place. Josiah and the other employees were very helpful and friendly.
Great place, in a convenient location. would definitely stay there again!
The host was the best we have experienced.  Look forward to going back!!
Great location just blocks from the riverfront and the French Quarter!

description.summary:
Located a short 3 minute walk from the French Quarter and close to the Convention Center, Superdome, Smoothie King Center, Aquarium of the Americas, and World War II Museum. This luxury condominium is perfect for a family and friends get away. This property was built in the 1830's and has been beautifully renovated into luxury rental condominiums. This condo features high style with ample original art, photographs, and richly appointed furnishings. All of our countertops at The Natchez are custom made out of 200+ year heart pine timbers that were meticulously reclaimed during the renovation and restoration of this historic Greek Revival building.

This 4 bedroom 4 bath unit is a very comfortable at about 1,500 sq ft. The living/ dining/kitchen are “open floor plan style” designed for socializing. All appliances are top of the line stainless steel. The unit is richly appointed with original paintings, art work, and local photography. The exposed brick walls, exposed beams, cathedral ceilings, and large windows blend with the modern furnishings and contemporary art. The bedrooms are quaint, functional, with en suite baths and located just off the main living area. One bedroom is quietly tucked away on the split level up a few steps from the living room. All bedrooms are richly appointed and have either a king size or queen size bed. Most bedrooms have huge 4’ x 4’ sky lights with motorized blackout shades. The kitchen is equipped with glassware, plates, flatware, pots, pans, etc. Simply walk in, unpack your bags, and enjoy your trip-- everything else should already be taken care of. This units is located on the top (3rd) floor.

The pool, grotto, cabanas, sun deck and the hot tubs are immediately accessible in the courtyard to the rear of the property. There are 4 hot tubs on the property: two of them are private to the two units that have their own private 2nd floor patio decks and 2 are available to all guests with both freshwater and saltwater options available for your enjoyment. Enjoy a midday or night dip in the swimming pool or lounge in the grotto. Sun bathe on the sun deck overlooking the pool or relax in the cabanas.

Feel like kicking back and cooking at home? No problem, gas grills are available to grill your favorite steak or burgers and fully stocked kitchens are at your disposal in your unit. The pool and grotto are accessible all year long and the pool and hot tubs are always heated in the winter months.

For more information on larger or smaller units, visit our direct website by searching for The Natchez Vacation Rentals

Multiple condos available for rent in this building in case your group needs more space than just this condo. Follow the links below for more!

3304 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/15358307
1103 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/16027665
1104 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/16027863
2204 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/16027956
2202 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/16028030
3302 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/16028160
1101 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17382969
1102 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17383120
2201 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17383220
2203 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17383315
3303 https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17383359

A 24 hour front desk / concierge is located on the property to allow for checkins 24 hours a day and to help with any questions. 

The pool, grotto, cabanas, sun deck and the hot tubs are immediately accessible in the courtyard to the rear of the property. Two hot tubs are available to all guests with both freshwater and saltwater options available for your enjoyment. Enjoy a midday or night dip in the swimming pool or lounge in the grotto. Sun bathe on the sun deck overlooking the pool or relax in the cabanas.

Rest well knowing that you are safe and sound in this very private and secure property with security cameras (none inside the actual condo) and keyed access to the building and your condo. If you have any questions about the condo or New Orleans in general, we have a 24 hour concierge available by phone or in person.

There's always something happening in the French Quarter and business district, be it a festival, parade, convention, or just a beautiful day. Take a paddlewheel cruise, go on a horse drawn buggy ride on a cool night, and explore jazz clubs and bars.

Many major attractions in New Orleans are walking distance from our condo. If you would like to visit Uptown or the Garden District we are only 1 block from the Streetcar stop that will bring you to those parts of town in style. Uber, Lyft, and taxis are all very readily available from the property.

The condo has a fully equipped kitchen: dishes, glasses, flatware, and cookware. Washers and dryers are available for your use. All linens are provided and replacements and extras are available upon request. Pool towels are also available to enjoy the pool and hot tubs.
Please note we require a credit card and matching government-issued ID to be presented upon check-in. This card will not be charged but is required in case of incidentals, and must be on file before we provide keys to the unit.
description.space:
Located a short 3 minute walk from the French Quarter and close to the Convention Center, Superdome, Smoothie King Center, Aquarium of the Americas, and World War II Museum. This luxury condominium is perfect for a family and friends get away. This property was built in the 1830's and has been beautifully renovated into luxury rental condominiums. This condo features high style with ample original art, photographs, and richly appointed furnishings. All of our countertops at The Natchez are custom made out of 200+ year heart pine timbers that were meticulously reclaimed during the renovation and restoration of this historic Greek Revival building.

This 4 bedroom 4 bath unit is a very comfortable at about 1,500 sq ft. The living/ dining/kitchen are “open floor plan style” designed for socializing. All appliances are top of the line stainless steel. The unit is richly appointed with original paintings, art work, and local photography. The exposed brick walls, exposed beams, cathedral ceilings, and large windows blend with the modern furnishings and contemporary art. The bedrooms are quaint, functional, with en suite baths and located just off the main living area. One bedroom is quietly tucked away on the split level up a few steps from the living room. All bedrooms are richly appointed and have either a king size or queen size bed. Most bedrooms have huge 4’ x 4’ sky lights with motorized blackout shades. The kitchen is equipped with glassware, plates, flatware, pots, pans, etc. Simply walk in, unpack your bags, and enjoy your trip-- everything else should already be taken care of. This units is located on the top (3rd) floor.

The pool, grotto, cabanas, sun deck and the hot tubs are immediately accessible in the courtyard to the rear of the property. There are 4 hot tubs on the property: two of them are private to the two units that have their own private 2nd floor patio decks and 2 are available to all guests with both freshwater and saltwater options available for your enjoyment. Enjoy a midday or night dip in the swimming pool or lounge in the grotto. Sun bathe on the sun deck overlooking the pool or relax in the cabanas.

Feel like kicking back and cooking at home? No problem, gas grills are available to grill your favorite steak or burgers and fully stocked kitchens are at your disposal in your unit. The pool and grotto are accessible all year long and the pool and hot tubs are always heated in the winter months.

For more information on larger or smaller units, visit our direct website by searching for The Natchez Vacation Rentals

description.access:
A 24 hour front desk / concierge is located on the property to allow for checkins 24 hours a day and to help with any questions. 

The pool, grotto, cabanas, sun deck and the hot tubs are immediately accessible in the courtyard to the rear of the property. Two hot tubs are available to all guests with both freshwater and saltwater options available for your enjoyment. Enjoy a midday or night dip in the swimming pool or lounge in the grotto. Sun bathe on the sun deck overlooking the pool or relax in the cabanas.

Feel like kicking back and cooking at home? No problem, gas grills are available to grill your favorite steak or burgers and fully stocked kitchens are at your disposal in your unit. The pool and grotto are accessible all year long and the pool and hot tubs are always heated in the winter months.
description.notes:
The condo has a fully equipped kitchen: dishes, glasses, flatware, and cookware. Washers and dryers are available for your use. All linens are provided and replacements and extras are available upon request. Pool towels are also available to enjoy the pool and hot tubs.
Please note we require a credit card and matching government-issued ID to be presented upon check-in. This card will not be charged but is required in case of incidentals, and must be on file before we provide keys to the unit.
description.neighborhood: There's always something happening in the French Quarter and business district, be it a festival, parade, convention, or just a beautiful day. Take a paddlewheel cruise, go on a horse drawn buggy ride on a cool night, and explore jazz clubs and bars.
description.transit: Many major attractions in New Orleans are walking distance from our condo. If you would like to visit Uptown or the Garden District we are only 1 block from the Streetcar stop that will bring you to those parts of town in style. Uber, Lyft, and taxis are all very readily available from the property.
description.interaction: Rest well knowing that you are safe and sound in this very private and secure property with security cameras (none inside the actual condo) and keyed access to the building and your condo. If you have any questions about the condo or New Orleans in general, we have a 24 hour concierge available by phone or in person.
description.house_rules:
- $250 smoking/damage fee
- Parties and events are not permitted. Please check with the host if you have concerns regarding whether your group is considered a party or event
- All guests must be registered with the host at least 48 hours in advance of arrival. If guest list is not received, the reservation will be cancelled
- Maximum of 10 guests allowed on the guest list, including reservation holder

recent.comments: I have found my go to every time I’m in New Orleans. The hot tub was so awesome and the view of the business district from it was even better. The building, the design, and the upgrades were definitely oozing New Orleans meets luxe! The staff was so incredibly friendly and accommodating! They not only allowed me to check in a little earlier per request, my daughter stubbed her toe very very bad last night and we needed a quick first aid kit, and to the rescue they came within minutes! I am so happy I found The Natchez. My mom doesn’t even like New Orleans and is ready to come back strictly for The Natchez. Thank you guys!

Awesome place

We had a wonderful stay at The Natchez. The front desk staff was friendly and quick to respond to any questions. They were extremely helpful and went above and beyond our expectations. The space was clean and comfortable and we would definitely return.

PERFECT location!! Easily walk to everything with ease! We were able to park right outside under the patio and keep eyes on vehicles which was comforting for us. The condo offers so much space and allows you to really feel at home and settled versus living out of suitcases. 
The staff were very friendly and helpful at every turn!! We appreciated the communication and ability to reach out with ease for assistance!!!
Luxurious.  Well appointed.  This was a great place.  I'm so happy we stayed here.
Great space and great location. Everything was super walkable and convenient. Space was well equipped and the beds were very comfortable. We all had a great time.
We had a great time!  Front desk staff was great, and the location is very walkable to everything in the French Quarter.

hosts.about:
Soy una persona a la que le gusta mucho leer y viajar. Uno de mis escritores favoritos es Stephen King ya que toca temas cotidianos y de ellos saca historias magnificas. 
En cuanto a los viajes, me gusta mucho ir a lugares fríos. Al vivir en Cancún, el calor se vuelve aburrido, pero no quiere decir que sea malo, ya que también me gusta la playa, pero prefiero los lugares con menos temperatura.
Otra cosa que me podría distinguir mucho, es la música. Me encanta la música Rock y la clásica. Muchos de mis viajes han sido para ir algún concierto. Considero que con la música no hay que limitarse, si es necesario viajar, pues viajamos!!!

Hola! Estamos encantados de recibirte en nuestra comunidad, tratamos de formar lazos fuertes con nuestros huéspedes y ayudarlos en lo que necesiten, nuestros departamentos fueron creados con lo mejor para que tu estancia sea siempre confortable y te sientas como en casa.

Como locales, nos encantaría darte recomendaciones de nuevos lugares para visitar durante tu estancia.

Todo fué creado para tu comodidad, estaremos felices de recibirte.
......................................................................................................................................................

Hello! We are delighted to receive you in our community, we try to form strong ties with our guests and help them in whatever they need, our departments were created with the best, so that your stay is always comfortable and you feel at home.

As locals, we would love to give you recommendations of new places to visit during your stay.

Everything was created for your convenience, we will be happy to receive you!

¡Hola! Mexicana y arquitecta de profesión. Amante de la vida, viajar y los gatos. Desde hace 6 años he sido parte del equipo de diseño de los departamentos que rento, esto me llena de satisfacción personal y profesional.  

I'm very enthusiastic about life, architecture and cats (I secretly love cats. Well, not so secretly). 
Everybody is welcome in my place and my country, which I would love to share. It's always a pleasure to share my work with the people I host. It's been three years now I have been part of the design team that built the departments I rent, it is VERY special for me to have guests enjoying their stays.

recent.comments: I had a great stay at Hola Donceles! It was clean and cute and easy to check in. The cafe at the bottom was a nice convenience. I’d stay again.

items.comments: I had a great stay at Hola Donceles! It was clean and cute and easy to check in. The cafe at the bottom was a nice convenience. I’d stay again.

A truly amazing and beautiful place! It is located in a charming and quite tipical mexican neighbourhood. The place is very well furnished, modern and cozy at the same time. The neighbourhood is quite, safe and authentic. Would really highly reccommend it to anyone! 10/10
Muchas gracias … volveremos

esta fue mi tercera vez
hospedarse en donceles. Súper cómodo, seguro y muy bien decorado! . definitivamente me quedaría aquí de nuevo!  :)
Exactly as expected, lovely place, we had the opportunity to mingle with the locals in multiple occasions to get recommendations for the best activities, thanks for everything Donceles!

Très bien 👍🏼 L’appartement étais propre, très design avec avec une belle décoration et beaucoup de détails qui rendent l’appartement très cozy. Nous avons passé un moment agréable dans un cadre de vie vraiment mexicain ( pour ceux qui veulent se sentir à la place d’un habitant du mexique). Merci 😃🙏🏼

It was a great experience to stay at Donceles’ apartment! The neighbourhood is calm and authentic, and the building itself is small and quiet. The apartment has access to the rooftop with a fantastic view and a small swimming pool. There’s a lovely cafe downstairs where you can find tasty breakfast options. The flat itself is comfortable and enjoyable, with great, modern design. It was better than we expected! ☺️

description.summary: The home sits in a family neighborhood between the downtown and Isla Mujeres, close to the ferry and Hotel Zone. Markets, malls, and restaurants run along two of Cancun's main streets nearby. Walk or bike to Isla Mujeres and Puerto Juarez beaches.
description.space:
The loft is ideal for travellers who wishes to know the real Mexico!
Totally equipped with: a queen size bed (150 x 200 cm/4,92 x 6,56 in), sofa bed for extra guests  AVAILABLE JUST FOR RESERVATIONS UP TO 3 PEOPLE (120x180cm), fully equipped kitchen, private bathroom with rain shower, smart TV, working table in case you need (don’t forget you are on holiday) and a balcony with a hammock to enjoy the morning or the evening. The loft is at 2nd ground floor of a three story building.
description.access:
-A/C.
-Wi-Fi.
-Smart TV 43".
-Safe.
-Street parking lot.
-Rooftop garden with sea view, pool, grill, table and chairs to enjoy the day.
-Portable crib (subject to availability).
-Private airport transportation (with extra cost).
-Luggage storage service before check-in and after checkout.
-A park with a playground for kids next to the building.
description.notes:
HOUSE RULES
Please keep the rules in mind always!
-Not unregistered visits after 8:00pm are allowed inside the premises.
-Building public areas access are from 09:00am-09:00pm.
-No yelling at the hallways.
-Keep the volume in a respectful level, there will be more people resting.
-Smoking is not allowed inside the rooms. You can always use the rooftop
-It is important to take care of the objects inside the room, please avoid any misuse of them. Extra charges will be applied for any missing or damaged objects, sheets or towels. We understand there may be accidents, but we believe is important to be honest and responsible for your acts.
-There is no "late checkout" service. After 11:10 am it'll be charged 15 USD. If the Studio is not empty at noon, the charge will be for the entire night. All charges will be made through Airbnb.
-If you lose the keys the cost to replace them will be 50 USD.

WEATHER NOTE: Don't forget that Cancún has a tropical climate in which, during summer and rain season, is pretty normal to have mosquitos and ants in the property (even if we treat with insecticide every 15 days).
description.neighborhood: The home sits in a family neighborhood between the downtown and Isla Mujeres, close to the ferry and Hotel Zone. Markets, malls, and restaurants run along two of Cancun's main streets nearby. Walk or bike to Isla Mujeres and Puerto Juarez beaches.
description.transit: It’s very easy to get here by taxi or walking. Inside the studio I left the bus route, you can use it to move to downtown or Hotel zone.
description.interaction: Always glad to help you! Whether I am busy, I am always available through Airbnb chat, under any convenient, if you have any doubts please do not hesitate to contact me for making your stay as comfortable as possible.
description.house_rules:
1. Avisar con anticipación de huéspedes extras.
2. Se apreciaría avisar con anticipación la hora de llegada y salida del estudio.
3. Cuidamos el ambiente, si no estas, apagar el aire acondicionado, ventiladores y luces.
4. Solo se puede fumar en los balcones del departamento.
5. Entiendo que vienes de vacaciones, pero en el edificio hay más personas que les gusta descansar. Por respeto a los demás habitantes del edificio, después de las 10:00pm se agradecería tratar de no realizar ruidos fuertes.
6. Habrá cargos extra por cualquier objeto perdido o roto, toallas y sábanas dañadas. Entendemos que pueda haber accidentes, pero creemos en la importancia de ser honesto y hacerse responsable de sus actos.
7. Solo se aceptarán modificaciones a las reservas con 15 días de anticipación antes de la fecha de llegada.
8. La reposición de llaves perdidas tendrá un costo de 50 USD. 
9. Tener cuidado con los objetos olvidados después del checkout ya que no nos hacemos responsables por nada dejado en la propiedad.

1. Inform about extra guests with anticipation.
2. I would thank any anticipated information of check in and check out times.
3. Let's take care of our environment, If you're going out, please turn off the AC, fans and lights.
4. Smoke is only allowed at the balconies.
5. I understand you are on vacations, however it is important to consider there are other persons living in the building, and have their needs of resting at night. For respect to them, I will kindly ask you to please not make loud noises after 10:00pm.
6. Extra charges will be applied for any missing or damaged objects, sheets or towels. We understand there may be accidents, but we believe is important to be honest and responsible for your acts.
7. Modifications in reservations will be accepted with at least 15 days notice before the arrival date.
8. If you lose the keys the cost to replace them will be 50 USD. 
9. Please be extra careful to not forget anything before your check-out, we are not responsible for any damage or theft to your personal property.

A 24 hour front desk / concierge is located on the property to allow for checkins 24 hours a day and to help with any questions. 

The pool, grotto, cabanas, sun deck and the hot tubs are immediately accessible in the courtyard to the rear of the property. Two hot tubs are available to all guests with both freshwater and saltwater options available for your enjoyment. Enjoy a midday or night dip in the swimming pool or lounge in the grotto. Sun bathe on the sun deck overlooking the pool or relax in the cabanas.

Feel like kicking back and cooking at home? No problem, gas grills are available to grill your favorite steak or burgers and fully stocked kitchens are at your disposal in your unit. The pool and grotto are accessible all year long and the pool and hot tubs are always heated in the winter months.

Rest well knowing that you are safe and sound in this very private and secure property with security cameras (none inside the actual condo) and keyed access to the building and your condo. If you have any questions about the condo or New Orleans in general, we have a 24 hour concierge available by phone or in person.

Within easy walking distance of all main attractions downtown, including the French Quarter, Bourbon Street, Smoothie King Center, the World War II Museum, Harrah's Casino, and the Aquarium. There are countless amazing bars, restaurants, & venues nearby. If you want to visit the Garden District, just hop on the street car one block away. Business travelers will be happy to know that The Natchez is located in the Central Business District and is a 10 minute walk from the Convention Center.

Many major attractions in New Orleans are easy walking distance from our condo. If you would like to visit Uptown, Mid-City or the Garden District we are only 1 block from the Streetcar stop that will bring you to those parts of town in style. Uber, Lyft, and taxis are all very readily available from the property.

The condo has a fully equipped kitchen: dishes, glasses, flatware, and cookware. Washers and dryers are available for your use. All linens are provided and replacements and extras are available upon request. Pool towels are also available to enjoy the pool and hot tubs.
Please note we require a credit card and matching government-issued ID to be presented upon check-in. This card will not be charged but is required in case of incidentals, and must be on file before we provide keys to the unit.
description.space:
Located a short 3 minute walk from the French Quarter and close to the Convention Center, Superdome, Aquarium of the Americas, and World War II Museum. This luxury condominium is perfect for family and friend get-aways while also being conveniently located for corporate needs or trials at the Federal Courthouse. This property was built circa 1830 and has been beautifully renovated into luxury rental condominiums. The unit feature high style with ample original art, photographs, and richly appointed furnishings. All of our countertops at The Natchez are custom made out of 200+ year heart pine timbers that were meticulously reclaimed during the renovation and restoration of this historic Greek Revival building.

This 4 bedroom 4 bath unit is a very comfortable at over 1,500 sq ft. The living/ dining/kitchen are “open floor plan style” designed for socializing. All appliances are top of the line stainless steel. The unit is richly appointed with original paintings, art work, and local photography. The exposed brick walls and large french doors blend with the modern furnishings and contemporary art. The bedrooms are quaint, functional, with en suite baths and located just off the main living area and one is quietly tucked away on the split level up a few steps from the living room (see light blue area in floor plan above.) All bedrooms are richly appointed and have either a king size or queen size beds. The kitchen is equipped with glassware, plates, flatware, pots, pans, etc. Simply walk in, unpack your bags, and enjoy your trip-- everything else should already be taken care of. This units is located on the 1st floor and has easy access to the pool, grotto, and courtyard.

Multiple condos available for rent in this building in case your group needs more space than just this condo. Follow the links below for more!

hosts.about: Hi! I'm Jana- pronounced (Yahnah). I am a friendly host who loves to travel & loves Venice Beach! I can't live without my daughters, my dogs and California living.

recent.comments: We had such a wonderful time staying at Jana's place. The room was comfortable, had more than we needed, and we slept great both nights. Jana herself is lovely as well as her many adorable pets. We used the sauna and the pool without issue and made use of the plentiful space. We hope to come back here someday again soon, such a great location and beautiful place to stay.

items.comments: We had such a wonderful time staying at Jana's place. The room was comfortable, had more than we needed, and we slept great both nights. Jana herself is lovely as well as her many adorable pets. We used the sauna and the pool without issue and made use of the plentiful space. We hope to come back here someday again soon, such a great location and beautiful place to stay.

Phenomenal space and host. Jana was friendly, helpful, and accommodating when we requested to drop our bags off early. I would love to stay at Jana's place every time I visit Venice. Loved every minute of the stay.
The best stay ever! Absolutely loved every minute of it. Make sure you save time to hangout by the pool and with the dogs. Everything you could ever need or want is there.
Incredible place, great ameneties, the pool, spa and sauna combo is amazing. Jana is a fantastic host and she offers great recommandations. Highly recommend.
Super cute place I loved everything about it!! Jana was super friendly and helpful and made me feel right at home! Had an amazing stay here, wish it could have been longer!

we had an amazing stay here! We loved being able to use the bicycles to go to the beach/restaurants. The pool was incredible and a great way to cool off. The neighborhood felt welcoming and safe. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb and would come back.

Jana ist eine super Gastgeberin und sehr zuvorkommend. Gebrauchtes Geschirr wird gespült und bei Nachfrage auch mal eine Maschine Wäsche gewaschen. Die Bettwäsche und die Unterkunft ist super sauber. Leider ist die Unterkunft nur für zwei Personen, da wir gern mit unseren Kindern wiederkommen wären.
Danke für alles Jana, wir hatten eine super Zeit.

description.summary:
You have a charming Spanish 1926 architecture pool house. It’s located in the back of my house with all of the amenities necessary to enjoy your stay.

***MUST LOVE DOGS: I have 2 small friendly dogs that live with me in my house in front, I will keep them inside for the most part while you are here, but they will be around.
description.space:
This listing is for 2 adults only. This is a studio with 1 queen bed. Your bathroom is outside, but fenced in with a surfboard door and private.
The pool house is 7 blocks to the beach, about a 15 minute walk, or 5 minute bike ride to the beach. Abbot Kinney Blvd has the coolest shopping & some excellent restaurants to explore.
description.access:
-Private gated keyless  entrance
-Washer & dryer
-Unique outdoor cabaña with fire pit next to pool for hangout
-outdoor dining area with fire pit
-pool use depends on if you can swim 
-free access to bikes, boogie boards & skateboards!
- Hot tub takes 45 minutes to heat up & is available upon request. Arrangements need to be made ahead of time.
- Natural gas BBQ
description.notes: There is plenty of free street parking. Just pay attention to street cleaning days so you don't get a street cleaning ticket ! Tickets are $73.00!
description.neighborhood: Venice Beach is arguably the most relaxing and exciting part of Los Angeles. It is a bohemian chic beach town with fun bars and a number of fantastic restaurants. Venice is located in between Santa Monica and Marina Del Rey.
description.transit: If you rent a car, there's plenty of free street parking, and I have 6 beach cruisers & 2 skateboards available! Uber & Lyft is also a car service that can drive you anywhere you want to go! There are also electric scooters & bicycles everywhere that you can rent by the minute & they go really fast! Bird, Lime & Jump are the companies that have free Apps that you’ll need to download into your phone in order to rent electric scooters or bikes.
description.interaction: If I'm here when you arrive, I usually meet my guests and am a friendly and helpful host! You have your own private space behind my house.

-No parties
-No smoking inside pool house. Outside is ok.

hosts.about:
Mi nombre es Carmen, estudie educación y baile. Soy una persona muy amigable, me gusta tratar a todos mis huéspedes como a mí me gustaría ser tratada. 
Quiero que sientan confianza y que pregunten sus dudas tanto de nuestro apartamento como de la ciudad. Pero sobre todo, deseo que la pasen increíble en esta Gran Ciudad de México, eso me hará sentir muy feliz :)

recent.comments:
It was such a nice stay!! 
It was what we needed to have a quiet and very chic place to stay, to work some hours and come back to rest after a busy afternoon sightseeing, and Carmen was such a great host from the moment of the booking.

items.comments:
It was such a nice stay!! 
It was what we needed to have a quiet and very chic place to stay, to work some hours and come back to rest after a busy afternoon sightseeing, and Carmen was such a great host from the moment of the booking.
Carmen was a great host. She was very kind and attentive. She even messaged me during my stay to make sure I was having a great time. 10/10!

Este ha sido uno de los mejores apartamentos en los que me he hospedado por muchas razones. La host súper comunicativa y proactiva, el apartamento limpio, acogedor y con todo lo que uno puede necesitar durante su estadía, el edificio y vecindario seguro, el personal de seguridad dele difícil amable y muchas cosas interesantes alrededor. Me encanta que la host toma el tiempo de dejar agua, refrescos, cerveza, jugos y frutas para sus huéspedes. Café y té nunca te faltarán. Muy agradecidos por todo.

Me encantó hospedarme aquí! 
Estuve por un mes, y de verdad que no le falta nada. Todo muy cómodo, amplio y fresco. Me gustó que la zona es muy segura y céntrica para transladarte.
La Sra Carmen es una super Anfritiona, ella tan amable, siempre estuvo al pendiente de cómo estaba, y dispuesta a responder y solucionar cualquier inquietud a tiempo. 
Pude tomar el servicio que ofrecen de limpieza con la Sra Nere y lo recomendo.
 
Seguro volveré muy pronto!

Carmen es una excelente host. Desde que reservamos hasta la fecha de salida, siempre contestando todas las dudas y brindando apoyo. El lugar está muy acogedor, cerca de la zona de restaurantes y shopping de polanco y en general muy buena ubicación. Definitivamente regresaría para mi siguiente viaje a CDMX.

Carmen's place was perfectly laid out and had everything we needed for our first time in Mexico City. The bathroom is very nice and had lots of space to hangup our clothes. We would definitely recommend this place to others!

El departamento es precioso e impecable. 
Está muy bien equipado también, tiene todo lo que uno necesita para una estadía de varios días y está ubicado en una zona muy segura. Carmen fue tan atenta y considerada, siempre respondió mis dudas en cuestión de minutos.

El barrio es muy seguro, todo está muy cerca: Polanco, Palmas y Reforma, donde encontrarás los mejores bares, restaurantes, centros comerciales de lujo, galerías y museos.

Smart T.V.

gallery.caption: Beautiful plants that give you the true Palm Springs EXPERIENCE!
We have thought of EVERY detail to ensure you have an AMAZING experience in our kitchen! You will LOVE to cook again!
Custom made decor designed for this home!
Walk the streets and neighborhoods of celebrities lived!
From the moment you arrive, you will fall in LOVE with this home before even walking inside! But once you enter, true elegance is displayed!
Everything you need to catch of some work while you are away!

hosts.about: We rent more than a Vacation Home; we create EXPERIENCES with EVERY HOME! Thousands of hours go into each home’s design before opening it to the first guest! Our primary focus is to ensure that EVERY guest has an AMAZING EXPERIENCE from the beginning of the booking process until checkout! Our mission is to create memories through travel; that can last a LIFETIME! All of our homes are constantly changing to ensure that guests' stays at each property are simply beyond AMAZING!

recent.comments: Troisième séjour depuis 2019, et comme d’habitude, il n’y a pas la moindre déception. Cette maison a un charme fou, dans un pure style californien, la piscine est grande, l’espace est extrêmement bien aménagé à l’intérieur comme à l’extérieur. L’accueil est amical, on se sent vite chez soi et il est toujours aussi difficile d’en partir. Encore une fois, je ne peux que recommander cette maison sans émettre la moindre réserve.

items.comments: Troisième séjour depuis 2019, et comme d’habitude, il n’y a pas la moindre déception. Cette maison a un charme fou, dans un pure style californien, la piscine est grande, l’espace est extrêmement bien aménagé à l’intérieur comme à l’extérieur. L’accueil est amical, on se sent vite chez soi et il est toujours aussi difficile d’en partir. Encore une fois, je ne peux que recommander cette maison sans émettre la moindre réserve.
A beautiful couple’s vacation. Very kind hosts.  😍 Supplied with everything you could need…. Full kitchen, Private pool, relaxing home, and close to all the local amenities. Would book again!

We wanted to get away for a few days but not travel far and we wanted a pool. Steven's place was perfect for us. The house was perfect for two people, plus we brought our dog. The house had everything we needed. Basically, we wanted to relax in the pool and spa and not worry about cooking. There are plenty of restaurants nearby which we took advantage of. There are also parks nearby with plenty of grass to walk the dog.  The binder Steven provided everything you needed to know about the house and Palm Springs (restaurants, places to visit...,). We plan on returning soon.

I had a great stay! It was extremely hot outside during my stay, but stayed nice, cool, and relaxing inside. Made very good use of the private pool! Antonio met me when I arrived and was super welcoming, walked me through the whole place, and had great recommendations about different things to do!

Steve's place was everything we wanted for our week vacay in Palm Springs. The house was cozy, all the tools we needed in the kitchen we had it (and we did a lot of homemade meals during our stay). The pool was A-M-A-Z-I-N-G, honestly the best we've had in all times we stayed in Palm Springs, just perfect to beat the heat. I'd say the highlight for me was the bed, so comfy!
Steve and his team were super responsive whenever we needed them, had great recommendations for us around town, super clear and friendly communication. 
Would love to come back next time we're in the area!

We love staying here! This was our third stay because it’s such a great space, great location, and the hosts are awesome. Bed is super comfortable, the house is always extremely clean, and the pool is great! Highly recommend staying here on your trip to Palm Springs.

This is my 3rd time staying here and it’s just as good as the first time.  Very nice and relaxing.  Everything is so clean and tidy.  You have all the amenities that you’ll ever need.  

Steven is super quick to respond to any questions I may have had.  You won’t be disappointed!  Looking forward to the next time my wife and I visit.  

Thanks again Steve!

description.summary:
City ID#1837
Open the zesty yellow terrace doors and bring the outdoors in for a chilled breakfast at a vibrant, plant-filled Airbnb PLUS hideaway. Hop on our bikes, take a leisurely tour through the neighborhood, and then soak up the sun on a pool float.
This home has been featured as the top home for a couple's getaway in Palm Springs in local and national magazine publications with a stunning PRIVATE pool and spa!
Come to Palm Springs to EXPERIENCE the MAGIC of the Dream Home!
description.space:
You will be AMAZED at this home so close to downtown! You will never want to leave this stunning piece of Palm Springs!

You will also have your very own remote control gate to park your car next to your home behind a self closing gate. You are welcome to invite friends over for a small party or cookout on your grill. All the kitchen utensils are provided. You just bring the food and start grilling!

The home is FULL of TECHNOLOGY from Alexa, to a Nest thermostat and even control the temperature of the spa directly from a wireless tablet in the home!

The home has amazing ambiance overlooking a heated pool and spa.

The home has a queen bed with a memory foam mattress and bamboo pillows. It also has a couch in the same room that could be used for a child or an adult. The home is full of beautiful MODERN furniture to give you the true Palm Springs Experience. The Dream Home is completely surrounded by a privacy fence which gives you complete privacy during stay!
description.access: This is your home while you are here. From the time you check in, the home and the pool & spa area are exclusively yours.  Your will also realize for the rate you are getting an amazing deal with all the amenities included.
description.notes:
There are always amazing things to do in Palm Springs!

Use the links below to find a great event to attend while you are in town. 

(URL HIDDEN)
description.neighborhood: Sunmor Estates is a central Palm Springs neighborhood comprised of a remarkably intact collection of mid-century homes built by the Alexander Construction Company and a few by Robert C. Higgins and Jack Meiselman in the late '50s and early '60s.
description.transit: The heart of Palm Springs is 1.7 miles. A short drive by car or by bike.
description.interaction: The owner reside in another home on the property for any questions you may have. However, the owners will give you space surrounded by a private fence to insure you have a great experience.
description.house_rules:
We are looking forward to you having a great time at the Dream Home on your upcoming trip to Palm Springs.

We want to make sure that you a great time and leave with some wonderful memories to reflect upon for many years to come. 


Please remember the City of Palm Springs has a MINIMUM AGE REQUIREMENT for booking Airbnb properties. The Minimum age is 25 years old! Valid ID must be shown at checkin. 

Please review the the Dream Home House Guidelines below so that you familiarize yourself with what to expect as you begin your stay at the Dream Home. 

CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT TIME
* Check-in time is 3PM - 8PM. 
* Please call 1 hour before your arrival. 

*Checkout time is 11:00 AM. This is critical to insure the Dream House is ready 
for the next guest. Any late checkouts, not approved, will be charged another day plus reimbursement of other guests expenses.

* Upon checkout leave the key and gate remote on the center isle countertop. 
* There is a $50.00 charge for the house key not being returned. 
* There is a $75.00 for the gate remote not being returned.

PARKING
Guests have their own park ing space(s). You must park in the only the space setforth by the City of Palm Springs code.

PETS
* Sorry only ONE dog is allowed at this location per stay!
* There is a an additional pet fee of $75 per stay payable prior to arrival.
* Pets are NOT allowed on any furnishings.  

POOL AND PATIO AREA
* No glassware in the pool area. We have specialty glasses for you to use.
* Make sure to turn off outside grill after each use.
* After pool use, please dry off before sitting on furnishing to avoid additional charges that may result from damage of the fabrics. 
* Pay careful attention to fabric and bed furnishings.
* Please turn off the barbecue after each use. 

SPA HEAT CHARGE
* No charge 12 months a YEAR!
* Open 24hrs

POOL HOURS
* Open 24 hrs 

POOL HEAT FEES 
(Oct 15 -November - December - January - February - March - April -May 15) to 82 degrees the following fee will be applied;
*$60 per day plus 12.5 % palm springs taxes - ! Mandatory pool fee.
* Pool Heat Charges tracked by Pentair Software program during your stay.
* Pool heat invoice charges will be sent a week or two before check-in. 
* Payment must be made via Airbnb.

GENERAL
* Please make sure to lock all doors when you leave your home for excursions to protect your valuables. 
* To keep our beautiful property rates extremely low, please clean up after yourself before check out by placing trash in all available trash cans. 
* Guests staying longer than a week have washer and dryer privileges.
* No food in the bedroom area. 
* If you use the guest bicycles, please make sure to lock the bikes each time you arrive at a destination. Please advise that you assume all risks associated with riding the guest’s bicycles included but not limited to theft or any injury that may occur.
* Permission from the host is needed for any additional visitors. Please remember 
  you assume all responsibilities for your guests. 
* No smoking or burning candles/incense on the premises are allowed at any 
   time. A $250.00 fine for any smoking on the property will be charged at the time of check out. 
* No drugs on the property will be allowed at any time. 
* Please keep noise to a minimum after 10 PM out of respect for neighbors.
* All damages, if any, will be billed against security deposit on file.
* Owner is a clean, quiet, takes pride in his home, and is respectful of his 
   neighbors. Guests should be the same. 

LIABILITIES
* Homeowner is not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises of this property or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. 
 
By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that Guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they may invite, with Homeowners consent, to use the premise.
* A thorough walkthrough will be completed by the owner after checkout.
* Please report any damages that may have occurred to avoid hefty credit card charges for damages.  
* Any evidence of damage caused by Guests will result in additional charges to the Guest, depending on the extent of the damage. The Homeowner reserves the right to assess damage and charge Guest as needed.

name: Secret Getaway Nestled in a Woodland Setting
title: Lackawaxen, Pennsylvania

recent.comments: We had a great time, plenty of things to do in the area.  I love that Carla was very responsive and that my dogs were welcomed with no problem at all.  We felt very safe and enjoyed the games, fire pit and bbq.  The pools were great, we also enjoyed the beach area and the kayaks and peddle boats.  We also liked that restaurants weren’t too far away.

items.comments: We had a great time, plenty of things to do in the area.  I love that Carla was very responsive and that my dogs were welcomed with no problem at all.  We felt very safe and enjoyed the games, fire pit and bbq.  The pools were great, we also enjoyed the beach area and the kayaks and peddle boats.  We also liked that restaurants weren’t too far away.

Our family of four had a great stay. we enjoyed everything about the home and activities in the community.  The home was exactly as seen in th photos. This was our second stay and will definitely return.

This was the perfect summer getaway. The space was comfortable and felt very homey. It was outfitted with everything we needed, and the host responded quickly when we couldn’t find something we needed, bringing it to our door right away. The setting is picturesque. We saw deer in the yard every day. Overall, a beautiful getaway.
Carla was super responsive! and the property was so perfect for a family!

Carla is simply the best. After my husband and I stayed at Carla's place a few months ago, we returned for a longer stay along with some family members. The place was exactly the same - clean, welcoming, and comfortable. The hot 4th of July weather was tamed with excellent air conditioning and we got to try out some of the amenities including mini golf, the Tiki Bar, and River Park. (just be aware that on some days around July 4 the amenities aren't available to guests, but Carla went above and beyond to make sure we got to enjoy everything we had hoped). We expected the place to be buggy in the summer, but were pleasantly surprised to see no insects inside! Our dog had an awesome time exploring the property and also the Delaware at River Park. A really wonderful place to stay and enjoy activities or just lazing around. Definitely on our "return again" list. Thank you, Carla, for everything!

We had a great stay at Carla's place! The house was beautiful, and the area is stunning. Check-in was super easy and being able to bring our puppy along made for a great trip. We had such a nice time we messaged Carla on the last night and asked her if we could extend our trip by a night. She responded right away, was super nice, and we managed to carve out some extra time away from home. We hope to visit again sometime!

We had a great stay here. The house was very cute and cozy (even better than the photos), and perfectly clean.  The area is very scenic, and there is a river you can swim in which is a 12 minute walk from the house. Also the kitchen was very well stocked with cooking and baking wears — we were able to make multiple course meals for a group of 6 people. We would stay here again!

description.summary:
Less than 1 mile to Beautiful community pool/restaurant/tiki bar! Lake and beach available for guests! Waterfall hikes! Along with so much more! Please reach out with any specific questions! Our home and the area are truly beautiful!

Less than 2 hours from NYC!
Our 1200 sqft chalet offers beautiful hardwood floors throughout, modern kitchen & bathrooms, cozy wood stove, oversized bedrooms, large wooded lot, huge outdoor wraparound deck, wireless internet, 3 roku tv’s (one in living area, one in the master bedroom & one in game room) & ample parking!
Bumper pool & poker in the game room.
New charcoal grill!
Kayaks available to bring to river (2 minutes away) or community lake that offers beaches, boat launch, and restaurant (life vests must be worn at all times).

Pets Welcome! :) 
Ski Big Bear less than a mile from the house! Open for the season (weather permitting)

The home is located in the Masthope ski community, meaning there are many amenities for your enjoyment. By summer enjoy the lake, outdoor pool, restaurant and, of course, the tiki bar. There are stables for horse riding, a market for shopping and a large recreation area featuring tennis courts, a bocce ball court, a racquetball court, miniature golf and much more.

We have also made our kayaks available for guests to use but PLEASE wear a life vest! Delaware river access less than a minute away and lake access 5 minutes.

By winter you can ski, snowboard and snow tube as much as you wish and there are also cross-country trails to explore. With your guest pass, you will have access to all the amenities at Masthope.

You have the entire chalet to yourselves. We live locally so if there is anything you need or have any questions regarding area recommendations, please don’t hesitate to ask :)

We welcome both short and long term bookings 
Pets Welcome!
