description.house_rules:
I will need your guests names, ages of anyone under 18 years old, your address and an emergency contact/phone number upon booking to get you registered with the community! Thank you! :) *ALL GUESTS MUST BE REGISTERED WITH THE COMMUNITY* The community offers our own pool, beach at gorgeous Westcolang Lake, volleyball courts, bocce ball, horseback riding*, little petting zoo, gym, restaurant, playgrounds, Ski Big Bear Mountain, picnic, BBQ areas, fishing, playgrounds, mini golf and much more! 
Guests planning on using pool/lake will pay the office $7 per person per day for days you plan on using! You MUST return guest passes to the main office before heading home to avoid $60 fee! Thank you! :) amenities are not available for guests to be used Fourth of July weekend. Check amenities hours/availability at masthope website.

name: Admire Harbour Views from a Hip Potts Point Sanctuary
title: Elizabeth Bay, Australia

hosts.about:
I'm an Australian born who moved back to Sydney after living in New York (in the coolest part of Williamsburg!) for nearly 3 years, studying Theatre Acting at HB Studio. Prior to this, I lived in London for 7 years. I have a Degree in Events management and also Diplomas in Graphic Design & Multimedia; and Fashion & Marketing. Although one day I hope to have my own little cafe, just because I'm obsessed with making coffee and the thought of being a full time barista wouldn't be a bad idea :)
I've travelled alot (but it will never be enough), mostly in Europe, US and Asia. My last adventure was to Russia and I absolutely loved it.  
I also enjoy cooking, dancing and doing DIY/ creating everything and anything!! I take great pride in been hospitable and been appreciated is the cherry on top of the cake.

I've being an Airbnb member since 2011, both as a guest and a host. Through Airbnb, I have met many interesting people from all over the world. As a guest, the 3 most important things I look for is a place that's clean, safe and convenient to amenities/ transportation, and of course, that won't break my bank account. Keeping this in mind whilst being a host, I understand that communication is vital to guests as they want to be able to know their needs are met and that organising accommodation should be stress-free as travelling/moving homes can be overwhelming. Juggling between being a mum of 2 (bub and toddler), working part-time and being a Airbnb Plus/Super Host, I aim to provide my guests a comfortable and enjoyable stay, and hope you can walk away with a positive and memorable experience in Sydney, my hometown. My goal is to provide a “home away from home” feel to my guests. With the help of my hubby Evgeny and my brother Nick as my co-hosts, we’ve accommodated more than 1700 guests in Sydney since 2015. 
In return, I would appreciate you taking a few minutes of your time to write a review on your experience staying with me. I enjoy being a host and I'm all ears to any suggestions as there is always room for improvements, so please feel free to message me as I would love to hear them. 

Look forward to being your host. 

Tina :)

recent.comments:
We had a great time staying at Tina's place.
The apartment is exactly as described with everything we needed, a beautiful view, great location, and Tina was very nice.
I'd definitely stay there again.

items.comments:
We had a great time staying at Tina's place.
The apartment is exactly as described with everything we needed, a beautiful view, great location, and Tina was very nice.
I'd definitely stay there again.
Tina’s place was lovely. Nice Stay!

spent a week here while visiting sydney and thoroughly enjoyed our time at the accommodation. Tina was extremely responsive and friendly in her communication. the room was so cute and homely! had everything we needed! lots of great cafes and restaurants around the place (we particularly enjoyed the cafe literally opposite the building!). metro was within a very short walk and took us wherever we needed to go. we would definitely stay here again if visiting Sydney and will recommend to any friends/family we know of going to visit.
Wonderful place

Tina's apartment is adequately stocked with anything you might possibly need. The view of the harbour was beautiful. Tina was really helpful and responsive over text and gave us several local recommendations which we tried out and were awesome 🤩 Thanks Tina for a great stay :)

We had a really nice stay, great location & nice apartment. 

Would highly recommend!

Cute little apartment in a fabulous location close to shops/cafes/restaurants/transport. Very clean and comfortable, great shower. Perfect for short stays. Check in was easy and Tina responded quickly to any questions.

description.summary:
Wake up to sweeping views across the city's iconic harbour, then head down for a refreshing morning dip in the shared pool at this light-filled, modern pad. Take a relaxing stroll through the Royal Botanic Gardens to the Heart of Sydney, then hang out at a cool cafe.
Stylish immaculate modern 22sqm studio is carefully designed with a personal touch to create a cosy atmosphere with extra facilities to maximise your stay with comfort and functionality. Spacious newly renovated bathroom, supplied with all the essentials. Perfect stay for singles or couples whether it be for business or pleasure.

Stylish immaculate modern studio apartment with extra facilities to maximise your stay with comfort and functionality, whether it be for business or pleasure. Perfect for singles or couples. Please note, the studio is approx. 22 sqm. 

The studio has recently been installed with fast speed internet (d/l speed of 40+Mbps), Smart TV with NetFlix access, a DVD player + selection of films to entertain you after a long day at work or sightseeing. 

Conveniently located across Woolworths Metro Supermarket which is open late (til 12mid) everyday that offers DVD rental and sells alcohol. 

The studio is carefully designed with a personal touch to create a cosy atmosphere. There is a fully functional built-in kitchenette equipped with fridge/freezer, portable hot plate, microwave, kettle and all cooking essentials including crockeries and utensils. Spacious newly renovated bathroom, supplied with fresh towels, toiletries such as body wash, shampoo/ conditioner and hairdryer. Queens size bed with a firm and comfortable mattress and fresh linen will ensure a good rest. Extra blanket and softer pillows provided as options (in wardrobe). A large built in wardrobe provides plenty of storage for personal belongings. There is a separate laundry room (on same floor) with coin-operated washing and drying machines (washing liquid & softener provided). Front entrance and lift of building is secured with concierge and 24hr CCTV.

Included: High speed WiFi Internet, breakfast (cereal & porridge), snacks, tea and coffee, body wash/shampoo/conditioner, fresh towels and bedding.

Please ensure you have read and understood the house rules and house manual as they are useful information for you to know. House manual is only available once reservation is confirmed.

* Smoking is prohibited in the apartment & building. Should you wish to smoke, there is a designated smoking area located on the ground floor of the building. Smoking in the apartment will incur an automatic penalty of AU$500.00.

You will be supplied with a set of keys to the studio apartment (with kitchenette and bathroom) and have access to the premises' common facilities including the lifts, laundry room (located on the same floor), smoking area and outdoor pool.

Private apartment provides you the flexibility and convenience to explore and enjoy Sydney at ease. At the same time, I will be available round the clock by Airbnb messenger if you need any assistance or local information. For emergencies only, please contact me via my mobile. I will do my very best to accommodate you and ensure you have a memorable experience in Sydney.
Please don’t hesitate at all if you have any questions.

The apartment is in the heart of Potts Point, one of the city's true gems, on Macleay Street, notable for its great restaurants, bars, and cafes. Darlinghurst Road is right down the road, offering countless number of nightclubs, bars and theatres. Walking distance to Sydney's City Centre and Kingscross train station. Great location to explore Sydney's main attractions including Opera house, Harbour bridge, Darling Harbour, Bondi beach and George & Pitt Streets where major retail brands resides.

Just a short 15-minute walk to Sydney's CBD and a 7-minute walk to Kings Cross Station. The famous Opera House is only 30mins scroll away. Some of Sydney's major attractions such as Darling harbour, Harbour Bridge, The Rocks, Bondi beach, Sydney Fish Market, Rushcutters bay, Wooloomooloo Harbourside, Barangaroo Waterfront and Manly are easily accessible. Public transportations (includes trains, buses, light rail and ferries), Taxis, Uber, GoGet and car rentals are readily available in the immediate vicinity. I highly recommend grabbing an Opal card for all Sydney Public Transportations as it will save you time and money (pick up at any train station counter or kiosk with the opal flag, free of charge just requires minimum $10 top up). 

** Please note, parking is NOT provided, and I do not recommend renting a car as Sydney central is limited and parking fees are absurdly high. However, if you require parking, there is paid street parking as well as paid parking near by, from AU$50 per day (both options subject to availability) which you will need to arrange yourself. There are limited free street - parking available after 10pm and before 8am. I highly recommend using public trains/buses/ferry to get around, however, Uber/ Taxify, taxis and GoGet are other options (for Uber use promo: uberTinan37 for first timers and save $5 or for Taxify: HX47Q and you can save $10 on your first ride). You will be required to download the app and register first.

*** Please book under your own Airbnb account - will not accept reservations on behalf of others.***

* Smoking is prohibited in the apartment & building. Should you wish to smoke, there is a designated smoking area located on the ground floor of the building. Smoking in the apartment will incur an automatic penalty of AU$500.00

* Please note, there is no luggage storage on premises. 

* Please ensure you take the keys before leaving the apartment, lockouts will cause a lot of inconvenience as well as an additional fee charged to have the locksmith come to open the door. Lost or damage keys will incur a fee of AU$120.00 to replace.

*I also can provide a mobile broadband during your time in Sydney, at an additional one-off fee of AU$25.00 (24hrs notice required and paid in advance).

*I can arrange a shuttle bus to the airport for you to be picked up in front of the lobby for AU$20.00 per person between 5am - 7.30pm. The journey to the airport is approx. 45mins. Full payment and departure flight details must be provided at least 48 hours in advance prior to pick up.

Should you wish to smoke, there is a designated smoking area with outdoor lounge located on the ground floor of the building (adjacent to the common outdoor pool).
• Maximum of 2 occupants in the apartment.
• Respect the Neighbours. Please keep noise at a minimum in the evening. If you experience any disturbance from other units nearby or in the hallway after 20:30, please see the Front Desk for assistance.
• Keep apartment clean and tidy.

hosts.about:
Hey! I am from Buenos Aires and I currently live in Palermo Hollywood neighborhood, which is the coolest and trendiest in the city. 

Traveling and exploring new cities is one of my favorite hobbies as well as skiing and sailing. 

Please enjoy the apartments and count on me to help you explore the neighborhood and this beautiful city! Hope to see you soon.

recent.comments: Everything was great! Check in was very easy and straightforward, despite my flight being very delayed. The apartment is in a very fun area with tons of amazing cafes and restaurants a short walk away.

items.comments: Everything was great! Check in was very easy and straightforward, despite my flight being very delayed. The apartment is in a very fun area with tons of amazing cafes and restaurants a short walk away.

Wonderful place - highly recommend. 
The apartment has everything you need, I loved the spa and pool area on the roof and the area is absolutely stunning. Lots of great places to eat and relax, great galleries and coffee spots.

Acomodação lindíssima, em uma localização perfeita ao redor de vários cafés e restaurantes, com uma decoração digna de pinterest
Pros: localização, check in e check out facil, limpeza, organização, decoração, cozinha completa, roupas de cama ótimas, internet com boa velocidade, na frente de um mercado, recepção 24 h.
Contras: banheiro sem box com uma cortina que precisa ser trocada (um pouco suja); agua quente que oscila e pode demorar a voltar entre dois banhos seguidos.
Great place. Great location. Great host. Thank you :)

O apartamento é confortável e aconchegante, super bem localizado, e bem aquecido (B Aires estava bem fria durante nossa hospedagem). Todas as comodidades que precisamos estavam disponíveis e funcionando normalmente. Ornela esteve sempre disponível. Indico a hospedagem porque o apartamento é ótimo, a localização é privilegiada e a atenção dos anfitriões também foi impecável.
bonito local
Great location right in the middle of Palermo's bustling shops and night life. the perfect spot

description.summary:
Brand new studio apartment with full kitchen, bathroom and balcony with great views in the heart of Palermo Hollywood. Also full of light!
Cool modern decoration, fully equipped and safe. 
SmartTV with cable and Netflix. 
Building with great facilities: heated indoor pool, outdoor pool with solarium, spa with massage room and sauna, gym, terraces to chill out, meeting room, and BBQ area. 
Walking distance to the best restaurants, bars and cafes, as well as to bus, train and subway station.
description.space:
Great modern decoration, fully equipped, unbeatable location, lot's of light and superb views. 
And everything in the flat and the building is new!
description.access: Apart from the whole flat, guests can also access to all the building´s facilities (heated indoor pool, outdoor pool with solarium, spa with massage room and sauna, gym, terraces to chill out, meeting room, and BBQ area.).
description.notes:
- 50 USD will be charged in case of keys loss. If the guest gets locked out and the key is in the door lock, guests must cover the locksmith costs. 
- For long stays (over 21 nights) guests must cover the cost of a cleaning service halfway through the reservation. For stays longer than one month at least every two weeks.
- No smoking, no pets and no parties/events. 200 USD fines.
description.neighborhood: Named for its TV and radio production houses, today the area is well known for it's nightlife and cool restaurants. This part of Palermo is also home to many design stores, the famous Dorrego antique market, cafes and patisseries, as well as bars.
description.transit: Several bus, subway and trains stops just a few blocks away. Very easy to get around.
description.interaction: As needed by the guests.
description.house_rules:
- No smoking, no events / parties, and no pets. 
- No loud music after 10pm weekdays, and midnight on weekends. 
- The apartment should be returned in the same conditions as it was before check in, as the cleaning lady will do laundry and general cleaning, not the dishes.
- Any linens or towels stained with unremovable stains will be charged to the guests. 
- Always leave lights and ACs off when leaving the property.

Chill out in a beautiful Vivien black lounger...
Traditional balinese bell

hosts.about: Travel is a philosophy of life, a passion, a sharing, an enrichment. I love hosting guests,  I love Bali...I'm happy to share my places and give you the best tips during your stay. Welcome to Bali!
Happy to share my love for Bali with you!

recent.comments: Very cosy and charming home with a lovely ambiance at night due to beautiful lighting.

items.comments: Very cosy and charming home with a lovely ambiance at night due to beautiful lighting.

Great little place tucked away from all the noise of the busy areas surrounding, Ani was an amazing help throughout our stay, cooking breakfast every morning and keeping the house perfectly clean, and was able to help us with an early check in and storing our bags on our final day once we'd checked out.

Lovely villa in a private, quiet location. Beautiful rooms and lovely interiors. Rustic and cool! Outdoor showers were beautiful. 
Ani is delightful and so nice to have around in the mornings. Happy to help with anything. 
Location is away from main seminyak area but Gojek and Grab was easy to order. Traffic generally a nightmare but that’s everywhere. Nice to escape to a quiet location. Would recommend :)

Fabrice and her team were incredible. Kind, proactive, responsive, and all things good. They truly provided over the top experiences including complimentary breakfast every morning as well as housekeeping. Fabrice was constantly responding to our questions and helping to make our trip as amazing and relaxing as possible. Ani, the woman who helped make us breakfast and clean the house each morning and her daughter were so kind and pleasant. Always making sure we had what we needed! Stay here if you are planning on going to Seminyak!
One of the best stays I’ve ever stayed at. Loved it so much. Would definitely what to go back again just for the stay!!

Beautiful Villa with pool. The beds were so comfortable. place was very clean and Ani the keeper is great ! Host is top notch with very good recommendations and helped to arrange transportation and even massages. Would 100% go back again! thank you so much for your wonderful hospitality
Beautiful villa, incredible hosts and staff. Would 100% recommend staying!

description.summary: This is a peaceful neighborhood, with all the amenities close by. It is a short drive to Seminyak and the beach. The villa is also close to Petitenget Road, which is home to exquisite restaurants, including Mauri, Sardine and Merah Puti.
description.space:
This peaceful tropical paradise features 4 bedrooms. 

IMPORTANT 
Please note that we charge per guests or per bedroom after 4 people. It means, if you book for 4 people you will get 2 bedrooms. 
If you need 3 bedrooms, fill up 6 persons.
if you need 4 bedrooms, fill up 8 persons.

This is to allow smaller party to book our place for a better deal.
description.access: You will have access to the whole property. We never share it with other guests.
description.notes: We can help you to book in-villa massages, on call Chef, daily drivers, scooters etc...
description.neighborhood: This is a peaceful neighborhood, with all the amenities close by. It is a short drive to Seminyak and the beach. The villa is also close to Petitenget Road, which is home to exquisite restaurants, including Mauri, Sardine and Merah Puti.
description.transit: We recommend to book scooters or a daily driver.
description.interaction: Accueil à la villa effectué par Virginie (villa manager), dès votre arrivée ou le lendemain (si arrivée de nuit).

hosts.about: Hello my name is Bill and I am originally from Rhode Island. I love Austin and my neighborhood in Travis Heights. I hope you enjoy the place and I promise to work hard to make your stay enjoyable. Cordially yours.

recent.comments: Lovely apartment within walking distance of South Congress. We really enjoyed our stay here. The pool is beautiful.

items.comments: Lovely apartment within walking distance of South Congress. We really enjoyed our stay here. The pool is beautiful.

We loved our two night stay here! Amazing!
The pool was fantastic!
Super comfortable, clean, and the pool was just heavenly! Loved being so close to shopping and restaurants, too.

Staying at Bill’s place in Austin was wonderful! He was very responsive, and accommodating. I enjoyed laying by the pool and the retreat was very clean! Would absolutely stay here again! Thank you for having me.
Absolutely gorgeous property. Stayed for a birthday weekend in Austin mid July, so the pool was frequented. 10/10 stay!
A great weekend getaway! Very relaxing spot with the pool and cleanliness and decor. Would definitely return!

We stayed for 6 nights at Bill's place - it was an amazing experience. The apartment itself was fully furnished and had great A/C - we had temp's of 40C whilst there. We had everything we needed, the bed was very comfy and the TV had lots of channels.
 The pool was out of this world, it was salted water rather than chlorine and felt very clean and clear. The pool was a perfect place to relax when it got too hot - there is a very good sunshade covering most of the pool, so you can brave the sun if you want, or stay in the shade and keep cool.
 We met Bill on the second day, and he was very pleasant to speak to. He offered advice on good places to eat, which we took him up on.
 It was a truly wonderful holiday and we would definitely return in a heartbeat.

description.summary:
Kick back on a plush day bed at this deluxe Retreat in coveted Travis Heights.
The Retreat was awarded by internationally known travel publication, AFAR Media, as one of the top Airbnb’s in the World.
Relax in a waterfall salt water pool. Perfect for cooling off during summer and heated during the winter! Just four blocks to vibrant South Congress.
description.space:
Welcome to The Retreat, a luxury experience located in coveted Travis Heights right in the heart of South Congress.  

Why choose the Retreat?  Premier location, High end design delights, tranquil and private resort like setting, waterfall salt water swimming pool and waterfall, tropical landscaping and luxury amenities!  Our pool is perfect for cooling off during the summer and heated in the winter! 

Premier Location!  Only 4 short blocks to vibrant South Congress shopping and restaurants, Stacy Park and wooded walking/biking trails.

Enjoy a tranquil resort like vacation in luxury accommodations of over 1200 feet with panoramic views of travis heights.   The Retreat is furnished Egyptian cotton bedding, Beautyrest plush pillowtop mattress and fully equipped kitchen.

At The Retreat, you are surrounded by a carefully curated mix of bespoke antique, modern and custom furnishings and eclectic art work.  

The Retreat provides a compound like experience featuring a lovely heated salt water swimming pool surrounded by tropical plants, limestone, Brazilian decking and mature landscaping. 

Luxury amenities including bedding linens from Frette and Restoration Hardware, furnishings from internationally known furniture designers including Montauk and Shine SHO.  

Details, Details, Details!: Perks, extras and amenities include gourmet espresso, Turkish robes, moisturizers, tooth brush and shaving kits, elevating your stay to a tranquil and luxurious experience. 

The Retreat interior was created by the owner who is a designer combining a bold sense of color, luxurious use of textures and an eye for detail.  

The owner is a successful Airbnb host with over 2700 five star reviews and over a decade of experience, ensuring you will have a high quality vacation experience.  

Maximum occupancy is two guests.  Visitors are not permitted.  

Outdoor patio and pool use hours are 7am - 10pm.   

No pets allowed.

Property details and house rules:
The Retreat is part of a four unit compound on a lovely ¼ acre lot in the beautiful Travis Heights neighborhood.  All units have private entrances.  The Pool area is shared with each unit on the same property.  Pool hours are 7am-10pm.  Each unit has a maximum occupancy of two guests. Visitors are not permitted on the property.
description.neighborhood: The Retreat is only four short blocks away from vibrant South Congress shopping and restaurants. Stacy Park and Pool as well as wooded walking or biking trails are accessible nearby.
description.house_rules:
- Minimum guest reservation age is 25 years old.  
- Maximum occupancy is TWO guests.  
- Visitors are not permitted anywhere on the property. 
- There are NO EXCEPTIONS to these house rules. 
- Violation of house rules will result in EVICTION without any refund. 
- Pool is shared with another rental unit on the property, up to two additional people.  
- The Owner lives full time on the property.  
- The pool and patio hours are from 7am - 10pm.  
- Outdoor gatherings by the pool are NOT permitted after 10pm.   
- Absolutely No pets are allowed.  
- Early Check-in is not available due to cleaning time required for set up from previous guest.  Luggage storage in the property garage is available upon request.  
- Multiple unit buyouts are not permitted.  Only a single unit is available to rent for two guests only.  
- Professional Photography Shoots are not permitted anywhere on the property.  
- Smoking is NOT allowed anywhere on the property.    
- If you are found to have smoked inside the property, you will incur a $250.00 charge. 
- The owner is not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners is not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise.
- Keep the property and all furnishings in good order.  Guests are responsible for all costs related to repair or replacement of any damaged furnishing.  
- Housekeeping:  There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate.   We do not permit towels or linens to be taken from the units.
- No loud music is permitted.

name: Light, Airy Apartment with Elegant Garden & Solar
title: Cape Town, South Africa

location.address: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa

gallery.caption: Survey the private patio from the sunny, open-plan space.

recent.comments: Such a beautiful listing and welcoming hosts. Stunning location

items.comments: Such a beautiful listing and welcoming hosts. Stunning location
Amazing place, a real gem.

This is a great, newly re-furbished flat at the back of the host's beautiful home. It is a little bit of a walk to shops or restaurants, but Ubers were always close. The flat has solar power - a huge plus for Cape Town at the moment.
Beautiful home, lovely stay! Would highly recommend 😀
Andrew and Jules have an incredibly clean and beautiful home. I definitely recommend and will be back soon :)

Below average cottage. Smaller than advertised. Not worth the money- Room was quite dark and had a strong urine or cat litter odour. 
It was impossible to sleep when it rained as the rain drops where heavy; and with the room being somewhat of a basement, the noise was unbearable. 

Host was not helpful and instead threatened to “send his guys” to throw us out when we just wanted to resolve a refund/booking dispute. This was even after explaining that I’m new to the Airbnb platform. 
Ended up cutting the stay short and host agreed to a refund at least. 
Terrible experience.

Very clean and neat 
Very close to restaurants 
Solar was a big plus
Andrew is a very good host
Will definitely visit again.

description.summary:
Close to Contantia Wine farms and 15 min drive to beach
14 Km from City Centre/ Waterfront/ Cape Town International Convention Centre
2 Km from Kingsbury Hospital
4km from Kirstenbosch Botanical Gardens/ UCT/ Newlands Rugby &  Cricket
3Km from large shopings centres in Claremont and Constantia
2 min walk from Wynberg boys High

Private courtyard, private parking and private walkway to the cottage

You can contact us via: phone ;text ;WhatsApp or visit the main house

The house is located in a secure estate in a quiet, leafy neighbourhood with shops, restaurants, the waterfront, and beaches just a short drive away. Visit Constantia Valley’s award-winning vineyards, like Eagles' Nest.

Private parking on property. If guests prefer not to drive uber operates in Cape Town and can cater to all their transport needs

name: Incredible apartment close to mall & mountain view
title: Las Condes, Chile

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
Soy Constanza Villalón, ingeniera civil industrial, fanática de la cocina y los viajes. Estoy casada, tengo mellizos (niño y niña), una gorda 1 año menor y a mi perro Bartolo. Nos encanta viajar y recorrer el mundo visitando distintos lugares.
Me dedico a la administración de propiedades a través de Airbnb.

recent.comments:
The apartament was clean , comfortable and a lovely neighbourhood. The only thing I would advise that the bathrooms are on the small size which might be an issue if you are a taller or larger person. 

Overall a gem!

items.comments:
The apartament was clean , comfortable and a lovely neighbourhood. The only thing I would advise that the bathrooms are on the small size which might be an issue if you are a taller or larger person. 

Overall a gem!

Suor recomendo o espaço da Constanza. Tudo lindo, limpo, organizado. Tem tudo pra fazer as refeições no apartamento. Estávamos com 1 bebê de 1 ano e dois meses, eu precisava fazer as refeições dele e foi perfeito. 
O apartamento tem aquecimento em todos os cômodos, inclusive no piso até no da cozinha, tem máquina de lavar roupa, batedeira, mix, cafeteira, microondas, fogão com forno, liquidificador, ferro de passar roupas, berço, talheres, pratos, copos, varal pra secar roupas, tvs,  a internet funciona super bem, as roupas de cama são ótimas , possui vaga de garagem, … . Tem 1 banheira em 1 dia banheiros ( são dois, 1 na suíte e outro q serve o restante da casa).
A Constanza é maravilhosa, sempre atende, é muito educada, atenta a tudo o tempo tempo, só elogios a ela e ao apartamento. Nada a nos queixar.
Muito obrigada Constanza!

La estadía en el departamento ha estado excelente. El lugar muy seguro y con una vista espectacular de la cordillera.
Muchas gracias por todo el apoyo Constanza.
Excelente departamento, tranquilidad, orden y seguridad. 10 de 10.
Todo perfecto y organizado
Estadia perfeita, ótima localização, apartamento limpo e equipado, atendimento da anfitriã impecável
Buen departamento equipado y con todo lo necesario, recomendado

description.summary:
Increíble departamento ubicado en un barrio muy seguro con la vista más linda a la cordillera de los Andes. 

El departamento cuenta con todo lo que puedas necesitar. Malla de seguridad, vidrios plegables en la terraza, lavadora, ropa de cama, toallas de ducha y mucho más.

Tenemos calefacción central para el invierno y aire acondicionado para los días de calor.
description.space:
Muy cálido, luminoso, cómodo, ubicado en barrio tranquilo. Supermercado a 1 minuto caminando, mall alto las condes a 8 minutos caminando al igual que Clinica Las Condes . Sector muy seguro y con muy buen transporte público. Hay cuna plegable.

La clínica Las Condes se encuentra a 5 minutos caminando.
description.access: Hay piscina panorámica en el piso 20 del edificio habilitada sólo de Diciembre a mediados de Marzo.
description.notes:
Es un barrio muy tranquilo y seguro, de muy fácil acceso, con muchos buses que pasan constantemente. Justo frente hay una estación de servicio que vende de todo (24 hrs), un supermercado a 1 minuto caminando y una gran cantidad de restaurantes.

El mall alto las condes se encuentra a 10 minutos caminando. Este es uno de los malls más importante de la ciudad.

La estación de metro más cercana está a 8 minutos en taxi.

La clínica Las Condes se encuentra a 5 minutos caminando.

Hay un paradero de buses justo abajo del edificio y pasan constantemente durante las 24 horas, es muy seguro moverse con el transporte público. El edificio además del estacionamiento privado, tiene cerca de 35 estacionamientos de visita.

description.interaction: Estaré disponible para ayudar con cualquier tema que necesiten via correo electrónico o celular
description.house_rules:
Prohibido fumar al interior del departamento ya que hay detector de humo, sólo se permite fumar en la terraza.
Prohibido colgar ropa en la terraza y cualquier cosa que pueda afectar la fachada del edificio.
No está permitido invitar personas externas a la reserva.

name: Villa Guacamaya Private Pool and Gym in the Jungle
title: Tulum, Mexico

gallery.caption: The Acapulco chairs are an example of the original Mexican design.
Tea, coffee, and basic cooking spices are available.
Discover handmade Mexican crafts throughout the villa.
The house was built respecting nature as much as possible—this little tree is proof.
Acapulco chair with a hint of Mexican folklore

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: Travelling and discovering new places is my passion, but the joy is even bigger when I  feel like at home. I want you to feel at home. Mi casa es tu casa.

recent.comments: Our family of 5 (kids ages 13, 11 and 8) stayed here for 3 nights. The pool was definitely a highlight and our kids loved playing with the floats and volleyball. My husband and I enjoyed relaxing inside in the evenings while we watched them swim. The neighborhood was very quiet and felt very safe. The location was perfect - close to downtown, grocery stores, etc. Olga’s house truly felt like a home away from home. Thank you for having us!

items.comments: Our family of 5 (kids ages 13, 11 and 8) stayed here for 3 nights. The pool was definitely a highlight and our kids loved playing with the floats and volleyball. My husband and I enjoyed relaxing inside in the evenings while we watched them swim. The neighborhood was very quiet and felt very safe. The location was perfect - close to downtown, grocery stores, etc. Olga’s house truly felt like a home away from home. Thank you for having us!

La villa est vraiment très belle et très agréable à vivre. Literie de qualité, équipements fonctionnels, personnel aux petits soins, la piscine au top 👌 
Nous tenons à remercier Olga pour sa sympathie, sa réactivité et son professionnalisme.

This is an awesome house, it looks just like the pictures. The bedrooms are huge, really comfortable beds, nice bathrooms and good AC units. We really enjoyed swimming in the pool and lounging. Great place to spend time with a group we wished we had longer than 1 night there!

La maison est très belle, bien décorée et spacieuse. la communication avec Olga est un vrai plaisir, ainsi qu'avec Ada, l'intendante du logement sur place. elles sont toutes 2 très sympathiques et d'une grande aide. Nous avons été très contents de la nuit que nous avons passée sur place, et le service suggéré de chef sur place était un vrai plus, bien qu'un peu cher. 
Je vous recommande d'y séjourner si vous venez à Tulum!
Wonderful

The apartment is beautiful and has great city views.
Olga was very attentive and responsive. The location is very convenient.

Nous avons passé un très beau séjour à la villa! Excellent service de la part d’Olga et d’Ada, toujours rapides pour répondre à nos questions avant et pendant le séjour. 

Nous recommandons!

description.summary:
Open a floor-to-ceiling glass door, spread beach towels on sun loungers, and let a private poolside vacation begin. Indoors it's spacious and cool, decorated in gentle earth tones that compliment both the jungle setting and the modern conveniences.

Enhanced cleaning protocol - Keeping the space clean and making sure that your safety is not compromised during your stay is my priority. I have a cleaning routine that I follow to ensure that all surfaces are washed and disinfected. All bed linen is washed at the hottest possible temperatures, the bedding itself is regularly tumble dried and the m

The villa is very spacious with a minimalist touch with very comfortable areas and bedrooms. 
The main bedroom is downstairs with a King bed, very spacious, with an en-suit full bathroom with bath tube and wardrobe. It has direct access to the garden and the pool area.
The second main room is a Queen bed upstairs on top of the main, so very similar to the King downstairs, very spacious, with en-suit wardrobe and full bathroom with a shower. It has a balcony towards the garden and the pool.
The third room is upstairs too, it's a two double beds (1.35m) with a full en-suit bathroom with shower. It has also a wardrobe and a big desk to work or use comfortably your laptop if you need it. It is a room ideal for kids, although 4 adults fit comfortably too.
The TV room upstairs is a common space that has two single proper mattresses to accommodate two more persons. If not needed it is used as a sofa to watch TV or use as a chill out room. It is equipped with a smart TV connected to the wifi with access to Netflix, YouTube and other apps.

There are two safe boxes in the house, one in the king bed room and one in the queen bed room, to keep your valuables locked.

The kitchen and the living room are downstairs in a common area. The kitchen is fully equipped with all the necessary to cook everyday for breakfast, lunch or dinner. It includes within others: microwave, toaster, coffee maker, electric kettle, etc..

In the living room you’ll have enough space to chill around the sofa and also a dinning table with space for 8/10 persons. It has a toilet and a washing room and is equipped with other amenities like Bluetooth speakers or art magazines.

All rooms and common spaces are equipped with Air Conditioning and ceiling fans. All the windows have a mosquito sliding net with I recommend to leave close all times to avoid mosquitos inside the house.

The pool area counts with a few chaises lounges and some Acapulco chairs to chill and sunbathe. You can access the roof to sunbathe or enjoy the sunset into the jungle. At the moment it’s empty and any chair can be brought upstairs.

The gym is equipped with a pull-up bar, free weights, dumbbells, yoga ball and mats. If you practice yoga and would like to have a private class in the villa, just ask as this is one of the extra services we can provide.

There are 10 bicycles available to rent in the property at extra cost from an external bicycle provider (100MXN per day). Please ask the janitor to give you more details. You can ask for more to be brought if your group is larger and planning to use them.

The is a swing with two seats for kids in the front garden and a children pic-nic bench. We have also available a cot for infants.

You can access the whole villa including the gym, rooftop, front and back gardens.

You can enjoy the following extra services during your stay or even book them in advance so we can customise your arrival:
-	Daily deep housekeeping.  
-	In home massage 
-	Private yoga classes at the villa or group classes at Holistika centre
-	Private meditation sessions at the villa or at Holistika centre
-	Bicycle renting available at the villa 
-	Transportation booking

We will welcome you on arrival. We will let you know in advance the details of the person welcoming you.

The villa is in the new Holistika neighborhood, in the jungle outside the town of Tulum, where it's quiet and relaxing. It's close to the only organic supermarket in town, one block from the action in town of, and a 10-minute drive to beach clubs.

You can park your car in front of the villa. If you need transportation from the airport or during you stay just, let us know and we will help you to book them for you.

Please note that ther eis an extra guests fee of $15 per persone and per night from the 7th guests. ie. additional $30 per night for a group of 8 guests.

Please also note that we are in the jungle and the wifi is basic in the area. It is the best I could get but it is not as the one we are used to have in big cities. If you are a big group and all connect to the wifi at the same time you might expect to have a very slow connection. Tulum is a little village and we are in the jungle area. Thank you for your understanding.

In Mexico the drainpipes are not prepared and able to disolve toilet paper, so you will be asked to thow the toilet paper in the bin provided to avoid the toilet to be blocked and disturb your stay. You will experience that also in restaurants and hotels. Thank you very much.

recent.comments: Na afgelopen week in het verblijf te zijn geweest hebben we het ontzettend naar ons zin gehad. Er is duidelijk aangegeven wat er aanwezig is in het appartement en hoe alles werkt. Verder kwam alles overeen met de foto's en was alles goed schoon. Simon reageerde snel en was heel behulpzaam. Zeker een aanrader.

items.comments: Na afgelopen week in het verblijf te zijn geweest hebben we het ontzettend naar ons zin gehad. Er is duidelijk aangegeven wat er aanwezig is in het appartement en hoe alles werkt. Verder kwam alles overeen met de foto's en was alles goed schoon. Simon reageerde snel en was heel behulpzaam. Zeker een aanrader.
Simon was very friendly on arrival. We were able to check-in early and the room was very clean and tidy. Lovely & quiet in a great location, and walking distance from some restaurants. Great stay.
Really enjoyed our stay. Beautiful apartment, quiet and very clean. Greatly recommend!

Dit vakantiehuis is geweldig! Wij waren op huwelijksreis in Malta en door aanhoudende stroomstoringen moesten wij halsoverkop naar een ander verblijf. Heel last-minute konden wij nog terecht in het verblijf van Simon, zonder enige problemen. Er werd heel snel gereageerd en we waren meteen welkom. Het huis is zeer schoon en opgeruimd, ligt in een prachtige rustige omgeving en heeft een groot zwembad, welke je met maar een paar van de andere huizen van het resort deelt. Simon is echt een zeer fijne host en reageert erg snel, dat is super. Verder worden er hele fijne tips gegeven over bijvoorbeeld wat er te doen is in de buurt, over de check-in en over supermarkten in de buurt. Wij zijn heel tevreden en komen zeker nog eens terug! Hou er wel rekening mee dat de airconditioning werkt door er 1 of 2 euromunten in te doen dus zorg dat je deze bij je hebt!

Our second time here at Simon’s and I can’t wait for the third!
Simon is very friendly and accessible if needed.
The place seems to attract similar people who are never too noisy and sharing the pool is not an issue.

There’s a full kitchen and a washing machine which is a bonus and the bedroom and sofa are massive. 

You can pay for usage of the air con - which is fine (as an ex-Airbnb host I know that people leave it on all day otherwise). It’s only 1€ for about 2 hours and you really only need it for a few hours at night in the peak of summer as the fans work really well. 
(We did get 8 hours for our last 2€)

It’s an easy 5 min downhill walk into Xlendi which is our favourite place in all of Malta - and we’ve been just about everywhere now.
Victoria is really close to visit but you feel like you are miles from anywhere in Xlendi.
Great place with nice pool. It's up on a steep hill, so be aware if you are with older people who might not be up for that walk.
Good host with a nice house.

description.summary: Escape to Villa Marni, a serene retreat cradled by nature's embrace. Immerse yourself in luxury and tranquility, where thoughtfully designed apartments and maisonettes offer a haven of comfort. Wake up to mesmerizing sunrises, enjoy seamless self check-in, explore local gems, and relish a harmonious environment. Your journey is a symphony of relaxation and cherished memories, a true escape from the ordinary.
description.space: Step into Villa Marni, where enchanting design meets coastal tranquility. Our meticulously crafted apartments and maisonettes offer a blend of modern luxury and soothing ambiance. Bask in the soft hues of nature-inspired decor, relish spacious rooms flooded with natural light, and experience a seamless fusion of comfort and elegance. Your stay at Villa Marni promises a serene retreat amidst captivating surroundings.
description.access: You will enjoy exclusive access to their private apartment, ensuring a personal retreat. Additionally, the inviting pool and pool area provide a shared space for relaxation and socializing with fellow guests, creating a harmonious balance between privacy and community. Your stay promises the perfect blend of personal serenity and shared enjoyment.
description.notes: A nightly eco tax of €0.50 per person is relevant and applicable.
description.neighborhood: Nestled in an exclusive enclave, Villa Marni graces a serene cul-de-sac in Xlendi's prestigious locale. Just a 2-minute walk to the nearby bus stop, exploring is effortless. A leisurely 10-minute stroll leads to the breathtaking Xlendi Bay, adorned with charming bars, enticing restaurants, and mesmerizing coastal vistas. Nature enthusiasts will relish nearby trails, while history buffs can explore cultural landmarks. Villa Marni offers tranquility and proximity, a gateway to both relaxation and adventure.
description.transit: Navigating the neighborhood is a breeze at Villa Marni. The nearby Qsajjem bus stop, a mere 50 meters away, ensures seamless exploration. For those with a car, convenient parking is readily available. Whether you're venturing near or far, getting around from Villa Marni is effortless and convenient.
description.interaction: We take pleasure in meeting and engaging with our guests. Your comfort is paramount, and we're available for assistance whenever you need. We respect your privacy and will interact only at your request, ensuring a personalized and enjoyable stay. Feel free to reach out, and we'll stay connected through your preferred means of communication. Your experience is our priority.
description.house_rules:
Communal Pool 
- Communal Pool can be used between 09.00 – 20.30
- No Glass allowed near the pool area
- No Food or Drinks in the pool
- Jumping or Diving is not allowed
- Adult Supervision
- Walk, don't run.
- Pool Towels are to be used only in the property
- Deckchairs and Pool Towels are provided between May to September

Music
- Music is not allowed in common areas including the pool area
- Loud Music not allowed in the property

Air-Conditioning 
- Air-Conditioning is paid separately using a coin meter which takes €1 and €2 coins

Other
- Beach Towels are not provided
- Smoking is only allowed on the balconies, terraces and pool area
- Guests will be held responsible for any loss or damage
- Only reserved guests can enter the premises. No additional guests are allowed.

name: Remarkable 17th-Century House with a Terrace Lap Pool
title: Goult, France

hosts.about:
For over 30 years, the space Xavier Nicod continues the ongoing search for the object as a work, whether popular or valuable. That is, each time, a search of harmony and beauty that splint the wildest and most timeless projects. Through his creations, home, garden, hotel, shop or event, Xavier Nicod shaping the scene plays on the contrast of cultures and meaning, by daring to overcome the limitations of conventional decorative aesthetics.

With the desire to share his universe, Xavier Nicod opened in September 2017 its guest rooms in Provence, in a discreet and authentic village of Luberon, places where nature and selected objects are used to sample the audacity, beauty and poetry as a way of life.

Depuis plus de 30 ans, l’espace Xavier Nicod poursuit la recherche permanente de l’objet comme une oeuvre, qu’il soit populaire ou précieux. C’est, à chaque fois, une quête d’harmonie et d’esthétique qui s’attelle aux projets les plus fous et les plus intemporels. A travers ses créations, maison, jardin, hôtel, boutique ou événement, Xavier Nicod façonne les lieux, joue sur le contraste des cultures et du sens, en osant dépasser les limites de l’esthétique décorative conventionnelle.

Avec l'envie de partager son univers, Xavier Nicod a ouvert en septembre 2017 ses chambres d'hôtes en Provence, dans un village discret et authentique du Luberon, des lieux où la nature  et les objets sélectionnés permettent de goûter à l'audace, la beauté et la poésie comme un art de vivre.

recent.comments:
Ouvrez la porte de ce joyau et laissez vous transporter par la
Magie des lieux .
Ce que propose Xavier n’est pas un logement c’est un enchantement .
Tout mène à la rêverie : le calme absolu des lieux, le goût raffiné de Xavier, le charme de Goult, et la cerise sur le gâteau c’est le jardin luxuriant paysager et le bassin de nage .
Bref, je suis encore toute émue par tant de beauté .
Sans oublier la sympathie inégalée de Xavier

items.comments:
Ouvrez la porte de ce joyau et laissez vous transporter par la
Magie des lieux .
Ce que propose Xavier n’est pas un logement c’est un enchantement .
Tout mène à la rêverie : le calme absolu des lieux, le goût raffiné de Xavier, le charme de Goult, et la cerise sur le gâteau c’est le jardin luxuriant paysager et le bassin de nage .
Bref, je suis encore toute émue par tant de beauté .
Sans oublier la sympathie inégalée de Xavier

Art Déco- oder Brocant-Wohnung - beides passt für dieses Schmuckstück. Die Wohnung ist verspielt und passt sehr gut in das Konzept von Xavier! Der kleine Balkon der Wohnung ist ein Traum. Die Sicht auf die alte Mühle von Goult ... (zum Schmelzen). Die Lage ist absolut ruhig. Ausser einem Pfau den man ab und zu beim Château de Goult sehen, kann hört man nichts. Der Indoor-Pool muss man selber erleben. Die ganze Anlage ist wie ein Brocant in "L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue". 

Xavier ist ein super lieber Typ. Immer für einen Spass zu haben. Die Wohnung können wir allen empfehlen, die offen für neues sind. Wir kommen wieder!

Es ist eine wunderbare, kreative Ferienanlage, die über Jahrzehnte in einem alten provenzialischen Steinhaus gewachsen ist. Goult ist eine sehr schöne kleine, authentische Stadt in der Provenz, in der es alles gibt, was man zum guten Leben braucht. Von hier aus kann man perfekt alle Sehenswürdigkeiten des Luberon erkunden. Xavier ist wie ein guter hilfsbereiter Geist. Wir haben uns rundum wohl geführt. Danke Xavier!
Xavier’s place more than met our expectations! Xavier greeted us upon arrival and made us feel right at home.  We had a relaxing weekend and wish we stayed longer. My boyfriend and I will be back!

It is not possible to be better welcome than Xavier did for us. He was enthusiastic, friendly, available with big sense of details.
Xavier’s AirBnB is already on the top of our list for next year vacations. The house is an experience by itself, made with lot of taste, peaceful… We should have stayed longer !!!6 stars out of 5. 🤩

Xavier est un hôte accueillant et sympathique.

Ses appartements sont bien pensés afin de faciliter la vie et les vacances de ses hôtes.

Emplacement idéal au cœur de Goult.

Je recommande

Xavier has to be the best Super Host we've come across. He is incredibly friendly and helpful, and his beautiful, eccentric apartments and pool are french masterpieces of chic style and history. Goult has all the beauty of more renown villages, with great restaurants but with less of the crowds.

description.summary:
Revel in the otherworldly ambiance of this remodeled 17th-century home eclectically adorned with antique furnishings, whimsical decor, and magical curios. Guests are welcome to use the owner's 12-meter-lap-pool, shared with his 3 other rentals, situated in his unique calm closed magic garden.

The entrance from the street leads you through a closed stone walled  sunny patio with a table and chairs for outside eating, as well as 2 sun-loungers into the bright colourful open well equipped kitchen integrated in the dining room, all with a cheery, vintage vibe. 

(The patio is also used by the other guests as a right of passage to access their apartment and the shared lap pool.)

From there a spiral wood staircase leads you up to the bedroom with wood floors and a fireplace, a terrace with a great view over to the windmill, the top point of the village and an antique romantic outside bathtub. The night sky full of stars is famous in the Provence, if you’re lucky you catch a full moon.

The toilet is located on the same level as the kitchen/dining room and is separated from the shower which you find on the level below in the basement, tiled in sea green Moroccan zelliges.

You also find your own washing machine for clothes in the basement.

The character of the house, the architecture as well as the interior decoration is full of original antiques and vintage pieces, carefully selected by the owner and has an absolute unique handwriting. It will appeal to everyone who loves an aesthetically unique and novel experience.

Parking:
You can unload your baggage at the house and park you car free of charge a one minute's walk away on the convenient public parking of the village.

Linen, Pool Towels:
all included

Information about Goult and the Area: 

At the heart of the „Triangle D’Or“, Goult makes an ideal base for exploring the many surrounding villages, as well as larger towns such as Avignon, Aix-en- Provence and Marseille, all within 15 mins to 1hr30mins' drive away.

All amenities, restaurants, bar, coffee places, the famous 'Cafe de la poste‘, groceries, bakery, butcher, fromagerie, market on thursday with regional products, as well as a couple of little shops with local handmade art, regional products and antiques are all one-minute’s walk away to be explored.

Walks up to the windmill, the castle, the church through the little peaceful winding streets of the village as well as gorgeous walks directly from the village into the beautiful nature, eg. natural terrasses, views, lavender fields and partly through light forests are highly recommended.

Electronic bicycles are possible to be rented in Coustellet or Apt to discover the surrounding area.

Additionally you can visit the owners 'Borie‘, an original habitation by the rural population of the region in the ancient times, where you can have your picnic. Covers to sit on are lent by the owner for that occasion. The 'Borie‘ is a 5 mins walk away.

Guests are welcome to use the owner’s 12-meter lap-pool, situated in the quiet and secluded magic adjoining owner's garden.

This absolutely unique garden will offer you an exceptional memorable souvenir, welcoming you to use all amenities available such as 2 relaxing lay matts surrounded by trees to cover you with the necessary shadow, a daybed hidden in a vaulted corner by the pool as well as a rocking chair with a shower in another vaulted alcove by the pool. There are little terraces to be wandered around and a table with chairs to have your meal in that paradise.

I live next-door, and are happy to answer your questions and offer suggestions if needed.

Goult is known by the locals as the hidden village of the Luberon and is appreciated for its pleasant, authentic atmosphere. There are several charming restaurants in the heart of the village, as well as the lively Café de la Poste on the main square.

You can unload your baggage at the house and park you car free of charge a one minute walk away on the convenient public parking of the village.

GOOD TO KNOW
ABOUT YOUR TRIP TO  GOULT

A 2 days stay at Goult is a minimum, ideal would be 4 days or more.

Reservations at the restaurants in Goult and the Luberon are necessary. 
The restaurants  are often fully booked 1 or 2 weeks ahead.
Think of reserving ahead of time !!!

For cooking at home, all my 3 apartments have well equipped kitchens. 
Coffee and tee are provided.

name: Park Vista at Joshua Tree
title: Twentynine Palms, California

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: My passion is building and designing beautiful spaces all over the country. I love traveling, finding new places to explore and networking. C6 / C7 Quadriplegic - Life Rolls On!

recent.comments: This property was amazing and isolated. the pool was super refreshing, and star gazing was phenomenal. we couldn't get the TV to work during our stay, but everything was magical!!!

items.comments: This property was amazing and isolated. the pool was super refreshing, and star gazing was phenomenal. we couldn't get the TV to work during our stay, but everything was magical!!!
Definitely a great get away location!
This place was awesome. Location was perfect. Quiet. Big home. We had way more space then we needed. Place was very clean. Would definitely recommend to friends
Johnny was great at responding & suggested a few locations for us to visit. Home was beautiful & his service was even better! Thank you!
It was definitely the best experiance for 6 people. The best of best was the air-contioning was on in advance so inside was cool when arrived.  We want to come here again.

Me and my group of 9 others had an amazing time! The interior design was gorgeous and was overall comfortable and spacious. It was the perfect distance from the main road so it felt private but was also close enough to food and cute shops. I would definitely recommend this Airbnb to people looking to relax with a beautiful view!

Park Vista at Joshua Tree is an absolutely beautiful property with a spa like feel in the desert. The place is even more impressive in person than it was in the photos and Johnny was a very responsive and helpful host.

If you are planning a trip out to visit the Joshua Tree National Park or just want a couple of quiet days away from things to pamper yourself, this is the perfect spot!

description.summary:
Park Vista is the ultimate group destination located on five private acres overlooking Joshua Tree National Park, Indian Cove and expansive protected land.

Bring wood and gather your group around our fire-pit underneath the stars!

Float in our Saltwater pool on those hot summer days. Pool up in April. Ease those tight muscles after a long day of hiking in our giant spa under the stars. Lie back in the over sized teak loungers or the zero gravity chairs on our second story sky deck, the perfect way to star gaze. 

Kick back in Restoration Hardware appointed living room with cloud chair

Park Vista is the ultimate group destination located on five private acres overlooking government land never to be developed. Indian cove is directly out the massive 8x10 glass windows. 

Bring firewood and gather your group around our fire-pit underneath the stars!

Float in our Saltwater pool on those hot summer days. Ease those tight muscles after a long day of hiking in our giant spa under the stars. Lie back in the over sized teak loungers or the zero gravity chairs on our second story sky deck, the perfect way to star gaze. Gather your group around a camp fire at our stone firepit!

Feel like a movie? Kick back in the Restoration Hardware appointed living room with the cloud chair and 9 foot ultra deep linen sofa. Bring firewood for the wood stove during the winter months and heat the whole home to comfort!

Invite your friends and host a dinner using our fully stocked kitchen with double ovens and 6 burner stove. The open floor plan wont leave anybody out! 

Park Vista has something for everyone, including boardgames, foosball, darts and corn hole!

The property is yours to explore! Our giant spa is available year-round for your enjoyment. Saltwater pool is available all summer through mid October, depending on weather.

We prefer to be hands off, Enjoy your privacy and message us on Airbnb with any questions!

Desert Heights is along the border of Joshua Tree. Look no further for a quiet relaxing getaway just outside of the busy downtown, with access to nearby parks and amenities and the darkest skies free of light pollution

Car Is the best form of transportation

description.house_rules:
Late Checkout Fee: $50 Mandatory when unauthorized by host.
Undisclosed additional guest fee $50/ea per night, even if they do not stay.

Very late unauthorized checkout (2 hours or more): Full undiscounted daily rate will be charged, this does not give you permission to stay, it is only a fee. If you wish to continue your stay you will need to do so formally through Airbnb by requesting to book.

Any refunds that any other affected traveler receives due to your unauthorized late checkout will be charged to you and payable by you.

Smoking fee: $500 – Zero tolerance

Cleaning fee will be doubled if the home is found in an excessively dirty condition.

Do not flush any large objects or female hygiene products down the toilet.

Pets Policy

- We are severely allergic so unfortunately no pets of any kind are allowed on the premises due specifically to our health risk. If you are seen or caught on the premises with an animal you will forfeit your deposit and be asked to leave. This is a zero tolerance policy.

Excessively dirty condition - fingerprints on the wall, dishes left in the sink, trash left in the house.

If you have a complaint about any of the amenities, the property or otherwise, upon contacting us or Airbnb, you are authorizing us access to the property to fix whatever is broken, repair the home or resolve the issue up to the standard you require. We do not need permission to access the property if there is something you deem unsuitable that needs to be remedied.

Any violation of any house rule is grounds for removal from the property, cancelled reservation and no refund.

name: Walk to the Beach from a Modern Hideaway
title: Kihei, Hawaii

recent.comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gal’s place, which was as described. The unit is very tastefully furnished; the outside pool area and gardens are stunning; and the beach across the road very quaint and accessible. All our questions were promptly and thoughtfully addressed. We look forward to our next stay at Gal’s place!

items.comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gal’s place, which was as described. The unit is very tastefully furnished; the outside pool area and gardens are stunning; and the beach across the road very quaint and accessible. All our questions were promptly and thoughtfully addressed. We look forward to our next stay at Gal’s place!

These villas are an ideal place to stay in Kihei if you’re looking for privacy with everything you need to have a relaxing and fun time in Maui. They are modern and spacious, you have plenty of beach items at your disposal, and the private pool area is beautiful. Having private parking in this area is also fantastic, and you’re a short drive to Wailea, many beaches and lots of food options. We walked to dinner and lunch often, and to nearby beaches too. Having this place to call home during our trip made it so much more relaxing. We can’t wait to return and stay here again!
Incredible! A gorgeous private villa walking distance from the beach and great restaurants. We loved every aspect of our stay.
We had a great stay!! the place was immaculate, and the sheets were buttery soft.. great for surfing as the beach is one minute away! Just love the vibe and stay again.
A beautiful place in very clean! I enjoyed my short stay.
Amazing little oasis sanctuary in the heart if Kihei! Property is immaculately maintained and the on-site staff is excellent. We will be back!
Everything was amazing and I can’t wait to be back! Def check out the food trucks nearby :D

description.summary:
Sit down to breakfast at a live-edge table in a nook of the kitchen featuring classic wood floors and granite surfaces. Head out to a shared terrace to relax in the sun amid tropical foliage before jumping into the pool for a swim.

Note: Hawaii GET, TA & Maui County TA taxes of 17.416% are included in price.
description.space:
Experience an older Hawaiian style charm with a modern twist in this newly remodeled villa that was originally built as a beach bungalow in the 1950’s. Villa 7 features an ocean view living room with A/C, high speed WIFI, fully equipped kitchen, comfortable king bed, full bathroom with a walk-in shower, ocean view covered lanai and private gated parking conveniently located next to the villa front door. Designed to feel like a second home, this villa is conveniently supplied with all of your travel-related “extra” needs such as an iron and ironing board, Tupperware, wine glasses, dishwasher soap capsules, beach towels, and a clothes drying rack for wet swimsuits after playing in the ocean across the street. Basics such as bath towels, linens, kitchen rags, a set of travel size shampoo and soap, dish soap, salt, pepper, and olive oil are provided as well. 

2 beach chairs, 2 boogie boards, 1 beach umbrella and 1 cooler are provided for your sun-filled days at the beach. Property is located 25 feet from Cove Beach Park where guests can mingle with locals, take surf lessons or body surf in The Cove's consistent small waves. Charley Young Beach, a long stretch of white sand ideal for beach walks and swimming, is another local favorite that's located at the end of the street, about a three minute walk from the property front gate. 

For the active and adventurous traveler, our prime location offers easy access to sun bathing, swimming, surfing, snorkeling, diving, stand up paddle boarding, kayaking and whale watching. Also a golfers' paradise with nearby world class golf clubs less than 10 minutes away in Wailea and Makena. Restaurants, shops, nightlife, cafes, farmer’s markets, and Kalama Park are within a 5-10 minute walk.
description.access:
All guests have access to our complimentary Private Concierge Service. Private chef or catering services, transportation, and group activities such as luau's, whale watching tours, and snorkel boat tours are some of the many services our Concierge can assist with. 

Two gas barbecue grills are located in a common area for all guests. Guests have access to a complimentary washer and dryer, and laundry detergent is provided.

Ask us about your complimentary hot yoga classes!
description.notes:
All nine villas on the property are surrounded by the lush tropical landscape of mango and palm trees, where the sounds of ocean waves and tropical breezes foster utter relaxation and serenity.
Walking on the beach, swimming, surfing, snorkeling, shell-seeking, and whale watching are some of the daily activities just steps away from each villa’s front door.
Enjoy ocean views and total privacy in a lush tropical landscape, and is located across the street from the beach.
description.neighborhood: Tucked away on a residential street, this apartment is in a resort-style complex and steps away from the beach. From shopping and dining, to whale watching and hiking, there are a variety of activities within walking distance.
description.transit: Located within walking distance to daily activities and amenities such as restaurants, shops, nightlife, grocery stores and two different beaches. We recommend renting a car for sight seeing on Maui since most attractions are spread out across the island. Our complimentary Concierge service can arrange transportation upon request.
description.interaction: Property Manager is available by phone and frequents the property daily.
description.house_rules:
- Quiet Hours: Maui County “Quiet Hours” in residential neighborhoods must be observed from 9:00PM through 7:00AM. All noise levels must be brought inside and TV’s and stereos must be operated at a lower volume during this time. 
- Please remove your shoes before entering Villa 7

name: An Entertainer's Dream with a Free Heated Pool.
title: Phoenix, Arizona

hosts.about:
Originally from Quebec City, Canada, Sacha was a professional Figure Skater for many years. After travelling the world, Sacha was intrigued by the beautiful warm and sunny Arizona climate. 

Instantly, Sacha decided to make Phoenix/Scottsdale his permanent home and dedicate his passion for gracious living by purchasing and hosting unique and comfortable short term rentals. Currently, Sacha now hosts over 60 short term rentals in the US, Canada, and California. 

His other passion also now includes representing Buyers (including short term rental investors) and Sellers as an award winning and highly sought after Real Estate Agent since 2004 covering the entire Valley of the Sun. 

Sacha’s success in providing exceptional customer service and an enjoyable guest experience includes his AMAZING team consisting of John who handles client/guest relations and Paul our Supply Manager. Additionally, the Team oversees excellent and highly experienced cleaning teams, 2 full time maintenance technicians, home inspectors, and a well-known local designer.

Extraordinary customer service and beautifully decorated homes has earned Sacha over 5,000 valued guest reviews – demonstrating a commitment to excellence in hospitality and providing a variety of homes for guests to enjoy.

We look forward to hosting your stay at any of our homes, and ensure a smooth and seamless experience whether your travels bring you for business, pleasure or that much needed getaway with family and friends.

We enjoyed our time and would rebook on our next visit.

Centrally located, beautiful and clean. We loved the pool. Would stay again.

I loved this home for a last minute weekend Memorial Day weekend with the family. The living room is smaller than advertised so being all together in there was a bit of a squeeze. Some portions of the home were also not like in the pictures. A missing living room table, a few things missing from rooms (decoration wise), no cushions on outside seating, and many tiles in the pool seem to have fallen and noticeably replaced. Sacha will message you more in depth details about the rental after submitting payment that I wish were public prior to renting out the home since there is no refund. Besides that, the backyard has a great grass area for a dog,  the rooms and bathrooms were very nicely cleaned, pool towels were available for all 6 guests, and kitchen is fully stocked with supplies and spices. This home is in a quiet neighborhood which we pleasantly enjoyed that is not too far from shopping centers and markets. Great location and home that just needs a few upgrades. :)
it was a great stay

title: Puerto Vallarta, Mexico

gallery.caption: Incredible panoramic views from the infinity pool of the ocean, mountains and city.
Enjoy every morning a nice cup of coffee while you enjoy the views.

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
I am a super upbeat and positive outgoing individual. You will always find me with a smile on my face.  :)  I love building relationships and learning new things. I especially love to learn how I can better myself and expand my horizons.   One of my passions is building awesome and exciting memories with my family and friends.  Every year we set plans for new countries to explore and adventure to embark on.  If there were a few things I could not live without it would be faith, family, traveling, music, good food, and good tequila.  One of my favorite adventures I have done with four friends was a three week crazy motorcycle ride from New Delilah to the highest motor-able road in the world in the Himalayas.  We literally rode for 10-12 hours per day through some insane weather condition,  rivers, and off road terrains.  It still all feels like a dream.   

As a guest I am super clean and respectful of the space.  I more then likely will not be around since I live to be out throughout the day exploring the town. Overall, I am low maintenance and very respectful of other peoples property. 

As a host, I love to provide the best experience as possible by upholding high standards.  I enjoy interacting with my guests but also respect privacy and provide space. My goal is to be a resource to help provide the best experience possible by being helpful in any way.  I love to joke around so I might be silly at times, but with my intent to build a fun relationship and great experience.  I am also flexible and firm if need to be.

My life motto:  I believe that we all have the ability to "Create Your Waves"  We are in control of our destiny and its all a mindset.  The story that we tell ourselves that either hold us back or help us move forward and live our ideal life. I personally choose to always be authentic and optimistic.

recent.comments: Loved this unit. It was very close to restaurants, nightlife, and shopping. Pool was easy and never felt crowded. And even though the unit is close to some very happening bars, it was always peaceful and quiet in the unit by midnight. Kids slept soundly.

items.comments: Loved this unit. It was very close to restaurants, nightlife, and shopping. Pool was easy and never felt crowded. And even though the unit is close to some very happening bars, it was always peaceful and quiet in the unit by midnight. Kids slept soundly.
Dago’s place was in the perfect location and ADA friendly! Beds were extremely comfortable and clean
Was great!

We enjoyed our stay at Dago's while celebrating my bithday in Puerto Vallarta.  It is in the heart of Zona Romantica and is very walkable to many popular restaurants, beaches, and cafes.  The space was beautifully decorated and stylish. The unit is very spacious and we loved having an in-unit washer/dryer.  The rooftop pool was beautiful but was sometimes crowded with other residents/ guests and hard to find seating. 

Dago was a bit hard to get in touch with prior to our reservation regarding local recommendations and confirming arrival time, but we did not need much assistnce as check in was easy and seamless with provided instructions.  We would highly recommend staying at Dago's if visiting Puerto Vallarta.

Thanks for hosting us!
Great location, perfect apartment, definitely recommend.  Front desk ladies could be a bit friendlier
Loved staying at Dago’s condo! Definitely one of the best in terms of location, price, amenities, cleanliness, and overall grata experience! Will be coming back!

We absolutely love this condo. This would have to be the best condo we have ever stayed at. From the modern decor to the stylish furnishings, everything about it was dreamy. This condo was the epitome of dreams coming true. When I say I felt like a million bucks, believe me I did! Made me think twice about my life decisions; it had me wanting to live like this forever. LOL I love that we had complimentary water, since it was scorching hot in June. Lord knows I love picking off season for that great deal. ha! Each room had its own air conditioning as well as a fan. Our Host DAGO was amazing! He's responsive, extremely nice, and cordial. I would definitely like to rent from him again. Aside from the condo being beautiful it was literally walking distance to everything. If you have a chance you should really stop by one of our favorite bar called Bar la Playa. Craft cocktails and awesome vibes.

description.summary:
Polished woods and soft grays adorn every fixture found throughout this apartment creating a vibrant aesthetic that feels full of life. The home is named Casa CaliMex because of its Chic Bohemian beach modern design which mixes styles from California and Mexico.  Every detail is literally a custom piece of art you will enjoy.  Head to the rooftop and unwind, play a game of pool in the entertainment lounge, or layout and cool down by floating around in the infinity pool while enjoying the gorgeous panoramic views of the mountains and sea.

The interior design of the unit "Casa CaliMex" is a cool bohemian modern beach vibe which brings Cali and Mexico decor in one. The goal is that our guest feel like they are 100% on vacation while they enjoy all the amazing amenities of the home. More pics coming soon.

Our guest have access to all the amenities such as pools, entertainment areas on the rooftop and gym. There is also free wifi in the entire building such as lobby, rooftop and apartment.

If our guest need any suggestions of what to do or places to go eat we are happy to assist. Our goal is to help provide the best experience for our guests.

Hands down the best location in the heart of PV Romantic Zone.  The apartment is in a secure and welcoming neighborhood. There are many boutique shops, inspiring art galleries, delicious local restaurants, lively bars, and the famous sparkling beaches all within easy walking distance. Explore comfortably and discover your piece of Beautiful Mexico. Everyone is so friendly, welcoming and down to earth.

Getting around is easy.  Just a short walk.  The area has no hikes up any mountains or stairs. Ubers are also available in Puerto Vallarta and are very inexpensive.

Relax and Enjoy! :)
