The HostMaster is a property management company that looks after a bright and diverse portfolio of properties in Athens! We are committed to offering the best stay to each and every one of our guests. We provide some unique services that most of the other hosts cannot provide. All our properties are selected carefully in order to offer you the best stay! From the moment you book to the moment you arrive at the apartment, we are helping you through all the processes so that your stay is hassle-free!

recent.comments: Best of the best 🏅

items.comments: Best of the best 🏅
Really amazing place. Excellent quality - very comfortable. The pool is phenomenal. And the hosts were very helpful and welcoming. Highly recommend!
Excellent apartment, great location to walk to the centre. Would recommend. Enjoyed our stay.
Great location with amazing views and amenities. Very responsive and helpful host. Would stay here again!
Sehr schönes Apartment. Toller Pool. Sehr gute Ausstattung. Bequeme Betten, Liegen und Sofa. Eher laut, wegen der U-Bahn und der Veranstaltungsanlage nebenan.

One of the best AirB&Bs we have stayed in anywhere.  The apartment is modern and spacious with lots of outdoor space.  The rooftop pool is outstanding with a great 360 view of the Athens and a good sight line to Acropolis.  We enjoyed some hours swimming and taking photos into the pool from the living room.  The apartment is a 5min walk to the metro so you have easy access to the rest of the city.  In addition, the taverna next door is very good so if you don’t feel like venturing out for a night you have dinner close to the apartment.  The only downside is that neighborhood is kind of noisy and run down but the apartment more than makes up for it.  I would highly recommend this unique experience to anyone traveling to Athens.

Beautiful apartment in a great location. Not a far taxi drive to the Plaka, Monastiraki and Acropolis. The plus side to this apartment was the 2 bedrooms with private bathrooms, the elevator to all 3 floors of the apartment, the cleanliness of the place and of course the private swimming pool. If I ever come back to Athens, which I plan to do in the future, I pray this apartment will still be available to rent because I would stay here again in a heartbeat. The Host responded to every one of my messages with a quick response, if I ever needed anything. The only negative which has nothing to do with the apartment, was the time of year I was there due to the high heat and the music venue extremely nearby that played loud music until midnight most of the nights we were there. Most of the time it was okay, when we weren’t in the room trying to sleep. But on the few nights we wanted to sleep we couldn’t do it until after the music ended. But even that is minor. The apartment was perfect!!

description.summary: Welcome to Kerameikos in the heart of Athens! A brand new, luxurious maisonette in a new building (built in 2018), ideal for 5 people is here to become your base in exploring the city. Just across the street from the always cared for park of Kerameikos, with a private pool and an amazing view to the Acropolis, this apartment combines high aesthetics, comfort and luxury so that all your needs will be met and wonderful memories will be created.
description.space:
The maisonette, ideal for 5 people (upon agreement up to 6 people can be accommodated), takes up the third and the fourth floor of a new building in Kerameikos, in the heart of the city, just minutes away from the metro station. Our guests also have exclusive access to the fifth floor where they can enjoy the deck and the pool.
There is an elevator for easy access to each floor.

On the 4th floor you will find the living room, the dining room, the kitchen and the veranda with the limitless view of the park of Kerameikos. On the 3rd floor you will find two bedrooms, each one with a private bathroom and some auxiliary spaces. The two floor are connected by an internal wooden staircase, while the elevator door on the 4th floor opens directly into the living room. On the deck you will find the pool, a small sitting area and showers. You can access the deck by the elevator or by going up the metallic staircase on the veranda.

The bright and spacious living room has a sitting area with a sofa, an armchair and a coffee table. In the roof of the living room there is a glass construction so you can see inside the pool! The daylight going through the clear water of the pool creates a unique lighting in the space and gives a sense of tranquility to the visitor.
The lighting and the special paintings of the artist Paniaras complement an space ideal for relaxation, with neutral colors, yellow touches, warm wood, unfinished concrete and minimal style. There is also a TV with cable channels, an air conditioning unit and decorative details that complement a luxurious area of relaxation and leisure.

In the same space, you will find the dining table, made of cement screed and metal. Placed in front of the glass window doors, this is the ideal spot to enjoy all meals of the day. A beautiful side of the city unfolds in front of you with the unique view of the green park of Kerameikos and the train crossing the bridge, a sight that few visitors of the city get to witness. 

Next to the dining area you will find our fully equipped kitchen, a modern space designed so that functionality meets aesthetics. Minimal lines, glossy and matte surfaces, there is luxury hidden in every detail of the space. You will find all the necessary equipment to prepare your every meal with electrical appliances to cover every need, while cooking utensils and serving equipment are at your disposal!
The space is bright, naturally aerated, air-conditioned and adequately heated.

On this floor you will find a large veranda with a seating area. The view of the green park will relax you. Enjoy the first coffee of the day in the coolness of the veranda or sip a cold beverage at dusk while the sky has the most amazing purple hues. There is also a barbecue device at your disposal. Bring out your inner chef and cook some special meals to impress your company.

On the third floor you will find the bedrooms and some auxiliary spaces. Go down the internal wooden stairs and get into the hallway. This is the main entrance to the apartment with a high security door, electronic lock and alarm. In the same area, under the staircase there is a small broom closet and, in a closet, the washing machine and some storage spaces.

The main bedroom can accommodate up to two people with a comfortable double bed with a quality mattress and feather pillows by Dunlopillo. Appropriate design has taken advantage of every corner of the area, while a special wood construction creates a lightweight double partition for better arrangement of the space. On the side of the bed you will find a cable TV, all the necessary equipment and dim lights that create a relaxing atmosphere. On the other side of the partition there is a big mirror and a desk with a comfortable armchair, ideal for a few hours of work. The room also has a closet and chests of drawers for storing your things, an air - conditioning unit and all the necessary equipment. The magnificent view of the park, the private balcony with the small sitting area and the quality of the equipment in combination with the relaxing colors, the natural materials as well as the paintings of the artist Paniaras will make your stay comfortable and luxurious.
The room has a private bathroom with a spacious hydro massage shower cabin and all the necessary equipment. Shampoo, shower gel, hand soap and clean towels for every guest are also at your disposal.

The second bedroom has a comfortable double bed with a luxurious mattress and feather pillows by Dunlopillo as well as high quality bedding. The headboard and the uniform nightstands make a unique wooden construction. There is warm light everywhere from the lamps on each side of the bed and the exceptional ceiling lamp. A closet for storing your belongings, a cable TV and all the necessary equipment complete a space ideal for relaxation. This room also has a private balcony, on which you will find equipment such as a drying board.
There is also a spacious private bathroom. The shower with the built - in seat is offered for a relaxing time after a tiring day. Shampoo, shower gel, hand soap and clean towels for every guest are also at your disposal.

The feature that you will not forget from your stay in our luxurious maisonette is the swimming pool on the roof of the building that is exclusively used by you. The unobstructed view to every side of the city, the Acropolis showing even more idyllic when it is lit up during the night, the green Keramikos park with the picturesque train crossing of the bridge and the hill of Lycabettus overlooking our city are all in front of you. Relax while enjoying a drink on the sofas of the sitting area or while swimming in the crystal clear water of our pool. A space designed for all hours of the day complements the comfort and quality of our space.

It is easily accessible by both a lift and an external staircase from the large veranda of the living room. The area around the pool designed on different levels, with a wooden floor, and there is a shower at your disposal and a beautiful seating area with sofas and shades. Experience a special experience swimming in the clear waters of our pool, where we use Magnapool Zodiac cleaning system with its special glass bottom. There is a counter-swimming system at your disposal as well which is turned on by the push of a button and can be used as a fitness program.

The swimming pool is no deeper than 1.50m.

There is also a private parking space in the pilotis and a space for locking bicycles.
description.access:

You will find:
- Wi-Fi 50 mbps

There is, also, available storage room for your luggage for a short time before your arrival or after your departure.
description.neighborhood: The apartment is in Kerameikos, in the shadow of the Acropolis, and close to the metro station. Head out on foot to explore nearby Kerameikos Park, not to mention the Kerameikos Museum. All of the city's main monuments are also within easy reach.
description.transit: It is easy to access any place in the city from the apartment via public transportation. The metro station of Kerameikos, from which you have direct access to the airport, is just 250 meters away from the apartment. On Pireos street, almost on your doorstep, there is a bus stop for all buses to the port of Pireus, Kifisia, and all other spots in Attiki (by changing means of transportation at central stations). Just 600 meters away, in Thiseio, you will find another metro station (green line) with direct access to the port of Pireus (main port from which you can travel to the islands of the Aegean) and to Kifisia. Moreover, just outside the building, between the cultural center of Athens "Melina" and the "Technopolis" cultural park, there is a cycle path connecting the Stavros Niarchos foundation cultural center in Faliro with the Acropolis.
description.interaction:
Upon arrival, we will be waiting at the apartment to greet you and show you around.
We are available for direct communication via telephone or email and we can help you by giving you details for the apartment and the area. Please do not hesitate to contact us should you need more information.
There is the potentiality of a 24-hour arrival without our own presence.
description.house_rules:
- - During your stay the gardener may need to enter the apartment to maintain the plants. We will inform you prior to his arrival and if you agree he will first ring the bell. In case you don't want him to enter the apartment kindly inform me
- - Pay attention to wooden floors and in all furniture as well
- - Use the cutting table to prepare your food and put the warm utensils on the base
- - Respect neighbors
- - When leaving the apartment make sure that electrical appliances, air conditioning  and heating are switched off
- - When you leave the apartment make sure you close all windows, arm the alarm and close the door
-- Respect common silence hours: * Summer period 15: 00-17: 30 and 23: 00-07: 00 * Winter period 15: 30-17: 30 and 22: 00-07: 30
-- For your own safety and the proper maintenance of the swimming pool, every Wednesday at 8 am, a maintenance crew will be visiting the pool area and the engine room , located on the balcony of the 4th floor. 
-- Every morning, 10 am Monday- Saturday the cleaning crew will visit the pool area (5th floor) for a quick clean- maintenance of the space. The procedure will last approximately 15 minutes.
-- In the pool area you are allowed to use ONLY the grey towels with the sign "THE HOSTMASTER". The use of the bathroom towels is FORBIDDEN in the pool area because they get destroyed.

- - Κατά τη διάρκεια της διαμονής σας μπορεί να χρειαστεί να  επισκέπτετει το διαμέρισμα ο κηπουρός προκειμένου να συντηρήσει τα φυτά. Θα σας ενημερώσουμε για την ημέρα και ώρα της άφιξης του. Πρωτού εισέλθει στο διαμέρισμα θα χτυπήσει το κουδούνι. Σε περίπτωση που δεν επιθυμείτε την επίσκεψη του κηπουρού παρακαλώ όπως με ενημερώσετε το συντομότερο δυνατό
- - Προσοχή να δείχνετε τη δέουσα προσοχή στα ξύλινα δάπεδα καθώς και σε όλα τα έπιπλα
- - Να χρησιμοποιειτε το πάγκο κοπής για τη παρασκευή του φαγητου σας και να τοποθετείτε τα ζεστά σκεύη στη ειδική βάση
- - Παρακαλούμε χρησιμοποιείται το τζάκι με προσοχή και σύνεση, τοποθετώντας πάντοτε το προστατευτικό κάλυμα και χρησιμοποιώντας τα ειδικά εξαρτήματα που σας παρέχονται
- - Να δείχνετε σεβασμό στους γείτονες
- - Όταν αποχωρείτε από το διαμέρισμα φροντίστε να είναι απενεργοποιημένες  οι ηλεκτρικές συσκευές, ο κλιματισμός και η θέρμανση
- - Όταν αποχωρείτε από το διαμέρισμα βεβαιωθείτε ότι έχετε κλείσει όλα τα παράθυρα, έχετε ενεργοποιήσει το συναγερμό και βεβαιωθείτε ότι έχετε κλείσει σωστά τη πόρτα
- - Τηρείται το ωράριο κοινής ησυχίας: *Θερινή περίοδος 15:00-17:30 και 23:00-07:00  *Χειμερινή περίοδος  15:30-17:30 και 22:00-07:30
-- Για τη δική σας ασφάλεια και τη σωστή συντήρηση της πισίνας , κάθε Τετάρτη στις 8 το πρωί, θα επισκέπτεται το χώρο της πισίνας και το μηχανοστάσιο, που βρίσκεται στο μπαλκόνι του 4ου, ειδικός συντηρητής.
-- Kάθε πρωί, 10 η ώρα, Δευτέρα- Σάββατο, το συνεργείο καθαρισμού επισκέπτεται το χώρο της πισινάς στον 5ο όροφο για ένα γρήγορο καθαρισμό- συντήρηση που διαρκεί περίπου 15 λεπτά.
-- Στο χώρο της πισίνας επιτρέπονται ΑΠΟΚΛΕΙΣΤΙΚΑ ΚΑΙ ΜΟΝΟ οι γκρι πετσέτες με το σήμα "THE HOSTMASTER" που διατίθενται γι'αυτή τη χρήση. ΑΠΑΓΟΡΕΥΕΤΑΙ η χρήση των πετσετών των μπάνιων γιατί αποχρωματίζονται.

hosts.about:
Entrepreneurial Colombian woman, married and mom of 2 beautiful children, Airbnb Community Leader and living in Cartagena de Indias.

I love public relations because I can know more about people and give them my advice on what they need. Lover of books, good food and travel around the world, getting the opportunity to know new cultures and experience meeting new people. 

As a frequent traveler, I know the needs and the important things to notice when you are staying in another place/country. I’ve been a guest myself and now being a host too.

I am looking forward to connecting with people traveling to Cartagena and aim to make each guest experience, at this amazing place, like a local. 

My main objective is that you have a wonderful vacation and discover all that Cartagena offers, making your stay in my house and in my city really pleasant. 

In order to really enjoy a holiday in Cartagena you must experience the true local culture, I believe you need a host who really knows the local area, somebody to share time and gives you close attention, answering your questions and concerns; so please don’t hesitate to ask me anything, it would be my pleasure to help you.

Thanks for checking out my place and I hope to talk with you soon!

recent.comments:
Tatiana a été absolument adorable et très à l’écoute. 
L’emplacement est idéal et l’appartement parfait! 
Seul précision pour ceux comme moi qui avec 3 enfants ont besoin de faire des machines, le lave linge est situé hors de l’appartement et accessible de 7h à 17h avec une clé. Les cycles ne sont que d’une heure et ne lavent pas très bien.

items.comments:

Tatiana’s place is perfect if you are traveling to Cartegena! She is the perfect hostess, providing many local recommendations and very responsive. Check in was a breeze; the building is locked and has a door man 24/7 for safety.  The apartment has freezing cold aircon (a must in Cartegena in August), good wifi and really comfy beds. The location couldn’t be better in the old city, walkable to shops and restaurants and with a grocery store 2 minutes away. Don’t miss it!

Superó mis expectativas.  Volveremos sin duda.  Muy amables en recepción.  Nos recibieron maletas antes del check in. El lugar divino, muy bien organizado. Ubicación excelente, cerca al CC Serrezuela, Exito, restaurantes.  Entrar es como aislarse dentro de la ciudad.  Tatiana super amable. 100% recomendado
Excellent in every way. Great location to explore. Tatiana was very helpful with ideas and recommendations. Highly recommend.

This place was AMAZING. Having cold AC was important for me. The fridge had cold water and ICE! it’s so important especially in Cartagena. It was clean, beautiful and the host was very responsive. I absolutely loved it thank you.

Great location in a beautiful building with a great rooftop pool. Highly recommend. We will stay here again. 
If you need a tour of the city as to speak to Manfred. He was fabulous!

description.summary:
Enjoy this luxury apartment, located in an exclusive building in the heart of the historic downtown, within the walled city. A few steps from the most emblematic places of the city. Contemplate the quiet interior gardens and the fountain from the comfort of the embroidered hammock on the private terrace. Feel safe with 24-hour security, have fun in the 2 swimming pools, the very small gym and the common areas that invite you to relax in this beautiful place.

An unforgettable experience at the Cartagena's Downtown area (Walled City), very close to the main places around the city

*1066 Sq ft  (100 mt2) apartment, located a few steps from the San Diego plaza, that has a spacious bedroom where you will find a King size bed. 

* The kitchen has all the necessary implements, including coffee machine, microwave oven and necessary dishware, that allow you to cook your food in the most comfortable way. 

* Laundry in the building.

* Very Small gym in the building - Running Machine, Sauna

* In the living room you will find two large sofas that can be used as twin beds. They will be dress at the bedtime. 

* On the livingroom TV (43" Smart TV) you have cable and you can use your NETFLIX account. 

* Free High speed WIFI inside the apt.

* On the terrace you will find the dining table where you can enjoy your meals in a space full of peace and tranquility. 

* From the Apartment, You can explore Cartagena on foot: 5 - 15 mins to the main sights


I’m always looking forward to hosting great people. Email me to see if we can work out a deal.

The whole apartment in addition to common areas of the building such as:
* Laundry Room
* Dry-Cleaning onsite
* Swimming Pools
* Gym Running Machine, Sauna - No weigths

I am always available. You can send me a message, a text, an e-mail, or give me a phone call for any question or need you may have, in order to make your stay at my apartment, and of course at Cartagena, the most pleasant one. I will be more than happy to give you all my support.

Walking through San Diego is a unique sensation, as if the walkers were the stars of a yesteryear's film. Walking through this neighborhood is time travel, one of the most beautiful and traditional neighborhoods in the city. Getting lost among its streets is wonderful because this colorful neighborhood, the most majestic and exclusive of the colonial era. In San Diego everything has its charm. View vividly painted houses with flower-filled balconies in and around San Diego Square.

Based on the fact that the building is located in a strategic point at the Cartagena`s old city, it does not require the use of public transportation; walking is your best option to enjoy the atmosphere of its streets. Rent a bike is also a good option to know the city.

If you want to go to somewhere else around the city; taking a taxi, or an UBER is a good option. Another option is to let me know where you want to go and I can make all the arrengments for you.

The city has a humid tropical climate and an annual temperature of 29 ° C. Cartagena de Indias has a relative humidity + 90%, with the rainy season between April and May and October-November. It is noteworthy that although the weather tends to be hot all year round, the presence of a breeze makes the climate pleasant. The months of November to February are the windiest of the year.

description.summary:
Este apartamento cuenta con todos los servicios para hacerte sentir como en casa y hacer muy confortable tu estancia en la Ciudad de México.

Está amueblado con un diseño acogedor y vanguardista que te encantará.

La ubicación del departamento es excepcional y con una vista formidable de la ciudad.

Los huéspedes podrán hacer uso del gimnasio, alberca o estacionamiento.ñ, así como del roofgarden y salón de juegos del edificio.

El apartamento es sólo para los huéspedes y yo estaré disponible para atenderles.

Polanco es una de las zonas más exclusivas de la ciudad. A unas calles encontrarás importantes centros comerciales, como Plaza Antara, Plaza Carso, Palacio de Hierro de Polanco y restaurantes, museos y una de las avenidas más famosas de México: Presidente Masaryk.

A unas calles se encuentra el metro Polanco. En Polanco hay servicio de alquiler de bicicletas Mobike y Ecobici, así como de motocicletas eléctricas para moverte fácilmente.

description.interaction: El apartamento es sólo para los huéspedes y yo estaré disponible para atenderles.
description.house_rules:
El condominio donde está el departamento cuenta con un reglamento de uso de áreas comunes y buen comportamiento, el cual están obligados a respetar los huéspedes, pues de lo contrario, absorberán las multas que se genere su incumplimiento.

Cualquier desperfecto ocasionado por los huéspedes será cubierto por éstos. 

Tratamos de proporcionar insumos de calidad a nuestros huéspedes, por lo que la ropa de cama, toallas o muebles que resulten dañados durante una estancia con manchas difíciles de retirar -maquillaje, comida, zapatos, etc.-  generarán un cargo extra.

La renta del departamento no incluye el servicio limpieza durante los días de estancia de los huéspedes. Este tiene un costo de 400 pesos por día.

La renta de la casa no incluye despensa.

Toma en cuenta que el edificio es muy seguro, por lo que sólo se permitirá el acceso a personas registradas ante la administración del edificio y que podría solicitársete una identificación.

hosts.about:
Hi! My name is Zsuzsanna, or if easier call me Suzie - a lover of travel, food, and people. I am originally from Hungary, but currently living in Cape Town and studying part-time. My journey started as a stewardess on superyachts, however, my dream was to become a digital nomad. So now I work as a digital marketer & executive assistant to finally pursue this dream. 

I'm looking forward to hosting you and making your stay memorable in the Mother City - Cape Town. If you need recommendations of activities, restaurants, bars and more, I'm here to help! :)

I am a technology entrepreneur and been involved in a number of entrepreneurial ventures and blue chip companies across 10 countries - forming start-ups and SMEs; to launching one of the most popular group buying sites on the African continent.

I have worked across Africa, Europe and the US. I have travelled extensively for business and leisure having visited multiple countries on every continent.  

These days I can be found investing and consulting on number of projects and investments that incorporate my experience in start-ups and technology.

recent.comments: Check in process was very easy. The building is well secured. The grocery store, restaurants, and ATM on the first floor were very convenient. The view cannot be beat.

items.comments: Check in process was very easy. The building is well secured. The grocery store, restaurants, and ATM on the first floor were very convenient. The view cannot be beat.
Daniel is lovely host. He checked in regularly to make sure my stay was going well. He was also flexible with check out times which I appreciated

Great place with powerful setup for big minds .. 
would recommend anytime
Her şey harikaydı çok güzel bir 1 ay geçirdim. Konum ve güvenlik olarak başarılıydı.

Just the perfect place for us in Cape Town to wake up and prepare for our day, and then get back in the evening and relax. We were visiting family in difficult circumstances and Daniel’s place was so convenient. Thank you.
Generally a nice place to stay. The view of Table Mountain was amazing.  Load shedding was a pain especially when you want to stay indoors.

Nice and convenient place with gym and pool. UPS for load shedding and stays connected to wifi. :)
Supermarket and restaurants right downstairs and although you might not wanna go out at night in that area as a tourist, it is close to lots of central things by car.

description.summary:
Woodstock is one of the city’s coolest historic areas, conveniently situated in the City Centre with access to great cafés, restaurants, and bars. It is an ideal base for travellers to explore the beautiful sights of Cape Town. 

The building’s amenities include a gym, pool deck, lounge, and bar, while the ground-floor retail and restaurants cater for everyday needs and weekend treats. The fast Wi-Fi and UPS system in the apartment allows for seamless remote work.
description.space: This industrially designed studio is thoughtfully decorated with retro-chic inspired urban décor and tasteful splashes of colour.  The kitchen is fully equipped with luxurious imported appliances and the large walk-in shower will ensure that you relax and unwind in style. Admire the iconic Table Mountain from your window while sipping on your morning coffee and witness an incredible sunset to crown your day.
description.access: Guests have full and unrestricted private access to the apartment. In addition there is a communal swimming pool, gym and working area for use.
description.neighborhood: There's plenty to do on-site with a shared workspace, gym, pool, and cafe. Woodstock is one of the city's coolest historic areas, between Table Bay's docks and Devil's Peak's slopes. Visit Roodebloem Road for great restaurants and bars.
description.transit: The Stock Exchange allows guests to connect with the region's beat, its exciting atmosphere, and its people's colourful creations, from fashion-forward clothing to compelling cuisine and artisanal products. It also provides the ideal base from which the rest of Cape Town can be explored, given its central location and its proximity to city transport facilities, including a MyCiTi bus stop, bicycle lanes, and a train station.
description.interaction:
We are available 24/7 and ready to welcome you upon arrival.
Your Superhosts, Daniel and co-hosts Ireen & Suzie, are ready to take care of your every need and would be delighted to assist you with any additional requests or recommendations.
description.house_rules:
- Quiet time after 10 PM until 08 AM
- Please note heavily soiled/damaged linen will be billed for at replacement value. 
- Please ensure you book for the correct number of guests staying, more will not be allowed. 
- Visitors are permitted but more than 1 requires prior agreement with the owner due to health and safety reasons.
- If the booking is longer than 7 days a mandatory linen change and cleaning will be completed every 7 days at the advertised rate to ensure cleanliness and hygiene levels.
- Should keys be lost a lost keys fee will be charged at R1500.

Great convenient stay in Mexico City - close to multiple metro stations, restaurants, and landmarks. Great host/hosting team to work with, and the apartment is comfortable and clean. Recommend this stay if you're visiting CDMX.
Great place to stay! Very clean and felt safe. We enjoyed the neighborhood and it was easy checking in late at night. Would stay here again!

דירה מצוינת במיקום מעולה!
הכל היה נקי ונעים, המתקנים במבנה היו טובים מאוד ונגישים. המארח היה מצוין ונהנינו מאוד מהשהייה בנכס.
ubicación excelente y edificio impecable, volvería a hospedarme con ellos sin duda.

We stayed here for a week when visiting mexico city and were very happy! Erick and his co-hosts were very responsive, and also gave us great recommendations when we were looking for specific things to do in the city. The apartment was very spacious, including great closet space and a nice shower. They provided a fan to help keep the space cool. It was not noisy at night, and we felt safe walking around even late at night as the nearby streets were well-lit. It's overall in a great area of CDMX, there were plenty of bars, restaurants, and cafe's open nearby. Most of the major sights in the city were walking distance from the apartment. The building had several amenities that we didn't have time to take advantage of. The building has a doorman, and you will be asked to send ID photos of all your guests after booking to share with the building. We'd definitely stay here again the next time we visit!
Great spot near all the stuff. Clean, quiet apartment and responsive host!

description.summary:
Relájate y descansa a placer para después explorar la ciudad, este departamento te ofrece todas las comodidades y amenidades para que tu visita sea memorable, amarás cada minuto que pases en él.

Alguien estará disponible de forma remota en caso necesario

La Roma Norte y Condesa son los lugares que todo visitante debe explorar, podrás disfrutar de infinidad de cafés, restaurantes, museos, heladerías, además de una hermosa arquitectura y un ambiente seguro y agradable, querrás regresar!
description.neighborhood: La Condesa y la Roma Norte son dos de los barrios que todo visitante debe explorar. Con infinidad de cafés, restaurantes, museos, heladerías típicas, además de una hermosa arquitectura y un ambiente seguro y agradable, regresar es inevitable.
description.interaction: Alguien estará disponible de forma remota en caso necesario
description.house_rules: Estas son las reglas del apartamento, avísanos si se adaptan a tu viaje y si es así será un placer hospedarte.   Reglas del edificio y departamento:  - Fumar esta estrictamente prohibido dentro del departamento. - Esta prohibido ingerir bebidas alcohólicas en las áreas comunes del edificio (jacuzzi, sauna, alberca, terrazas, lobby, etc). Si eres sorprendido ingiriendo bebidas alcohólicas en las áreas comunes se te cobrará una multa. - No se permite nadar desnudo en la alberca.  - Se solicitará mandar una foto de identificación antes de la llegada, misma que deberá presentarse en el momento del registro al llegar al edificio, cualquier información sensible puede cubrirse si lo desea, solo necesitamos que sea visible el nombre y la foto del huesped - SOLO SE PERMITE LA ENTRADA AL DEPARTAMENTO Y AL EDIFICIO A LOS HUÉSPEDES REGISTRADOS EN LA RESERVACIÓN DE AIRBNB.  - En caso de necesitar usar el estacionamiento, te pedimos enviar los datos del coche que estará ingresando, placas y modelo. - No se permiten mascotas. - No se permiten fiestas, ni eventos.  - Check-in es a las 3 pm - Check out a las 11 am (mediodía) - El check-In se puede hacer a través de smart lock o con guardias de seguridad del edificio.   Para tener buena relación con los vecinos porfavor mantener el volumen de música y/o televisión en niveles aceptables, recuerda que es un edificio residencial aunque se vea como un hotel, y recuerda que si dañas algo del edificio o departamento se te cobrará el importe del arreglo o reposición del mismo.  Sean ustedes mismos pero siempre con respeto hacia los demás y disfruten esta icónica colonia.

The apartment was tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean. It provided a cozy and comfortable atmosphere that instantly made us feel at home.

Carol's communication was excellent, and she promptly answered all our questions. She also provided us with helpful local recommendations, ensuring we made the most of our time in the area.

The amenities provided were top-notch. The well-equipped kitchen made cooking a breeze, and the comfortable living area was perfect for relaxation. The bed was cozy, ensuring a restful night's sleep.

our stay with Carol was delightful. She is a caring and attentive host who ensured our comfort throughout our visit. We highly recommend her Airbnb to anyone seeking a memorable getaway. We look forward to returning in the future!
We traveled to a gymnastics competition and had the pleasure of staying over. Fantastic spot, centrally located, and has the fine details that one appreciates. Recommended. Thank you

perfect little privacy nook in busy centurion. checking in and out was a breeze, Carol is very responsive and has friendly and helpful staff on the property. the apartment is just as gorgeous and cosy as the photos depict and the gardens on the grounds are so peaceful. the solar panels were a HUGE bonus as well. such value for money and will definitely be back, no complaints from me

description.summary:
Let the eyes feast on clever exposed-brick feature walls, local artworks, and a white subway-tiled bathroom. The sparkling farmhouse kitchen has stainless steel appliances, while sockets fitting both local and international plugs are a nice touch.

New Yorker is an industrial chic apartment that accomodates 4 guests. It has brick-feature walls, South African artworks and an eye-candy white subway tiled bathroom. The bedrooms have bamboo mattresses and feather pillows. The kitchen is equipped with modern stainless steel appliances anf all sockets have both SA and  international plugs.

Guests can access the lapha or bbq grill patio, the well maintained garden and have a free and secure parking in the premises.

I live in the property so incase of any questions, enquiries or just simlpy socializing, am available at any time.

This ground-floor, accessible apartment is located in The Reeds, Centurion, a leafy suburb of Pretoria and very close to Midrand and Johannesburg. Stock up at the nearby shopping center, while cafes and restaurants are also within easy reach.

You can get around using the following modes of transport: car, uber, paid taxi, train and bus. We have a detailed map in the flat for your consideration.

This flat is fully wheel chair accessible and is located on the ground floor.

This ground-floor, wheelchair accessible apartment is located in The Reeds, Centurion, a leafy suburb of Pretoria and very close to Midrand and Johannesburg. Stock up at the nearby shopping center, while cafes and restaurants are also within easy reach.

name: Retreat to a Boho Chic Guesthouse in a Leafy Family Suburb
title: Loveland, Ohio

hosts.about: Co-Host/Clean for AIrbnb

Hello!  :)

I am so glad you are interested in getting to know our family.  My wife and I met in 2003 at college.  After dating for two and a half years, we got married the day after our final exam.  Katie began working at a marketing firm, while I began working as a CPA for a large public accounting firm.  After 4 years in Cincinnati, I took a job opportunity to audit hedge funds in the Cayman Islands.  This incredible experience formed us in many ways by  cementing our relationship and giving us the confidence that we could do anything together.  We left Cayman in order to start a family back in the States in 2012, and we now have four amazing kids - Giorgio, Decker, Pfeiffer, and Covey.  We believe family is one of the greatest tools God gives us in order to change the world. 

To sum up what we are all about, it's  adventure, togetherness, and impact.  

When my wife and I were starting our family, we decided to quit our corporate jobs and focus on quality over quantity.  Since then our life has been filled with adventure through travel, new experiences, business ventures, relationships, and a willingness to do what others think is crazy.  "Adventure" to us really means being "doers" by acting on our ideas.

Togetherness is a huge part of what our family is about as we integrate our whole family into our work, our education, our faith, our hobbies, and all we do.  We work from home to be around our kids, we homeschool together, we travel together, and, generally, any other task from grocery shopping to working out is an opportunity to spend time together.

When Katie was pregnant with our first child in 2013, we decided to write a family mission statement to help give us direction in decisions big and small.  The gist of our mission statement is to change the world by making it more like heaven.  We do our best to make the world a better place by spreading love.

We hope that helps you get to know us a little better, but we'd love to get to know you more in person!

Thanks,
Brent, Katie, Gio, Decker, Pfeiffer, and Covey!

recent.comments: Adorable styled place with the most coziest bed. The sheets were so soft and the mattress felt like heaven. Every decor detail was perfectly placed to give you lovely at home feel. Having a garage space was a very extra added bonus too.

items.comments: Adorable styled place with the most coziest bed. The sheets were so soft and the mattress felt like heaven. Every decor detail was perfectly placed to give you lovely at home feel. Having a garage space was a very extra added bonus too.

We have stayed at Brent’s place several times and every time it is pristinely clean. The bed is very comfortable and there are plenty of pillows and covers. The towels and washcloths are really soft and there are plenty of them. All the comforts of home!
Great accommodations.
Beautiful space, would love to stay again!

This guest house is exactly as pictured. Exceptionally clean and very well equipped and maintained. Very quiet, safe neighborhood that is an easy drive to the downtown area or Cincinnati itself. 

Brent was spot on with his communication and gave some excellent restaurant suggestions. 10/10 would definitely stay again in the future!
Brent was wonderful to work with.  He was very understanding of special circumstances and we can’t say enough good things about our interactions!

Loveland was exactly as advertised. The space is pretty large and very clean. Access through the garage was simple and great since it rained and we could pull our car into the garage. There was enough pots and pans to cook and ample prep space.  We were able to do laundry. And It’s very close to Kings Island with a Kroger down the street. 

The hosts were very courteous, proactively sent instructions/reminders, and quick to response. 

Loveland is an excellent place to stay.

description.summary:
Laze away an evening swaying in a macrame hammock in a living room with a Moroccan vibe. Make breakfast in a sparkling white kitchen and snuggle together on a cozy banquette.

The bedroom has a new memory foam queen mattress.  The family room has a pull-out couch with a queen mattress.  The eating area feels like a diner with a built in banquette.  The Kitchen is charming and bright.  A washer and dryer are available in the home.  The bathroom is newly updated with concrete tile and gold fixtures.  The home has an attached garage for your use.

The guest house is completely detached from the main house, but it does share a driveway with our main residence.  The guest house also has an attached two car garage that can be used by guests.

We love getting to know new people!  Because the guest house is so close to our main house, we are always available for questions or help.  On nice nights we'd be happy to have drinks around the fire.  We're very friendly and would love to connect, but we also fully respect privacy and discretion for guests that just want to get away from it all.

The Land of Love House is in the city of Loveland, 30 minutes northeast of Central Cincinnati. It's a wonderful neighborhood with great restaurants and attractions including Kings Island, Beach Waterpark, Great Wolf Lodge, and ATP Tennis Tournament.

The Land of Love house is located near everything a good suburb has to offer - restaurants, shopping, grocery, and (of course) Target are all within a 5 minute drive of the house.  Historic downtown Loveland and the bike path are less than 10 minutes away, best accessed by vehicle.

During the week of your stay we will send you a welcome letter with everything you need to know about the house.  It’s all pretty straightforward though.  :)

name: Remodeled 1928 Guesthouse with a Pool in Five Points
title: Nashville, Tennessee

hosts.about:
I live in East Nashville. I moved here from Los Angeles 4 years ago and absolutely fell in love with Nashville.  Nashville is wonderfully supportive community: Wonderful food, friends, and lots of warm hello's. People here have a real authenticity and kindness. 

I decided to Airbnb because I love to travel. It is one of my passions. I have been all over the world and love the idea hosting people in this great city. It brings me great joy for people to come here and feel welcomed as I felt welcome in all the other countries I have traveled to.

I was originally born in South Carolina and am a Southern girl at heart though I have lived in NYC and LA for over 20 years. However I have never lost my love for hospitality. We take great pride in hospitality and I want everyone to feel comfortable, relaxed, and welcome in our cottage. 

I do have a 9 year old son and we are in and out more in the summer but please say hello if you see us. IF you have any questions don't hesitate to ask. 

My life motto is CARPE DIEM. This life is a gift and I am so grateful every day for the many many blessings.

recent.comments: We loved our stay in East Nashville!! Nealy was a very responsive host and the home was clean and comfortable. Our only minor complaint was that the gate leading to the Airbnb was old and stuck quite a bit trying to get in and out. Everything else was easily accessible and we loved our stay in Nashville! Thank you Nealy!

items.comments: We loved our stay in East Nashville!! Nealy was a very responsive host and the home was clean and comfortable. Our only minor complaint was that the gate leading to the Airbnb was old and stuck quite a bit trying to get in and out. Everything else was easily accessible and we loved our stay in Nashville! Thank you Nealy!
Nealy’s place was amazing!!!! Beautiful and SO close to everything !!!! Nealy was great to communicate with and the bed was very comfortable!!!
Nealy was responsive and helpful. We enjoyed her beautiful space and the darling neighborhood. Will definitely consider for future stays in Nashville!
10/10 recommend
Such a cool vibe! Walkable to a cute downtown area. Will definitely consider staying again when returning to Nashville.
Lovely stay! Spacious place, easy pool access, and all the amenities to feel right at home.

Nealy’s place is very beautiful and feels safe and homey! It was very clean and spacious. She did a good job communicating the day we got there when there was someone parked in the guest parking so we really appreciated that! I feel like we paid more than necessary since we were barely at the Airbnb but that’s ok. Overall a good experience and a cool find!

description.summary:
Climb a ladder to a secret loft in a dreamy white-on-white room and get the feeling of sleeping in a cloud. There's plenty of space to spread out on polished white floors, including a full kitchen and dining table big enough for entertaining guests.

The home is permitted via Nashville Metro permit # 2/0/1/8/0/0/3/8/4/2

House has access to salt water pool from April - October. The pool is heated April - May and September - October. 

Relax by the pool and soak up the Nashville sun. The cottage is minimally furnished with locally sourced furniture and filled with one of a kind art I've collected from my travels.

Fully equipped kitchen with small balcony overlooking pool. Open Studio feel, with vaulted ceilings, with a handmade wooden ladder leading to the Queen Loft Space. One King Size bed with one Queen size bed in the loft space. Sofa is also cozy and great for sleeping. All bedding provided. One full sized shower and bathroom with an old vintage trough sink.

The ceilings are vaulted with thoughtful wood working throughout. This gives the space a very relaxing, romantic feel. You can utilize the kitchen to cook for yourselves. Turnip Truck, our local grocery, is within walking distance or you can rent bicycles on 10th street and cycle down. Don't forget to stop at our local wine store, Woodland Wine, for some amazing vino to go with your meal. 

You can also walk to other wonderful restaurants in the neighborhood if you don't feel like cooking. After dinner make sure to stroll around our charming neighborhood filled with beautifully restored homes and shops. It's as if you stepped out of a different time period. 

East Nashville has become a local gathering place for artists, restauranteurs, and neighborhood families. It is a wonderful, eclectic neighborhood filled with heart and personality. Our cottage is within walking distance of many of the local hot spots. 

East Nashville has been featured as a culinary and style destination by the likes of GQ, The New York Times, and Travel and Leisure. The cottage is very close walking vicinity (5 min) to:

Barista Parlour
Marche/Margot
Edley's BBQ
PRB Butcher
Bar 308
Five Spot (Incredible Intimate Venue)
Crying Wolf Bar
Tree House
Lockland Table
Dino's
Public House
Atta Boy
I Dream of Weenie
Five Points Pizza
Burger Up
Basement East (Local Venue, Great music)
Woodland Wine Shop
Turnip Truck

We are within a mile from:

Two Ten Jack
Jeni's Ice Cream
Eastland Cafe
Rosepepper Cantina
Wild Cow Vegetarian
Pharmacy Burger
Mas Tacos

Back Alley and street parking. Fenced in back yard.

Explore and fall in the love with Nashville like we did when we moved here four years ago! It is a beautiful city: filled with romance, honky tonk's, one of kind music, and delicious food. 

Guest access
Guests will have house to themselves. Ammenities include:

WIFI
Cable TV 
Fully Equipped Kitchen
Back Yard with access to salt water pool - April thru October
Fire Pit
Cable TV
Alarm Code
Walkable to Five Points and local restaurants

Guests have access to the backyard with salt water pool.

My family does use the pool as well in the summer however we will be respectful when guests are in the cottage. 

You can access the cottage from the back alley and park behind the house. You access the cottage from the gate.

I like to give guests space....however am available if they need anything. Feel free to text me. 323.632.6813

The guesthouse is in the heart of the Five Points neighborhood in historic East Nashville. It's a walkable area just five minutes from downtown. Walk to bars and restaurants, and rent a bike to tour nearby Shelby Park.

Lots of Uber’s and Lyft’s available in the neighborhood.

name: Off-Grid Historic Pioneertown Home on 40 Acres
title: Pioneertown, California

recent.comments: Spent a fantastic weekend with my wife at Erik's place.  It was very serene and private with beautiful 360 views of the desert landscape.  Being cat lovers, Molly the Cat was a big plus for us!  Would definitely return here for a romantic weekend.

items.comments: Spent a fantastic weekend with my wife at Erik's place.  It was very serene and private with beautiful 360 views of the desert landscape.  Being cat lovers, Molly the Cat was a big plus for us!  Would definitely return here for a romantic weekend.
Nice place, need to walk up steps to get it the house. Very close to pappi & harriets which was very fun!

The house was the perfect getaway for relaxing. Erik was so helpful with any questions we had and lots of tips for the house. We absolutely fell in love with the place and will definitely be returning!

This was our second time staying at Ranch of the Rising Son and it was lovely. Our dog was so happy to be back in the yard and we loved our quick getaway out of LA. Thanks Erik for being such a kind host and so easy to communicate with!

The adventure was real! 
Great location and vibe…and couldn’t get enough of Molly the visiting neighbor cat. I went for a solo road trip and to make some music … the piano was a great bonus! The trip was a success!
Erik is an attentive and gracious host.
Cheers!
Amazing house, great location.  I highly recommend this house.  Beautiful blend of character and modern amenities.  I look forward to staying here once again soon!
Had a wonderful stay. I love this place.

description.summary:
Welcome to your historic rural oasis on the outskirts of Pioneertown. Showcased in the NY Times fashion section, the property features a rock hot tub or cool dipping pool surrounded by cactus gardens and the Sawtooth mountains. Just minutes from Pappy & Harriet’s in Pioneertown and replete with original art by the late Gerald Zeldin, custom furniture, and a grand piano. Also close to Joshua Tree park and the amenities of Yucca Valley. The historic mining property of The Ranch of The Rising Sun was designed and restored as a completely off-grid haven by filmmakerJulian T Pinder.

The Ranch of the Rising Sun, a mining base camp built in the 1920's,  is the perfect balance of rustic charm and modern amenities. Off grid on a full solar system and water well, the home also provides high speed wifi, state of the art cooling and heating systems on a smart NEST thermostat, flatscreen tv with Netflix, Amazon etc, new top of the line oven / stovetop, vintage sound system with Bluetooth capabilities, keyless door entry etc. 

Guests have access to the entire house and property, including the wood burning stove (eucalyptus firewood is provided at all times free of cost), cowboy wood burning hot tub / cool dipping pool, grand piano, native cactus garden, fire pit, outdoor banquet dining table, hammock, alkaline drinking water, and some of the best hiking in the area right out the back door.

The house and property are also right off of Pioneertown Road, with no long rough dirt roads to navigate and beat your car up on.

The ranch was built and owned by Julian Pinder, who has lived in the area for years. Rent from locals, not out-of-town investors!

Entire house and property, as well as endless hiking and adventuring right behind the house on thousands of acres of stunning Wildlands Conservancy land, no tourists or park fees to deal with, just old fashioned exploring!

There are detailed self-check in instructions. Tyler, my friend and property manager lives nearby and I'm 5 miles away at my other ranch. We respect your privacy 100% but if you need any advice, help, or have any questions we are always available by text or phone 24 hours a day.

Pioneertown was built in the late 40's as a functioning movie set by Roy Rogers and the Sons of Pioneers; hundreds of Westerns have been shot here. Catch live music at Pappy and Harriets, minutes away, and go hiking and horseriding out the back door.

Unfortunately you'll need a vehicle out here, it's rural!

*There's a very strict maximum of 4 guests in the house as the solar and septic system cannot handle any more than that.

name: Charming Condo in Heart of Kona, Oceanfront Pool & A/c
title: Kailua-Kona, Hawaii

hosts.about: I'm a mother of three, a rancher who is drawn to the sea. We spend as much time as possible in Kona close to our family. We welcome you to our home away from home.

recent.comments: Die Wohnung entspricht den Fotos. Es war sauber und das Check-in war unkompliziert. Essmöglichkeiten sind teilweise zu Fuss aber vor allem mit dem Auto gut erreichbar. Im Wäscheraum konnte via App oder mit Münzen bezahlt werden.

items.comments: Die Wohnung entspricht den Fotos. Es war sauber und das Check-in war unkompliziert. Essmöglichkeiten sind teilweise zu Fuss aber vor allem mit dem Auto gut erreichbar. Im Wäscheraum konnte via App oder mit Münzen bezahlt werden.

The place was perfect for my husband and me. It was near the airport, Walmart and Costco which was great! Lots to see and do close by. We took many day trips exploring most of the island and getting to the other side of the island only took 1 1/2 hours. We used the snorkeling gear and towels nearly daily which were wonderful to have. We cooked all meals in the condo, everything worked great and it met all of our needs. It was wonderful coming home to AC and a shower after a long day of exploring. We would definitely return to Jenna’s place the next time we visit Hawai’i.

quiet neighborhood. small pool and access to shoreline (rocky, not a beach). provided a boogie board and a couple of sets of snorkel gear. full kitchen with oven, stove top,  microwave, and full-size frig.  Close to restaurants and beaches.  comfortable beds. Only the bedroom is air conditioned.  We enjoyed our stay here.

We had the best week staying at Jenna’s. She gave wonderful local recommendations and we felt very cozy at her home. The AC unit works well to cool down the bedroom and the snorkel gear was nice to have. We walked every morning to get coffee and it is ~1 mile to all of the shops and restaurants so definitely walkable or you could drive and park. The Big Island was amazing and we will be coming back someday!!
Jenna’s place is sooo cute. Great location with a pool and an ocean view. She was also super responsive to my questions. Highly recommend!

Jenna was so easy to communicate with and even when I had some questions she was quick to reply and help me out! 

Location is pretty nice, you definitely do need a car for the big island though!

Jenna’s place was perfect for me, my husband and 11 month old daughter. She supplied a pack n play which was a great addition. Her place was clean and looked just like the pictures. The condo amenities were easily accessible. We loved trying out the charcoal bbq by the pool. We spent a week and got to travel around the island by car- the parking space was appreciated! This was a perfect spot to enjoy Kona. Would recommend and would stay again. 
Thank you Jenna!

description.summary:
Pull up a lounger on the stone pool patio for a spectacular ocean sunset. This redesigned condo features a peaceful, neutral palette against rich mahogany flooring. Each morning is a perfect one on a private balcony off the dreamy white bedroom.

Our 1 bedroom 1 bath condo comes with a stocked kitchen and bathroom for up to four guests. In the master bedroom you will find a new 14" queen memory foam mattress, new A/C unit and new 40" smart television with Netflix. In the living room there is a new queen sofa sleeper. We provide free Wifi, beach towels, assigned parking stall and coin-op laundry facility on site.

Guests have access to the beautifully redone pool at the waters edge, community bbq to grill up your daily fresh catch and coin-op laundry facility for your convenience.

This condo is in Kona Shores, an oceanfront complex located on the scenic Ali'i Drive. It is family friendly, with both full-time and vacation tenants. While here, enjoy the farmers and craft markets, local cuisine, amazing sunsets and whales.

Kona Shores is located within walking distance to Kona Town. You do not need a car for this location if you are the walking type. Our condo is within one mile of restaurants, farmers markets, beaches, shopping and tour companies to help you plan your ideal Hawaiian vacation.

description.transit: Kona Shores is located within walking distance to Kona Town. You do not need a car for this location if you are the walking type. Our condo is within one mile of restaurants, farmers markets, beaches, shopping and tour companies to help you plan your ideal Hawaiian vacation.
description.house_rules: ~Please remove shoes when entering the condo~No Glass in pool area~Park in designated stall only~clean all dirty dishes~take trash to dumpster at pool before check out~enjoy!

name: Cool King Studio. In Town. Next to Lift. Pool/Hot Tubs.
title: Breckenridge, Colorado

gallery.caption: Rustic-modern decor.

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
We love taking advantage of the Rocky Mountains: skiing, biking, golf. When we're not getting up to our homes Colorado, we love to travel. We really try to get a true-life experience of a place and have found AirBNB helps immerse you in a city. 

As guests, we like to be busy, so you probably won't see us much. As hosts, if you are staying in our mountain homes, you probably won't see us at all. We try to be available by text, email during waking hours to help make your stay fantastic.

recent.comments: We enjoyed a perfect long weekend and this place made it all worth it!  Everything was so close - within walking distance to restaurants, shops and more!  The hot tubs were amazing and so relaxing!  Highly recommend!!!!

items.comments: We enjoyed a perfect long weekend and this place made it all worth it!  Everything was so close - within walking distance to restaurants, shops and more!  The hot tubs were amazing and so relaxing!  Highly recommend!!!!
Awesome place. Super clean, in a good location, and easy to access
Great place, great weekend! Thank you so much for a great experience.
Great place in an excellent location and very cozy, we felt right at home!

This space is not the lap of luxury but it’s location makes it perfect for a weekend in Breck! It is clean, tastefully decorated as pictured, and within walking distance to all that Breck has to offer. Jack and Jerrod were quick to respond whenever we had a question. Overall my husband and I had a fabulous time staying here! We would definitely book again!

My friend and I stayed here for a couple nights for a girls’ mountain getaway. The place was smaller, but enough space for 2 people comfortably. Decor was super cute, and we appreciated the thoughtful touches such as makeup wipes. Location could not be beat! So close to Main Street, so we were able to park upon arrival to Breck and walk everywhere during our stay. Jack & Jerrod were communicative and provided clear instructions (with photos!) with directions for parking and check-in, which was really helpful. Would definitely stay here again!
Loved the place. Would definitely stay here again.

description.summary:
This adorable studio is perfectly located right at the ski lift and in the heart of Breckenridge. It has a fully equipped kitchen, massive bathroom , smart TV, and cool design features like vintage ski photos and reclaimed barn wood wall. There is a comfy king bed and a pullout sofa. The building has all the amenities: brand-new pool, hot tubs, game room and gym (new pics coming). Park in the heated garage ($20/day) and walk to everything.

THE CONDO
This is a 400 square foot one-room studio located on the fourth floor. It has a king-sized bed and a queen-size pull-out couch with memory foam mattress (it's still not the most comfortable thing but does the deed). There is TV with cable, a small closet, two-person breakfast bar, fully equipped kitchen with stove, fridge, freezer, microwave, coffeemaker, etc. The bathroom has double sinks, and bathtub/shower, separate toilet room. There are many cool design features such as reclaimed barnwood wall, slate bathroom tile, wood floors, vintage ski photos, stacked stone backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and walnut counters. The unit looks out to a courtyard area. It's perfect for a couple or a few close friends/family members as it's basically the size of a normal hotel room. It is very very quiet as it is in a concrete building sharing only the bathroom/kitchen wall with nobody above. 

THE BUILDING
The Village at Breckenridge is a large complex of several buildings. This unit is located in Peak 9 Inn which has heated underground parking (additional fee), conference center, mini convenience store, business center, an indoor/outdoor pool, four hot tubs, steam room, sauna, and minimal workout room. There is a ski shop downstairs for rentals..

Guests will have access to the entire studio and the building amenities including pool, hot tubs, and gym.

We live in Denver so likely won't see you but are available by text or phone to answer questions, give recommendations, or help with any issues. We cannot guarantee 24/7 service.

The location doesn't get any better than this! It is located 1/2 block off of Main Street, which makes it within easy walking distance of  shops, grocery stores, bars, and restaurants. It is right at the base of Peak 9, just a few steps from the Quicksilver lift in the Village at Breckenridge.

Once you get here, you won't need a car. You can walk to dining, shopping, grocery, and skiing. There are also free town shuttles. The nearby free Summit Stage will take you to Keystone, Copper, ABasin. Take a shuttle from the airport (Colorado Mountain Express) and never need a car!

PARKING CHARGES
Parking is NOT INCLUDED. It is an additional $20/day, let me know when you book and I will alter the reservation to add it. 

CHECK-IN PROCESS 
Much of this building is managed by Vail Resorts and it has a traditional front desk, valet, etc. Because we rent our unit on our own, we are able to provide a better pricing than Vail (and it's cooler than their units). But, the front desk and valet are not available to our guests. You will access garage by getting key card and parking pass from a lockbox located in the garage.


MISC NOTES
There is no air conditioning in summer, but you rarely need it. No balcony. No fireplace.

name: Movie Colony Home with Pool, Hot Tub and Private Casita
title: Palm Springs, California

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: I'm an LA based photographer. Loves travel, gardening, friends, trip to our desert home, good food and great drinks.
A

recent.comments: Brought my small children to Palm Springs in the 112 degree heat, and they loved the house and pool. Collin and Patrick were super responsive when we had any questions and concerns. Would totally stay again. Hopefully not in the hottest week of the year .

items.comments: Brought my small children to Palm Springs in the 112 degree heat, and they loved the house and pool. Collin and Patrick were super responsive when we had any questions and concerns. Would totally stay again. Hopefully not in the hottest week of the year .
This house is awesome, clean and well organized. Collin and Patrick were great hosts and were very easy to communicate with. We would definitely stay there again.
Collin was a great host! Extremely communicative and easy to work with. I would gladly stay at another of Collin's places again.
Booked Collin’s place for a girls weekend. Host was super responsive & the house had everything we needed. Had a blast!! Will definitely book again.

Collin & Patrick were both very helpful and quick to respond. The house was perfect for our ladies weekend. It was lovely to spend the day enjoying the pool. We also enjoyed the hot tub at night. The house was so sweet and everything was clean and nice. I would rent this house again if I go back down in Palm Springs.

This is a perfect bungalow that comfortably houses 3 couples with plenty of privacy. It's close to downtown and has an extremely well equipped kitchen for an Airbnb. Great furnishings and several little inviting outdoor areas to gather. The pool is lovely but cold which is probably welcome in warmer weather but I wish I had asked for it to be heated which must be done in advance. 

There is also some additional paperwork required presumably by the City of Palm Springs  that I found to be a nuisance and made me a little uncomfortable that there might be sensitivities by the neighbors to having renters in their neighborhood. We had three cars to manage with rules that they couldn't be parked on the street and getting in and out was a bit of a hassle. Small things to be aware of but really nothing that will impact the enjoyment of your stay. 

We truly enjoyed our time there with our two grown sons and would definitely stay there again. It was a relaxing and great Airbnb experience.

Our stay was absolutely fantastic! Everything matched the description, the pool and the hot tub were defiantly the highlights. They were very well-maintained and provided a perfect way to relax and unwind after a day out exploring Palm Springs. I loved being able to cool off in the pool and then soak in the hot tub while enjoying the beautiful desert landscape. 

Collin and Patrick were always available and quick to respond to any questions or concerns that I had. Their responsiveness made our stay even more enjoyable and stress-free. 

Overall, we had a fantastic experience at Collin and Patrick’s  Airbnb in Palm Springs and we cannot wait to come back again soon.

description.notes:
Palm Springs TOT Permit #PS6857 

Palm Springs 11.5% tax will be applied to all short term stays and collected at check out via Airbnb money request. 

Pricing: 
- Extended Stays - 28 days and over - is $4,800 / month, Utilities - Water, Gas & Electric, cable & internet are paid by tenant. Pool service, gardener and trash disposal are paid by host.
- Stays 2 weeks and over - Water, Gas,  Electric, Internet / cable are paid by tenant. Pool service, gardener, trash disposal are paid by host.
- Optional pool heating is $50 / PER DAY. Pool heating is generally needed ~ Oct-May.
- Cleaning fee of $175 per reservation. 
- Pets are an additional $50/day - 2 pet max.
description.neighborhood: Located in the quiet residential neighborhood of Movie Colony, our home is protected from the strong winds that the north side of town experiences. A secure property with Mountain Views and walking distance to down town Restaurants and shopping!

description.house_rules:
House Rules :
Palm Springs recently implemented a strict CODE OF CONDUCT for short term tenants and home owners. By breaking the rules below tenants may be subject to city fines upwards of $3,000, eviction and loss of security deposit. Please help us keep Palm Springs vacation renter friendly! 

- Noise Detection :  We use “NOISEAWARE” a noise detecting (not recording) system popular with short term rental owners that sends alerts when outside noise reaches levels considered by the city to be unacceptable / citation worthy. A $250 fine for noise violations will be implemented on the first violation. A second detection is grounds for removal from the property. This includes children at play and loud pool splashing during the day.  

- AGE REQUIREMENT : Palm Springs city ordinance requires that the responsible person occupying the home (i.e., the person making the booking) be at least 25 years old. Booking guest MUST be present during length of stay. 

- A mandatory 12.5% occupancy tax will be applied to every stay under 28 days and collected at check out via an Airbnb money request 

- Absolutely NO parties : An unauthorized party or event at the property will lead to your immediate removal from the property. The city of Palm Springs has strict vacation rental ordinances regarding parties and any violation can result in fines up to $3,000. ONLY 6 PEOPLE are allowed on the property at any time. 

- No amplified outdoor music at ANY TIME. Palm Springs city ordinance prohibits amplified exterior noise. Additionally indoor amplified music should not be heard at property line. THIS IS STRICKLY ENFORCED and includes LAPTOPS, CELLPHONES and blasting the TV so you can hear it outside. 

- Maximum Occupancy is 6 (strictly enforced) – Again, Palm Springs has strict rules regarding occupancy. If more than 6 people are to found to be staying at the house security deposit will be forfeited and all guests will be asked to leave. 

- Noise Curfew : 10pm exterior noise curfew. Palm Springs city ordinance requires that outdoor noise be limited to 40 decibels after 10pm -- equivalent to a soft whisper.

- Smoking : This is a Non-Smoking House. If evidence of smoking is found indoors, entire security deposit will be retained for additional cleaning.

- PETS : Pre-approved, well behaved pets are allowed on the property but not on the furniture or beds. If pets are found to have been on the property without prior approval, security deposit will be forfeited. There is $75/day PER pet cleaning fee - 2 pet max. 

- Pool Rules : Guests agree to have a responsible adult supervising minors while they swim in the pool. Guest is hereby notified that the pool can be dangerous and guest accepts fully the risks involved. By booking this rental the guest agrees to this. Our pool is shallow and contains a raise shelf. There is absolutely NO DIVING. 

- No Glass : Glass is not allowed near the pool (including beer bottles, glass water bottles etc.) plastic dishware is available for use and is located in the kitchen cabinet to the right of the sink. 

By continuing to book all guests agree to follow rules and abide by statements made above. The guest booking our house will be required to read the Palm Springs "Good Neighbor Guide", email a copy of their government ID and have all guest staying at the house sign their names to the Palm Springs "Rules and Regulations" form. 
 
Thank you.

hosts.about:
Hello I’m Sofia,
I have been travelling to and living time to time on the beautiful island of Bali for 18 years now. 

I designed the interiors and the furniture for YourBali Homes and also built the Lighthouse Apartment! 
Parwati loves ‘cute and colourful ‘ and the homes are definitely warm and welcoming as is Parwati herself!
Her family is my Bali Family. 
So, If you need advice on,
Restaurants and shopping and moving around Bali 
I am here to assist at anytime but Parwati is such a good host you wont need me !

Enjoy Yourselves in Your Bali Home and on the Island!

Bali is our island home ! 
We hope you enjoy to feel at home here, which reflects colourful and cosmopolitan Bali with a familar family feeling!

recent.comments:
Don’t hesitate - just book!

The place is perfect - you’re right in the heart of Ubud but in an oasis of calm. There’s a really magical quality about this place. 

Pretty much opposite the world-class Seniman coffee house - ideal for breakfast and for pre-dinner drinks. 

Parwati was immensely helpful, proactive and supportive. 

We’d recommend the place without a moment’s hesitation.

items.comments:
Don’t hesitate - just book!

The place is perfect - you’re right in the heart of Ubud but in an oasis of calm. There’s a really magical quality about this place. 

Pretty much opposite the world-class Seniman coffee house - ideal for breakfast and for pre-dinner drinks. 

Parwati was immensely helpful, proactive and supportive. 

We’d recommend the place without a moment’s hesitation.

This Villa felt like a retreat every time we came back from exploring everything Ubud had to offer. The location is absolutely perfect. Steps away from top class cafes, exciting restaurants and beautiful rice field walks, and yet unbelievably peaceful and quiet at the same time. We had planned on visiting so many different spots for breakfast but that all changed when we went to Seniman cafe on the first day and we realised we were having some of the best coffee and food Bali has on offer. The yoga space was perfect for relaxing and enjoying a wine or just as a space to plot the next day’s adventures from. Parwati was an amazing host and really did make us feel safe and at home in the Villa. Her recommendation of using Satya as a driver was fantastic. We used his services on three separate occasions and can’t recommend him highly enough. Do yourself a favour and book this Villa now. You won’t be disappointed.

It was great, we had a fantastic time

The place ist just wonderful
Our family enjoyed it very much

Parwati house was great. everything was as it show on the the air b&b website. the kids loved the pool,the sleeping areas, and the location. excellent  host. 
I will be recommending her place to any of my friends visiting ubud.

Parwati’s villa is in the perfect location for accessing everything Ubud has to offer on foot. No need to hire a scooter or driver as you can walk everywhere. The best coffee in Ubud (Seniman) is right across the road and we enjoyed breakfast there every morning. If you enjoy vegan food there is a good vegan pizza place about 100m up the road and Hujan local (fine dining) is also about 50m away. Alternatively for budget friendly food Fair Warung Bale provides good food for a worthy cause providing free health care for someone in need for each meal purchased. Although the Villa is in the centre of Ubud it is a peaceful and quiet space to return to in the evening. I would definitely recommend.
Parwati is an amazing host. The place was beautiful, close to Ubud's main attractions, and at the same time, placed in a quiet and private street. I would definitely go back!
Super hôte toujours prête à vous aider . Emplacement en centre ville proche de tout . Villa top

description.summary:
The buzz of Ubud market is just a few minutes' walk away,  countless cafes, restaurants, and shops create a vibrant atmosphere, spa treatments, massages, and pedicures are all within easy reach.
if you are  A FUN person ..LOVE life ..young at HEART.. ready for something special..open to new things..and can let go and go- with- the- flow please come and stay
description.space:
Our friends call the villa "Seminyak in Ubud" or "Marrakesh in Bali" 
 "Your Bali Home" is a unique private home in the centre of Ubud, but positioned perfectly secluded from the noise & dust. The rooms all open onto a central (hand coloured cement ) pool space  with decking. The space is serene & filled with artworks both from around the globe & produced by the host. Comfort, elegance & humour infuse every corner.
description.access:
There are 2 entrances to the villa, 
1. use street stairs on the MAIN road. (reasonably steep 17 STEPS ) OPPOSITE PIICCA BALI SHOP and above and behind MAY SALON SHOP  
2. entrance via a small lane with ramp (steep NO STAIRS) To find this entrance, continue from Stairs at location (1.) go straight 20m and turn 1st street right. then take 1st laneway right. then 1st lane way right again and walk up a ramp 20m to find the BLUE DOOR. 

You have access to the entire villa which includes the fully equipped kitchen, lounge area, dining area, pool & deck plus multi-use yoga/ meditation space, open air pool- outdoor shower  near the temple & extra toilet. 

You have access to the entire villa which includes the fully equipped kitchen, lounge area, dining area, pool & deck plus multi-use yoga/ meditation space, open air pool- outdoor shower  near the temple & extra toilet. You are free to come & go as you please & there's wi-fi.
description.notes:
House is hidden but our list of drivers know it! (making it private) 


NOISE AND FUN!!
Your Bali Home is located next-door to a beautiful Balinese temple which comes alive with the entranced sounds of "Cecak fire dance" singing/performance each Wednesday and Saturday night at 730-830pm. You can of course purchase tickets to watch the show from inside the temple OR simply sit in the house (even in the pool) & be transported elsewhere by this unique sound. 
PLEASE BE AWARE-
if you are  A FUN person ..LOVE life ..young at HEART.. ready for something special..open to new things..and can let go and go- with- the- flow please come and stay.!!

The house owners may come for special days to place their offerings and blessings for the house and also you :-) ONLY in the small temple only (you can see from the kitchen) but will not come inside. 
This can be seen as a blessing!!
please ask Parvati if you must know when they come to pray.

If you are not quite ready for all of the above.. please choose an alternative home for your vacation :-)

Follow us on social at YourBaliHome and ..PLEASE ADD YOUR PHOTOS to  use the tag #YOURBALIHOME
description.neighborhood: The buzz of Ubud market is just a few minutes' walk away and the Ubud Palace is within 5 minutes on foot. Countless cafes, restaurants, and shops create a vibrant atmosphere, while spa treatments, massages, and pedicures are all within easy reach.
description.transit: The house is smack in the middle of Ubud - you can walk EVERYWHERE! If feeling lazy or in a hurry, scooter or car drivers are available on the spot to take you where you need to go, & for out of town adventures or family-friendly transport, drivers can be pre arranged to chauffeur you around the town or the entire island!  For more independence, rent motor bikes/ scooters or bicycles for around $5 per day or even your own car from $30per day. To get to know the interesting local characters better, jump a Bemo  (shared tiny bus) from the main street for a unique ride out of town.
description.interaction:
Seldom do we have face to face interaction with guests. Because when you are renting the entire villa we are not around! 
However we very happy to make suggestions via email or even better option is if you read our inhouse book that have other guests favourite experiences, menus , restaurants and spas!!

The house owners may come for special days to place their offerings and blessings for the house and also you :-) ONLY in the small temple only (you can see from the kitchen) but will not come inside. 
This can be seen as a blessing!!
please ask Parvati  if you must know when they come to pray.
description.house_rules:
-The house is in a close residential zone. Please respect your neighbours who often wake before sunrise! 
-Keep noise and music to a minimum before 08:00 and after 21:00. 
-Smoking in the open air only, please no smoking or candles in the bedrooms.
-Kindly please don't stain the towels with makeup or fake tan. 
-Please only allow people you know & can trust into the villa.
-Please park your bike/s on the street, although parking is limited in Ubud, please read the sign.-This house is a much cherished home, please treat it with the respect & care you would hope for your own.

Enjoy your stay @YourBaliHome
