hosts.about:
I am an architect/interior designer who enjoys traveling -whenever possible.

As a host, my goal is to provide comfortable apartments, carefully decorated to please all the senses and ensure that the guests  fully enjoy their holiday.

As guests, the only thing we mind is that “what we see, is what we get”. (My husband and I)
 Most commonly, we would be out and about, trying to make the most out of or time in the towns we are visiting.

recent.comments: Playa Bonita es un paraiso, el apartamento esta muy bien, tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar de unos dias de descanso. Nidia siempre responde rápidamente de forma muy amable. 100% recomendable

items.comments: Playa Bonita es un paraiso, el apartamento esta muy bien, tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar de unos dias de descanso. Nidia siempre responde rápidamente de forma muy amable. 100% recomendable

bellísimo depto!! volvería sin dudarlo. hermosa decoración, agua potable disponible, ambiente seguro! 
muy cómodas las camas.  amplio, luminoso, quedamos encantados!
This apartment was great, well equipped, easy walk to the beach. Beautiful grounds and Nidia was a great host.

Excelente lugar, apartamento en perfecto estado, todo limpio y en orden, lugar amplio y con todo lo necesario para estar muy cómodo. Muy cerca de la mejor playa de la zona, restaurantes, bares y todo para estar feliz

Place and location were described accurately.
First time at Las Terrenas. We loved it and definitely we will be back soon for more peaceful, private and fulfilling experiences.
Thank you Nidia for sharing your place in paradise with us.

áEstoy sumamente complacida con la excelente estadía en el apartamento de Nidia.  Todo estuvo impecable sumamente acogedor con una grata vista hacia las áreas verdes y piscina cerca del complejo.  El mobiliario y accesorios de decoración muy bonito, climatización maravillosa y todo en excelentes condiciones, incluyendo las habitaciones y baños, todo inmaculado.  El área de cocina muy agradable con vista al exterior y los electrodomésticos en excelentes condiciones.   La playa estuvo espectacular y el área de club de playa muy acogedora también. Seguridad y vigilancia excelente y el personal de recepción muy amables. La verdad es que superó mis expectativas y las de mi familia.  Le agradezco mucho a Nidia por habernos facilitado la oportunidad de esta inolvidable estadía. Muy agradecidos!!. Volveremos pronto!!

Nidia siempre está disponible y te responde a tiempo las inquietudes que se te puedan presentar. El apartamento muy limpio y bien equipado 
El personal del edificio muy atento 
Solo deben mejorar la Fumigacion del área, hay muchos mosquitos.
Volvería a utilizar los servicios de Nidia con mucho gusto

description.summary:
Wander barefoot to the martini-clear waters of a palm-shaded beach, steps from this jungle retreat — an upscale complex transplanted to paradise. The home has an open, airy layout with calming blues, and a patio with nautical touches for sandy feet.

*Electricity fee is an additional charge at the end of your stay. Only cash is accepted
**An extra cleaning fee of USD40 will be charged for every cleaning requested. Only cash is accepted

The home is 500 meters from  the beach, and a short walk from a clutch of cozy bars and restaurants. There's even a surf school close by. 

The condo is located inside the gated community Playa Bonita Residences. 

You have access complimentary lounge chairs for the beach.

**Electricity fee is an additional charge at the end of your stay.
description.space: Vous êtes à quelques minutes du village de Las Terrenas, si vous souhaitez allez manger dans les bons restaurants sur la plage. Une formule voyage idéale ! Loin des grands complexes hôteliers, plus près de la nature.
description.notes: **Electricity fee is an additional charge at the end of your stay.

description.transit: À 40 minutes de l'aéroport de Samana. Des paysages à découvrir !!
description.interaction: Communiquez à l'aide de l'application Airbnb
description.house_rules:
-House rules
1. Refrain from sitting with wet garments in the indoor sofas and beds.
2. Dishes and dinnerware must be cleaned of residues before being washed - to avoid clogging the sinks.
3. Do not litter in the toilets. TP and any other trash are to be deposited in the trash cans beside the toilet.
4. We kindly ask you to wash the sand off at the beach shower before entering the condo.
5. Please, refrain from changing or rearranging cables in the media centers/devices.
6. Use the electricity as you would at home. Please note that electric consumption is measured and billed at the end of your stay
7. Please refrain from leaving the AC units on throughout the day -if not in the property. Also, note that all doors and windows should be shut while the ACs are on. Each unit can only climatize the space where it is installed.
8. Important to know that we have a standard price set for FOUR (4) PEOPLE as a consideration to smaller groups. Each additional guest -after two- pays 20 dollars/night.
9. Provided knives and cooking utensils should be used for their specific purpose. Please refrain from using our cooking knives to open cans, coconuts, shopping bones, and/or any other hard things.
10. We kindly ask you to refrain from using our towels (bath and/or beach towels) when using tanning lotions or to remove make-up.
*Stained or missing towels entitle a 50.00 American dollars reposition value per item.
11. Mind the remotes: missing AC or TV/cable remotes has a reposition cost of 100 American dollars
12. All the condo’s equipment is privately owned and as such, any item used outside must be returned to the property before checking out.
*Missing or damaged equipment will be charged to the person responsible for the reservation. 
13. Please help us keep the condo pests free by properly disposing of the garbage every day.

name: Starry Desert Retreat, Mt. Views, Private Pool/Spa
title: La Quinta, California

gallery.caption: Comfy, beautiful king sized bed with flat screen smart TV (w/ cable HD movie channels & Netflix).
Master bedroom includes a king bed, smart TV with full cable access, a walk in closet and an enormous master bathroom.
Light and bright bedroom with queen bed and direct access to jack and jill bathroom.  An inflatable mattress is avail in the hall closet.
Master bathroom provides a huge walk in shower with built in bench.
Relax and read in the corner nook, watch a movie by the fire, cook dinner while mingling, or play shuffle board.

hosts.about:
Our family loves having short term rentals that we can enjoy along with our guests.  My husband and I work in the entertainment industry so for work & play, we enjoy having homes that are equipped with high speed internet, cable and streaming access.  

We love the calm and small town feeling of La Quinta and Mammoth (the sunsets and stars are amazing in both) as a juxtaposition to the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles life.  We hope you will too!

recent.comments: Second time staying here and it did not disappoint! The home has everything you could possibly need for a comfortable stay. Host was very responsive and flexible. Thank you!

items.comments: Second time staying here and it did not disappoint! The home has everything you could possibly need for a comfortable stay. Host was very responsive and flexible. Thank you!
I had a wonderful stay. The neighborhood was quiet and the house had everything I needed.
I recommend staying here! My family and I enjoyed our stay.

We had a great stay! The home is spacious, well furnished, and clean. We were pleasantly surprised by how roomy and open it felt. The pool was a great size for a party of 2-3 people. We had all the supplies needed to be able to cook our meals. Angie is a very responsive host and was readily available if we had any questions or concerns. Highly recommend.
The place was very nice, pleasant and clean.
Angie’s home is gorgeous!  Spacious perfect gateway with my family. She had everything we need in the kitchen. The pool was perfect size & perfect temperature. Amazing definitely coming back!  😍

Angie & Chris have a beautiful home. When we arrived the pool was a bit dirty from the winds. I let them know & they immediately had someone come out and clean it right away for us to enjoy the rest of the weekend. That was greatly appreciated. Their home had everything we needed for a nice, relaxing getaway. Plenty of towels, TV’s, space, all in all we had a wonderful time and would stay here again. Thank you both again for being so responsive .

description.summary:
Count stars in the desert night sky against a silhouette of serene mountains. Return indoors when it gets chilly and relax around a fire in a colorful living room. Watch TV here or in bed. In the morning, make breakfast in a full modern kitchen.

Permit number 066675

The home is fully furnished with a pool, spa and beautiful mountain views. Keyless entry and two car garage access. BBQ, Washer/dryer, fireplace, all the comforts of home! Stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, coffee maker, blender, dishwasher, large island with granite counter tops. The living room and master have flat screen / smart TVs with cable (all movie channels - HBO, Showtime, Cinemax, etc). You can easily access your personal accounts to watch movies/shows or play music. 
We also have a 9ft shuffleboard table in the living room.

The two guest bedrooms are furnished with one queen bed in each room.  The guest rooms are connected by a beautiful double vanity bathroom with bath tub and shower. The master bedroom is furnished with a king size bed, walk in closet, spacious bathroom with large walk in shower. There is also a queen size air bed for use.

Pool/spa heating available for an extra cost (negotiable for longer stays).

You have full access to home and property including garage access.

We are available for questions/concerns through phone call, text or email. You will not see us unless you need us.

The house is in a quiet neighborhood in the majestic Santa Rosa mountains, near hiking trails. It's close to numerous award-winning golf courses and the Indian Wells Tennis Garden. Old Town La Quinta is a mile away, with shops and a farmers' market.

There is a park one block from the home.

If you have your own bikes the cove is a great place for a bike ride otherwise a car is generally needed to get around.  There is a small park about one block away.  Hiking trails begin about 9 short blocks from the house.

The jacuzzi is heated by propane, therefore if you would like the jacuzzi heated during your stay please let us know prior to your arrival. There is a $50/day charge to heat the jacuzzi.

description.interaction: We are available for questions/concerns through phone call, text or email. You will not see us unless you need us.
description.house_rules:
1.) Must have government issued ID verified through Airbnb before booking. 
2.) If the guest would like the jacuzzi heated please let your host know by the day before check in so the money can be collected via money request for propane use. The jets only turn on periodically when heating and do not continuously stay on. The cost is $50 per day and includes the jacuzzi and pool heating.  
3.) Absolutely no smoking in home, no pets.  If you bring a pet without approval, there will be a charge of $300 for additional cleaning.  If there is a pet visitor that leaves business in yard, there will be a charge of $150 (please don't make us send photos).
4.) Owners advise guests to watch children at all times due to the pool and jacuzzi. There is no safety gate around pool.  
5.) No diving in pool. Swim at your own risk.  
6.) No parties. No persons who are not included in reservation are allowed in home at any time.  
7.) Max occupancy for overnight guests is 8 persons - per City of La Quinta guidelines.  
8.) Extra charge of $100 per hour for late checkout not approved ahead of time. This is to ensure we can have the home ready for guests to check in that same day.  
9.) It is the guest’s responsibility to make the host aware of anything that is not working properly/damaged/missing during your stay.  
10.) Do not put drinks/food on shuffleboard table or use for beer pong. You will be charged for damage or missing pucks.    
11.) Owner is not responsible for guest’s personal items left in the home.  
12.) Guest is responsible to leave property and all furniture in good order. Removing, adding or changing furniture without owner’s written approval is strictly prohibited. Guest is responsible for cost of replacement of any damage to furniture or premises and replacement of missing items.  
13.) There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the home, we do not permit them to be taken off the property.  
14.) The home is provided with a starter set of paper towels and toilet paper. Owners do not guarantee that these extra items will always be available and guests may need to replenish their own paper goods, toiletries, laundry detergent, etc.  
15.) The failures of operation of certain amenities, such as TVs, cable, games, or the internet and WiFi service are not a basis for any refund. Owner will make every effort to have these items repaired but does not guarantee that they will be repaired during guests occupancy.  
16.) Guest shall allow owners/host access to the property for purposes of repair and inspection when necessary. 

You must also acknowledge Security Deposit - if you damage the home, you may be charged up to $1000.  There is a security system on property.  Ring video doorbell at the front door.

gallery.caption: Elementos decorativos cuidados hasta el más mínimo detalle.

hosts.about: Somos una familia seria, educada y amistosos. Nuestro objetivo es que disfrutéis  en nuestro apartamento unas vacaciones y momentos inolvidables.

we had the most wonderful stay here. the apartment is beautiful and modern with the world's most comfortable bed! Having the pool and the beach in such close distance is very handy. In addition shops, pharmacy and a gym in very close walking distance. 

I would however recommend hiring a car and taxis are expensive to get around (we did for one evening) and is a little drive away from a lot of the main towns! 

will 100% be coming back here when we return to marbella! 

thank you!
Very beautiful apartment in a beautiful and safe gated community with a pool and easy accessibility to the beach and to the bus stations.
Lydia was very helpful by message and the appartement was perfect for our stay. Everything you need is there. It is clean and cosy. The location is perfect !

We had an awesome stay here and would highly recommend this apartment and the hosts.
Everything was like it looked/described = perfect!

Great apartments with separate entrance and terrace located close to the sea with a decent size swimming pool located in the closed territory.
The good beach is within walking distance (1  km or so).
Lidia was the contact person for our stay, and she was found as a very attentive and kind host.
Het is een prima appartement waar je lekker kan verblijven. Alles er op en eraan en een heerlijk terras. Wij gaan er zeker nog eens terug.

description.summary: Explore and enjoy the beautiful Costa del Sol from our cozy apartment designed and furnished with love. We have thought of every detail – you will find everything you may need while travelling, we did it the way we would’ve done for ourselves! The apartment is located in a quiet area only a 3 minute walk from the beach and you will find many local amenities nearby. It is situated in a beautiful urbanization with 2 swimming pools and benefits from high speed Wi-Fi and a private terrace.
description.space:
It is a one bedroom apartment with a bathroom and a separate living room. It comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, ceramic hob, kettle, Nespresso coffee machine, microwave, and a dishwasher.
There is a 150 * 200 (king size) bed with a high comfort mattress in the bedroom. There is sofa bed in the living room for 2 additional guests for extra charge. A USB and Bluetooth enabled vinyl record player allows you to connect to your phone and listen to your favorite music.
The living room has access to the private terrace with a table and chairs, where you can enjoy unforgettable sunsets of the Costa del Sol and beautiful views of the communal garden.
The apartment has everything you need for a memorable and comfortable stay.
There is a ping-pong and chess table available to all in the urbanization, and we keep a set of rackets and balls in the apartment, should you wish to play ping-pong.
Various restaurants and bars offering international food are on your doorstep.
Private communal parking is next to the house.
Air conditioning with hot / cold air settings is available in the living room and bedroom. Communal pools for adults and one for children are compete with sunbeds. The South East aspect lets oodles of sunshine into the apartment, making it warm and bright in winter and pleasant in summer.
If you are looking for peace and tranquility with easy access to all amenities - our apartment is perfect for you!
description.access: To name but a few, there are restaurants, a beach club, gym, shops, a supermarket, and a Golf course. A children's club is a 2 minute walk from the apartment. Public and private parking is available in the establishment.
description.notes:
A baby cot (up to 2 y.o.) is available for rent, sheets included- € 10 / night, € 60 / week.
Extra person 10 € per night per person.
A highchair is available on request.
Extra cleaning service is available.
description.neighborhood: It is an amiable residential neighborhood.
description.transit: With a car, taxi or local bus you will be able to explore the surrounding area in any direction. It takes ca. 15 min to the center of Marbella or Estepona, 10 min to Puerto Banus. A 50 minute drive will see you in Gibraltar or Malaga Airport.
description.interaction: We are always happy to answer any questions you may have and help in any situation. We endeavor to do everything in our power to make your stay as pleasant as possible! We speak English, Spanish, Russian, German, and Italian.

name: Rock Hill Villa, Hot Tub Fireplace, Cowboy Pool, Joshua Tree
title: Yucca Valley, California

hosts.about: My husband and I own and operate a full time home staging business in Southern California! We have 2 furbabies that have completely stolen our hearts. We work hard, and try to play hard too! In our 9+ years of traveling together, we have paid attention to what matters most in a vacation. We have also seriously come to appreciate a good ol' staycation. We absolutely aim to provide you with a stay that feels like home. Well thought out, eye alluring as well as comfortable.
My passion is building and designing beautiful spaces all over the country. I love traveling, finding new places to explore and networking. C6 / C7 Quadriplegic - Life Rolls On!

recent.comments: The location and place was very nice and Johnny was quick with communication! The only thing we noticed was that the hot tub had a strong odor, but with the heat we didn’t need to use it!

items.comments: The location and place was very nice and Johnny was quick with communication! The only thing we noticed was that the hot tub had a strong odor, but with the heat we didn’t need to use it!
I loved how peaceful the home was and the scenery was great. My host was awesome responding quickly to any questions I had.

It is a great place to stay in the desert. Room is spacious love the living room. Only thing is that during summer it might be better if guests can park cars indoor instead of parking on the drive way.  Would recommend
Quite neighbors and nice view of the city.
Great house for our family trip! We loved all the amenities the house had to offer,  especially the cowboy pool and hot tub! Would definitely stay here again.
Muy buena experiencia! Nos gusto muchísimo y tienen juegos de mesa 🥰
great place to come back to, enjoyed my stay.

description.summary:
Welcome to our desert vacation home in Yucca Valley, California! Our property is nestled in the heart of the beautiful Mojave Desert and boasts stunning natural surroundings and endless outdoor recreational opportunities. The open floor plan and spacious living areas are perfect for entertaining, while the fully equipped kitchen and outdoor grill allow you to prepare delicious meals and enjoy the desert views. The property features 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, sleeps 8, and includes a private pool, outdoor fireplace, and covered patio. Amenities include WiFi and a washer and dryer. Don't wait –

Enjoy a private soak in our 6 Person jetted massaging hot tub, or relax on the front porch and take in all that Joshua tree has to offer with the panoramic views of rocks and the National Park right off the front of the house.

After several years of hosting in the Joshua tree area we have found the perfect location. Western Hills Estates has the best climate with the higher elevation, winds breezing throughout the year, panoramic views of the national park, rocks to climb within walking distance, 15 minutes to the national park, a very calm quiet neighborhood and direct access to the highway with only one right turn.

Pool Available Starting May 2020!

The home has been professionally decorated by @redefinedhomestaging and professionally managed in partnership with @destination_joshuatree

We are available for any and all questions during your stay.

The property extends far up above the home, making for hiking right out of the backyard. The higher elevation offers a pleasant climate, with cooling breezes throughout the year. Joshua Tree National Park entrance is just 15 minutes from here.

A car is recommended transportation for the area, Uber is sometimes available.

description.neighborhood:
The area is known for its dark skies, making it an ideal spot for stargazing and enjoying the beauty of the night sky.

Our home is conveniently located within a short distance of the town's main attractions, including the Joshua Tree National Park, the Hi-Desert Nature Museum, and the Pipes' Canyon Nature Preserve. There are also plenty of hiking and biking trails in the area for those who love the great outdoors. Whether you're looking to relax or unwind Yucca Valley has something for everyone
description.transit: A car is recommended transportation for the area, Uber is sometimes available.
description.interaction: We are available for any and all questions during your stay.
description.house_rules:
"○ If you open it, close it; if you borrow it, return it; if you turn it on, turn it off; if you break it, fix it; if you use it, take care of it; if you make a mess, clean it up; if you move it, put it back
○ Local guests please contact me prior to booking
○ Bookings within 24 hours of check-in will require driver's license prior to check-in
○ Quiet Hours after 10pm outside
○ Undisclosed pets forfeit full deposit
○ Additional undisclosed guests $50 each per night, regardless of whether they stay or not
○ Unauthorized early arrivals $50/hr
○ Late Checkout Fee: $50 Mandatory when unauthorized by host.

Very late unauthorized checkout (2 hours or more): Full undiscounted daily rate will be charged, this does not give you permission to stay, it is only a fee. If you wish to continue your stay you will need to do so formally through Airbnb by requesting to book.

Any refunds that any other affected traveler receives due to your unauthorized late checkout will be charged to you and payable by you.

Do not flush any large objects or female hygiene products down the toilet.

Smoking fee: $500 – Zero tolerance

Cleaning fee will be doubled if the home is found in an excessively dirty condition.

Excessively dirty condition - fingerprints on the wall, dishes left in the sink, trash left in the house.

If you have a complaint about any of the amenities, the property or otherwise, upon contacting us or Airbnb, you are authorizing us access to the property to fix whatever is broken, repair the home or resolve the issue up to the standard you require. We do not need permission to access the property if there is something you deem unsuitable that needs to be remedied.

Any violation of any house rule is grounds for removal from the property, cancelled reservation and no refund.

name: Warm Apartment, City Views, parking in  El Golf
title: Las Condes, Chile

gallery.caption: arte y fotos originales

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: Me siento cómoda en el rol de anfitriona. Estudié comunicacion social en Chile y me dedico a la comunicación estratégica. Me encanta viajar y recibir visitas. Lo mejor de mis viajes ha sido hacer amigos y amigas para toda la vida.

recent.comments: Realmente muy buena experiencia . Mariela siempre atenta y muy flexible tanto para el check inn como para el check out. El Depto está muy bien decorado , es moderno y muy amplio . Altamente recomendable . Además está ubicado en la zona más bonita De Santiago

items.comments: Realmente muy buena experiencia . Mariela siempre atenta y muy flexible tanto para el check inn como para el check out. El Depto está muy bien decorado , es moderno y muy amplio . Altamente recomendable . Además está ubicado en la zona más bonita De Santiago

Excelente lugar, nos gusto mucho las instalaciones, el sector es hermoso, cerca de restaurantes, el Sky costanera queda cerquita para ir hacer shopping caminando! Mariela una gran anfitriona, siempre atenta y lista para ayudarnos! Cuando regresemos a Santiago sin duda nos hospedaríamos nuevamente con Mariela
Valeu cada centavo! Mariela super prestativa! Apto limpo, localização perfeita!!

A localizacao é maravilhosa! Perto de tudo! 
O apartamentos é bem como no anúncio! O check in e check out foi super tranquilo! 
O apartamento é super confortável para 4 adultos! 

Agora vou dar uma dica sobre o Chile que não tem nada a ver com o apto! Mas quanto mais divulgar, mais ajudaremos a combater: fomos roubados por um taxista! Existe uma quadrilha que fica próximo ao SKY Costaneira! Eles adulteram o taxímetro e ao invés de girar a cada 150 pesos, gira para 1500 pesos! Para terem uma ideia: uma corrida q por uber custaria 2300 pesos, pagamos 26 mil pesos! Tentamos questionar, mas ficamos com medo. CUIDADO! Meu conselho: usem uber! 

Mas o apto é ótimo e vale a estadia!

El apartamento es muy bonito y está bien ubicado, muy cerca de una zona de restaurantes y servicios.
Pero lo mejor de todo fue la amabilidad de la anfitriona Mariela. Siempre estuvo atenta a cualquier cosa que pudiéramos precisar, y nos dejó instrucciones muy claras.

A acomodação foi perfeita para minha família de 5 pessoas. O apartamento fica numa área excelente e segura, próximo ao Costanera Center e muito perto de bares e restaurantes. Muito bem equipado, as camas são super confortáveis, era bem aquecido, já que fomos numa época muito fria.
Mariela foi muito atenciosa, nos recebeu pessoalmente, guardou nossas malas, pois chegamos antes do horário de check-in, na saída estendeu nossa estadia por algumas horas sem nos cobrar nada a mais. Se voltar a Santiago ficarei lá novamente.
o apartamento corresponde às imagens. possui excelente localização com bons restaurantes a menos de 300 metros e próximo do costanera Center

description.summary:
Start the day making coffee in a bright, cozy kitchen. Kick back on the sofa with a book amid vivid hardwood floors, charming decor, and large windows offering city views. Enjoy dinner at a classic wood table, then go for a swim in the shared pool. 
Walk to nearby restaurants and also to Costanera Center for superb shopping

Large, beautiful living room. You may relax or hold  business meetings in it. Big  HD TVs in each room, A/C and heatting in winter. Great for holidays, perfect as business headquarter

Besides using the apartment, you can enjoy the swiming pool by the garden

We are happy to assit you online at any time. If there is an emergency, we will assist you in person

The apartment is located in the Barrio El Golf neighborhood and within walking distance of trendy restaurants and shops at Costanera Center. Play a round of golf at the nearby Los Leones course, then pay a visit to the nearby Jardín botánico Chagual.

Walking distance from Metro stations El Golf and Tobalaba.  You can find taxis on Isidora Goyenechea Ave,  a block away from building.

Full security, earthquake proof construction. Emergency kit in the kitchen.

description.interaction: We are happy to assit you online at any time. If there is an emergency, we will assist you in person
description.house_rules: Solamente se puede fumar en el jardín.

title: La Quinta, California

Dining area with seating for 6.
Master bathroom with double vanity sinks
Master bedroom with Cal-King bed

hosts.about: Mom of two who loves spending time with her little ones, hubby, family, & friends. I enjoy traveling and learning new things. Can’t wait to try new foods, explore, and see the world.

Welcome to the “Gem of the Desert” also known as La Quinta!

We are from Los Angeles and this is our vacation home. We enjoy spending time as a family along with our two young children. We put together our homes as a place to relax and unwind from it all. We believe that a vacation home should be just that... a home that feels like home, yet provides our guests a vacation-like experience. We truly hope you enjoy it just as much as we do. 

Make it a memorable one!

recent.comments:
Enjoyed our stay at Mark’s place.
Pros - Incredible outdoor area, pool floats and towels provided, clutter free home with games and all the kitchen appliances and utensils you would ever need. Great location in beautiful neighborhood and close to shopping. Host was very responsive and dealt with any issues in a timely manner. 
Cons - AC system condensation drips from ceiling units causing the appearance of mildew.

items.comments:
Enjoyed our stay at Mark’s place.
Pros - Incredible outdoor area, pool floats and towels provided, clutter free home with games and all the kitchen appliances and utensils you would ever need. Great location in beautiful neighborhood and close to shopping. Host was very responsive and dealt with any issues in a timely manner. 
Cons - AC system condensation drips from ceiling units causing the appearance of mildew.

very nice stay with my husband and baby. it had everything we needed for a comfortable stay and the pool was great. 
it was very close to stores and shopping centers in case we needed anything. 
our host was very responsive and proactive reaching out in case we needed anything. 

we loved our stay and would stay again
Beautiful place and great hosts!
We loved this place! Such a peaceful stay and beautiful home
The Crest was a wonderful place to spend a couple of days relaxing surrounded by the natural beauty of the desert. Mark is a great host!

Our experience was amazing. Mark’s place was beautiful, clean, and located near everything you could need (Trader Joe’s, Costco, restaurants, bars, golf courses, etc), and the view of the mountain from the pool was the cherry on top. Mark was a great host too…he checked in on us throughout the stay. Overall, highly recommend.
Mark was great love the communication and the quick responses. Thank you.

description.summary:
Travel back in time in this mid-century design garden house with mountain views. The home boasts original architectural features, retro furnishings and decor contrasted with modern amenities, a BBQ patio, and a covered outdoor ping-pong table. 

As of August 2020, a cemented outdoor patio and breakfast area have been added to the home.

Short term rental permit #066151

Looking for a getaway? What better place than The Crest! This little paradise is located in a beautiful and quiet palm tree lined neighborhood with stunning dramatic views of the Santa Rosa Mountains. 

Many of our neighbors have lived in the community a very long time. Just take a slow drive down our main street or take a walk around the neighborhood and you’ll see why. You are in another world.

The home is lusciously landscaped with exotic varieties of desert plants and mature trees and the oasis-like pool area invites a sense of relaxation and peace. 

Take a nap, read a book or enjoy the views from your tree-hanging hammock or have a cup of coffee in your peaceful breakfast nook. 
The home has a very bright and open layout. The custom floral double entry doors that were imported from South America are stunning and unique. The home is beautifully appointed with bamboo wood flooring throughout. Inside the living area, you will notice the tasteful and inviting mid-century eco-modern design and mango wood furnishings that are popular in today’s living.

The entire house is accessible except for a few locked closets that store our maintenance supplies. The garage is accessible for washer/dryer use only. Please park your cars in the driveway. Additional parking should only be next to the house.

Check-in is simple. There is a keyless entry system on the property and you will be provided a personal passcode before your arrival.

I will also be available via phone/text/email if any questions or concerns arise. Please don't hesitate to reach out!

Our home is located near the intersection of Hwy 111 and Point Happy, and is considered by some, to be the western gateway to La Quinta. Our small Highland Palms community consists of less than 100 homes that were built in the early '60s and '70s.

The best part about the neighborhood is its location. You won't find a better one! It provides the perfect balance of peace and quiet while also being centrally located to everything! It's all at your fingertips. You are walking and biking distance to great restaurants, theatres, shopping and are 1.5 miles away from the Indian Wells Tennis Gardens. You are also within short driving distance to world class Golfing, Hiking Trails, Casinos and the Empire Polo Grounds- home to the Coachella and Stagecoach Festivals.

Around Town:
* Coachella Music & Arts Festival (5.9 miles)
* Indian Wells Tennis Garden (1.4 miles)
* Downtown Palm Springs (22 miles)
* Old Town La Quinta (2.7 miles)
* Fred Wolff Bear Creek Nature Preserve (4.3 miles)
* La Quinta Resort and Club (2 miles)
* SilverRock Resort (3.6 miles)
* La Quinta Museum (3.1 miles)
* Cliff House Restaurant (0.7 miles)
* PGA West (6.5 miles)
* Lake Cahuilla (9.8 miles)
*Sunnylands (11 miles)
* Agua Caliente Resort & Spa Casino (12 miles)
* Fantasy Springs Casino-Indio (8.5 miles)
* El Paseo Shopping District-Palm Desert (5.9 miles)
* The Living Desert Zoo-Palm Desert (7 miles)
* Palm Springs Aerial Tramway (29 miles)
* Joshua Tree National Park (37 miles)

Short Term Vacation Rental Permit #766151

The City of La Quinta has a mandatory 10% transient occupancy tax (TOT) for short term vacation rentals. This amount has already been factored into the price. 

The home is fully stocked with all the basic essentials as you would find in your own home. 

There will also be a guidebook at the home with very useful information. Please make sure and read through it and ask questions if needed. 

Last but not least, enjoy your stay!

The City of La Quinta has a mandatory 11% transient occupancy tax (TOT) for short term vacation rentals. This amount has already been factored into the price.

description.house_rules:
Thank you for considering our home for your stay here in La Quinta!

We kindly ask that you read through our house rules to see if our home is a good fit for your stay. We want to be clear and transparent with our guests on the use and expectations of our home.

By accepting this reservation, you agree to the following:

•This is a quiet, family friendly neighborhood with older neighbors. Our community is what truly makes this a special place. Please respect our neighbors when it comes to parking and noise. Small gatherings are ok but no LOUD music or LOUD parties of any kind allowed. 

Per City of La Quinta short term rental ordinance, no amplified music or noise allowed at the home at ANY TIME. No speaker systems or amplified sounds of any kind allowed. This includes Bluetooth speakers and cell phone speakers. NO EXCEPTIONS. ZERO TOLERANCE. This is a very strict rule which can result in very large fines and a revocation of our short term rental permit. Please do not ruin it for us or for our future guests.

PLEASE DO NOT BOOK OUR PLACE IF YOU OR YOUR GUESTS CANNOT ADHERE TO THIS RULE. WE WOULD APPRECIATE YOUR COOPERATION.

• Maximum 6 overnight guests

•If a disturbance is reported to the city, you will be responsible for any fines or penalties associated with those claims.

• Parking- 2 car maximum. Please do not block any of our neighbors mailboxes. NO GARAGE PARKING.

• A good neighbor policy brochure will be provided to you during your stay as required per La Quinta city ordinance. Please take a moment to view it along with our guidebook which outlines important information about your stay. 

• As much as we love pets, our other guests might not, therefore NO PETS allowed.

• No Glassware around the outdoor pool area. No exceptions. There will be separate labeled dishware provided that can be used in this area. 

• The pool is NOT heated. 

• Please put all trash in the outside trash and recycle bin after your stay and place used linens and towels in the laundry basket and/or bathroom counters.

• Check out time is 11am. Check in time is 4pm. Please inquire with us on availability should you request an earlier/later time.

• We value our guests safety. Please keep an eye out for kids around the pool area. There is no fencing or lifeguard on duty. Also, there is desert landscape around the exterior of the home, some with very sharp points. Please be mindful of this. By accepting this reservation, you agree to indemnify and hold the homeowner harmless against liability for personal injury, property damage or loss or theft of personal property sustained by guest or parties invited to the property by guests. 

• Lastly, we want to make sure your stay is  enjoyable. Please feel free to reach out to us with any questions, concerns or feedback. We are constantly making improvements and we value your comments. 

Our goal is to make every guest has an enjoyable experience and to earn your 5 ⭐️ review!

name: Take in a Dip in Waterfall Pool at SoCo Retreat
title: Austin, Texas

gallery.caption: The Retreat is curated with bespoke antiques, custom furnishings and eclectic art work throughout
The Retreat provides a compound like experience featuring a lovely salt water pool.

hosts.about: Hello my name is Bill and I am originally from Rhode Island. I love Austin and my neighborhood in Travis Heights. I hope you enjoy the place and I promise to work hard to make your stay enjoyable. Cordially yours.

recent.comments: This was a great place to stay.  With beautiful decor inside and out. The pool was very refreshing in this very quiet neighborhood.  The location was convenient to the South Congress/downtown Austin area. The host Bill was very responsive and made us feel welcome.

items.comments: This was a great place to stay.  With beautiful decor inside and out. The pool was very refreshing in this very quiet neighborhood.  The location was convenient to the South Congress/downtown Austin area. The host Bill was very responsive and made us feel welcome.
My stay was amazing. The pictures on the site were great but the actual space was even better. Bill was super helpful in helping me find thin to do around the city.

I couldn't have been more pleased with my stay here! In fact, I'm already planning my second visit. The quality of the space, the incredible pool, the privacy of the surrounding trees, and the walkability to South Congress made this Airbnb my favorite that I've ever stayed in. Bill was kind and responsive, and his attention to detail in the Airbnb was greatly appreciated. I won't hesitate to book again.

Wonderful place for our birthday weekend. The pool was clean and a great place to cool off in the Austin heat. We found ourselves rushing home to enjoy the pool. Bill’s place was clean with useful amenities. He was also friendly, helpful and kind. We would come back, recommend his place highly for your stay!
The entire apartment is beautifully decorated and the pool is so peaceful and private. We will definitely be back when visiting Austin again!
Great place to stay in Austin. Great location to get around town. This is my second time customer looking forward to my third visit.
Beautiful spot! Very peaceful, close to everything, tranquil grounds, and Bill was extremely friendly and responsive. Thanks so much!

description.summary:
Welcome to The Retreat, a luxury experience located in coveted Travis Heights just four blocks from South Congress.  

The Retreat was recognized by internationally known travel publication, AFAR Media, as one of the top Airbnb’s in the World.  

Kick back on a plush day bed at this deluxe retreat in coveted Travis Heights. Take a dip in a waterfall salt water pool surrounded by tropical plants and lush landscaping.  Perfect for cooling off during the summer and heated during the winter!
description.space:
Welcome to The Retreat, a luxury experience located in coveted Travis Heights right in the heart of South Congress.  

Why choose the Retreat?  Premier location, High end design delights, tranquil and private resort like setting, waterfall salt water swimming pool and waterfall, tropical landscaping and luxury amenities!  Our pool is perfect for cooling off during the summer and heated in the winter! 

Premier Location!  Only 4 short blocks to vibrant South Congress shopping and restaurants, Stacy Park and wooded walking/biking trails.

Enjoy a tranquil resort like vacation in luxury accommodations of over 1200 feet with panoramic views of travis heights.   The generously proportioned space includes a private bedroom, large living room, spacious bathroom and a breakfast bar.  

Breakfast bar area includes a microwave, under counter refrigerator, glassware, utensils/dishes, sink and large counter space.  Note that that The Retreat does not have a stove or cooktop.  

At The Retreat, you are surrounded by a carefully curated mix of bespoke antique, modern and custom furnishings and eclectic art work.  

The Retreat provides a compound like experience featuring a lovely heated salt water swimming pool surrounded by tropical plants, limestone, Brazilian decking and mature landscaping. 

Luxury amenities including bedding linens from Frette and Restoration Hardware, furnishings from internationally known furniture designers including Montauk and Shine SHO.  

Details, Details, Details!: Perks, extras and amenities include gourmet espresso, Turkish robes, moisturizers, tooth brush and shaving kits, elevating your stay to a tranquil and luxurious experience. 

The Retreat interior was created by the owner who is a designer combining a bold sense of color, luxurious use of textures and an eye for detail.  

The owner is a successful Airbnb host with over 2700 five star reviews and over a decade of experience, ensuring you will have a high quality vacation experience.  

Maximum occupancy is two guests.  Visitors are not permitted.  

Outdoor patio and pool use hours are 7am - 10pm.   

No pets allowed.

Property details and house rules:
The Retreat is part of a four unit compound on a lovely ¼ acre lot in the beautiful Travis Heights neighborhood.  All units have private entrances.  The Pool area is shared with each unit on the same property.  Pool hours are 7am-10pm.  Each unit has a maximum occupancy of two guests. Visitors are not permitted on the property.
description.neighborhood: Located in coveted Travis Heights, it is only a short walk to the shops and restaurants on South Congress, Stacey Park, and beautiful, wooded walking and bike trails.
description.house_rules:
- Minimum guest reservation age is 25 years old.  
- Maximum occupancy is TWO guests.  
- Visitors are not permitted anywhere on the property. 
- There are NO EXCEPTIONS to these house rules. 
- Violation of house rules will result in EVICTION without any refund. 
- Pool is shared with another rental unit on the property, up to two additional people.
- The Owner lives full time on the property.  
- The pool and patio hours are from 7am - 10pm.  
- Outdoor gatherings by the pool are NOT permitted after 10pm.   
- Absolutely No pets are allowed.  
- Early Check-in is not available due to cleaning time required for set up from previous guest.  Luggage storage in the property garage is available upon request.  
- Multiple unit buyouts are not permitted.  Only a single unit is available to rent for two guests only.  
- Professional Photography Shoots are not permitted anywhere on the property.  
- Smoking is NOT allowed anywhere on the property.    
- If you are found to have smoked inside the property, you will incur a $250.00 charge. 
- The owner is not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners is not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise.
- Keep the property and all furnishings in good order.  Guests are responsible for all costs related to repair or replacement of any damaged furnishing.  
- Housekeeping:  There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate.   We do not permit towels or linens to be taken from the units.
- No loud music is permitted.

name: Confort y modernidad de estilo industrial cerca de plaza Cataluña
title: Barcelona, Spain

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: Turisme de Catalunya: ATB-000086

recent.comments: Great place, just as describe, friendly reception who had lots of recommendations. El Market next door is great for tapas.

items.comments: Great place, just as describe, friendly reception who had lots of recommendations. El Market next door is great for tapas.

Best place we stayed at during our 3 week European trip, and quite possibly of all our stays ever! Excellent communication prior and during our trip with very wonderful, nice and accommodating staff. The room was immaculate, and the high ceilings made the already large room feel even more spacious and luxurious. Our kids enjoyed the rooftop pool every day.  The location is within walking distance to the Born and Gotic neighborhoods, while also having public transport nearby should you need it. We will not hesitate to stay here again the next time we are lucky enough to visit Barcelona!

This was a great location in Barcelona. Easily walkable to restaurants, attractions and metro. There were 4 of us staying, which would be a little tight for a long stay but worked out well for 2 nights. Nice to be able to do a load of laundry.

The place was fantastic - super clean and friendly front desk person. Not much of a view from the room itself, but the rooftop pool made up for it and then some. The Bluetooth speakers were a nice surprise, but the TV didn’t have any streaming apps. Walkable to great restaurants and bars. Would highly recommend.
I’ve stayed at midtown apartments 3 times now and highly recommend. Extremely clean, nicely decorated and excellent pool. Never disappoints. Super easy and slick check in.
Excellent place, good location, clean, modern and comfortable

Everything we need for our city break. Great location, really friendly staff, great apartment.  We stayed with our 2 year old and the apartment was child friendly and really well equiped, with extra touches for our daughter to enjoy.

description.summary:
El apartamento está ubicado en un edificio exclusivamente compuesto por apartamentos, el Midtown Apartments.
Nuestro apartamento de 1 Habitación y 1 Baño, puede albergar un máximo de 2 personas.
Amplio y  lujoso apartamento, con su propia personalidad. Exterior, con balcón y una gran luminosidad, que le proporcionaran la calidez y comodidad de un segundo hogar.

Mini market (con cargo extra).
Servicio de conserjería.
Terraza solárium con piscina comunitaria. Horario de la piscina y la terraza : 9h a 20h.
Consigna.
Parking (con cargo extra)
Wifi gratuito.

Asistente personal y conserjería de 9h a 20h.Horario de la piscina y la terraza : 9h a 20h.

L'Eixample, barrio emblemático donde se alberga este exclusivo apartamento de estilo urbano y moderno, situado a pocos minutos de los principales puntos de interés turísticos y culturales de la ciudad.

Para llegar a Midtown Apartments desde el Aeropuerto de Barcelona:
Taxi: El coste aproximado es de 35€.
Aerobús: El coste por persona es de 5,90€. Puede tomar el Aerobús a la salida de cada Terminal del aeropuerto y debe bajar en la última parada: Plaza Cataluña. Los apartamentos están a 200 metros, subiendo por Paseo de Gracia y girando a la derecha por la misma calle Casp todo recto hasta llegar a los apartamentos.
Tren: El tren sale cada 10 minutos de la estación del aeropuerto y son unos 35 minutos de trayecto hasta la estación de Passeig de Gràcia. Midtown Apartments se encuentra a unos 750m de la salida de la estación.

Transporte público cerca de Midtown Apartments Barcelona:
Metro: Dispone de 3 paradas de metro cercanas a los apartamentos: Urquinaona L1, Passeig de Gràcia L2 (salida Gran Vía) y Tetuán L2.
Bus: Diversas líneas de autobús tienen parada en la Gran Via cerca de los apartamentos: 7, 50, 54, 62 y H12.
Bus Turístico: La parada más cercana está en plaça Catalunya a menos de cinco minutos andando.
Bus Nocturno (sólo funciona por las noches): N1, N2, N3, N9 y N11.

Los apartamentos disponen de parking en el mismo edificio.

description.house_rules:
NORMATIVA DE CONDUCTA / ESTÁNDARES DE CONVIVENCIA

Horarios
Entrada: A partir de las 15h00.
Salida: Antes de las 11h00.

Atención al cliente presencial: 9h00 a 17h00

Atención telefónica para emergencias 24h.

Tasa Turística (NO INCLUIDA EN TARIFA)
A partir del 1/11/2012 ha sido aplicada una tasa municipal de 0,72€ por persona y noche que deberá abonarse al realizar el check‐in. Máximo de 7 noches. Menores de 17 años exentos. (Ley 5/2012, de 20 de marzo, del DOGC)

El cliente siempre deberá avisar de la hora aproximada de llegada. En el caso que la llegada sea más tarde de las 18:00, se le proporcionarán las debidas instrucciones para tener acceso al apartamento reservado.
Es condición indispensable avisar como mínimo 2 días antes de la hora de llegada.
El huésped que realice la entrada después de las 18:00 se compromete a personarse en recepción el día siguiente de su llegada para proceder con el registro y pago del total de la estancia (en el caso que no estuviera prepagada).  El acceso al apartamento se verá limitado a partir de las 11:00 si no ha pasado por recepción para revalidar sus llaves.

Número de huéspedes
Sólo las personas registradas podrán tener acceso a los apartamentos. No se podrán alojar más personas de las permitidas por capacidad. Si se detecta que hay personas alojadas que no han sido registradas previamente, Midtown Apartments se reserva el derecho de anular la estancia completa de los clientes, sin derecho a devolución del pago ya realizado.

Comportamiento
Hora de descanso:   De 21:00 a 9:00.
No están permitidas las fiestas, ni en los apartamentos ni en las zonas comunes. Respeten el descanso de los otros huéspedes y vecinos, y no hagan ruido a partir de las 21:00. En caso de no seguir esta directriz Midtown Apartments se reserva el derecho de anular la estancia completa de los clientes, sin derecho a devolución del pago ya realizado.
Queda totalmente prohibido fumar en todo el edificio. Sólo estará permitido fumar en la zona de la terraza. En caso de incumplimiento de esta directriz se cobrará un plus en concepto de limpieza extra de cortinas, sofás, etc. La misma fianza será aplicada en caso de introducir animales domésticos, los cuales no son bienvenidos.
No se aceptan mascotas.
Si necesita guardar bicicletas, pregunte al recepcionista dentro del horario de atención al público. No se permite subir bicicletas a los apartamentos ni depositarlas en zonas comunes. 

Responsabilidad
Por su propia seguridad asegúrese que la puerta principal quede bien cerrada a su llegada o salida del apartamento. La dirección no se hace responsable de la pérdida o daño de los objetos personales no depositados en la caja fuerte (hasta 600€).
Le pedimos que haga un  correcto uso de los electrodomésticos de su apartamento, no introduzca objetos metálicos en el microondas.  Por favor apague el aire acondicionado, luces y aparatos eléctricos cuando abandone el apartamento, y no utilice el aire acondicionado con las ventanas abiertas. Asimismo le agradecemos un uso responsable del agua; intentamos reducir al máximo el impacto medioambiental. 
Le recordamos que la potencia eléctrica en España es de 220V. Asegúrese que los aparatos eléctricos que utiliza soporten dicha potencia, la dirección no se hace responsable de cualquier daño que produzca un mal uso de éstos aparatos.
Póngase en contacto inmediatamente con nosotros en caso de que se haya producido algún desperfecto o accidente en el apartamento para poder solucionarlo lo antes posible.  Tenemos personal de mantenimiento que se encargará lo antes posible de repararlo. Por favor no intenten arreglar ningún electrodoméstico por su cuenta, ustedes serán plenamente responsables de cualquier desperfecto derivado de esto. Tampoco nos responsabilizamos de cualquier accidente derivado de la manipulación de objetos eléctricos o similares.
Quejas
Midtown Apartments no hace en ningún caso responsable de acontecimientos ajenos a la empresa como pueden ser:
-  Ruido ocasionado por obras próximas a la vivienda reservada.
-  Ruido ocasionado por otros huéspedes del alojamiento.
-  Avería del servicio de internet por causas ajenas a los apartamentos.

Deposito de garantia reembolsable
Se pedirá un depósito por daños de EUR 250 a la llegada. Se efectuará con tarjeta de crédito. El depósito se devolverá por completo mediante tarjeta de crédito una vez revisado el alojamiento.

Limpieza
Mantenga las zonas comunes limpias.
Se realizará 1 limpieza en estancias superiores a 1 semana cada 7 días.
El cliente podrá solicitar limpiezas extra durante la estancia (según disponibilidad del servicio de limpieza y con coste adicional).
Apartamento 1 Dormitorio  - 45€
Apartamento 2 Dormitorios  - 70€
Apartamento 3 Dormitorios  - 85€
El día de la salida, el cliente deberá dejar la vivienda en condiciones aceptables de orden y limpieza. Midtown Apartments  tendrá derecho a cobrar gastos adicionales de limpieza cuando la vivienda no esté en condiciones aceptables, así como de los posibles desperfectos ocasionados.

Seguridad
El edificio cuenta con un circuito cerrado de cámaras de seguridad con vigilancia 24h. Éstas están ubicadas en las zonas comunes (entrada, pasillos, escaleras, ascensores, piscina y pasillo), nunca en los apartamentos.

Este servicio de vigilancia 24 h es para su seguridad y la de los otros huéspedes. En caso de cualquier incidencia o desorden público, un equipo de guardias jurados tomaría las medidas pertinentes para asegurar el descanso y tranquilidad de todos ustedes.  Midtown Apartments se reserva el derecho de anular la estancia completa de los clientes, sin derecho a devolución del pago ya realizado.

Información personal y protección de datos
En cumplimiento del artículo 5, apartado 1.a), de la Ley Orgánica 15/1999, de Protección de Datos de Carácter Personal, informamos al cliente de que los datos de carácter personal que se nos faciliten se incorporarán a un fichero debidamente inscrito en el Registro establecido a tal fin por la Agencia de Protección de Datos, y servirán para la eficaz prestación de los servicios que usted ha contratado. Sólo aquellos empleados y proveedores que deban conocer tales datos en orden a la prestación de dichos servicios tendrán acceso a los mismos. En cualquier caso, el cliente puede ejercitar los derechos de acceso, oposición, rectificación y cancelación previstos en la mencionada ley.

name: Updated Central Phoenix Townhouse near Restaurant Row
title: Phoenix, Arizona

gallery.caption: There is a well-equipped kitchen with plenty of utensils, pots, pans, a crock pot, cookware, bakeware, and kitchen accessories.
Enjoy our Amazon Echo Dot during your stay. Listen to music, get info, play games, etc. You can even change the AC with your voice!
Both bedrooms in our home have en suite bathrooms, so it's great for guests who want more privacy.
Open during COVID-19. There are pool towels in the home—but like most pools in the area, the pool is not heated.
Rest easy at night with our increased cleaning procedures and included extras like hand sanitizer and disposable face masks.
Rest easy at night with our increased cleaning procedures and included extras like hand sanitizer and disposable face masks.

hosts.about: We are both native Phoenicians and our families have lived in Arizona for more than three generations.  We love the Central Phoenix area and take an interest in finding new and exciting things to do around our neighborhood.  We love the amazing restaurants located in close proximity to our home and frequently get out to try new ones.  We both love to travel to the beach and mountains; our favorites are San Diego and Flagstaff.  Ryan is also a regular business traveler, having been to more than 130 cities, across 16 countries, and flying almost 500k miles.

recent.comments: this was a perfect location for my business travel and the box of snacks got me through a busy week! .. Great hosts and hope to be back soon!

items.comments: this was a perfect location for my business travel and the box of snacks got me through a busy week! .. Great hosts and hope to be back soon!

The townhouse apartment was a gem for my wife and I. Great for a small family of four or less. As a pastor I often look for a quiet secluded getaway for relaxation. This location was surprisingly quiet. Our son was playing in a basketball tournament and we didn't know if had to book 4 days or more. After the fourth day, we requested an extended stay and our host were most gracious in allowing us one more night to enjoy the apartment. Good location for non-chain restaurants. The apartment was clean on our arrival. It's a simple residence if you're not into anything real fancy. Neighbors were quiet and friendly during our stay. I would definitely return to the townhouse in the future. Our host responded almost immediately when we made requests.

Great place to stay. Had everything we needed for an enjoyable week away. The internet was spotty at times. However, when I called the host they took care of it right away. I would stay at this location again.

The property is a bit old, so you see the occasional wear and tear. The kitchen was very lightly stocked, however the host were great in sending us whatever we needed. This property definitely could use a makeover and remodel. Host are great! Location great!
Wow! Best airbnb in PHX so far, and I stay in Phx once a month! Clean covienient and the goodies box wad the best! .. would recommend it to everyone! thank you!!

Ryan and Sarah were amazing hosts. Their spot was as pictured and very comfortable. They also went above and beyond to make sure my partner and I were accounted for and had everything we needed to make our stay comfortable.
Nice place 20 minutes from everything very clean and has everything you need

description.summary:
Sink into the comfortable sofa in the bright, open living area, or head out into the private courtyard with built-in seating. This postwar complex was designed by Ralph Haver, featuring a Spanish style with tasteful refinement and designer touches.

With two bedrooms, two bathrooms, and approximately 1,100 sq. ft. of living space, this updated townhome is a perfect retreat in Central Phoenix.  Located within minutes from many amenities, this is an ideal home base for your stay in Phoenix.

All of the interior is light, bright, clean, and up to date.  Relax in an open living area with TV (local channels, plus HBO), WiFi, streaming video player, and ample seating.  Both bedrooms boast comfy foam mattresses, new furnishings, and en suite bathrooms.  Enjoy a cup of coffee, a book, or the weather in your private courtyard with built-in bench seating.

The kitchen includes all stainless appliances, a Keurig coffee maker (just get your favorite K-Cups), basic kitchen appliances, and most everything you'd need to either cook at home or enjoy delivery from any of the great nearby restaurants.

Our townhome is one of only 38 residences on a private drive.  It's very quiet and many neighbors have lived there for years.  Enjoy a dip in the community pool which is just steps from your front door (our community pool, like most others in the area, is not heated).

You'll have the entire townhome just for you and your guests.  The community has an outdoor pool (not heated) and barbecue area (charcoal grills) and a key is provided in the townhome.

We have a washer and dryer provided inside the townhome. It’s easily accessible from a closet in the kitchen area.

We once lived in this home, but have relocated just a few blocks away.  You may contact us with any questions before, during, or after your stay.  We love the area and are happy to provide recommendations!  Check in/out is self-service, so you can also come and go without ever talking to us.  Steve, who helps us manage our bookings, might also respond to your questions or provide assistance, if needed.

We take hosting seriously, and are a proud #HostfullyHost. This means when you stay with us, you will get a personalized Hostfully guidebook. In it, you will find important information about our home, as well as our favorite local recommendations. It’s easy to navigate, and you can access it from your phone or desktop.

The townhouse is one of only 38 residences on a private drive. It's very quiet and provides easy access to major freeways and attractions. There is a variety of dining, cocktail, and brewery options within a mile of the home.

Our neighborhood has a Walk Score of 62 out of 100, so some errands can be accomplished on foot.  Uber and Lyft are easy and affordable methods of transportation in this area.  If you're planning to rent a car, there are two parking spaces available in the unit's covered carport and additional parking nearby.  There is also convenient access to public transit, taxi, and bike lanes.

Our major cross streets are 12th St. and Missouri Ave. If you’d like to estimate the distance or travel time to/from our home, we suggest that you look up “Virginia G. Piper Charitable Trust” as the location in your favorite map app.

description.house_rules:
Adhere to published CC&R's for Avenida Hermosa Townhouses #2 Corporation. Including:

Article XII Section 2: No noxious or offensive activity may be carried out or permitted. Nor shall anything be done thereon which may be or become an annoyance or nuisance to the neighborhood.

Article XII Section 9: The following will be provided to the Association: 1) name and contact information of any adults occupying the property and 2) a description of and the license plate numbers of any vehicles (as identified at check-in).

Article XII Section 11: Storage of items (other than passenger vehicles) visible from the common areas or neighboring property is prohibited in the carports.

Article XII Section 12: Parking is permitted in the carport area or guest spaces only; no street parking.  Overnight parking in guest spaces is prohibited.

This property cannot be used for purposes identified in the City of Phoenix Ordinance Section 10-195(c). The City of Phoenix short-term registration number for this property is 2021-1427.

name: Stunning Views - Downtown - Base of Peak Nine
title: Breckenridge, Colorado

gallery.caption: King-size bed, with high-end, new  style  mattress. Mtn views while laying in bed!

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
Local in Summit County since 1991 and have enjoyed every year, every season. It is a wonderful thing to love where you live and raise your family.

We built this house in 2001 and have been blessed with growing along with the community. 

I would love to have you visit my home and share the beauty of the area.

I am a SuperHost with two AirBNB rentals in downtown Breckenridge.

Mountain Chic (1 bdrm) overlooks the Blue River, mid-town of downtown Breck. Cabin feel with luxury.  Spring through fall, listen to the river. Winter is Ski-In with a short walk to the gondola or hop on the free shuttle with a pickup outside the front door of River Mountain Lodge.

Stunning Views (studio) has panoramic views of all of the Breck peaks...even from bed. Located at the base of Peak 9 in the village. It is Ski-In and Out, with the QuickSilver lift.

recent.comments:
The condo is in the perfect location with great amenities. The space is perfect for a couple, but would be tight if you added anyone else. The views are lovely to take in with morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening. 

Check-in was troublesome as was parking but Carol eventually helped us get everything ironed out.

items.comments:
The condo is in the perfect location with great amenities. The space is perfect for a couple, but would be tight if you added anyone else. The views are lovely to take in with morning coffee or a glass of wine in the evening. 

Check-in was troublesome as was parking but Carol eventually helped us get everything ironed out.
This is a beautiful place to stay and we love the location and the view from the windows.  We had a fabulous getaway and Carol and Mark are amazing hosts.  Thank you soo much

We had a lovely stay! Beautiful view!! The location is prime with the free shuttle, shops, and restaurants right outside the  entrance. The added parking option for a reasonable fee was incredibly useful since you have to pay for parking nearly everywhere in Breckenridge anyway. Carol was super responsive and checked in to make sure we settled in okay.
Great Location

The directions for getting into the building were very confusing. No one in the resort knew what “building 4” was. It took us 40 minutes to figure out where we needed to go and park.   Other than that the unit was great with a very comfortable bed!
We had a great stay! The view is amazing and the location is close to everything!

description.summary:
Enjoy stunning, unobstructed views of the Breck peaks - even from your king bed - from the 5th-floor – Inn at Peak 9.

You will feel like you are in a mountain retreat but you will be downtown Breck. 

The building is in the Village and offers fantastic amenities. My favorite is the indoor/outdoor pool that is surrounded by outdoor hot tubs. There is also a sauna, steam, games, fitness center, pool table and more. (Pool closed thru 5/18).

Parking Optional: $15/night
description.space:
STUNNING VIEWS

The condo is decorated Colorado cool. Cabin feeling with real wood on the walls in the setting area and around the bar with solid slab granite counters and stainless-steel appliances, full size frig, dishwasher, oven/stove, and micro. Faux-cedar wood flooring.

Enjoy a steaming cup of coffee, while you watch the rising sun light up the peaks from this cabin-feel condo with beautiful CO pine paneling. You will be tempted to chill, but the mountains will be calling.

You will be downtown, so everything is within walking distance.

The Inn at Peak 9 is a Vail property, so it is managed to the highest standards.  There is also a 24x7 front desk that is run by Vail, the staff will be helpful but they don't manage this unit and won't be able to assist with any issues.

Ski-IN and OUT. At the end of the day, stop at The Maggie, next to the Quick Silver lift…great après ski place.

Complete upgrade of FITNESS, HOT TUBS, STEAM, SAUNA, INDOOR/OUTDOOR POOL. You'll love it!

CONDO DETAILS
Faux cedar plank flooring and rustic wood for the cabin feel.

Most units have a queen-size bed. Mine has a king-size bed (Tuft and Needle MINT, their best mattress - comparable with Casper, Purple and the other new style of premium mattresses).

The 2nd bed is a very high-end sofa bed.  Memory foam mattress that is an over-sized queen. And no removing the cushions – with a single pull, the bed folds out and all of the cushions stay attached and are neatly out of the way. 

Fully furnished (including the kitchen with cookware and utensils), with upgraded linens.

Large locker just outside your door for skis and boots.

Newly renovated Fitness Center. Indoor/outdoor pool, outdoor hot tubs, fitness center, sauna, steam, large shard area with fireplace, pool table, and games.

DOWNTOWN BRECK
You are downtown, in the Village, the only SKI-IN/OUT in downtown Breck. You will not need a car once you arrive.

The Inn at Peak Nine is in the Village, in town...and believe me, you want to be in town. Views, in town, ski-in & out...what else could you want?


PARKING
Parking is available for an additional charge (we only pass along our cost), heated and underground. There are a limited number of parking places, but generally parking is available when booked ahead, but we cannot guarantee until we have your reservation.

At the bottom of the Quick Silver lift and in town, you won't need a car. Our Breck Guide includes a discount codes for shuttles to/from DIA and equipment rental.


NOTES:
- Sorry but ANIMALS ARE NOT ALLOWED per HOA rules including Emotional Support Animals.
- There is a "kiddie cage" available for the little ones. There may be a charge of $20 for delivery. 
- Pay-per-use laundry is available on the same floor, it uses an app.
- My property manager (Carol) is local and is only a call/text away. And the front desk is staffed 24/7 for emergencies.
- Our Breck Guide includes discount codes for shuttles to/from DIA and equipment rental.

ADDITIONAL CONDO
In addition to this listing, I have another in downtown Breck on AirBNB. One bedroom that overlooks the river, mid-town. To view it, use this number (18121409) after /rooms/ in the URL.
description.access:
Heated pool indoor/outdoor pool. Outdoor hot tubs, fitness center, games, large common area with pool table and games. 

Shared movie room.

At the bottom of the Quick Silver lift and in town, you won't need a car. Get a 10% discount for DIA transfers and ski rentals on booking.
description.notes: The Inn at Peak 9 is a Vail property, so it is managed to the highest standards.  There is also a 24x7 front desk that is run by Vail, the staff will be helpful but they don't manage this unit and won't be able to assist with any issues.
description.neighborhood:
The Inn at Peak Nine is in the Village, in town...and believe me, you want to be in town. Views, in town, ski-IN and OUT...what else could you want?

Our Breck Guide has our favorite places, and discounts for transfers from DIA and rental equipment (bikes, skis & more).
description.transit: You are already downtown, so everything is in walking distance.
description.interaction: My property manager (Carol) is local and is only a call/text away. And the front desk is staffed 24/7 for emergencies.
description.house_rules:
1-  No Parties. Quiet hours are 10pm-7am.  If the desk gets a complaint, you must comply.  If they get a 2nd complaint, you will be asked to leave, and you will forfeit your damage deposit.  
2- No smoking of any kind, including pot, and including the balcony.
3-If Sleeper sofa was used, please leave open so that we know it has been used.
4-Please leave keys and parking pass on the counter (failure to leave keys and pass will be $25 per key and pass).
5-You must specify the number of overnight guests in your reservation. If you plan to host other people,  you must let us know how many additional visitors you expect in addition to the overnight guests.
6-There are community laundry facilities in the building that are coin-operated.  Apparently AirBNB is not communicating that it is coin-operated.  As a host, we only have the choice to select laundry is available for a fee, but apparently that information is not made available to guests.
7-Parking is extra.  Shuttles are a great option from DIA, and we have a discount code for you on our Breck Guide on the MountainsAndSea website. There is a nightly fee for parking (we charge only our cost - see listing for amount, if changes based on the time of year). You must request, parking is not guaranteed but we have never had a problem with reserving in advance.
8-Only service animals are allowed - dogs and miniature horses (funny, we know, but this is Colorado) .  Not our rule, it is the building policy.
9-For COVID protection of the cleaning crew, please place the sheets and towels that were used on the bathroom floor, so they can be collected with less risk.

name: A Mini Kirstenbosch near the Gardens, Forests and Winefarms
title: Cape Town, South Africa

location.address: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa

gallery.caption: Design curated with care and creativity

hosts.about: With a zest for life and all its beauty, my family and I would love to extend our hospitality to make your stay sublime!

recent.comments: Helen's flat is lovely with amazing views. Thanks for accommodating my late arrival.

items.comments: Helen's flat is lovely with amazing views. Thanks for accommodating my late arrival.

I had a great stay at Helen’s place.
It has a brilliant location 
Maria her assistant was very helpful and on call at any time.
I did not have enough time to explore the vast garden.
The only drawback was load shedding which the host has no control over.
I would love to go back in Summer.

This little spot is just perfect for work and play.  I did both on my visit and was extremely satisfied with both elements!  The heaters were a bonus over the cold spell I was there and I was well provide for in the case of power outages.  Thank you!
Thank you for accommodating me last minute, lovely space!
It was just perfect for two travellers and a short stay. Helen was amazing
I loved staying here. It’s the perfect place to relax
Wonderful host only positive feedback from my end. Would definitely revisit again. Beautiful place and host very accommodating.

description.summary:
This luxurious room with kitchenette and bathroom provides an intimate, safe and restful retreat for 2 people.

Your flat has its own entrance which is separate and private from the main house. Our guests are encouraged to take a walk through the gardens and explore the extensive flora!

As your hosts we we will help make your stay as peaceful and accommodating as possible. Let us know any specific requests including extras you may need for your stay.

The house is located in Cape Town's prestigious Bishopscourt neighbourhood with shops, restaurants, the V&A waterfront, and beaches just a short drive away. Visit Constantia Valley’s award-winning vineyards, like Eagles' Nest or Beau Constantia.

An available Uber is never more than 5 mins away, but if you have rented a car you can park it in our secluded road or within the property.
