all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
Very friendly and accommodating host. Love to travel and meet new people. Enjoy cooking, snow skiing and going to the gym. 

I am a Real Estate Agent by profession.

recent.comments: Great place to stay for a private weekend, the room is clean and spacious with a nice pool. The host was also very responsive and answered all questions that I had

items.comments: Great place to stay for a private weekend, the room is clean and spacious with a nice pool. The host was also very responsive and answered all questions that I had

This is our second time staying at Robert’s. We LOVE this place. The location is super close to downtown, lots of restaurants and great food places. The private pool takes the cake. The backyard is great to layout and work on your tan. I would recommend this place over and over again.

What a beautiful, peaceful space to get away. Everything was clean, tidy and beautifully decorated. The pool was beautiful and kept very clean. We had everything we needed to enjoy our stay and were thoroughly impressed.
My husband and I stayed at Robert’s place for the first few nights of our honeymoon and I wish we could have stayed longer! It was so beautiful and peaceful and we had a great time there.

If you’re looking for a peaceful getaway, I highly recommend Robert’s listing. My partner and I were looking for a peaceful and private weekend and it was truly a success. The home is as described, clean and easy to find. Beautiful home and location with a pool. Easy access to the local restaurants and attractions via a quick Uber ride or drive. I will be back to Robert’s home in the future. I want to add I had great communication with the host. They were responsive and helpful to my questions.
Beautiful home,looks just like the pictures. Definitely will be booking here again!

Robert's place is by far our favorite places to stay when we are in Palm Springs.
He is always so responsive, helpful and goes above and beyond to make sure that we are comfortable. the pool is a lifesaver in the heat of the summer and the surrounding gardens and trees are like something out of a tropical postcard. 
10/10 every time 
Thanks Robert!

description.summary:
The home's classic Mid Century post and beam architecture, high ceilings, and numerous windows allow an abundance of natural light into the premises. 
Fire up the BBQ for dinner outside. Soak in the above ground hot tub. Enjoy the beautiful and private pool or lounge in one of the many seating areas poolside. Yard is fully fenced, gated and private. Gated entryway with off-street parking.
description.space:
Great vibe in this very spacious Mid-Century modern guest house (800 square feet!). Fully equipped kitchen. Bath has cool original Roman tub.  Washer and dryer. Wireless internet throughout property and cable TV. Separate private entrance from street. Beautiful pool in main yard that is for your exclusive use during your stay. 

All water is guest house is filtered through a 5-stage water filtration system. Home has environmentally sensitive solar energy.

Welcome to the Sunmor neighborhood, with exclusively vintage homes. The area has a cool retro vibe and is very pedestrian and bicycle friendly. An easy 5-minute drive to downtown, or a quick trip by bike. Easy to get around using Lyft or Uber if you don't want to rent a car.

Taxis and Uber are very easy to access in Palm Springs (and normally very quick to respond). It is a 5 minute ride to downtown. It is also a very bicycle friendly community with numerous biking routes throughout the city.
I have 2 bicycles in the room for your use.
description.access: You have a private fenced yard with a street entrance that is completely separate from the main house (your entrance is on Tamarisk Drive). The pool is located in a separate fenced yard.
description.notes:
I live next door in the main house. I have 2 dogs which remain in the main part of the property (they do not have access to the casita nor the pool). Pool is private and heated. 
I am happy to assist you with recommendations for restaurants or suggestions for activities. I am a licensed Real Estate Agent as well and I would be pleased to discuss any interest you may have in purchasing a property in the desert.
Pool is maintained twice a week. Normally on Wednesday and Saturday. Pool maintenance person comes in sometime between 8 and 12. It normally takes 15-30 minutes.

description.house_rules:
Smoking outdoors only!

Dogs allowed subject to restrictions at an additional fee of $50 per stay
Maximum of any vacation rental is 12 people with no more than 2 people per bedroom, no matter how big the home.

NO MUSIC or SOUND (TV, cell phone, radio, etc) are allowed outside at any time. Any type of SOUND from any sound producing device is not allowed outside of your Vacation Rental unit. This includes music coming from the inside of the home that can be heard outside. If your neighbors can hear the noise, you are in violation of the City Ordinance.

While NO MUSIC or SOUND (TV, cell phone, radio, etc) are allowed outside at any time, QUIET TIME is between 10pm and 10am. Please consider moving indoors after 10pm. If you choose to be outside, please be considerate of the neighbors and use low voices. Please remember our neighborhoods are quiet, surrounded by mountains and voices can easily carry.

A CALL from the neighbors to the City will bring Code Compliance Officers to your door.  Our officers may issue you a citation if you exceed the allowed noise levels or if another violation is observed.  So please, keep the noise down and be considerate of the neighbors.  You may be on vacation, but other occupants in homes around your vacation home may not be.

Please keep in mind that you will be cited or fined by the City, or even immediately evicted by the owner, for creating a disturbance or for violating any provisions of the City’s Vacation Rental Ordinance. The minimum fine is $500 per violation. The surrounding neighbors have been given a 24-hour number to CALL should they need to report a complaint.

name: Sparkling Clean, Stunning Luxury, Secure Condo with Pool
title: Tulum, Mexico

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
Chocolate, avocadoes and coffee! Some of my most favorite things cultivated by the Mayans. There is so much to love about the Yucatan peninsula and specifically Tulum. I hope to share my appreciation of the people and place with you to make you want to visit again and again.
I live full-time in Sedona, Arizona with my artist husband Alan Wolton. I try to get to my oasis in Tulum as much as possible but open it up to you to enjoy whenever I’m not there. 
My co-hosts, Yana and Esteban, are there to greet you and take care of your every need. I think you will agree that they are the most lovely and hospitable couple on the planet!

recent.comments: We had a great time at Danny’s place. This is really a home away from home. Communication with Yanna was great she provided a lot of great suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. We had a great time and a fabulous week here. Thanks for everything

items.comments: We had a great time at Danny’s place. This is really a home away from home. Communication with Yanna was great she provided a lot of great suggestions for restaurants and places to visit. We had a great time and a fabulous week here. Thanks for everything

Perfect place to get out and explore and also quiet and restful when you come back. The apartment feels like home! We loved it! Beds are super comfy and they provided all the extra nice touches of drinking water, fruit and coffee before we arrived. Esteban also recommend wonderful places to eat. We went to the Tulum Ruins, Gran Cenote, Cenote Cristaline and Yalku Lagoon. We would definitely come back again! It was a girls trip with my best friend and our 14 year old daughters. We had a blast and felt completely safe at night. The girls loved the pool too!

Really enjoyed our stay,  parking available, very nice quiet neighborhood. Felt very safe with with security to enter premises. Aldea Zama neighborhood located in between Tulum Pueblo to the north and Beach Hotel Zone to the south. Esteban was very nice and even welcomed us with papaya and bananas!!
Danny’s apartment was perfect for what we needed. Perfect location

My friends and I absolutely adored our time here - the place is most definitely more beautiful than the pictures show and much more spacious! We loved how each bedroom had their own ensuite! 
Would highly recommend :)

We loved our stay at Damny's place!  It was immaculate, spacious and had everything we needed.  Getting there &  getting in was simple and easy. Help/advice was given quickly when we asked for it. The neighborhood is a quick bike ride into Tulum center. Its great if you want to be close but have a quiet place to spend the evening.  We would definitely stay again.

Great location! 5 or so minutes from downtown Tulum! You’re really close to the most authentic parts of the city! Danny and Esteban were super responsive, thorough, and helpful! They gave me a list of recommendations for food and even sent over direct contacts for taxis which made getting around a breeze! I’d love to stay here again!

description.summary:
Enhanced cleaning protocol. Perfect space for home office. High speed Wi-Fi. Free Netflix. On-site gym. Located in a secure complex, the condo is spacious and cool, decorated in gentle earth tones that compliment both the jungle setting and the modern conveniences.

Step out through floor-to-ceiling sliding glass and relax on a vibrant deck patio with rosy concrete walls. Swim in the sparkling shared pool hugged by courtyard greenery.

Beautifully designed 2-bedroom, 2.5-bath condo located within the Mi Querido Tulum gated community in Aldea Zama.  Local and internationally renowned artwork showcased throughout the interior. 

Condominium complex with on-site security and keyed main-door access.

- 2 Queen beds
- Private deck with jungle view
- Complete kitchen w/appliances & cookware
- Living room
- Sofa
- Flat screen TV
- Washer/dryer
- Free WiFi
- Free Netflix
- Towels
- Patio with hammock
- A/C in all rooms

Additional perks: 

Free parking
Pool area with garden and lounge chairs
On-site gym
Palapa with BBQ, table and chairs

Mi Querido Tulum is an exclusive development that combines the majesty of its geographic location, including climate and vegetation, with the power to easily decide between going to the beach or the town's center, about a mile away. Then again, guests may choose to stay and hang out on the lush grounds, swim in the pool, work out at the gym, or relax under the palapa and enjoy the shared BBQ facilities.

Full-time concierge at your service. We are available to guests as much or as little as you desire. Our goal is to make your stay the vacation of a lifetime!

The apartment is set in a jungle area in the upscale community of Aldea Zama in Tulum. Parque Nacional Tulum, beaches, and the ancient Mayan structure El Castillo are all a short drive or bike ride away.

The condo is strategically located within Aldea Zama for guests to easily access the wide, tree-lined streets for walking and the bike paths to town or beach. English-speaking taxi drivers are also available.

The maid will come to clean during your stay upon request and fee. Cleaning service fee is $25.00 USD. Towels and linens changed if needed. You are able to choose which days you would like the cleaning service and fee must be paid by cash on site ONLY.

name: Best Of Nashville - Award Winning, Top Floor Studio and Pool
title: Nashville, Tennessee

recent.comments: Zac was a good host! He was responsive and helpful. The location was great because it was close to everything we wanted to do in Nashville. The room was clean, had the essentials, and the bed was extremely comfortable. I enjoyed that there were guidelines on how to use everything in the Airbnb. Check in and check out was easy. I really wanted to use the pool and, unfortunately, the pool wasn’t clean. However, Zac was helpful in accommodating our stay which I truly appreciated. I look forward to returning

items.comments: Zac was a good host! He was responsive and helpful. The location was great because it was close to everything we wanted to do in Nashville. The room was clean, had the essentials, and the bed was extremely comfortable. I enjoyed that there were guidelines on how to use everything in the Airbnb. Check in and check out was easy. I really wanted to use the pool and, unfortunately, the pool wasn’t clean. However, Zac was helpful in accommodating our stay which I truly appreciated. I look forward to returning

Easy to check in, relatively close to downtown, plenty of restaurants nearby, but the bed was extremely uncomfortable and our TV did not work even though we followed the instructions listed (though this wasn't a huge deal as we weren't trying to watch TV for our entire stay) Overall, it was an okay stay.
Excellent accomodation and the pool is fantastic
I was very pleased that Zac got back to me so quickly when I reported the issue with the air conditioner, he also had his maintainance guy out right away when the toilet backed up.
Cute little place! Loved that there was pool access and the bed was super duper comfy. Was only there one night to crash, but would rent again.

Beautiful place with walking distance to a few restaurants and stores! Decor was nice and the place was spotless! Zac was very helpful with providing suggestions about food ideas, entertainment, etc. Will love to stay again!
It was a good place to stay I would recommend it to anyone just a little smaller than I expected but I loved it!!

description.summary:
Hi! Thank you for your interest in our beautiful and recently remodeled condo. We have multiple condos listed on Airbnb, we host approximately 1,000 guests per year between them, and we are very proud to be AIRBNB SuperHosts and of our 5-star rating! We LOVE hosting guests and helping them plan their best possible Nashville experience. We like to think we are good at it!

If you are celebrating a special occasion please let us know! We will be happy to provide our concierge services to make your trip even extra special and super easy! We can provide grocery shopping and pantry stocking for you before you and your guests arrive, bottles of wine, champagne, liquor, flowers, balloons, cards, party decor etc.- you name it, we can provide it for you!

Our top floor studio has everything you will need for a fun and convenient vacation or staycation! While our 3D White Wall is certainly a feature that is popular among our guests, we have also designed this condo to maximize space and have supplied everything you need to feel right at home...and we want you to feel this way, its important to us!

This condo has:
A super-comfortable queen size murphy bed that folds into the wall when you are not sleeping to create more space. It also has pull-around bed curtains to provide a private and cozy sleeping environment.  
Fantastic throne-like vintage yellow chairs. They are TALL!
A full kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a complete coffee bar, wine and champagne glasses, pots, pans, utensils, and fabulous dishware. And yes…of course…there is also a corkscrew!
An couch that folds out to a full size bed. Plush mattress toppers and blankets could keep you in bed all day.
Clean and comfortable bathroom with supersize mirrors and a rain shower!
Wifi 
Washer and Dryer (in the building) 
All home amenities including (iron, hairdryer, etc)
Pool access during the warm months!
And much more!

Guests have access to all facilities including the full condo, washer/dyer, parking, and pool.

We have been awarded "AIRBNB Superhosts." This means we go above and beyond for our guests. You are welcome to email, call, or text us at anytime and we usually respond within an hour, if not right away!

This condo is located in the 12th South and Melrose neighborhoods - which are 2 of the most popular, must-visit neighborhoods in Nashville. Within walking distance are shops, many restaurants and bars, grocery stores, a Walgreens and CVS, and just about everything else you need. Broadway, the famed honkytonks, and the heart of downtown is only a 5-minute drive away!

This condo has a keyless entry system. Guest are sent their own unique key code prior to arrival.

name: Walk to Resort & Restaurants from a Relaxing Condo
title: Breckenridge, Colorado

gallery.caption: Separate water closet for privacy.
Spend the evening relaxing by the cozy gas fireplace.
Second floor balcony off the living space.
Stairs for accessing the unit.

hosts.about: Husband and father of one. I’ve lived in Colorado for 10 years. I love all things outdoors, whether it be snowboarding, climbing, or biking, there is nothing better than getting up for some early outdoor exercise and then spending evenings relaxing around town with good food and drink.

Wife and mother of two boys. I enjoy all things outdoors and love sharing the places I love with others.

As a host, I strive for you to feel like you are at home from check in to checkout. I'll try to communicate mostly prior to your arrival to allow you to enjoy your stay without being bothered.

recent.comments: Super comfortable and clean! My mom and I really enjoyed our stay. We appreciate Laura’s attentiveness and the detail she put into the place to make it feel like home!

items.comments: Super comfortable and clean! My mom and I really enjoyed our stay. We appreciate Laura’s attentiveness and the detail she put into the place to make it feel like home!
Nice, clean place that is very close to restaurants and the ski slopes. It comes with great amenities. I would stay at Laura’s place again.

This Breckenridge condo was perfect; it was cozy, clean, and well-stocked with amenities. It is walking distance to Main Street and has easy access to all the shops and restaurants. You can’t go wrong with this one!

Perfect location, meticulously clean, and very thoughtfully stocked/furnished! I am so grateful we were able to stay in Laura & Adam's home. This unit exceeded all of our expectations! It had everything we needed and more. Very comfortable, full of quality amenities, and just an all around cozy and happy place to be! The perfect "home away from home" for us. We loved the location so much - one of my favorite parts of the day was the peaceful morning walk to Coffee Depot :)  I cannot say enough great things about this unit and location!
Great place and an even better location! Short walk to downtown. The place was stocked with everything you could need on your trip and the hosts were very helpful and great at communicating.

Laura was an excellent host. 
Everything was as described and she also had very quick responses. 

My fiancé and I love the area, we will definitely recommend Laura’s listing to friends and family as well as stay again.
Super cute, cozy, many amenities, nice host.

description.summary: Return from a day hiking, biking, or otherwise exploring the mountain and store all your gear in a private locker before kicking up your feet in front of the fire in this relaxing condo. The location allows you to spend a quiet evening watching a movie in front of the fire or taking a quick walk downtown to shops and restaurants, or doing a combination of everything!
description.space:
The Condo Unit
This 750 square foot mountain contemporary condo is a one bedroom perfect for a couple or a small family that includes...
- Queen bed in a private bedroom
- Memory-foam pullout in the main living area (queen-width, 8" shorter than a queen)
- Duel-entry bathroom: one bedroom entrance & a separate living room entrance
- Full size kitchen with all the furnishings needed to prepare a home cooked meal
- In-unit washer/dryer (Honestly, best for small loads only)
- Gas-operated fireplace

The condo complex
In addition to the unit itself, the complex offers...
- Heated, locked underground parking (One space is reserved for the unit. Please note, oversized /lifted vehicles may not fit in garage, but most vehicles such as Chevy Suburbans and smaller do fit.)
- Community washer/dryer in underground parking area (best for full loads, is coin operated)
- Community hot-tub & pool located ~100 yards from unit.
- Ski/snowboard locker in underground parking garage

In addition to all parts of the condo (minus 1 small owners closet), guests will have access to: one reserved parking spot in the garage, plus one parking pass for the outside lot, one private storage locker within the garage for skis or other similarly sized items, plus access to the newly renovated Columbine community pool and hot tubs.

We will not be available in person unless there is an emergency, but will be accessible by AirBnB messaging or text message if any questions arise.

The unit is in the beautiful and peaceful Warrior's Mark neighborhood. Just steps from the Peak 9 base, Main Street, the Blue River, trails, and more the location enables you to feel like you are in a tranquil setting while still having easy access to the highlights of Breckenridge.

Breckenridge Free Ride - provides free public transit around Breckenridge and the surrounding area.

Summit Stage - provides free public transit to other resorts and towns in Summit county.

The in-unit combo washer/dryer is great for doing small loads of laundry conveniently within the unit. Regular to full sized loads of laundry are best done in the community coin operated units located in the underground garage.

name: Savor Sweeping Urban Vistas from Bedroom Balcony
title: Mexico City, Mexico

location.address: Ciudad de México, Ciudad de México, Mexico

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter
No stairs or steps to enter
No stairs or steps to enter
No stairs or steps to enter

recent.comments: Everything was lovely!! Arturo and Diana were very helpful and welcoming! I know that for sure when visiting Mexico City again, this will be my place to go again if it's available. The place is lovely, the view and the host are the best!! I will recommend it to family and friends!!

items.comments: Everything was lovely!! Arturo and Diana were very helpful and welcoming! I know that for sure when visiting Mexico City again, this will be my place to go again if it's available. The place is lovely, the view and the host are the best!! I will recommend it to family and friends!!
Great place great host I will stay there again!
Lindo apartamento con una vista impresionante. Súper recomendable

Great location overall. 10 minute walk to the subway station. Bring a backpack for gathering drinks and snacks. The nearest place to buy anything is an Oxxo near the monument.  

I agree with what others have said about the pool/gym reservations. The top floor is split into 2 separate sides one is the pool and one is the gym. You have to reserve either one in hour long blocks at the front desk. Depending on which worker is manning the desk on the top it can get weird. Asking us if we showered and make sure we have our swim caps etc.  These rules about reservations and limiting 2 people per room to the pool only seem to apply to the AirBNB guests. For the purpose of keeping things quiet for the full time residents. The views from the top floor are incredible day or night. 

There were trumpet and drum players down by the monument 5/7 days at varying times of day sometimes blasting for hours. 

The beds were not Queen size they were only full. No AC but the fans helped with open windows.
Excelente lugar !

Place is in good location. Walking distance or short Uber ride from most main attractions. Hosts are very responsive and communicate very well. Space is overall very spacious and clean. Only minor shortfalls are the lack of air conditioning, lack of cancellation policy, and a minor malfunction in one of the restrooms. Luckily was not in the unit for much of the time in the city, so the restroom and A/C were not a big deal. Bonus was the building staff being very helpful and friendly. Helped guests feel safe and welcome throughout the entire stay.

Arturo’s place was exactly as described. The checkin was easy and the view from the apartment was wonderful. The apartment had so many things to use to make you feel right at home. The building was in great proximity to so many nice businesses, places to eat and relax. I highly recommend this listing if you are visiting Mexico City.

description.summary:
Settle down in one of the tropical communal seating areas at a tropical-chic hideaway dotted with plants and impressionist art. Take an afternoon dip in the shared pool lined with trees, then admire one of the most iconic monuments in the city.

To use the amenities you have to book a 50-minute slot. No walk-ins.

The building was design by Alberto Kalach one of the most renowned architects on México with multiple projects under his arm, presents this beautiful building in one of the most exclusive zones of México City. The apartment has been renovated to his current state where love and time where put on it, for the guest, to feel like a home. With a privileged view of one of the most iconic monuments of the city! The apartment has incredible light and enormous windows. The amenities that my space has to offer are unique on each way.

You have access to the full apartment, is yours to enjoy, and you have access to the hole building, with all the amenities that it has, Gym, Pool, Spa, and two incredible yards for you to relax and enjoy. Plus you have your own parking spot.

I will be available through the app, don’t hesitate on asking anything! If you need something on your reservation I’ll be happy to provide it.

Reforma is the main avenue in Mexico City, running from the Chapultepec Forest to the area known as La Alameda. This is where the city's top luxury hotels and shops are, as well as the Stock Exchange, Latin America's tallest building, and embassies.

Mexico City is has so really good transportation methods, like the Metro which is located 5 minute walking ( Metro Juarez ), and a Bus that goes away all the main Avenue, Uber works great on Mexico City and it’s really unexpensive.

name: Four Seasons Stonework Castle, Live the Fairytale.
title: Anatoliki Attiki, Greece

gallery.caption: Σαουνα
Ντουζ σαουνας/πισινας

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
My name is Maria. I live in Athens, Greece. I live there with my husband and my two sons. In 2002 we built a house in Saronida. It was our dream to live in an actual Castle, so we studied it with the best architects and we created a real Castle made out of stone and recycled materials. Hence the name Four Seasons Stonework Castle.
We lived there for 18 years. My sons grew up in this house as did we (me and my husband) so, after all these years, we decided to move to the city in order to have everything closer. That meant that we had to make something out of our dream. So instead of leaving it behind we thought it would be better if we shared our love and experience of the house of our dreams with other people. All that led us to turn it to a small business of our own while making other people feel the warmth and love that this house has given us.
After some years of experience I felt that this is something that I would like to do as an actual job so I began designing other houses and villas for rent in order to share my excitement of what I do and also help other people make a business out of their beautiful homes. 
I will love to be your host. In any house you choose to stay…

recent.comments: We spent our family vacation at Maria's stone castle and had an amazing time. We were looking for privacy and an amazing view, everything was as expected. Host is very responsive, highly recommended!

items.comments: We spent our family vacation at Maria's stone castle and had an amazing time. We were looking for privacy and an amazing view, everything was as expected. Host is very responsive, highly recommended!

Maria and Manolys are an amazing couple, very welcoming, warm hearted and kind. 
We had a lovely food and drink hamper waiting for us on arrival. 
The villa is very homely with an excellent vibe and good energy. Everything to make our stay comfortable had been thought of with nice touches.
The pool and terrace are fantastic with the most fabulous views over the mountains and sea.
The area feels very safe, with lots of local shops, fresh food markets, bars, cafes and restaurants to choose from. 
We love the people and the place very much and look forward to coming back soon.
Thank you so much to our wonderful hosts. ☺️

A group of 6 of us just came back from a 1 week stay at Maria’s and could not be happier with how it all went. The place is amazing, it has everything we needed and more. It far exceeded expectations in that it had so much more to offer than we had anticipated just from the listing. Maria was incredibly helpful and very quick to respond whenever we had a request. The location, the views and the place itself make me want to return as soon as possible. Could not recommend highly enough!

Me and my family of 6 including three teenage girls, and one teenage boy had the most amazing experience you could possibly have.Maria and Hasbant couldn't have been better hosts. they were beyond helpful every step of the way, including where to go, what to do, restaurant recommendations etc. Absolutely any question I had they answered,and I had a lot,in the most timely manner possible. They've  truly earned the title of  SUPER HOST's.The property itself is truly magical. perfect location the most beautiful view imaginable. The house was immaculate. They were even nice enough to leave a gift basket with food. There was  also food and water in the refrigerator for us.Everything you could possibly need they provided and then some. if you were lucky enough to come across this listing, you should grab it immediately the best experience I've ever had at an Airbnb. I feel very blessed that we were able to find this property. Out of 5  Stars I give this experience 10#bestexperienceever

We had an amazing time staying in Maria’s place.
Unique villa which can accommodate a big group of people. Maria and her husband  were very polite and kind. Everything was spotless clean and there were many thoughtful extras and details that made our holidays even better! I would definitely recommend staying at this villa!
Maria holds both a great hosting personality and a welcoming property. we had a wonderful time staying at Maria's place for 6 days. highly recommended.

Our group had the most amazing time here! Maria and her castle are fabulous! Beautiful home, very accomodating host, thoughtfully stocked essentials when we arrived, and helpful connections to coordinate day trips and transport. Cannot recommend this stay more highly!

description.summary: At the heart of the hill of our town, we have created and decorated, a unique stone-built masterpiece with a stunning 270° view. Enjoy the breathtaking sunsets and have the most unique feeling and experience, while living in a mountain castle! The whole inner part of the house is decorated by us giving it a fairy tale feeling. An unforgettable sight and experience themed by all four seasons. Pool can be heated as well as cooled, with an extra charge and upon agreement with the owner.
description.space:
The property provides A/C in every room and a Central Heating System. It also has a fireplace to warm your nights.  
Bedroom description:
1) "HERMES"  one double (160cm width) + one single (80cm) + private wc w/bathtub
2) "APHRODITE" one double (150cm) +one single(90cm) + private wc w/shower
3) "ARTEMIS" one double (150cm), one semi double (120cm width) + a shared with nr 4 bedroom wc w/shower
4) "POSEIDON"  two single (90cm) + a shared with nr 3 bedroom wc w/shower
5) "DIONYSUS" one double  (150cm) +one single(90cm) + private wc w/shower + a full organized kitchen . This is a small house, independent from the main house.
The entire house can sleep 14 people in the bedrooms and 2 at the sofas by the fireplace.
There is one organised kitchen with two living-rooms and a full organized BBQ outside the house with a table for 8, another big table for 10 is outside with infinity view. 
The nearest beach is located only 3 minutes away also by car while there is a private pool with a whirl-pool, on the balcony of the property. There is also an open parking for two cars.
The whole inner part of the house will be decorated by us giving it a fairytale feeling. An unforgettable sight and experience themed by every season.
We can offer full time working employees providing you cleaning of the house, babysitting, personal training, dietician, personal driver and a tour-guide. Everything on extra cost.
Important Notice : This is a stonebuild house  that is able to withstand  the many Richter earthquakes !!
Enjoy our, full of surprises, hospitality.
description.access: Access to the whole property.Everyone guest can visit every corner of the stonework villa.
description.notes:
The rooms inside the villa are accesible by  steps . Outside by elevator .
Is builded in the senter of the Saronida hill with the most popular, outstanding view .
description.neighborhood: Saronida is right in the center of the Athens Riviera, with a beautiful coastline condensing some of the best beaches in the area. This is the southest part of Attica that Athenians visit to enjoy its crystal-clear waters and traditional taverns.
description.transit: need a car
description.interaction: My goal for you is to spend unforgettable holidays with my aid and whenever you have the need .Live the fairytale !!
description.house_rules: Due to the danger of the pool at the edge of the rocks, the parents have the absolute responsibility of the children accompanying them

name: Walk to Disneyland from a Five Star Resort-Style Pool Home
title: Anaheim, California

hosts.about: Professionally managed. We are always at your service! Locations in Southern California and Denver.

recent.comments: Great place to stay close to Disneyland. The kids loved the game room and pool. They were also stocked with everything you could need. Plenty of extra towels and kitchen utensils. Quiet neighborhood that felt very safe and they even had an alarm system we were able to use. The house would get a little hot during the day but we just left box fans running and made it work. Overall a wonderful stay and would 100% stay there again.

items.comments: Great place to stay close to Disneyland. The kids loved the game room and pool. They were also stocked with everything you could need. Plenty of extra towels and kitchen utensils. Quiet neighborhood that felt very safe and they even had an alarm system we were able to use. The house would get a little hot during the day but we just left box fans running and made it work. Overall a wonderful stay and would 100% stay there again.
The location was perfect for visiting Disneyland. The home had everything we needed and instructions were clear to us. It was very spacious and comfortable.
Place was neat, they had wverything you needes except laundry soap. Area was a little rough but overall it was a good stay.

Our family of ten enjoyed our stay at Trevor’s place! It was so close to Disney that we were able to come home and nap before heading back to the parks for the evening. The kids enjoyed swimming in the pool as well. Highly recommend for a family trip to Disney!

This place was perfect for a family of 2. Altogether we had 3 adults, 4 kids and an infant. We had more than enough space and could have easily fit another family. I loved that there was so much to do. The kids were never bored. It’s a 5 minute drive to Disneyland. I wouldn’t recommend walking especially with a baby. The extra Amenities is what I appreciated the most. It’s hard traveling with a baby but they had a high chair, extra stroller and walker. The welcome snacks were a great addition and we never ran out of towels and extra linens. Kathy and Trevor were quick to respond when we couldn’t figure out the alarm. Overall, we love the place and would 100% stay here again.
Super close to Disney! Was great to be able to come home mid-day for a break. Lots of restaurants close by as well! Really clean, super communicative, and helpful hosts. Great stay!
Could not be happier with this home. It was everything we could hope for!

description.summary: Live like a movie star in this expansive family-friendly home. Play Billiards, darts, and ping pong in the detached games room. Outside, swim in a heated pool and compete at croquet and corn hole. Inside, Smart TVs with Netflix and Blu-ray await. Jump on the bikes and start exploring, and walk to Disneyland, which is only a mile away. This property is also close to the Convention Center, together with numerous shops and restaurants to suit all tastes and pockets.

SHORT TERM RENTAL AGREEMENT

This Vacation Rental Short-Term Lease Agreement (this “Agreement”) constitutes a contract between the undersigned person (“you”) and OC Vacation Properties (OCVP). Airbnb or VRBO bylaws may override agreement.

1. Reservation Requirements and Full Payment. Reservations are not considered “guaranteed” until OCVP receives your signed Agreement and receives and accepts the required deposit and full payment (if applicable). If you signed Agreement and full payment is not received and accepted by OCVP at least 14 days prior to your arrival, your reservation is subject to cancellation. You agree that OCVP may charge your card on file for the remaining balance after deposit without notice no earlier than 14 days before arrival.
2. Deposit to Secure your Reservation. If you are reserving a property more than 30 days in advance, you must pay a reservation deposit when making your reservation in the amount of 50% of the cost of your vacation rental. You waive all rights to bank account interest that may accrue on your deposit. A fee of $25 will be charged for returned checks.
3. Confirmation of Reservation(s). Confirmation of your reservation will be emailed to you. Please read the confirmation for accuracy of dates, mailing address, number of adults and/or children and accommodations. You must notify OCVP of any errors within one business day.
4. Security Deposit. OCVP reserves the right at its discretion to charge a security deposit at the time of reservation in the amount of $300, not including Airbnb reservations. This deposit will be refunded in whole or in part at OCVP’s discretion after your departure and an inspection of the premises by OCVP.
5. Maximum Occupancy. The maximum occupancy for the rental property is the number the rental property sleeps, including children, as displayed on the OCVP website for the property. The number of guests must be pre-approved by OCVP.
6. Excessive Wear and Tear; Damage. You are responsible for rental charges for the full duration of the reservation and for any damages or breakage to the rental property incurred during the rental period, even if a security deposit has been paid. OCVP may charge the credit card on file for any damage or breakage or excessive cleaning costs.
7. Assumed Risks for Hot Tubs and Jacuzzi Tubs (if Applicable). You assume all risks related to the use of any provided hot tub or Jacuzzi tub, including any illness or injury. Hot Tubs and Jacuzzi tubs are not recommended for use by children.
8. Roads and Road Conditions. OCVP is not responsible for any adverse driving conditions that may impede access to your rental property.
9. Mechanical Failures. OCVP cannot guarantee against mechanical failure of electrical service, stopped plumbing, water supply, heating, hot tubs, audio visual equipment, computers or internet access, television or appliances. Please report any inoperative equipment to OCVP immediately. OCVP will make every reasonable effort to have repairs done quickly and efficiently. No refunds or rent reductions will be made due to failure of such items.
10. Rental Assignment Change. OCVP reserves the right to require you to change rental properties without liability to OCVP if the rental property unexpectedly becomes unavailable or uninhabitable. When comparable accommodations are unavailable, you will have the option of selecting from available properties or receiving a refund.
11. Listing Information. Information regarding individual rental properties is believed accurate but cannot be guaranteed. Particular furnishings and amenities are subject to change without notice.
12. Acts of God. OCVP shall not be liable or deemed in default under this Agreement for any failure to perform or delay in performing any of its obligations due to or arising out of any act not within its control, including, without limitation, acts of God.
13. Indemnification and Hold Harmless. You shall indemnify and hold harmless the owner of the rental property and OCVP and their respective shareholders, members, officers, directors, employees and agents for any liabilities, theft, damage, personal injury, cost or expense whatsoever arising from or related to any claim or litigation which may arise out of or in connection with your and your invitees’ and visitors’ use and occupancy of the rental property or the failure of you and your invitees or visitors to observe the Rental Regulations.
14. Property Rental Owner is a Third Party Beneficiary. You agree and acknowledge that the owner of the rental property is a third party beneficiary of your obligations, representations, warranties and limitations on liability under this Agreement and that the owner of the rental property shall be entitled to all rights and remedies that OCVP may have under this Agreement.
15. Governing Law; Venue. This Agreement and all transactions contemplated by this Agreement shall be governed by, and construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of the State of California.
16. Limitation on Liability. Under no circumstances and under no legal theory, tort, contract, strict liability, or otherwise, shall OCVP or the rental property owner be liable to you or any other person for any indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages of any character including arising out of or relating to this agreement or your rental. In no event will OCVP or the rental property owner be liable for any damages in excess of the amounts actually paid by you in connection with this agreement, even if OCVP or the rental property owner shall have been of the possibility of such damages.
17. Subletting. Subletting is restricted and guests will forfeit all rights if found. This Short Term Rental Agreement is solely between undersigned person and owner. Guest will lose all rent and damage deposit if found subletting.
18. Smoking: Smoking is not allowed inside the property. If there are signs of smoking inside the property, entire damage deposit will be withheld or request for damages.
20. Entire deposit will be withheld if party takes place or consistent breaking of rules.
21. Pool/Spa : If pool or spa is left on or is found to be overheating, a minimum of $40 will be withheld from deposit.
22. Garage: No Sleeping in the garage. Door must be closed at all times in accordance with the City of Anaheim Noise Ordinance.
23. Additional charges if necessary: Comforter Replacement =$150, Extra Cleaning Fees = $100, Rug Replacement = $200, Extra Pool Cleaning = $75
24. 4.05.130 VIOLATIONS/PENALTIES. .010 Administrative Citation. In addition or as an alternative to any other remedy provided by state law or this code, the city, the city's Police Department or an enforcement officer may issue a civil citation to the owner, the owner's agent, the local contact person, the responsible person, or the hosting platform if there is any violation of this chapter or the code committed, caused or maintained by such person or entity. When a violation occurs, it is not required that a warning or notice to cure must first be given, before a citation may be issued. All complaints for any violation of this chapter may be handled by either the city’s Police Department or enforcement officers on a twenty-four (24) hour basis. Any police report where the city’s Police Department has concluded that a violation of this chapter has occurred, may be submitted to the city’s Community Preservation Manager for review, processing and issuance of a civil citation. Each and every day, or portion thereof, that a violation of this chapter exists constitutes a separate and distinct violation for which a civil citation may be issued. Such a civil citation shall be issued, notice given, and any appeals heard by the processes and in the manner prescribed by Chapter 1.20 of this code. .0101 Responsible Person. The city may issue and the responsible person for each short-term rental may receive a civil citation for any violation of this chapter as follows: (1) A two hundred dollar ($200.00) fine for each minor offense; (2) A five hundred dollar ($500.00) fine for each major offense.
27. Entire Agreement. This Agreement, Exhibit A, Exhibit B, (AND Exhibit C, if applicable) represent the entire understanding and agreement between you, OCVP and the owner of the rental property with respect to the subject matter of this Agreement, and supersedes all other negotiations, understandings and representations (if any) made by and between such parties. OCVP reserves the right to add any addendums to agreement prior to arrival.


By my signature below, I hereby give permission to charge my credit card for the amounts above. I agree that all rental monies are non-refundable per cancellation policy above. Damage Deposit is subject to be withheld if house rules listed on Exhibit B are broken and are subject to further fines. I have read my rights to purchase travel insurance.
I hereby authorize OC Vacation Properties to charge my credit card given in Exhibit C if the Damage Deposit collected does not cover all damages or stolen items. This includes the potential of lost rents due to repairs needed from potential damages.


Exhibit A
RENTAL RULES

Smoking is NOT allowed inside the house. Not illicit drugs are permitted on the property.
People other than those in the Guest party set forth above may not stay overnight in the property. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest.
All of the units are privately owned; the owners are not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises or others whom they invite to use the premise.
Keep the property and all furnishings in good order
Only use appliances for their intended uses
Pets Fee: $100. If pet fee was not paid up front and pet was found at property, OCVP will charge $150.
Parking: Parking is limited to vehicle(s). Vehicles are to be parked in the driveway only. No street parking allowed. Parking on the street is prohibited. Any illegally parked cars are subject to towing; applicable fines/towing fees are the sole responsibility of the vehicle owner.
Housekeeping: There is no daily housekeeping service. While linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate. There will be extra sets of linens including towels and beach towels for your use. Please request before your stay for any additional linens or in-stay housekeeping.
Pool/Hot Tub: Pool/Spa Use from 9:00 AM-10:00 PM. (If Applicable) No children under the age of _12__ permitted in pool or hot tub at any time without adult supervision. When using the hot tub, remember there is a certain health risk associated with this facility. Use at your own risk. Our housekeepers drain, sanitize, refill and replenish chemicals in all tubs prior to your arrival; therefore, it may not be warm until later that evening. DO NOT STAND ON THE HOT TUB COVERS. Hot tub covers are for insulation purposes and are not designed to support a person or persons. They will break and you may be charged for replacement.] Remember when not using the hot tub, leave cover on so hot tub will stay warm.
Fireplace: The fireplace is not permitted for use.
Noise Restrictions: In compliance with Anaheim’s Loud and Unreasonable Noise Ordinance, you and your party must avoid creating “loud or unreasonable noise” between the hours of 10 p.m. and 9 a.m., and comply with Anaheim Municipal Code (AMC) Section 6.73. According to the Code, both you and the owner of this rental property can, and will, be held liable for any initial and subsequent repeat violations of the Loud and unreasonable Noise ordinance.
Trash: Trash and refuse shall not be left or stored within public view, except in proper containers for the purpose of collection by the responsible trash hauler and between the hours of 5:00 pm the day before and 8:00 pm the day after the scheduled trash collection containers and service to meet the demand of the occupants.
Parties: There are no parties allowed of any sort at the property. Any party that has taken place or that is found out will void lease agreement and guests will be subject to being removed from property with no refunds along with losing damage deposit and possible fines.
Additional Guest: The names listed on Exhibit B are the only permitted guests to stay at the property.Subject to additional charges and eviction if additional guests at the property.

name: Exclusive Villa Estate with Backyard Pool
title: Denpasar Selatan, Indonesia

hosts.about: Serious, fair and honest. Like many fellow villa owners in the Bali  Emerald Villas complex, I was not happy with the financial management of my investment, so we have decided  to break away, set up our own management company and go it alone. I want to offer my guests the best accommodations for the best pricing. Quite reasonable, don't you think? I'm running my own show now and appreciate and will reward any return bookings. Thank you.

recent.comments: We loved our stay. Agung was a pleasure to have around helping out.  Gary’s service was exceptional. We have booked again for next year.

items.comments: We loved our stay. Agung was a pleasure to have around helping out.  Gary’s service was exceptional. We have booked again for next year.

Everything about our stay was great!
Easy and prompt communication, spotlessly clean villa and Agung the house keeper is absolute lovely through and accommodating

Wow!  Our family of four had a lovely stay. The villa is better than pictured. Rooms are spacious and clean. Pool is wonderful. Agong was a delight and very attentive, and Wayan (driver) shared his local knowledge and organised 1/2 day outings to temples and the butterfly sanctuary. The villa is a 2-minute walk to the main road with ample cafes and restaurants. Our favourite was Sala. A 5-10 minute walk to the beach.
We love the place and have to give a huge shout out to the housekeeper who was amazing in making sure we were comfortable.

We had amazing stay at this villa in Sanur. There are tons of restaurant and the beach within walking distance. 
Gary and the villa staff are extraordinarily responsive and accommodating. They made our stay truly spectacular!
Was a perfect few days in Sanur at this villa, well located, clean, and great accomodations. Thank you Gary and Agung!

Lonely stay! If this home, its pool and facilities weren't enough, the location and the lovely Agung should be enough to convince you to stay. We felt right at home here. Everything was close - local food, convenient stores, beaches and cafes and shopping. The staff on site were more then helpful. It was all-round a great experience. Thanks again to Gary and his team!

description.summary:
Bali Emerald Villas is also a unique 30 villa complex conveniently located in the heart of Sanur. 24 hr. security is provided. Villa B-12 (aka Villa Ramayana) is tucked away in a quiet corner of the complex. Our lovely Balinese housekeeper, Agung, will take 
care of you during your stay. Her duties include making up the rooms, general cleaning in the villa and full laundry service, including ironing. She will also be happy to help you 
with your local shopping needs and preparation of meals.
description.space:
Bali Emerald Villas is also a unique 30 villa complex conveniently located in the heart of Sanur. 24 hr. security is provided. Villa B-12 (aka Villa Ramayana) is tucked away in a quiet corner of the complex. Our lovely Balinese housekeeper, Agung, will take 
care of you during your stay. Her duties include making up the rooms, general cleaning in the villa and full laundry service, including ironing. She will also be happy to help you 
with your local shopping needs and preparation of meals.
description.access:
The villa may be rented as a 2-BR or 3-BR accommodation. The unused bedroom will 
be locked off for the duration of the guest's stay. The housekeeper's area 
(washer/dryer, storage, etc.) will be locked off when she goes home for the
evening. Otherwise you have full run of the villa and all the amenities within.
description.notes:
We are very proud of our accommodations and will be working hard to make your stay a pleasant one, focusing on winning your return business. We are hopeful you will share your positive experiences with family and friends and your online reviews.

Additionally we are offering complimentary airport pickup and drop-off services (min. 5 night stay) and will offer our guests a free late check-out as required provided there are no conflicts with incoming guests. 

It should also be noted that the villa owner has invested significantly to upgrade 
the villa to his high personal standards for his enjoyment when he comes to stay in Bali. Approximately AUD 20K has been spent to completely replace the kitchen cabinetry and the bathroom cabinetry. This of course includes all new appliances in the kitchen and throughout the villa. New living room furniture, with oversized cushions and a 55" LED TV have also been added for your entertainment and relaxation. Please check out our photos. I'm sure you will agree the upgrades were worth the time and cost, not only for the owner, but also for our future guests. 

Amenities... too many to mention, but we will anyways:

You will feel safe and secure with 24 hr., round the clock, security.

Entertainment wise, there is a 55" flat screen TV in the living room and a 32" and 40" flat screen TV in the two main bedrooms. Indihome TV and Cable TV are provided for your news, movies, sports and serial TV needs.

In the mood to be pampered... We can provide you with a menu for in-villa personal spa services. Massages, mani/pedi, facials, etc. are now available in the villa for your convenience. These services have been pre-approved by MBO President Ibu Lany; 
Not good enough for her, not good enough for our guests.

The bathrooms are very spacious and well appointed inclusive of walk-in showers and bathtubs. The two main bedroom bathrooms both have outdoor Bali showers while the master bedroom also features an outdoor terrazzo bathtub. Check out the photos.

What else can we do to make your stay more enjoyable. Just ask us. We will consider any requests. After all, we are in the hospitality business... and we want you to come back and stay with us again. 

Baby / Toddler Requirements

We can assist you with any and all requirements to take better care of the safety and comfort of your little ones. Be it a stroller, car seat, high chair, crib, playpen, etc., we can assure you these requirements will be available at the villa prior to your arrival. We can also provide a swimming pool barrier fence, should you require for your peace of mind during your stay with us. (Fees apply, please ask for quotation)

NOTE: This is a brand new listing that has just joined our management team, hence no bookings have been blocked off yet. Christmas holidays and school holidays going 
forward are currently available. First come, first served. Book now to avoid 
disappointment.
description.neighborhood: There is lots to do and see in Sanur, and all within walking distance of the villa. The complex is located just off the main street with a multitude of shops, bars, and restaurants in either direction. It is also a five minute walk to the beach.
description.transit:
Getting around

When you rent directly with us, the owners, we will provide complimentary pick-up from the airport to our villa, and also include a  complimentary drop-off to the airport on your way home for any guests who have booked a minimum 5 night stay. For less than a 5 night stay we will have to charge for an airport pick-up but will provide a complimentary return trip to the airport after concluding your time with us.

Sanur is a very safe village to get around in. For starters, bicycle rentals are silly cheap. Sanur is a very bike friendly community as can easily be seen by the number of cyclists on the streets. Motor scooters can be rented for as little as IDR 50,000 per day. Cars, or MPV's, including drivers, are also readily available at very reasonable rates. Metered taxis (Bluebird) and Grab drivers are always close by. Grab provides the best transport value; If you don't have an account, then sign up. Most tour operators will include pick up and drop off to and from the villa as part of their package. Just ask us any specifics and we will answer you ASAP to help you with the planning of your stay.
description.interaction: The villa manager is in Bali regularly to ensure that our high expected standards are being maintained. No worries though, He is only a phone call away and stays in  very close contact with his housekeeper. Any concerns you may have can be quickly communicated, considered and addressed.
description.house_rules:
Sanur is not a wild and crazy party town. If that is what you are looking for, best focus your search in Kuta. Sanur is a more mature, peaceful community. We value our small-town feel here and enjoy the tranquility Sanur has to offer. Sanur residents are respectful of each other's space and loud music or partying into the wee hours will definitely not be tolerated.

Sorry, pets are not permitted due to follow-up guests having potential allergy issues.

This is a strictly "No Smoking" villa. Smoking is not even permitted in the open air
areas of the property so definitely not allowed in the bedrooms / bathrooms as is common in most hotels these days. If you want to smoke, the owner, the manager and fellow guests would appreciate it very much if you did so out in the common area of the complex. Thank you.

name: Private Desert Retreat with Saltwater Pool
title: Palm Springs, California

gallery.caption: Custom made furnishings & accessories throughout.
Custom bar
Chef's kitchen.
Perfectly manicured landscape

recent.comments: This is one of the most beautiful Airbnb’s I’ve ever had the privilege of staying in. I usually don’t write reviews but this is one of my favorites. Everything was spotless and perfect. Everything you think you may need was provided. All the incredible details inside and out left me speechless. The outdoor space is absolutely beautiful. Thank you for an amazing stay.

items.comments: This is one of the most beautiful Airbnb’s I’ve ever had the privilege of staying in. I usually don’t write reviews but this is one of my favorites. Everything was spotless and perfect. Everything you think you may need was provided. All the incredible details inside and out left me speechless. The outdoor space is absolutely beautiful. Thank you for an amazing stay.

This was probably the best Airbnb experience we have ever had. The backyard with the pool looked even better than it did in the photos. Communication with the host and property manager was fantastic and they were responsive to our every need. We will definitely be coming back to this property!

I will reiterate what others have said -- the photos don't do the backyard justice. It really is great to have a place that feels warm and green under the heavy sun of Palm Springs. This place has a warmth you just can't get in the photos. Everything was great. Recommended.

Great host, super responsive and easy to work with! The place is spotless and adorable for a girls’ weekend! We all agreed we would come back again. 
If airport noise is a concern- we never once heard it! Thanks Aram and Charley!!

This is our second time at Aram’s place. We loved it just as much as we did originally. The location is nice (no power lines!) the backyard is really beautiful and functional, and you’re a close drive to everything you’d need outside of the great place and backyard! Thanks again!

I loved this house for my weekend away with my group of friends. The inside and backyard looked even better than the photos. The check in and check out process was very easy and the host was very responsive and helpful.

I booked Papagayo House for a quiet weekend away from LA to celebrate my 60th with my husband, daughter and her boyfriend. The house is even better than the listing - what the photos can't convey is the privacy and peacefulness of the yard. I was worried that being so close to the airport there would be noise but it was shockingly quiet. Beds are comfy, we didn't really use the kitchen beyond coffee but it is well stocked. The real star of this property is the backyard - it is gorgeously designed and landscaped. We paid for the pool to be heated and we spent most of our time in/around the pool and it was well worth it. The little cul de sac is in a nice area and close to everything.

description.summary:
Outside, lie back in loungers by a saltwater pool. Tell stories around a luxurious fire pit. Balance the famous Palm Springs sun with shade produced by mature trees and a tiki hut. Inside, discover uniquely wallpapered rooms with a living area featuring soaring ceilings and a gourmet kitchen with lots of prep space.

A luxurious modern retreat, there is a great contemporary vibe running strongly through the interiors which feature soaring ceilings highlighted by knotty alder beams, rustic doors, reclaimed wide-plank wood flooring, a fully-equipped gourmet kitchen, custom made furnishings, and spa-like marble and stone bathrooms. For those cool desert nights, there is a cozy fireplace in the great room and for those warm days the back of the house is filled with french doors leading to your own private oasis outside.

The yard consists of a salt-water swimming pool and Egyptian glass tiled spa. There are multiple seating and lounging areas outdoors including dining for 8 under a tiki hut, a shaded outside living room, poolside chaises for 4, and relaxing loungers around a giant stone firepit. All of this is surrounded by breathtaking mountain views & California fan palms.

Being a bit farther away from the mountain is key to the success of the outdoor spaces in the house; you get almost an extra hour of sunlight (and sunsets) during the day as compared to the homes close to downtown (and those huge mountains)!

The bedrooms have televisions with a full cable package, as does the great room. Each room has a ceiling fan and luxurious Egyptian cotton linens. The smaller bedroom has two twin beds, and all rooms have large closets. There is an elegant and modern round dining table that seats 8 for interior dining or game night. The breakfast bar in the kitchen seats 4 atop the striking quartz countertops and glass backsplash, and there is a high capacity washer and dryer just off the side entrance in the garage.

The attention to detail in this home is like no other available on the vacation rental market in Palm Springs; you will never stay anywhere else after a night in this spectacular space.

Papagayo House is a City of Palm Springs Registered Vacation Rental CITY ID # 3600 TOT PERMIT # PS 6746

The house is on a quiet cul-de-sac in Palm Springs with amazing views. It's one of the few neighborhoods in the city with buried power lines, so views are unobstructed. Papagayo House is a City of Palm Springs Vacation Rental, #3600

Participate locally: If you arrive by Thursday, the Palm Springs' downtown area 'Village Fest' on Palm Canyon Drive is transformed into a bustling street fair...Artists, craftsmen, food vendors, musicians and entertainers are there to entertain. Stock up on local farm veggies/fruit or enjoy some great people watching. 

Also experience, on Friday from 4pm to 9pm, 'First Friday On North Palm Canyon' (every month, year-round), between Tachevah and Amado Road, featuring entertainment, food and fun, where more than 50 antique furnishings and art stores remain open into the late evening.

Please be aware that there are exterior security cameras at the property. They run 24/7 but are not monitored unless an issue arises. They are also recorded over in regular intervals. 

Papagayo House is a City of Palm Springs Registered Vacation Rental 
CITY ID # 3600
TOT PERMIT # PS 6746

description.house_rules:
Please note some very important things about this property BEFORE YOU BOOK IT. By booking this property, YOU AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING. 

Will consider small pets for an additional $150 fee per pet per stay. Whenever a pet stays, additional cleaning and post stay prep work must be done prior to the next guest checking in. 

The jacuzzi is heated on demand and included in your rental rate. Like most other rentals in Palm Springs, heating the main pool is optional and usually only needed from November through May. It is $95 more per night and you must purchase it for your entire stay or none at all. You will be asked about pool heating after booking and need to provide 72 hours notice should you wish it to be turned on. 

There is a NO amplified exterior noise ordinance in effect for the entire city of Palm Springs. This is a quiet residential community, and all guests in or on this property must agree to not disturb any neighbors with excessive/unreasonable noise (yelling, kids screaming, or any other unreasonably loud or commotion-causing activities) Also, after 10pm you must take your conversations indoors as the city has a noise free time after 10pm until 10am the next morning. If you have questions about this, we are happy to discuss to ensure you have a great stay!

If you intend to make excessive noise outdoors, especially after 10pm, this is not the right house for you. We reserve the right to charge you a $750 administrative fee if you are in fact cited directly by the City of Palm Springs (this is on top of the citation you may receive and will need to pay for by the City of Palm Springs). We LOVE our guests but the rules are strict; we are just following them as responsible owners. 

Check-In time is no earlier than 4:00 pm on the day of your scheduled arrival. Check-Out time is no later than 11 am on the day your scheduled departure. Sometimes an early check in (11am instead of 3pm) and/or a late check out (3pm instead of 11am) is available for an additional fee.

This is a non-smoking property. No smoking or burning of candles or incense in the house or in the garage or anywhere on property. 

The Primary Renter has to be 25 years old or greater.

Commercial filming and photography of any kind is not allowed unless given permission by the owner (additional fees apply). 

We are not responsible for any personal items left behind, lost or stolen.

Please be aware that there are exterior security cameras at the property. They run 24/7 but are not monitored unless an issue arises. There is one at front door, garage, side gate and backyard. They are also recorded over in regular intervals after each guest stay. Please do not tamper with devices. Address concerns with host. 
   
Liability Waiver:

OWNERS & MANAGERS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO RENTER, RENTER’S GUESTS, LICENSEES OR INVITEES OR ANY OTHER PERSON FOR ANY INJURY, LOSS OR DAMAGE TO ANY PERSON OR PROPERTY, INCLUDING THEFT, ON OR ABOUT THE PREMISES. RENTER SHALL HOLD OWNER AND MANAGERS HARMLESS AND INDEMNIFIED FROM AND AGAINST ALL LOSS, INJURY OR DAMAGE OCCASIONED BY THE USE OR MISUSE OR ABUSE OF ANY PART OF THE PREMISES INCLUDING THE SWIMMING POOL AND SPA. KEEP CHILDREN AWAY FROM SPA AND POOL UNLESS THERE IS CONSTANT ADULT SUPERVISION. RENTER AGREES NOT TO HOLD OWNER’SS LIABLE OR RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY INJURIES, ACCIDENTS OR ANY OTHER DAMAGES AS RESULT OF POOL USE AND FROM OR AGAINST ANY OMISSION, NEGLECT, OR DEFAULT OF RENTER, RENTER’S GUESTS, LICENSEES OR INVITEES. 

BY BOOKING THIS PROPERTY YOU AGREE TO ALL OF THE AFOREMENTIONED RULES & THE LIABILITY WAIVER.

name: Beach Apartment near Oceanside Pier
title: Oceanside, California

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about: I live in Salt Lake City, married and have 3 boys.  Love to bike, run, ski, and travel.

recent.comments:
The host was excellent at communicating instructions as well as very responsive and helpful with anything we needed. The condo was clean, super close to the beach with gorgeous views from the balcony! I was pleasantly surprised of the fact that there was even a pack n play and high chair for our one year old toddler. Very thoughtful, something that families with young kids would definitely appreciate. 
Thank you for a wonderful stay!

items.comments:
The host was excellent at communicating instructions as well as very responsive and helpful with anything we needed. The condo was clean, super close to the beach with gorgeous views from the balcony! I was pleasantly surprised of the fact that there was even a pack n play and high chair for our one year old toddler. Very thoughtful, something that families with young kids would definitely appreciate. 
Thank you for a wonderful stay!

This condo had a beautiful view, easy walking access to the beach, the pool, and the harbor. Also close to San Clemente to the north and Carlsbad to the south. Has everything we needed.  Steve was a great host, and communicated well.
Our family had a great stay in Oceanside. The property is beautiful. The pool was good. Nice walk to the beach and we enjoyed walking on the strand to the pier. Thanks!
Another great visit. Thank you!

The condo was clean and cozy, but even better was Steven. He was proactive with information, very timely and friendly communication and offered some great local recommendations. Overall great experience

Steven was an amazing host! We had minor issues that he took care of within hours! The space was clean and very spacious ( it’s bigger than the photos seem to show!) the outdoor patio with the view is HEAVEN! I will suggest bringing a sound machine if you are a light sleeper. People can be pretty loud going up and down the stairs late at night. But the sound machine next to the window drowned all the noise out! We felt safe and really enjoyed our stay. We will be back again soon! I would also recommend to the host to add an additional tower fan, we bought one for our stay as we were a bit warm and it helped tremendously. The two fans may be enough for many but our family runs hot so we can never have too many fans!
Great place, the view was awesome!  You can watch the sun set over the beach while sitting on the patio.

description.summary:
Clean modern Space with a panoramic view of the harbor and beach! NORTH COAST VILLAGE, located in Oceanside, California, this recently fully remodeled beach dream has 1 Bedroom, 1 bath, sleeps 4, full kitchen, gas fireplace and ocean view balcony G unit offers you a beach resort lifestyle. Amenities at North Coast Village include patios and balconies overlooking the ocean, direct beach access, 24-hour security, a heated pool and jacuzzi, exercise gym room, recreation game rooms, putting greens, fitness center, and an outdoor BBQ grill area supplied with beach toys, beach chairs, beach umbrella, boggie boards, etc. The lush tropical grounds with its waterfalls and soothing koi ponds, make this community a serene place to vacation. Only 45 minutes to Disneyland, 30 minutes to Seaworld, and Legoland is only 10 minutes away, no pets & no smoking.

Rental terms:

3 night minimum

June thru August $200 Monday-Thursday and $220 Friday-Sunday

Holidays and special events $200 to $220 

Offer weekly and monthly discounts

cleaning fee $150

fully refundable security deposit $300

no pets allowed

(URL HIDDEN)

You have access to all amenities, pools, barbecues, fitness center and sauna. There is also an event space that can be booked separately. Let us know if you wish to hold an event and we can put you in touch with the management.

Please do not hesitate to reach out for any needs, questions, tips while in town.

The apartment is in a great complex with a relaxed beach resort vibe. The property is located right by the water. There is a community amphitheater nearby that holds summer outdoor movies and concerts.

There are many great restaurants and shops in walking distance. You are close to the train station and bus station.

You are close to everything so feel free to travel light.

Fast Wifi
Cable for Sports and Movies
Apple TV for movies, games and music for when you just want to stay in.
