Tras el mueble del fondo se encuentra la lavadora-secadora  //  The washer-dryer is located behind the bottom unit
Distribuidor
Piscina cubierta en invierno y descubierta en verano
Piscina

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter

hosts.about:
We are Tania and Daniel.

We are an economist and a philologist. We are both from Seville and we love to host people who want explore Seville, its history, art and gastronomy.

In our free time we like to enjoy our children, family, friends, and of course travel to other places
Walking through the streets of Seville and knowing its gastronomy is something that we love, so do not hesitate to ask us about places to go. We want you to enjoy and to know better this wonderful city.

--

Somos Tania y Daniel.

Somos economista y filólogo. Ambos somos de Sevilla y nos encanta hospedar a personas que buscan explorar Sevilla, su historia, arte y gastronomía. 

En nuestro tiempo libre nos gusta disfrutar de nuestros hijos, familia, amigos, y por supuesto, viajar a otros lugares.
Pasear por las calles de Sevilla y conocer a fondo su gastronomía es algo que nos encanta, por eso no dudes en preguntarnos por lugares a los que acudir para conocer mejor esta maravillosa ciudad.

recent.comments: Appartement cosy et moderne facilement accessible par voiture ou à pied depuis le centre historique.  Proche de toutes les commodités et sites touristiques.  Piscine en bonus parfaite en été à Séville.  Les instructions pour accéder à l appartement très claire avec accès autonome ( boîte à clés sécurisé).A recommander

items.comments: Appartement cosy et moderne facilement accessible par voiture ou à pied depuis le centre historique.  Proche de toutes les commodités et sites touristiques.  Piscine en bonus parfaite en été à Séville.  Les instructions pour accéder à l appartement très claire avec accès autonome ( boîte à clés sécurisé).A recommander

The location was great! There are a lot of restaurants and coffee shops close by. It is literally a 8 minute walk to the train station, which was amazing, as we had a number of day trips planned elsewhere. The apartment itself was clean, with shampoo and conditioner as well as body wash provided. They were one of the few Airbnb’s that even provided laundry detergent. They left toys because we had a little one, which we and she appreciated. The bed was very comfortable and the apartment felt like home. The washer worked great, but I ended up taking Daniel’s suggestion of just drying the clothes on the rack, which was very efficient given the heat in Seville. Daniel was proactive and asked if we needed the crib, without us even asking for it. We didn’t because our little one is too scared to sleep anywhere when we travel, but the thought was much appreciated. Overall, this place was amazing value. Also, the internet was Lightning speed :) thank you for having us!
An amazing location in the middle of the city center. Close by all tourist attractions. Very clean apartment. Very friendly hosts. Highly recommended!
For me , IT was what i needed.

Excellente localisation pour visiter les points d'intérêt de la ville ainsi que ses ruelles ombragées.
L'appartement est décoré avec beaucoup de goût, climatisé et très bien équipé, on se sent comme à la maison !
Nos hôtes ont été très bienveillants et les instructions d'entrée et de sortie, très claires. Une place de parking en sous sol, un vrai plus ! Tout était parfait, nous recommandons vivement le logement de Tania et Daniel à Séville.

Fue un GRAN alojamiento!
Muy limpio.
Contaba con todo lo necesario y superó las expectativas.
Estacionamiento excelente.
Dos baños completos.
Atención a los detalles.
Barrio con muchas opciones de restaurantes, un supermercado cruzando la calle; sin embargo, calles muy tranquilas en las que se puede caminar sin problema.
Distancia al Centro de alrededor de 20 minutos caminando, sin mayor problema.
Aire acondicionado que funciona excelente.
En verdad no encontramos algo que no nos agradara.
Los anfitriones amables y con excelente comunicación.
Muy recomendable.

The place and the building its in is extremely clean and the place is very well equipped you don't really need to buy anything to stay here.  Has a ton of space to relax in was definitely more space than my mom and I needed however we're not complaining!  Feels like a home away from home.  If you do end up staying here go to La Filo its a nice little family owned restaurant business it seems.  The food is amazing and a really fair price.

description.summary:
Exclusivo y confortable apartamento de 80m2 en una de las mejores zonas de Sevilla.
Relájate en su espacioso y luminoso salón con vistas de la ciudad. 
Equipado para estancias cortas o largas. Ideal para ocio y teletrabajo.
Piscina climatizada abierta todo el año.
A tan solo un paso de la Sevilla monumental (Catedral, Alcázar, etc)
Bien comunicado. Cercano a la estación de tren y a 15 min. en taxi del aeropuerto.
Parking gratuito para coche grande en el mismo edificio y de fácil acceso.
description.space:
Nuestro apartamento tiene un cuidado diseño, con una decoración vintage muy colorista. Queremos que te sientas como en tu propia casa y disfrutes durante el día de la luminosidad que entra por todas partes, y cuando llegue la noche puedas disfrutar de un ambiente acogedor, gracias a una iluminación cálida en cada estancia.
Tiene grandes ventanas que cuentan con doble acristalamiento (Climalit), que permiten un total aislamiento térmico y acústico.
En la cocina encontrarás todo lo necesario para preparar cualquier tipo de comida, y para los amantes del café dispone de cafetera Nespresso (además de cafetera italiana). Aunque si prefieres tomar una infusión, tenemos un hervidor de agua para que te sea más cómodo.
La habitación principal tiene cama de matrimonio con colchón viscoelástico de 1,50m, armario y baño en suite.
La segunda habitación dispone de 2 camas (cama nido) y armario. 
Si traes un bebé, tenemos para él o ella cuna, trona y cambiador.
La televisión del salón es una Smart TV, y puedes acceder con tu cuenta a todo el contenido de Netflix o  Prime Video
description.notes:
Puedo resolver cualquier duda o incidencia durante vuestra estancia contactando conmigo por la app de AirBNB, mensajería, o teléfono

Se encuentra en el barrio de Puerta Osario, céntrico y muy bien comunicado, provisto de todo tipo de servicios (supermercados, tiendas, bancos, etc). Muy bien conectado por transporte público y con bares y restaurantes cerca.
description.neighborhood: Se encuentra en el barrio de Puerta Osario, céntrico y muy bien comunicado, provisto de todo tipo de servicios (supermercados, tiendas, bancos, etc). Muy bien conectado por transporte público y con bares y restaurantes cerca.
description.transit:
Si viene en coche, puede aparcar cómodamente en nuestra plaza de garaje gratuita. 
Para ir al centro y a los principales monumentos puede ir andando.
Si desea desplazarse a cualquier punto de la ciudad, hay varias líneas de autobuses justo al lado del apartamento.
description.interaction: Puedo resolver cualquier duda o incidencia durante vuestra estancia contactando conmigo por la app de AirBNB, mensajería, o teléfono
description.house_rules:
- Puedes depositar la basura en los contenedores que hay frente al portal del edificio. Por favor, no dejes nunca la basura en la puerta del apartamento. 
- Recuerda apagar las luces, radiadores y aire acondicionado.
- El vecindario es silencioso. Procura no hacer ruido entre las 22h y las 10h.
- No están permitidas las fiestas en el apartamento.
- Si vienes con bebé confirma si necesitas cuna, trona, cambiador
-La utilización de la piscina está sujeta a las normas de uso de la comunidad. No nos hacemos responsables del cierre de la piscina por razones de avería o mantenimiento.
-  No salga mojado por las zonas comunes del edificio al salir de la zona de la piscina
 - Al finalizar la estancia, deja recogido el apartamento. Especialmente la cocina, donde los utensilios deben estar fregados y sin basura.


- When the garbage is full, you can throw the garbage in the containers outside the building. Please, don´t leave the garbage outside the apartment 
- Before leaving home, remember to turn off the lights, electrical appliances that radiate heat and air conditioning. 
- The neighborhood is quiet, please avoid noise between 10pm and 10am. 
- Parties are not allowed
- If you come with a baby, confirm if you need a cot, highchair, changing table
- The use of the pool is subject to the rules of the community, which are mandatory. We are not responsible for the closing of the pool due to breakdown or maintenance.
- Don´t leave wet of the common areas of the building when leaving the pool area.
- At the end of the stay, leave the apartment collected.  Especially the kitchen, where the utensils must be scrubbed and free of garbage.

name: Boutique Apt in Heart of Downtown-FREE Park-Pool
title: Nashville, Tennessee

gallery.caption: Washer & dryer inside unit

hosts.about: Hi! I'm your host, Keri! My husband Jim and I are native Tennesseans and live in Downtown Nashville! We are self-proclaimed foodies, enjoy live music, and love to travel and experience new places! Hit us with all your local questions! Hopefully you enjoy our town as much as we do!

recent.comments: It was a great stay centrally located and easy to get to everything downtown! Keri was so helpful and responsive.

items.comments: It was a great stay centrally located and easy to get to everything downtown! Keri was so helpful and responsive.

Keri & Jim were the ultimate hosts. From the checkin all the way through checkout, things went extremely well. Their AirBnB was fantastic, very cozy and very Nashville!! Keri was very good at checking in with us periodically as well as responding to any requests we had. Will definitely be back when we revisit Nashville!

The place was immaculate and stocked with great coffee options and little things you may have forgotten at home. The host was very responsive, very flexible with our weird flight times, and had a very informative binder with details and local places to check out. The sound machine was amazing, but besides a couple "pedal taverns" passing by, it was a pretty quiet location. Far enough to not hear the noise of Broadway, but close enough to walk. Depending on which part of Broadway you are heading to, it's about a 7-10 minute walk. Ubers were easy to get for further away places like 12 South and Midtown, and the concierge service for checking our baggage before our flight was AMAZING. The bed was AMAZING, so huge and so comfortable. Perfect spot for coming home and taking a nap before the evening festivities. Kitchen was equipped with everything we needed and everything looked exactly like the photos. Girls, there is plenty of room to get ready in the bathroom and a full length mirror! :)
Great communication, great location, clean, chic, all the stuff. Will probably go back again. 👍

Keri’s place is clean, well decorated, and comfortable. You can tell there was a lot of effort and detail put into the room. Most importantly the location is in the heart of Nashville you can walk to a lot and of places. I would absolutely stay again if I’m in the area.
This place was great for a girls trip! Easy walk to broadway, country music hall of fame, and shopping. We will be staying here again when we come back!
Such a lovely stay! A great host as well! Thanks for everything!

description.summary:
Discover an indulgent escape featuring pops of color, chic furnishings, and coffee bar. Guests enjoy access to shared amenities including a BBQ patio, fitness center with climbing wall, lounges, courtyard fire pit, and an outdoor pool. Relax and unwind with beautiful balcony views and a luxurious, comfy king bed at the end of your busy day in downtown Nashville. The spacious living area features a queen memory foam sofa bed, dining table, and fully equipped kitchen. We take pride in deep cleaning and disinfecting our property to help keep our guests safe and healthy!

This well-appointed private apartment includes: 

*Private bedroom, KING bed with very comfortable memory foam mattress
*Queen sleeper sofa with memory foam mattress 
*Twin Aero-Bed
*AT&T U-verse cable
*High-Speed WiFi 
*50 and 60 in. Smart TVs in Bedroom AND Living Room
*Amazon Alexa
*Keurig Coffee maker and coffee
*Full kitchen with stainless appliances, microwave, blender, and toaster
*Washer/Dryer in unit
*Iron/Ironing Board
*Hair Dryer
*Travel soap, shampoo, conditioner

*FREE private parking for one car
*HUGE fitness center with cardio, free weights, yoga and cycling studio, and climbing wall open 24/7
*Outdoor pool and gathering space, with large gas grills
*Sky lounge, great outdoor views of downtown
*The Collective, a beautiful work and social gathering place
*Additional AirBnB building events often include singer/songwriter nights, cooking classes, pop-up bars, and more!

We love Nashville and want to make sure you do too! We are available 24/7 to make sure you enjoy your stay and live just a few blocks away from the apartment if a need arises! The Latch App (keyless entry) allows you 24/7 access to our private/secure apartment building and private gated parking. Looking for things to do - just ask! We have tons of recommendations for food, fun, and sightseeing!

The property is right in the heart of downtown Nashville. Walk just 1-2 blocks to Broadway, Bridgestone, or Music City Center. Scooter to The Gulch, Ride share (Uber, Lyft) anywhere in downtown.

Great location to walk everywhere! Uber, Lyft, and scooters are a great way to enjoy the Nashville scene, as well. This location is just 8 minutes from the airport and convenient to downtown commercial businesses if you're traveling on business!

description.house_rules:
HAVE FUN! Anything less than 5 stars is not acceptable on our part! If at any point during your stay you feel anything less than comfy, relaxed, and right at home – let us know! We are here to make your stay enjoyable and want you to love Music City just as much as we do! We can provide a list of our favorite things to do, in case you need ideas! Call or text us anytime during your stay if a need arises. Remember many people here are residents, so make sure to respect that they are sharing their home with you, as well.

Quiet Hours: 		10:00 PM – 8:00 AM

Smart Home:	This unit is considered a “smart home” and utilizes the Latch smartphone app for building access, Nest thermostat (eco-friendly), Amazon Alexa, and smart TVs, so guest should be comfortable with these amenities.  

Building Access:	The Latch App invitation is provided to the booking guest in a separate email prior to check-in. This free app for iPhones and Androids contains built-in codes to allow access to the building after hours, your unit, elevators, parking garage walk-thru gates, and all common areas throughout Burnham. Each guest needing access must provide host with email address for access prior to check-in. Smartphone access.

The Latch App also contains keypad “codes.” These codes are unique to you to enter the building and access your unit immediately upon arrival. You may access these inside your Latch app and other guests may use the number codes as a third option for entry. Each entry point/elevator/unit has a unique code. 

Upon exit from your unit, just close the door and touch the keypad with your finger. You will hear it lock. 

Parking: You may only park in your designated space – any other spots will result in booting/towing. Designated parking is for our guests only and is limited to 1 car per unit. Booting is STRICTLY enforced in the parking garage. Hosts are not responsible for any valuables left in car, booting/towing charges, etc. You MUST display the Burnham Resident Tag (blue) with parking space number inside the garage. You will also use a garage remote key fob to open the gate (provided at check-in). Additional paid public parking is located inside the garage (not in gated area) and is first come, first served. Other paid parking is also close-by. 

Replacement Parking Tag:	$150	Replacement Garage FOB:	$150

Laundry:	Please utilize the black washcloths and/or towels for makeup removal, spray tan, or small spills. If linens are permanently stained (makeup, spray tan, etc.), you will incur replacement fees. Upon checkout, please place all bath/kitchen towels in bathtub. Do not place used/unused linens or pillows back into closets or drawers. Bed linens may stay on beds. 

Smoking:	Smoking and/or vaping of any kind is STRICTLY prohibited anywhere on the property, including your unit, balcony, pool/courtyard, etc. Smoking must be a minimum of 15 feet away from the exterior of the building on the street. Evidence or complaints of smoking will result in a minimum $500 fine and could result in eviction. Additionally, any evidence of smoking inside this unit will result in additional fines to rid the odor.

Pets:	Pets are STRICTLY prohibited for Airbnb guests and will result in fines and immediate eviction. Additionally, any damages, odor, etc. inside this unit will result in additional fines.

Trash:	Trash chute is located on the same floor across from unit 555. Please dispose of all trash (including bathroom) prior to checkout. Loose bags or other items/cans may not be left in hallway.

Dishwasher:	Please load all dishes in dishwasher and start before checking out.

Common Areas:	Unless a private event is posted, common areas are open and available for guests. Some may require entry using the Latch App. If events are posted that you would like to attend (i.e. pop-up bars, cooking classes, fitness classes, etc.), just let us know promptly, so we can add you to the guest list.

Pool:	Only guests included in your reservation will be permitted into the pool area and they must be listed on your original reservation by name for access. Glass is STRICTLY prohibited in the entire courtyard and pool area and will result in banning from the pool and fines. Lifeguard not on duty. Swim at your own risk.

Additional Guests:	Additional guests may not be in unit without consent of host.

Check-out:		
1. Leave parking pass and garage fob on kitchen island
2. Check for left items in drawers, bed, etc.
3. Load dishwasher
4. LOGOUT of your account on Smart TV apps, such as Netflix, Amazon, etc.
5. Dispose of trash
6. Lock door

name: Luxury villa with views of Famara (130 m²)
title: Haría Lanzarote, Spain

hosts.about:
Born and raised on Lanzarote and have been managing rental properties on the island since the 70s. 

I have traveled extensively because of work and still regard Lanzarote as one of the most beautiful and inspiring places I have had the pleasure of visiting. Spend a day in the Timanfaya National Park and I guarantee you'll understand what I mean.

recent.comments: A great peaceful place next to the Volcano of La Corona

items.comments: A great peaceful place next to the Volcano of La Corona

This place is a paradise surrounded by amazing landscapes. Gerardo is a super super host, everything is carefully tended. The dehor is one of the best parts of the house and could be the perfect place to get away from work or to have a place where to work remotely. (Fibra wifi 450 - 140 Mbps)
Pool, Gym, Barbecue ... and it's nearest to a lot of amazing locations... but in the same time is Isolated enough to have all the necessary tranquility. We'll come back surely
It was a pleasure to stay at Gerardo's villa again. Beautiful place and fantastic memories.

Magnifique Finca. Un havre de paix face au volcan La Corona. L’appartement était parfait, ainsi que la literie et les services proposés ! Wanda et Ricardo ont été adorables avec nous. Gerardo a été réactif dans nos demandes. Nous y avons passé un super séjour. Si je devais soulever un point : ne vous fiez pas au point GPS indiqué sur l’application mais référez vous aux instructions écrites dans la description du logement ! Merci à Gerardo.

The villa is located at the foot of a volcano, in a very peaceful location, away from any touristy areas, near the small quaint village of Ye. It is perfectly located just down the road from the famous Mirador with stunning views of the water and cliffs. It's also very close to another overlook with amazing sunsets and a trail that you can hike down to a secluded sandy beach (it's a commitment, however, to hike back up! but worth it). You definitely need a car (or a bike) to get around as there are no supermarkets, etc nearby. The villa itself is nice, tastefully decorated, with a well stocked kitchen. We had a bit of a problem finding it at first as we arrived after dark but the host was kind enough to leave the key and we were able to get in without a problem. The only issue we had was a bit of a musty/sewage smell in the bathroom and back hallway but the host was very responsive and came the next morning to address it. Unfortunately it was tool chilly to enjoy the pool :(

We had a wonderful stay at Gerardo's amazing place ! The location is stunning, having you breakfast with such a view over the Corona volcano is priceless. We loved the quietness after visiting other parts of Lanzarote and really enjoyed being able to walk to the Mirador del Rio from the property. Muchas gracias for this stay and all the equipments and attentions provided for us and our baby ! 🙂

Stunning location with excellent views over volcano, well looked after by kind garden and cleaning staff. Spotless, beautifully decorated, large and comfortable house, veranda, pool and grounds.  The home had everything you could think of needing... from a sieve, to a BBQ fire lighter to a laundry basket.  All in a quiet corner of Lanzarote within an easy drive to most activities in north of the Island.  Thanks Gerardo

description.summary:
This beautiful rural-style luxury villa of 130 mt 2 is located in Finca La Corona, at the foot of the Volcán de La Corona, in a privileged natural enclave with unbeatable views of the volcano and Famara beach, at night you can enjoy a impressive starry sky.

Our location is ideal for hiking, just 5 min. walking you will find the beginning of one of the most iconic hiking routes in Lanzarote: "El camino de los Gracioseros"
description.space:
The bathroom has two sinks and a shower, the kitchen is fully equipped, and the living-dining room has large panoramic windows offering superb views of the La Corona Volcano and Famara Cliff which can be enjoyed from the comfort of the cosy armchairs inside or the sunloungers outside.
 Outside, the villa has a private outdoor terrace with garden, sunloungers and barbecue area.
Upon arrival guests will find a complimentary welcome basket filled with all the goodies you need for your first breakfast.
description.access: Guests will have access to all the shared amenities of the estate, at no additional cost, including a heated pool, ping-pong table, gym, ball courts, barbecue area, and garden.
description.notes:
Although there are some buses that go through Haria, we recommend renting a car for your stay on the island.

We are very close to Famara beach, Cueva de los Verdes, Jameos de Agua, Jardin de Cactus, Mirador del Río, Mirador de Malpaso, the Haria craft market, the Casa de Cesar Manrique and Villa de Teguise.
description.neighborhood: It is a calm and quiet area
description.transit: Although there are some buses that pass near the Finca, we recommend renting a car for your stay on the island.
description.interaction:
We will receive you if you arrive between 8:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m., if you arrive outside of these hours we will leave the key outside the house.

If you have any questions before arriving in Lanzarote or during your stay, do not hesitate to contact us.

name: New Riverfront Condo With Balcony in the City's Heart
title: Chattanooga, Tennessee

hosts.about: HELLO!  Welcome to Chattanooga Short Term Vacation Rentals!  I am Ashley & I love this amazing city.  I am a REALTOR with Real Estate Partners Chattanooga in the Greater Chattanooga Area serving not only downtown but all surrounding areas!  I am also a property manager, with the help of Justin & Alan, for both short term (furnished and unfurnished!) as well as long term rentals.  I stay busy and love every minute of it.  In my free time... I enjoy traveling and playing with my sweet Lab, Elby... I love animals and am thankful Chattanooga is so pet friendly so I can enjoy them just about anywhere.  Let us know how we can help you!  One of us is always available to help make you trip or business travel a successful one.  Contact us for long term options and rates if you are needing something for an extended period of time. If you are needing help with Real Estate - just let me know! I’ll be your personal guide whether it be your dream home or your next business venture! WELCOME TO CHATTANOOGA!

recent.comments: We loved our time here! It was super easy to access, very clean, and was so close to everything. I’d absolutely stay here again and highly recommend!

items.comments: We loved our time here! It was super easy to access, very clean, and was so close to everything. I’d absolutely stay here again and highly recommend!
Exactly as described. Host very responsive when issue with parking presented.  Home was exactly how described and was a wonderful place.

Great place for visiting Chattanooga.  The walk to downtown was fine but could be long for little kids (15 mins). Easy peasy for older kids and adults.   Quick drive to many attractions.    Place was clean and had everything you need for meals at home if you want to stay in.  As in the description the place is along a busy road so there was a road noise but they had a noise machine which I think helped. It was not any different than being at a hotel on a busy road.  Pool was great! We would stay here again.
Just as advertised and pictured. Great location close enough to downtown. Would definitely stay again!
great stay! clean apartment and great location

While there is a bit of road noise , the condo was very nice. Also one of the few places I’ve stayed that actually had ice in the ice maker which is always a plus . Overall a great place . Host were very helpful and friendly.

This was a great experience for us.  The condo was spotless and convenient.  We weren’t bothered by street noise at all but we appreciated the thoughtful note about ear plugs and the white noise machine.  The bed was soft and comfy.  Kitchen was AWESOME.  We might suggest bringing your own creamer but literally everything else was there.  The place is a short drive from lookout mountain and an even shorter driver from all the events downtown, but our favorite thing was walking to the river and along the river walk.  Parkway poorhouse across the street has great sandwiches and Scottie’s on the over right down the road is excellent overall.  We had a blast and hope to come back again.  Thanks so much!

PS- thanks especially for having beach towels for the pool!!!

description.summary:
Slumber soundly in a bedroom with Egyptian cotton sheets and room-darkening curtains. Start the day with a workout in the gym and a cooling dip in the pool, then head back for Keurig coffee and breakfast in the kitchen while viewing the 55" Roku TV.

This condo is well equipped with everything you need to stay for a night or a 6 month stay! You have a fully stocked kitchen with all the necessities, a comfortable bed, plush bedding and towels, and a stocked bathroom with all the toiletries. Shampoo, Conditioner, Body Wash, Q Tips, Cotton Balls, Hairdryer, etc is all provided. A large HE washer & dryer are provided as well as a starter pack of laundry detergent, etc. A large Smart Flat Screen TV in the livingroom. This unit is on the 2nd floor and it has a balcony from the living room that overlooks Riverfront Parkway & Parkway Pourhouse.

The guests will have full access to the entire condo including the furnished washer & dryer. They will also have access to the gym , pool and clubroom in the community.

We are available via phone or text or even email during your stay! If you prefer we meet you when you check in, we will happily accommodate but for the most part, we leave you be to enjoy your stay privately!

Take an easy 10-minute walk to the TN Aquarium, IMAX Theater and Children's Museum. Lots of restaurants are nearby as well,  with Parkway Pourhouse and Scottie's on the River directly across the street. Catch classic events at nearby Ross's Landing.

This condo has 1 dedicated parking space in the lot and then free parking on the street. This area is a short walk to the heart of downtown, easy access on and off the freeway, and plenty of Uber & Lyft drivers just minutes away.

Potential for noise - This is a condo located downtown. Although it is minimal, there is potential for noise from cars on the street below as well as the unit above you.

description.house_rules: - Quiet Hours 10 PM - 8 AM

name: Riverfront Condo near the Heart of Downtown Nashville
title: Nashville, Tennessee

gallery.caption: Wall decor features black and white candid shots of some of the greatest influencers in music history.
Bedroom has beautiful rustic pendant lights, repurposed wine crates as night stands, and a stunning headboard hand crafted from old pallets.
Frame features a concert poster from some of the wonderful talent that comes through Nashville!

hosts.about: We began our journey with Airbnb in 2014 as guests and absolutely fell in love with the concept. We have always dreamed of being able to host our own place and are now happy to finally be able to do that. We are both long time Nashville residents and are happy to call this place home. Traveling is one of our great passions and we hope to be able to facilitate a glimpse into our way of life as so many others have done for us in our own travels. We also love kayaking and exploring outdoors. Being near water is something we can’t live without for very long which is what drew us to our beautiful condos on the river. Music and art are also great passions as we both play instruments and write music and poetry. As hosts we will do everything in our power to make sure your stay is as enjoyable as possible, so feel free to contact us with any questions you may have. We would love to have you as our guests!

recent.comments: The place was quite and clean. The Ubers were quick. But everyday, there was one or more rad closure due to construction activity causing inconvenience. Over all a great stay.

items.comments: The place was quite and clean. The Ubers were quick. But everyday, there was one or more rad closure due to construction activity causing inconvenience. Over all a great stay.
Nice location with a variety of nearby restaurants and a straight shot to down town.
Clean and convenient condo.
Fantastic location! The river is wonderful to watch the boats, wildlife, river boat cruises,and even a fireworks show! Beds are comfortable and condo itself very functional and cozy.
Great stay in a wonderful location! We’d definitely recommend. Host was attentive and very responsive.

We had a great stay here. The unit is as described and very clean. Parking was a huge plus. The location was peaceful and walkable. Kids enjoyed watching woodchucks below from the balcony. The unit had everything we needed. Works perfectly for a family with 2 separate sleeping areas. Highly recommended and we would stay again.
Very clean and a great location.

description.summary:
Beautiful river views, and very close to downtown. It has a great open kitchen and living room. This condo sleeps up to seven people, offering three different options including a Queen size bed in the first bedroom, one bunk bed with a full size bed on bottom, and a twin size bed on top in the second bedroom, and one queen size air mattress that can be used in the living room.  Complimentary teas, coffee, and muffins are provided. Whether relaxing by the pool, or sipping wine on the balcony over looking the beautiful Cumberland River, or enjoying the proximity to all the attractions of our wonderful city, we are happy to help facilitate the right environment to make your stay in our hometown unforgettable!

Full access to condo, laundry facility, gym, fire pit and grill area, as well as pool. Pool is open memorial day-labor day.

We're only a phone call away.  Any questions or issues - just give us a ring, text, or message on airbnb.

The condo is in a scenic, friendly neighborhood that's only a 20-minute walk downtown. It’s 2 blocks from the Sounds Stadium and very close to the Nissan Stadium, Germantown, and Broadway. The beautiful Greenway runs along the Cumberland River.

Only a 15 to 20 minute walk to the excitement of downtown, or a 5 minute cab ride (Uber/Lyft only $5). We also offer a promo code, if you're new signing up for Uber, to get your first ride free!

**Parking** If you've brought your own vehicle to get around with we are happy to let you know that we have plenty of parking available. There is no parking pass, specific parking spot, or code you'll need to park, just pull into the complex and park wherever you'd like. The parking is also in a covered parking deck, so your car will be spared from the weather.

This condo sleeps up to seven people, offering three different options including a Queen size bed in the first bedroom, one bunk bed with a full size bed on bottom, and a twin size bed on top in the second bedroom, and one queen size air mattress that can be used in the living room.  Complimentary teas, coffee, and muffins are provided. Whether relaxing by the pool, or sipping wine on the balcony over looking the beautiful Cumberland River, or enjoying the proximity to all the attractions of our wonderful city, we are happy to help facilitate the right environment to make your stay in our hometown unforgettable!

The parking is also in a covered parking deck, so your car will be spared from the weather.
description.interaction: We're only a phone call away.  Any questions or issues - just give us a ring, text, or message on airbnb.
description.house_rules:
We want for you to have an incredible time, but there are a few rules we would be especially thankful to you for following:

Keep in mind that this is a residential community.  This unit is also on the third floor, which means the downstairs neighbors can hear every move.  So please be considerate and keep the noise level to a minimum. Quiet hours are from 10 pm to 8 am.

If you'd like to spend time outside at night try to keep it on the balcony and away from the parking area. The sounds carry a bit louder in the parking area, and many bedroom windows are facing this direction. We want to be considerate and make sure we don't disrupt anyone's sleep.

If you're going to be leaving the condo for a while we would appreciate it if you could turn off all lights, and keep the air around 75 or degrees or higher in the summer, and 70 degrees or lower in the winter. Electricity bills can add up very quickly. 

No smoking inside the condo- A $300 fine will be charged if condo is smoked in. However, you can smoke on the back porch. There will be a designated jar for your cigarette butts out there as well. 

No glass or smoking in the pool area- can get a pretty steep fine for that 


Do have fun and enjoy all the great things Nashville and this complex have to offer!

name: See Sangre de Cristo Mountains From a Cozy Condo Patio
title: Santa Fe, New Mexico

all.name: No stairs or steps to enter
No stairs or steps to enter
No stairs or steps to enter
No stairs or steps to enter

recent.comments: We love this place so much! The views are spectacular and the unit has everything you could possibly want for your stay.

items.comments: We love this place so much! The views are spectacular and the unit has everything you could possibly want for your stay.

We felt right at home.  The home was well stocked with cooking supplies, hiking guide books, toiletries and linens.  There are lovely views out the living room windows.  A short walk outside provides unparalleled views of sunsets.  The walk to the Plaza, restaurants and shops is less than 10 minutes.  Georgia, the host, is very responsive.

A very cute place in a fantastic location. Outside the window you see beautiful hills and mountains, but it is nevertheless a short walk to everything in town. A short drive to hikes in the mountains.

I believe Georgia was the best Host we have ever had.  She was extremely helpful and responsive.  Her condo is beautiful, comfortable and in a great location.  We saw sooooo many beautiful sunsets while we were there.  Parking was close and easy. Perfect place for a couple with occasional visitors.  Our month stay in Santa Fe was magical.

Location is good and the unit is comfortable with necessary appliances. The two bedrooms and two baths was a big plus. It's a bit dark even when all lights are on. If you want natural light you're fully exposed to the street and parking area as blinds are opaque allowing no light. The internet connection was not working most of the time. Perhaps it was me, but I couldn't find a trash can in the kitchen and couldn't get the tv in the bedroom working. Georgia and the contact once you arrive were very responsive and helpful.
Wonderful place to stay for a Santa Fe and surrounding area. Very convenient!  Comfortable! Clean! And quiet.
It seemed like the condo was $199 a night until we added all the extras (cleaning, fees, etc.), then it was more than $300 a night.

description.summary: Add logs to a wood-burning kiva stove in the living room and curl up on a well-upholstered couch. The Santa Fe vibe is enhanced by exposed timber ceilings and terracotta floors along with artwork and wall hangings that reflect the local culture.
description.space: The condo features an outdoor patio in front of condo, which has a table and 4 chairs. An inside pool and spa are available on the premises. The condo is approximately 1000 sq. ft. and has off-street parking adjacent to the condo. High speed internet, DVD and stereo system accompanies the condo.
description.access: An inside pool and spa is available in the Fort Marcy  club house. Hours are from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m.
description.notes: No pets allowed by HOA.
description.neighborhood: The condo is 4 blocks from the Plaza. Historic Fort Marcy State Park, where the Cross of the Martyrs is located, is right across the street. There are walking trails in the park, and it's is a gathering spot to watch sunsets and see city lights.
description.transit: The Santa Fe downtown plaza area and  the arts district of Canyon Road are within walking distance of the condo. The return walk to the condo will include a fairly vigorous walk up hill. - It is best to take the state park stairs and walking path that provides a zigzag trail to somewhat mitigate the climb.
description.interaction: The address of Fort Marcy Condominium Compound is 320 Artist Road, which can be a little confusing as the best way to reach the condo (Unit 55) is to use the Paseo de Peralta, turn north on Otero, then right on Kearny Road. Kearny Road is a steep hill going east, northeast, once on top of the hill, parking lot B is on your left and the condo is the first unit adjacent to the parking lot that faces northeast viewing the mountains.
description.house_rules: No pets or outdoor grilling are allowed by HOA .  There will be a $150 exit cleaning fee for every guest stay.

name: Contemporary Cottage - An Oasis with a Private Heated Pool.
title: Los Angeles, California

gallery.caption: The pool area is completely private for our guests with the option to have the pool heated for an additional fee of $50 a day.
Next to the pool is a Grill and outdoor table for 6.
The Cottage is tucked behind the pool area and fenced and gated for safety!
Your living room also looks out onto your pool.
Fully equipped kitchen
Kitchen
Plenty of storage and closet space. A TV in the bedroom and living room.
...or savor the omelet you just made in your fully-equipped kitchen.
Have a cup of tea...
Dine inside, and we'll provide extra chairs if you are 3 or 4.
Living room
Guests tell us that the sleeper sofa is very comfortable, which doesn't surprise us; it has a memory foam mattress.
Living room
Bedroom with a queen size bed.
bathroom with shower
Bathroom
Private Laundry Room

hosts.about:
We were both born and raised in Los Angeles, but we have been fortunate to have traveled all over the world, and we look forward to hosting travelers from near and far.

We met working at Universal Studios Tour may years ago, and we still live only a few minutes away this, one of the most popular tourist attractions in LA.

recent.comments: Michael was very helpful and super friendly. We will definitely be trying to stay with them again next year. Michael was super helpful and gave us some great ideas of some places to go check out during our stay.

items.comments: Michael was very helpful and super friendly. We will definitely be trying to stay with them again next year. Michael was super helpful and gave us some great ideas of some places to go check out during our stay.

Michael reached out way before our trip started to offer trip advices and info about their cottage. Their cottage is indeed very comfy and private with everything we need. The pool area is beautiful and I wish we had time to spend there-maybe next time. I would recommend this place to everyone and come back the next time we come back to LA. Thanks, Michael:)

Wonderful location and very nice owners. Perfect place for visiting LA. We felt very comfortable and welcomed. The accommodation was located in a safe and secure area. Another highlight was the excellent parking availability.  I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting LA. We definitely come back on our next trip to LA. Thanks to Micheal and Laura for this perfect stay.
Michael was so welcoming. The garden was gorgeous and the place was cozy. We liked the location and the welcome guide Michael provided was invaluable.
My girls and I had the best time at the cottage and hope to return one day soon.

The cottage was extremely clean, private, and close to everything we wanted to do. Me and my wife had an absolutely amazing time and the stay was so much easier because of the host, Michael. Michael worked with us on so many levels to make our trip to Los Angeles magical and easy. We plan to stay here every time we come to LA (provided the spot is available) it really was that good! it's not just that everything was clean; it's the little things you don't expect, like complimentary wine or a personalized greeting board for your stay. Michael & Laura really made this an unforgettable vacation for us. Thank you so much!
Michael is a welcoming and friendly host. The cottage is cozy and the pool is a great size. Would love to come back! Thank you, Michael.

description.summary:
Tucked away in a peaceful setting with lush landscaping is an oasis away from the hustle and bustle of LA. The Contemporary Cottage has the charm of a country cottage on the outside, with a fresh, contemporary design on the inside with a full kitchen. Or, fire up the patio grill and have a barbecue in a shady garden overlooking your private pool. 
OPTION: $50 to heat the pool, plus $50 per day to keep the pool heated during your stay, with a 2-day minimum.
description.space:
Private Guesthouse with separate entrance, and your own washer-dryer!

The Cottage has a living room with high ceilings and a fireplace, as well as a separate full kitchen, bedroom and bathroom.  It is furnished for your comfort, including a high-end sofa bed, a 40” TV in the living room with cable, and an additional TV in the bedroom that both offers "Netflix" and "Pandora".  We also offer free wireless Internet. Plus, there are indoor and outdoor dining areas, with access to a grill.

The Cottage can easily fit four people between the queen bed in the bedroom and the very comfortable full size sofa bed in the living room with a memory foam mattress.

The French doors in the living room open out to a brick patio under the shade of a majestic carrotwood tree, lovely landscaping and a tranquil pool for your enjoyment.
description.access: Unrestricted street parking is always available in front of the house, and you have a private side gate entrance secured by a keyless code lock, as well as the Cottage entrance that also has a keypad.
description.notes: This alluring cottage is tucked away in the back of a historic property built in 1936, and has some Hollywood history attached to it.  The original owners were famous movie stars named Joan Blondell and Dick Powell.  At the height of their career, they bought this Sherman Oaks property (ranchette, at the time), and would drive over the hill to their "country home" that originally included horse stables and a chicken coup.  This special home has had only four owners in over 85 years.  The screenplays for "Who Framed Roger Rabbit" and "Doc Hollywood" were written in the Cottage by the previous owner. The current owners are the Palazzolo Family who has happily lived here in the main house for the past 29 years.
description.neighborhood: The Cottage is in the quiet, residential neighborhood of Sherman Oaks, which is also home to many celebrities. Unrestricted street parking is always available. It's centrally located to all the LA attractions including Universal Studios, Griffith Park, the Observatory, the LA Zoo, and numerous world-class Museums. Wonderful hiking trails are nearby.  Plus, Hollywood is only 15 minutes away. Santa Monica, Venice, and the beaches are about a 45-minute drive.  Disneyland is less than an hour!
description.transit: If you don't have a vehicle, it's a short walk from the Cottage to a high-speed bus that connects to the LA metro system. LAX Airport is about 20 miles away, and you can reach the Cottage via cab, ride-sharing services, or car rental. Since L.A. is so spread out, we do recommend renting a car so you can maximize your time here.
description.interaction: Your hosts, Michael and Laura Palazzolo,  live in the main house, and are happy to help make your visit to Los Angeles very memorable! Laura often travels as a Director for the HGTV series "House Hunters", but Michael will be your main point of contact and is always a call or text away if you need anything!
description.house_rules:
Please respect our rules:
Please note that parents must agree to be with their children at all times on the property, including the pool.
All guests must also sign a release of liability that we will send out via personal email after the booking.
Maximum of 4 guests
No other guests, unless they are approved by the hosts in advance of their arrival.
No Pets, No Smoking, No Parties

name: Visit Local Vineyards from a Luxe Poolside Villa
title: Franschhoek, South Africa

recent.comments: This was our third visit…each time better than the last. We love Izak’s home and cannot imagine staying anywhere else when we are in the area. It is storybook perfect in every way!

items.comments: This was our third visit…each time better than the last. We love Izak’s home and cannot imagine staying anywhere else when we are in the area. It is storybook perfect in every way!

Nous avons passé quelques jours dans la maison d’Izak et ils ont été très agréables. Le quartier est propre et paisible, le jardin rempli d’arbres fruitiers et de lavandes est ravissant, et la maison est jolie et confortable. Nous serons ravis d’y séjourner à nouveau quand ce sera possible ! Les enfants nous le réclament déjà en tout cas !
Amazing stay, Host was very helpful with the stay.  Highly recommended .
Super hus och väldigt trevlig personal

Izak's home was absolutely beautiful! 
A Cape Dutch architectural style home, beautifully decorated and furnished and impeccably clean. It is located in a secure community.
His kitchen was well stocked and appointed and we immediately felt at home enjoying lunch  poolside and dinner inside.  Surrounded by beautiful trees and gardens we were able to relax after a busy few days in Cape Town. It was the perfect choice to enjoy some rest and relaxation while exploring  local vineyards and wandering through the art galleries in Franschhoek.
Izak was responsive with all communication and helpful with any questions.
It would be wonderful to return one day.

What an INCREDIBLE home - our family had the best 2 nights stay at this gorgeous villa. 

We loved having Nathan looking after us too - highly recommend paying for him to do housekeeping whilst you’re there. 

The property is beautiful, perfectly stocked and so well located to anything you wish to access in Franschoek and Stellenbosch. 

Cannot wait to be able to stay here again one day in the future.
It is nice house, secured and conveniently located.

description.summary:
Villa Simondium is in a gated community at the gateway to Franschhoek, Stellenboch and Paarl. Adjacent to the prestigious Solms-Delta wine farm (www.solms-delta.co.za), it is set in an exclusive equestrian estate and has expansive views of the vineyards and Simonsberg and Drakenstein Mountains - a must for food, wine and nature lovers. The mature garden is another real feature of this villa incorporating various indigenous trees and shrubs. Furthermore, there are well maintained communal areas, excellent estate security and equestrain facilities by private arrangement. The security estate is located 15km outside the village of Franschhoek in the heart of the Cape Winelands. Other famous wine estates within 10km radius of the villa is Boschendal (www.boschendal.com), Babylonstoren (www.babylonstoren.com), La Motte (www.la-motte.com) and Tokara (www.tokara.co.za).

Villa Simondium is located in an equestrian estate that lies in the centre of the beautiful Franschhoek and Stellenbosch vineyard region, and adjacent to the prestigious Solms-Delta wine farm.
Das ausgedehnte Wohnhaus lädt zur Erholung ein, während man auf den nahegelegenen ikonischen Weingütern, Boschendal und Babylonstoren, Weinproben und gutes Essen genießen kann, oder am privaten Pool, umringt von einheimischen Eichen und den dramatischen Drakenstein und Simonsberg Bergen, entspannen kann.

name: Retreat Beautifully with the Greatest Rate
title: Playa del Carmen, Mexico

location.address: Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, Mexico

recent.comments: Bed and furniture was very comfortable. Cozy and relaxing.  We enjoy staying in that area of playa. We were thankful to find such a beautiful place to stay.

items.comments: Bed and furniture was very comfortable. Cozy and relaxing.  We enjoy staying in that area of playa. We were thankful to find such a beautiful place to stay.

It was a wonderful stay ! We would easily give it 10/10. Francoise and her partner, Joe, were super responsive and provided great recommendations! The location was superb and close to everything. We would come here again.

Un oasis de verdure et de paix au milieu de l'activité incessante de Playa Del Carmen.
Le patio est charmant et les appartements joliment décorés. On s'y sent rapidement chez soi. La piscine est fraîche ce qui n'est pas négligeable dans la chaleur étouffante de Playa. Joe et Françoise sont hyper accessibles, attentifs à notre bien être et flexibles. La maison est bien située non loin de la plage, et près du centre. Nous recommandons vivement Plantation House!!

My second time staying here and I thoroughly enjoyed it. The hospitality from both Francoise and Jo is the reason I came back. You can’t beat the location or the privacy of this place, it is really special.
We loved our stay and would highly recommend.

Everything was absolutely perfect and Françoise was an excellent host! We felt so taken care of! Our flight was cancelled at the last minute and we had to rebook on a different airline. Françoise was so very quick to respond and help us set up a new airport transfer, and this was on Christmas Eve! The apartment is gorgeous and charming and comfortable, lots of cute little touches. You have everything you need for easy meals and cocktails, and a nice breeze on the porch to relax with your drink. The apartment is close to everything but also feels secluded and private. The apartment has many large windows with shutters to let in the breeze. Françoise and Joe provide beach towels and there are a few chairs in the courtyard, also a little hose to clean all the sand off your feet. The courtyard is lovely and the pool is very refreshing. Don’t miss El Gobernador across the street, their ceviche tostada was the best in town!

Great location! If you’re looking for somewhere quiet amongst the busy 5th avenue, this is a great choice. It’s just a block to the beach and also close to everything in Playa. Also, Joe was very helpful and nice and got to meet him on a few occasions. Definitely recommend.

description.summary:
Hand crafted Caribbean style in the tropics, subtly wrapped in white shuttles.  The effect of living in a place of such uniqueness and care, is all the difference in what makes a great vacation!
You will instantly feel drawn into the Caribbean atmosphere without hesitation.  
The suite features artisan details from local craftsmen. Colored floor tiles were polished to perfection on site. 
The Bamboo poster bed from Veracruz, highlights the bedroom, while white shutter windows surround the suite.
description.space:
The suite has a full kitchen & laundry washer.  Full service kitchen including cooktop, Microwave, Oven, refrigerator/freezer, blender, electric coffee maker, Italian coffee maker and toaster.
The living area has two sofas which convert to single beds if needed for extra guests.   Sleeping up to 4 guests. 

Dinner table for 4 people.

We provide bottle water, free house keeping twice the week, 1 beach towel per guest. 
There is a Laundry closet in your kitchen and a retractable clothe line on the terrace.
Beach chairs are available to borrow.

We have a luggage lift in the residence to help you to get your bags and groceries to your floor.

The beach is just a block away as are the shops and cafes!
description.access:
We are always just a phone call away.  Living nearby, we are happy to stop by to greet you, suggest helpful tips, help with any concerns.  

 TV with free Netflix access.

We provide bottle water, free house keeping twice the week, 1 beach towel per guest. 

There is a Laundry closet in your kitchen and a retractable clothe line on the terrace.
description.notes:
Our trustworthy cleaning ladies are with us since many years. They are taking a great care of your place and will do their best to accommodate you. 
They will visit your suite twice the week. They will refresh your suite, cleaning floors, bathrooms and tidy up.

The residential tree-lined street is set away from the crowds, but also offers several shops and a restaurant in front. Stroll to the beach and the 5th Avenue pedestrianized walkway, each only a block away. The popular Zenzi beach club is close too.

We are in walking distance to most attractions. The larger grocery stores are 5 blocks away. If you want to venture further a taxi around town is just $3 and buses or vans can drop you off at any point along the coast or ruins.
description.neighborhood: The residential tree-lined street is set away from the crowds, but also offers several shops and a restaurant in front. Stroll to the beach and the 5th Avenue pedestrianized walkway, each only a block away. The popular Zenzi beach club is close too.
description.transit: We are in walking distance to most attractions. The larger grocery stores are 5 blocks away. If you want to venture further a taxi around town is just $5 to $8 and buses or vans can drop you off at any point along the coast or ruins.
description.interaction: We are always just a phone call away.  Living nearby, we are happy to stop by to greet you, suggest helpful tips, help with any concerns.
description.house_rules:
Simple rules...  just be mindful of neighbors.
All suites are non smoking indoors. Smoking is permitted only outside on private terrace with doors closed.
The intercom at the front entrance will ring each suite. You can answer and unlock the entrance doors from the telephone receiver found just beside your door.
The Plantation House is very secure. Each door and window has a wooden shutter or glass door that can be maintained closed when you are away or at night. We ask our guest to keep the ocean side shutters slightly closed when they are away in case of sudden rainstorms that can wet their belongings and electronics.
We ask our guest to ensure that the door at the front entrance is completely closed when entering and exiting the property.
Children around the pool, staircase and luggage lift, must be supervised. 

Please inquire on pets. We have some suites open for pets. Others we keep allergy free. There is a small additional fee of  $30 - $50 US per stay for a pet.

name: Luxury Two Bedroom Villa with Mountain View 064622
title: La Quinta, California

hosts.about: Travel Eat Sleep Repeat

recent.comments: We enjoyed our two days at Nikki’s place.   Everything was clean and nice, and relaxing.   We would stay again, for sure!

items.comments: We enjoyed our two days at Nikki’s place.   Everything was clean and nice, and relaxing.   We would stay again, for sure!

We had such a wonderful stay here!! The location within the villas was fantastic - close to a beautiful peaceful pool with great mountain views, and also close to the main pool which was absolute heaven for our son. The unit was clean, beds comfortable, and instructions clear. Keyless entry was very convenient. We would return happily!
Nikki was super helpful, Great with communication, the apt was amazing with plenty of pool options and things to do. Made the weekend so easy and smooth. Didn’t want to leave!
Great location, pristine accommodations and great host!
Great place to stay.  Perfect for a family.
Muy bonito lugar, piscina y jacuzzi deliciosos y muy cómodas las camas y baños impecables!!! Excelente lugar para llegar !!!
Great five day stay. Beautiful complex with a great selection of pools and nice gym.

description.summary:
Legacy Villas is the perfect setting for entertaining family and friends and relaxing in the sun or in the 12 salt pools including 2 lap pools and 11 spas.

** Pools are open - Social Distancing rules are in effect limiting capacity **

Permit # 764622

The property is a two bedroom second floor home enjoying unparalleled north and west direct exposures to the Santa Rosa Mountains.  The expansive corner great room is tastefully furnished and complete with a fireplace and 60" Samsung 4K flatscreen HDTV.  

Interior architectural details include a gracious entry foyer, ten foot ceiling height, exposed beams, as well as vintage Spanish Colonial lighting.  

The kitchen is complete with custom cherry cabinetry, granite countertops, a professional Dacor stainless steel gas range, a Dacor microwave/convection oven as well as a Bosch SilencePlus 44dBA dishwasher.  The windowed dining area is adjacent the kitchen and opens onto the private outdoor terrace. 

The master bedroom features a king sized bed, fireplace, 50" LG flatscreen TV, en-suite master bathroom with soaking tub, and private shower enclosure. 

The second bedroom features a queen sized bed, double closet space and a 42" flat screen TV.

Further amenities include a washer/dryer, private balcony, and free wifi. 

Located steps from the property, the main clubhouse includes three pools with cabanas, two spas, fitness center, hammock garden, outdoor fireplaces, community barbecue, cafe, and meeting rooms. 

Legacy Villas is a private gated community with 24x7 security, located two blocks from the La Quinta Resort and close to restaurants, tennis, golf, shopping and casinos.


MASTER BEDROOM
• King size bed. 
• Wide-screen LG 46" TV
• Large private bathroom with granite countertops, soaking tub, and separate glass shower
• One touch fireplace
• Ceiling Fan

SECOND BEDROOM

• Ceiling Fan

• All kitchenware, barware, glassware, silverware 
• Toaster, Coffee Maker, and Teapot Included

LAUNDRY:

LEGACY VILLAS AMENITIES:

OTHER FEATURES:

hosts.about: I love to Travel to Disney Parks around the world with our family. We travel often and love to stay in Airbnb’s ...

We are a hotelier couple!  We have spent the last 12 years in the hotel business, James was GM of 5 luxury Starwood hotels in the US & Europe, and Tia was Director of Sales & Marketing for 6 hotels. We know what makes for a great stay from all angles, and we look forward to having you as our guests!

description.summary:
Legacy Villas resort, ground-level 3 bedroom, 3-bath villa PERFECTLY LOCATED next to the beautiful blue Paseo fountain and a 90-second walk to the main pool & gym. The owners are hoteliers (including being GM of 5 luxury Starwood hotels) and have outfitted this villa like a LUXURY HOTEL including Frette duvets & rainfall showers! The lawn on 3 sides is a safety zone for families & children. Recently renovated, incl. 3 new TVs with Roku/Netflix/Hulu/Prime. Kids items available for free upon request.

Our villa location can't be beat, and it is one of only two in the complex with grass on 3 sides.  It is next to the long blue Paseo fountain - the most beautiful of all fountains within Legacy Villas.  Our attention to detail and high standards as hoteliers are evident in the villa's cleanliness and maintenance.

We have invested in high-end home automation to make your stay more convenient & comfortable - including an Amazon Alexa in each room for voice-controlled music & more.

One master studio has a luxurious king bed, the second master studio has a luxurious queen bed, and the third bedroom has two queen beds in a bunk bed configuration.  The bunk bed is a high-end, 100% immovable adult bunk with staircase to the top bunk and a high ceiling overhead (please see the pictures).  The bunks have the same luxurious bedding as in the master studios.

The living room TV has a google Chromecast device so you can stream shows from your laptop, tablet, or phone.

Guests will have full access to the villa, including complimentary access to all pools and the on-site fitness center.

We're available via phone or text at any time but won't be around during your stay.

Legacy Villas is a high-class resort offering an amazing 12 heated salt water pools and spas, including a beach-entry pool and splash zone, plus a fitness center. Old Town La Quinta is very close, and there are many nearby retail outlets as well.

There is an on-site restaurant at the main pool (90 second walk from our villa) that is open on Saturdays and Sundays from 10am - 2pm, except during summer months.

description.house_rules:
- Read and follow Community Rules (Provided at security gate on arrival)
- No smoking OR vaping
- Sorry, no pets
- There is a limit of 8 overnight guests w/ total of 4 cars (only 2 cars allowed during music festival weekends).  4 additional daytime guests are allowed between the hours of 7am-10pm. 
-No subleasing without prior written permission
-Guests use the bunk bed at their own risk

- Basically, have fun, but treat our vacation home & community with respect. Thank you!

Parking: You can park on the streets in front of any unmarked curbs.  You can also park in any unmarked/unreserved parking spots in the carports and parking lots. There is no garage parking.  During events and holidays, parking can be limited.  It is suggested that you arrive earlier in the day.

description.summary: Escape to Can Rovira, a magnificent 19th century property set on 3 hectares of land, just 3 km from the beach and 20 km from Barcelona. Enjoy the serene surroundings of the Mediterranean garden, take a dip in the pool, and soak up the Spanish sun. This vacation home offers 7 tastefully decorated bedrooms and ample living space, accommodating up to 14 guests. Come experience tranquility and convenience at its finest.
description.space:
• A bit of history:

In 1863, our family acquired "Mas Monnar", the original house located on the estate. The property was primarily devoted to agricultural activity, particularly the cultivation of grapes and wine production. In its cellars, wines were bottled under the brand "Alella can Rovira" and their red wine won the gold medal at the Universal Exposition in Barcelona in 1888. The property has remained in the family ever since.

• The house:

The house boasts a grand entrance and staircase leading to the first floor, where you'll find a spacious living room, a library that opens out onto the garden, a large dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, three bedrooms, and a bathroom. Moving up to the second floor, you'll find four well-appointed bedrooms, some with sea views, a large living and dining room area and a bathroom. All of our rooms feature carefully designed interiors that aim to preserve the historical value and character of the house.

• The garden and pool:

The property that surrounds the house spans an impressive 7.4 acres (30000m2) and offers an abundance of outdoor amenities. At the back of the house, a spacious terrace and garden awaits, complete with a BBQ and outdoor dining furniture. Additionally, a swimming pool is available for those who want to take a refreshing dip or simply bask in the sun. The pool is furnished with comfortable loungers and sunshades, and towels are provided for guests' convenience.
description.access:
Our guests will have access to a private terrace and its garden, the living-rooms and dining-rooms, the equipped kitchen, all the bedrooms (if necessary), the two bathrooms and a sunny terrace to dry their laundry.
Guests also have the swimming-pool and its private toilet and surrounding garden at their exclusive disposal.
description.notes: We will prepare the number of bedrooms and beds based on the number of guests and their preferences. Precise information regarding this will be requested prior to their stay.
description.neighborhood:
Alella, a picturesque village nestled on the north coast of Barcelona, is a true gem of Catalonia. Just a short 2.5-kilometer jaunt from the Mediterranean Sea, Alella offers a tranquil escape from the hustle of city life, while still being conveniently located for those wishing to explore the nearby city of Barcelona.

This idyllic village is steeped in cultural heritage, with centuries-old buildings and quaint streets that transport visitors back in time. The breathtaking countryside surrounding Alella offers a plethora of outdoor activities, from hiking and cycling to horseback riding and birdwatching.

One of Alella's most famous treasures, however, lies in its vineyards. With a long history of wine production, the village is home to some of the finest wineries in the region, producing award-winning wines that are highly sought after by wine enthusiasts around the world. Visitors can indulge in wine tastings and tours, immersing themselves in the art and science of winemaking.
description.transit:
Renting a car is the most convenient option, as it allows you to easily travel to different places at your own pace. It takes approximately 25 minutes to get 
the city center of Barcelona and 30 minutes to Barcelona El Prat airport. The closest beach is only a 5-minute drive away, while the beautiful beaches of Costa Brava are 45 minutes away.

If you prefer not to drive, public transportation is also readily available. The closest bus stop is located 7 minutes away from the house by foot. 

Bus E19 or 644 is available to take you to Plaça Catalunya in approximately 25 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is a major transportation hub in the city center of Barcelona, with connections to multiple bus and train lines. From there, you can easily access other popular destinations such as the Gothic Quarter, La Rambla, or the famous Sagrada Familia.

If you want to go to El Masnou beach, you can take bus 646 or 690, which only 5 minutes away. From there, you can also take the train to Plaça Catalunya or the airport. The train ride from El Masnou to the city center takes approximately 25-30 minutes, while the journey to the airport takes around 50 minutes.

Complete information about the transportation options and directions will be given to the guests before their stay.
description.interaction:
I am committed to ensuring that your stay is nothing short of perfect. As such, I want to assure you that I will be readily available throughout your visit to attend to any queries or concerns you may have.

Whether you need suggestions on the best local restaurants to dine at, or recommendations for exciting activities to explore in Alella or Barcelona, I am more than happy to share my insights and knowledge with you.

hosts.about: Living is knowing how to choose! And traveling is the best choice in life. I believe that life should be lived without scripts where happiness resides in knowing how to live each moment no matter how insignificant it may seem, because each moment is unique and special. I believe we should live by doing what makes us happy, and that we are artists in life by transforming the ordinary into the extraordinary. I believe that dreams should always be pursued, and that you should love madly starting with yourself. Life is an adventure that you should never stop exploring. I believe that discovering the magic of the extraordinary begins with the simple things and with yourself, by taking time to explore a small shop, discover a new song, try a new recipe or simply lose yourself in a book. I think that retro is current, that design is much more than an aesthetic issue, crafts should be a representation of experiences, and you should always bet on the natural versus the artificial.

recent.comments: Had a wonderful stay in this little studio. Unexpected loud clanky plumbing occasionally at night & not maybe up-kept quite as nicely as I would’ve liked. But overall, great location to town & a quick scooter or bike ride to anywhere we wanted to go especially since the place is on a fairly main road. Having security to help with directions, rentals & just a friendly face was very nice. Chris’s guide also gave a lot of good tips & instructions for visiting which was awesome to have beforehand. The place was cozy, safe & served exactly what we needed for our 5 day trip - we had everything we needed.

Our first evening here we tried to walk to the center which would have been like a 15 min walk and we kept getting dirty looks from the locals so we turned back and got a taxi. Also the first taxi I took told us he didn't accept U.S dollar and we didn't have pesos yet so he offered we pay in debit or credit so I did, the charge was $7 U.S which is like $100 pesos. Well surprise in the morning after our  first night in Tulum , I woke up $525.30 U.S stolen from my account because of the taxi.
Only issues we had with this Airbnb we're the ants in the ac and bathroom and loud sounds from the kitchen  sink.

description.summary: Lie back on pillows to watch sunset over the Tulum jungle through a wide, balconied glass facade. Cool off on a communal rooftop with a Balinese bed and infinity pool. Clean-lined design features natural materials and handmade local furniture. Fast fiber optic Wifi (30 Mbps) for fun and stable remote working. The 2nd floor apartment is located only 5 minutes from the town center and 10 minutes by taxi or bike from the spectacular beaches of the Caribbean.
description.space:
This studio is located in-between Tulum town and the beach, an architectural concept that combines contemporaneous design with local culture. The studio features a very clean design and a wide glass facade with balconies facing the jungle. It offers a lot of fresh air, natural light and incredible sunset views from the bed. The space is equipped and furnished to offer everything you need to spend a comfortable stay in Tulum:

• A comfortable queen size bed and an extra sofa bed, casual dining area for 4 people with fully equipped kitchenette including high-end appliances such as fridge, microwave, coffee maker, all necessary kitchen utensils, clean and modern bathroom, hair dryer, towels for beach and bath, shampoo and shower gels, wardrobe with hangers, iron, fast WIFI, smart TV hooked up to watch Youtube, Netflix and more, A/C, tower washer and dryer (located in a separate public room and shared with a few other condos). Also, the tab water is safe to drink thanks to a special purification treatment (side note: be aware that drinking tap water is safe at this studio, but not elsewhere in Tulum).

• Spectacular shared infinity swimming pool on the roof top terrace with panoramic view. The perfect setting to enjoy the most amazing Tulum sunsets and sunrises. There is a BBQ grill on the common terrace as well which is available to be taken advantage of at any time.

• The 24/7 secured condo building is located in a quiet and safe area surrounded by vast jungle.

• It is only 5 minutes to town with plenty of trendy taco places and restaurants like Burrito Amor, El Camello Jr, Humo, La Hoja Verde, La Bonita, etc, and many cool bars and clubs like Amapola, or Batey Mojito Bar.

• The beach is only 10 minutes away and you can get there by bike, taxi or drive your own (rental) car. Relax at one of the many public beaches like Las Palmas or Paraiso, or hang out and enjoy one of the many beautiful beach clubs like Papaya Playa Project, Coco Tulum, Boa, La Zebra, Casa Malca, Akiin, etc. (check also if there is a full moon party at Papaya Playa Project while you are in Tulum, it's worth it!).

• The Mayan ruins of Tulum are located on the other side of the village about 10 minutes from the condo, a must-do. The tall pyramid of Coba is a little bit further inlands but yet not more than 25 minutes driving from the condo.

• Not to forget, visit at least one of the amazing cenotes (natural water pools) that connect with one of the biggest underground river systems in the world. Visit at least one of them while in Tulum like for example Cenote Cristal and Escondido, Calavera, Gran Cenote, Dos Ojos and Nicte Ha, Casa Maya, etc. Most of the cenotes are just a 10 to 15 minute bike ride away and definitely worth the trip.

The space is a concept inspired by love and art, making it a truly unique and Tulum experience, just the perfect home away from home in this magical destination.
description.access: The studio is 100% private and no one else other than you has access except the cleaning staff (with prior approval from you). You have also access to the property's large common roof top terrace and infinity pool with panoramic view (enjoy the most amazing sunsets in Tulum), lounge chairs and sun beds, balinese bed, showers, BBQ grill, picnic table, washing sink, public bathrooms, as well as a beautiful patio.
description.notes: The studio is made of local high quality finishes (Chukum) and locally handmade furniture combined with state-of-the-art technology appliances, fast and stable fiber optic Wifi (30 Mbps), a smart TV hooked up with major online streaming platforms (no cable TV), microwave and other amenities. The Chukum finish is an ancient Mayan material for walls and floors that allows the space to breathe and to keep the studio fresh and in harmony with nature. If you travel with your little one, I am happy to provide a baby crib for your stay without any cost. By the way, the building is 100% electric (all facilities and installations) so there is absolutely NO GAS or monoxide anywhere at all.
description.neighborhood:
The studio is located on Kukulkan Avenue (the new direct route to the beach), between Colonia La Veleta and Aldea Zama, the best residential areas in Tulum. Only 2 kilometers from the beach, 2 kilometers from the most beautiful Cenotes, and about 500 meters from restaurants and shops.

It is possible to walk to the city center of Tulum (about 10 minutes), go by bicycle (about 5 minutes) or drive. The taxi fare from the ADO bus terminal is approximately $40 pesos.

Great local atmosphere thanks to a great mix of locals, long and short term visitors from all around the world. Close to the city center but far enough to sleep peacefully at night.
description.transit:
The natural way to get around in Tulum is by bicycle. It is a convenient way to get around the city and to the Cenotes and the beach. If you want to rent bikes for your stay, there is a nearby bike rental shop called Kelly Bike Rental Tulum where you can rent for only $100 pesos per day per bike (based on availability).

Taxis are another easy and cheap way to get around and I am happy to provide you with the mobile phone numbers of reliable taxi drivers or help you ordering when needed. The taxi fares vary based on the city sections, but are somewhere between $40 and $240 pesos.

Another option is renting a car. There are all major car rental companies at Cancun Airport as well as in Tulum. My personal recommendation is Hertz but there are many other car rental options available.
description.interaction: My goal is to ensure a flawless and comfortable stay for you. Whatever the motive of your visit is, contact us through Airbnb at any time, my team and I are happy to help with recommendations, inspiration or anything else you need. We are available on Airbnb 24/7 all year round.
