This villa is as beautiful as it looks in pictures. Being in the heart of the city is amazing. Grab food, take a walk explore the city and then get some ice cream next door. I’m from the Dominican Republic and had never had the chance to stay in la Zona as an adult but staying in Casa Pantheon was the perfect place to do so. Staff was great and helpful, i will definitely stay again!
Beautiful home and amazing service

Piero's house is as beautiful as the pictures. Rooms are nice and spacious with strong AC for these warm days. Leslie and Annie were incredibly helpful and made us feel at home. Location is perfect with restaurants, shops and museums all in walking distance. The pizza right in front of the home and the ice cream shop right next to the home is a must! The home is very safe and police officers are stationed right in front of the home. The police officers and the community are amazing. We had a small issue with our son whom is autistic and it was incredible to see how they all came together to help us! This is a rare find in the area. We are Dominican and did a thorough search before booking. We will definitely be going back!

Things to keep in mind:
-Having cash will come in handy as Leslie and Annie will cook breakfast, lunch or dinner at a fee ($35 each meal when we were there)
-If you break a cup, it will cost you $6 which you pay the ladies before their shift change

Pantheon house is beautiful, spacious, safe and close to everything in the Zona Colonial. It is very comfortable and well kept, its where modern luxury met colonial grandeur. The staff is excellent too, Leslie and Annie are great, from making breakfasts or dinners to attending to any request we had. They are always happy to help. Also the transportation provided by Huander was perfect. Always helpful with good recommendations and safety is A+. I traveled there with my family and we had an great time. We do travel a lot in the US, Europe and the Caribbean and stay in homes trough different platforms and own vacation rental properties ourselves and  I have to say that we were really satisfied with Casa Panteon. I can recommend this property and would love to stay here again. 

Gabriel Montero

I have stayed in many Airbnbs in zona colonial, but this was a unique and exceptional gem of a find! From the best location to the size of the house, cleanliness, amenities,friendliness and com. The house is really big and allows comfort for large families and groups. The open air pool area was remarkable and inviting. As great, spectacular and comfortable as the house was there was on factor that made it beyond good to excellent! That was the housekeeper Leslie!! She was very attentive, warm , friendly and accommodating. I’ve stayed in 5 star plus hotels and her attention to service is unparalleled. Thank you Leslie for making our stay from great to excellent! This will be my new home on return visits! Well Done Piero!
The location was amazing you are right in the heat of the zona colonial. The staff were very attentive and helpful. Would definitely come back thank you !

description.summary:
Step back in time in this home first built in 1500 and located in the full heart of Colonial Zone in Santo Domingo, Pedestrian area. The estate, completely renovated in the year 2019, weaves modern luxury into spectacular Spanish colonial architectural elements, showcasing exposed brick, beamed ceiling, archways, courtyard patios, and all other facilities: steam bath, Wi-Fi, 2 smart tv, full Air Cond
Totally Private Access to Pool, Jacuzzi and all the spaces of the House,  Maid  Service Included
description.space:
Casa Pantheon has a refined pool and jacuzzi separeted by an original Colonial Arch, with a suggestive view on Pantheon de la Patria and is equipped with all other modern facilities: Steam Bath, Free WIFI,  2 SmartTV, Air-Conditioning.
Hospitality Manager and Maid Service 7 am-7 pm always Included, Chauffeur/Chef extra on request.


The property is located in the heart of the prestigious colonial district with direct views of the Pantheon de la Patria, one of the most famous monuments in the Dominican Republic.
Just outside Casa Pantheon, in 1 or 2 minutes walk you can reach all the major attractions of Santo Domingo: Pantheon de la Patria, the “Museo de la Dignidad”, the “Museo de las casas Reales”, the Christopher Columbus’s house, Calle el Conde or Plaza de Espana.
Airport "Las Americas"  km. 26
Chauffeur available for transportation from/to Airport
description.notes:
Chauffeur: Huander Rivera VAN 6 seats, available on request, for daily services or just Transfer (Ex Airport Las Americas - Casa Pantheon, special rate for Casa Pantheon's Guests $ 40). 
Other options available on request.

Private Security Service available on request 24/7 US$  100.00 per day, with a notice minimum 3 days.

No worries, no waiting, no stress. The New World has never been so close.
description.neighborhood: The property is located in the heart of the prestigious colonial district with direct views of the Pantheon de la Patria, one of the most famous monuments in the Dominican Republic.
description.transit:
Just outside Casa Pantheon, in 1 or 2 minutes walk you can reach all the major attractions of Santo Domingo: Pantheon de la Patria, the beautiful “Museo de la Dignidad”, the “Museo de las casas Reales”, the Christopher Columbus’s house, Calle el Conde or Plaza de Espana.
Airport "Las Americas"  km. 26
description.interaction:
Evelyn Luna, Casa Pantheon's Hospitality Manager, will wait for you to organize the arrival, the Check-in and to assist all time in anything you need. 
Not just clients, but guests.
Other informations available:
"WordPress Casa Pantheon Luxury Colonial House Santo Domingo"
IG profile: "Pantheon_House"
Personal: pspalaw Miami - Piero Salussolia
description.house_rules:
Lesli and Belkys, Casa Pantheon's housemaids, at your disposal to organize arrival and accomodation in the best way possible.
Our maid stays in a totally PRIVATE area of the house and our Policy provides for the MAXIMUM respect for the Privacy of our guests.

Maid Service 7 Am - 7 Pm always Included.

The maximum number of guests ALLOWED in Casa Pantheon is 10 (4 double rooms + 1 double sofa bed), any additional guest not previously booked in Airbnb $ 35 per person and per day to pay at the entrance (always maximum guests allowed n° 10).
Crib available on request.

BBQ Not Allowed in all the areas of Casa Pantheon.

name: Stylish Home in the Center of Pinheiros
title: Pinheiros, Brazil

hosts.about: My name is Liliane, known as Lili. Last year (2022) I decided to dedicate my time to take care of my apartaments , travel and enjoy my free time. I love to be outdoors, running and travel.

recent.comments: O local é ainda mais bonito que nas fotos. Local impecável, decoração linda, a a Liliane suor gentil em tirar dúvidas. Queria ficar mais uma semana lá haha

items.comments: O local é ainda mais bonito que nas fotos. Local impecável, decoração linda, a a Liliane suor gentil em tirar dúvidas. Queria ficar mais uma semana lá haha

Apto super gostoso, funcional e limpo. Basicamente o que todo mundo precisa quando vai a SP trabalhar ou só passar uns dias. Cama gostosa, bons travesseiros, roupa de cama e toalhas muito boas. 
Bom chuveiro também. 

Não usei nada de cozinha, mas é bem equipada. 

O único ponto é que para quem tem dificuldade de dormir pode ser um pouco barulhento, então recomendo levar tampão de ouvido para os mais sensíveis ;) com as janelas todas fechadas, no entanto, ameniza bastante.
Nossa estadia foi excelente! O apto é exatamente conforme a descrição e a localização é ótima (fácil acesso a bares, e restaurantes) e segura. Liliane é muito gentil e a comunicação fluiu muito bem!
one of my favorite airbnbs in sp
O apto da Liliane é ótimo. Fácil de encontrar, rua tranquila. Cama maravilhosa e roupa de cama limpinha.
Tudo estava perfeitamente limpo, o processo de checkin e checkout super tranquilo, o apartamento é ainda mais bonito e completo pessoalmente. Está muito bem localizado.
Ótima acomodação. Liliane é sensacional e seus imóveis também. O apartamento é muito bem mobiliado, com vista bem bonita.

description.summary:
Lounge in a home that fuses industrial-chic styles with a minimalist aesthetic. Wood floors and fixtures meet exposed brick walls illuminated by designer lighting. Relax on the private balcony and go for a swim in the shared swimming pool.

Sound proof window in the bedroom space.
description.space: Organizei este espaço para pessoas que gostam de uma decoração moderna e prática. O apartamento está novo e o prédio tem uma lavanderia no térreo que pode ser usada sem custo extra.
description.access: O hóspede tem acesso a sala de ginástica, piscina e lavanderia.
description.notes: O apartamento tem 34 m2 e fica ao lado da Faria Lima, podendo incomodar o barulho da avenida para quem não esta acostumado com Sao Paulo ou tem maior sensibilidade.
description.neighborhood: Pinheiros has everything a guest needs in São Paulo. Great restaurants and bars near the apartment such as : ELLA, NOU, BRAS PIZZARIA,EMPORIO ALTO DE PINHEIROS, PIÚ, VINIL HAMBURGUER, PIRAJÁ, LANCHONETE DA CIDADE. Cafeterias: BRIGADEIRO, BOLO A TOA, DAMA, NINA VELOSO, OFNER. Shoppings centers: IGUATEMI, ELDORADO.
description.interaction: Estou sempre disponível por (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), para resolver qualquer dúvida em relação ao apto ou a transporte e alimentação em São Paulo.

name: Escapade viticole dans le Bordelais
title: Gauriaguet, France

recent.comments:
Nous avons passé une excellente semaine ! Le gîte et sa piscine sont excellents, la décoration est top… un vrai plaisir pour les yeux!
Nous avons été très bien accueillis, nous recommandons vivement et reviendrons avec plaisir, merci!

items.comments:
Nous avons passé une excellente semaine ! Le gîte et sa piscine sont excellents, la décoration est top… un vrai plaisir pour les yeux!
Nous avons été très bien accueillis, nous recommandons vivement et reviendrons avec plaisir, merci!

Acceuil chaleureux de Cristel qui nous met tout de juste à l’aise. 
La maison est parfaite, fonctionnelle et propre. (Si vous avez des enfants en bas âge vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés)
Une jolie attention à notre arrivé qui fait toujours plaisir. Cristel et Jean Marc nous ont bien conseillé sur des visites et des restaurants. 
Le plus : la PISCINE nous y sommes allés tous les jours. 
Et le jardin magnifique les filles et notre chienne ont appréciées ce grand espace. 
Nous avons adoré nos vacances. 
Merci pour votre confiance

Incredible stay at this beautiful gite that has everything you want and need. Beautiful home with big garden and we enjoyed the swimming pool too. Jean-Marc and Crystelle were responsive, friendly and perfect hosts! Will be back.
Una casa estupenda con un gran jardín.  Maravilloso parair en familia.

Jean-Marc est une personne très accueillante, son accueil flexible bois à permis d’arriver à l’heure souhaitée. 
Je recommande fortement.

The gite is lovely, characterful and modernised to a very high standard, with a large well maintained garden.  The gite is well equipped and homely and very clean.  The garden was secure for our dog.  The bed and shower were great.  The hosts are warm and welcoming.  Our only regret was that our stay could not, on this occasion, be longer.
très bon accueil dans le Logement de Jean-Marc et Christel, ils ont été très accueillants et le logement est superbe.

description.summary:
Nous avons cherché en rénovant cette bâtisse à marier l'ancien et le moderne et à donner à ce gite un esprit année 1900 date à laquelle il a été construit. L'ensemble de l'électro ménager est neuf.
Le logement est grasse à la construction en pierre, frais en été et plusieurs espaces ombragés dans le parc vous permettent de vous reposer.

Vous avez accès à l'ensemble du gite et du parc. (L'ensemble du gite et du parc est privé), il n'y a que la piscine qui est disponibles que ponctuellement suivant la période et l'occupation de celle-ci. (nous contacter dès votre réservation pour vous assurer des créneaux disponibles de la piscine).

Nous sommes proche du gite, nous pourrons donc vous renseigner durant l'ensemble du séjour. Vous donner quelques bons plans ou vous renseigner sur les lieux à visiter dans la région.

Situé à seulement 35 minutes de Bordeaux, entre Saint-Émilion et Blaye, le gîte bénéficie d'un environnement calme et arboré, propice à la détente. Plusieurs chemins de randonnées passent à quelques centaines de mètres.

Vous êtes à 1 km de la gare de Gauriaguet qui dessert la ville de Bordeaux (30 mn) et de St André de Cubzac (10 mn).

Vous pourrez, suivant les dates de réservation de votre séjour profiter de notre piscine chauffée ou des activités qui y sont proposées . (Aquagym, Aquabike).

name: No Load Shedding and Stunning Harbour Views
title: Cape Town, South Africa

location.address: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa

gallery.caption: The modern, fully equipped kitchen has everything required to cook and serve delicious meals.

hosts.about:
Hey I'm Simon and I moved from London with my South African wife back in 2006 to live in this beautiful city.
I enjoy hiking on the mountain and strolling the beaches with our dogs.  I love the stunning scenery, food, wine and lifestyle that this vibrant city offers and would love to share this with you.
My goal is to make my guests feel they are in their own “home away from home” when staying in my apartment.

recent.comments: Our stay at Simon's beautiful apartment was perfect. He was a brilliant host who was extremely friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean, in a safe and well-kept building with security. We had a great view outside of the living room and beautiful sunrises with a view of the ocean and harbour. I definitely would recommend that you stay here.

items.comments: Our stay at Simon's beautiful apartment was perfect. He was a brilliant host who was extremely friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean, in a safe and well-kept building with security. We had a great view outside of the living room and beautiful sunrises with a view of the ocean and harbour. I definitely would recommend that you stay here.
excellent place and host. 5 star everything.

I had a truly amazing stay and will definitely stay there again if I go back to CT, walking distance from most of your needs! Absolutely beautiful apartment, day and night views, safe and secure :)

Thank you Simon!
awesome,e everything
The location is in the heart of the CBD and close enough to walk to the seaside shops, aquarium, etc.  This is a high rise so the view is expansive.   Highly recommended.
Great stay! Nicely decorated and close to many attractions. Simon always communicated promptly.  Food Lover's  Market on the ground floor for hot meals and snacks was a bonus.

The apartment is pleasantly furnished and centrally located. The large living area was the best part of the apartment, with views of the foreshore. The bedroom is located on the central atrium of the building and loud echoing noise woke us up at all hours. Simon communicated well.

description.summary:
No load shedding area, so the electricity will never go off!

Brew morning espresso and admire sweeping sunrise views of the harbor and mountainous landscape beyond. Prepare breakfast in a modern, well-equipped kitchen. Freshen up in spacious, luxurious bathroom with walk-in shower and soaking tub.  Relax on the comfy leather sofa and enjoy your favorite Netflix series. Drift away in a sumptuous king-size bed with a gentle breeze from the ceiling fan.

Smart TV with sound bar and access to DSTV plus all the main steaming services, including Netflix, Brit Box, Showmax, Apple TV and YouTube.

The apartment has Air Conditioning, super fast uncapped Fibre Wifi and DSTV satellite TV.  A fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso coffee machine.  Bedroom with king size bed, ceiling fan, en-suite bathroom with bath and large walk in shower.  There is a safe in the bedroom.

The living area has sliding doors and a balcony from which you have a stunning view to watch the ships sail in and out of the harbour.  

There is one secure parking bay within the building.

Full access to the large well equipped gym as well as the swimming pool and sun deck.

Conferencing facilities, meeting rooms and daily office space are available upon request.

The MyCiti bus stop is just outside the Icon building.

It will be my pleasure to assist you in anyway I can whilst you stay in our city.  I'm a full time Airbnb host so am always available to help out.

This apartment is perfectly located for exploring the city. It's a gentle 15-minute stroll to the waterfront, and is at the start of the famous Long Street, which is known for its fine restaurants and bars. The tourist buses and local buses stop right outside the building making getting around a breeze.  The Cape Town International Convention Center is but a stone throw away.  For exploring wider a field the location is ideal given the close proximity to the main highways in and out of the city.

The two main highways in and out of the city (N1 and N2) are right on your doorstep should you be exploring further afield.

Fresh milk and water will be in the fridge when you arrive along with a selection of teas and coffee.  You can also expect some other little treats on arrival in the form of fresh flowers, wine or champagne and chocolates or biscuits.

The apartment has Air Conditioning, super fast uncapped Fibre Wifi and DSTV satellite TV.  A fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso coffee machine.  Bedroom with king size bed, ceiling fan, en-suite bathroom with bath and large walk in shower.  There is a safe in the bedroom.

The living area has sliding doors and a balcony from which you have a stunning view to watch the ships sail in and out of the harbour.  

There is one secure parking bay within the building.

name: Apto aconchegante, na Bela Vista, ao lado do shopping e av Paulista
title: São Paulo, Brazil

gallery.caption: Não se preocupe em comprar água mineral: a torneira da pia já vem com filtro.
Com cooktop de duas bocas, forno elétrico, microondas e utensílios, você tem tudo à mão para colocar seus dotes culinários em prática.
A geladeira de duas portas também tem freezer.
Com o liquidificador e a sanduicheira, você prepara uma refeição rápida em minutos.
Depois de caminhar por São Paulo, nada como uma ducha revigorante de alta pressão.
Livros e objetos de decoração deixam o apartamento ainda mais aconchegante.
O cantinho dedicado ao café conta com uma máquina Nespresso.
O apartamento fica em um andar alto, e a varanda envidraçada oferece vista panorâmica.

hosts.about: Sou engenheira, casada e com duas filhas pequenas.  Meu marido é gerente de projetos e curte cozinhar.  Adoramos viajar e conhecer novos lugares.  Somos do interior e do litoral de SP, mas já moramos há um bom tempo em São Paulo e adoramos circular pela cidade.  Esse apartamento nos ajuda a hospedar familiares e amigos e também nos aproxima do maravilhoso centro de São Paulo, av. Paulista, Liberdade e Jardins, bairros que gostamos de explorar a pé e de metrô, sempre que possível.

recent.comments: Ótimo apartamento. Como no anúncio. Já ficamos algumas vezes nele e voltaremos. Aconchegante espaço muito bem aproveitado. Muito próximo do shopping.

items.comments: Ótimo apartamento. Como no anúncio. Já ficamos algumas vezes nele e voltaremos. Aconchegante espaço muito bem aproveitado. Muito próximo do shopping.
Foi ótimo

Estávamos em 3 (mãe e filhas adolescentes) e o espaço da Denise nos atendeu muito bem, com cozinha completa, colchões confortáveis e excelente ducha para banho.  Os armários foram mais que suficientes, faltou só mais um espelho (dentro da porta do armário com os cabideiros ficaria ótimo, por exemplo).
Ótimo apartamento. Muito próximo ao shopping Patio Paulista e à 23 de Maio. Muito limpo, organizado e funcional.
Tudo conforme a descrição, excelente hospedagem.
Estadia perfeita! Tudo muito arrumadinho e acolhedor;  pensado em cada detalhe. ♥️
Apartamento muito confortável e com excelente localização. Adorei!

description.summary: Apto moderno (Studio de 30 m²), planejado e decorado com muito carinho para você se sentir em casa e se apaixonar por SP. A varanda possui uma linda vista para a avenida 23 de Maio (andar alto). Prédio novo com excelente localização que propicia fácil deslocamento.
description.space:
O apartamento foi planejado e decorado com carinho para que ficasse bonito e aconchegante.  Há duas TVs (48'' e 32'') com canais abertos e cabo, além de Internet wi-fi, ar-condicionado quente e frio e espaço em armários.  A cozinha é super equipada, com cooktop, forno elétrico, forno de microondas, máquina lava-louças, filtro, geladeira espaçosa de 2 portas e mesa para 4 pessoas, além de sanduicheira, máquina Nespresso e utensílios de cozinha (louças, copos, talheres, panelas, assadeiras, etc).  O apartamento conta ainda com secador de cabelo e cabides.  Há persianas na varanda e cortina do tipo black-out no interior do apartamento.  A varanda possui uma linda e ampla vista para a avenida 23 de Maio (andar alto).  A maçaneta da porta funciona por meio de senha, dispensando a utilização de chaves.  O prédio é novo e possui uma linda piscina no vigésimo andar.  Você vai se sentir em casa e se apaixonar por São Paulo.

O apto esta em uma das melhores regiões de SP, muito próximo a shoppings, Centro Cultural, Av. Paulista, Casa das Rosas, MASP, Parque Trianon, teatros, restaurantes, hospitais e muito mais. Entre 3 estações de metro facilitando o deslocamento.

Região de fácil acesso tanto por metrô (apartamento próximo a 3 estações de metrô) quando com carro ou taxi (principal acesso pela Avenida 23 de Maio).  Próximo à ciclovia da Av. Paulista.

Em caso de falta de energia, o prédio tem gerador que supri os elevadores, entrada e halls dos apartamentos.
description.access:
Piscina, academia, sauna, lavanderia coletiva terceirizada pay per use, mini mercado.

ATENÇÃO. Piscina ficará fechada para manutenção preventiva no período de 17/07/23 a 07/08/23.

description.house_rules:
- Ao sair do apartamento, fechar as janelas, apagar as luzes e desligar o ar-condicionado
- Respeitar o horário de silêncio do prédio das 22h às 8h
- O lixo deve ser recolhido diariamente e levado até a lixeira localizada no primeiro andar
- Não é permitida a entrada de animais no apartamento
- Não é permitido fumar nas áreas comuns (lei estadual) ou dentro do apartamento
- Check-in das 15h às 20h
- Check-out até as 11h
- Caso precise de horários alternativos de check-in ou check-out, entre em contato (será avaliado caso a caso)
- Enviar documento de identificação com foto após confirmação da reserva
- Menores de idade deverão estar acompanhados de seus pais ou responsáveis legais

name: Gorgeous Cottage near Giraffe & Elephant Centre, Karen
title: Karen Nairobi, Kenya

hosts.about: Outgoing and loves a little fun here and there

Ol Losowan means ‘place of the buffalo in Samburu’ as Julie is a lucky survivor from the buffalo on the wall of the main house. It is the home of Julie Church, (a fourth generation Kenyan, survivor, swimmer, marine and wildlife conservationist, adventurer, and founder of Ocean Sole the Flipflop Recycling company and now Seas4Life Safaris Conservation and Education) who has created a unique and beautiful place to stay in Nairobi by lovingly building two cozy double cottages (each with ensuite bathrooms and small kitchens – perfect for making that essential early morning coffee and private garden)

recent.comments: Such a cutie space and felt very homey! We appreciated the starter pack for breakfast and loved sitting out on the veranda

items.comments: Such a cutie space and felt very homey! We appreciated the starter pack for breakfast and loved sitting out on the veranda
Amazing stay!!!
It was such a lovely and cosy get away!

Overall, this was a nice stay for 1 night. The grounds are very peaceful and it’s in a great location! The staff was very responsive to our questions and let us keep our luggage there long after check out. I appreciated how friendly everyone on the grounds was!
I think the listing description is slightly inaccurate as there was no dryer and given we were there for 1 night it was risky that our clothes would not be ready in time.
Julie's place was awesome! Such a peaceful getaway. A perfect place to relax. We can't wait to come back!
Loved the space! And the pool is very nice. Would love to visit again

My husband and I started our honeymoon here… and we would have loved to stay a few more days before Safari.   Julie’s cottages are wonderful — and the staff were SO lovely!   (Big shout out Janet for the terrific breakfasts and to Fred for his excellent local recommendations and driving!).  

We couldn’t recommend this more if you’re coming to Nairobi and don’t want to stay in a big hotel.

description.summary:
Jump into our outdoor pool and swim next to a thatched gazebo at the far end. Enjoyed by weekenders, safari, and business travelers alike. Quaint and far from the hustle and bustle of the city. The cottage is part of our Seas4life collection - check out our website.

We have so much for you to do both within Ol Losowan (at an extra cost & booked in advance) and in the nearby areas that combine nature, wildlife, culture, adventure, indulgence, and relaxation.

A cozy private charming cottage set in a lush, tranquil environment. 

The cottage has one ensuite bedroom, a kitchen, verandah and walled garden. The 18 metre swimming pool, garden and outdoor pool house area are shared spaces.

Other areas that can be used if discussed include the trampoline, tennis wall and veggie garden.

The main house, Ol Losowan, is in the same property (where Julie and Otto live) and the  Blue Cottage which retains its privacy. 

In walking distance are the Giraffe Centre, Matt Bronze, Boho Restaurant, Langata Link and Hardy Post stores and shops. The Elephant Orphanage, the Karen Blixen Museum, and the Galleria and Hub shopping malls  are within 10 - 25 mins. Wilson Airport and Jomo Kenyatta International Airport are within 25 - 45 mins, and 30 mins - 1 hour respectively.

This charming cottage is set apart by the wilderness where monkeys and warthogs occasionally come to visit, and the garden is filled with butterflies and variety of birds.

The 18 metre swimming pool, garden and outdoor pool house area are shared spaces.

Available to assist any time during your stay - and give me 24 hours notice to respond to anything on email/airbnb.

A charming cottage, in a butterfly filled wild garden, with a shallow 18 m pool, gazebo, fitness area, homely environment and a great location to explore. Activities -Walks, cycles, hikes up the Ngong hills, visit to the Giraffe Center, Nairobi National Park, David Sheldrick Wildlife and Karen shopping outside of Nairobi. A great spot to work from if on a business trip. Easy to get to, and in proximity to Wilson and JKIA Airports. Safaris around Kenya can be arranged through Seas4Life Safari.

Moses - our taxi friend -  will be available to assist for any transfers, please ask for further details.  

There is also good uber service in Nairobi, though it is important to be sure or the address to avoid confusion.

Laundry Services:
We have laundry services for guests who may have laundry needs. Our cleaners will collect them and return them freshly cleaned, ironed and folded at a reasonable cost.
Driver services:
We have a reliable and trustworthy driver who will be happy to pick you up and drop you off at the airport and drive you anywhere else you may need at normal taxi rates.
Chef:
Upon request, we can arrange for Janet, our chef to cook for you on special occasions. 
Safaris:
If you are interested in safaris, I can advise. Seas4Life (www.seas4life.com) offers bespoke marine guided safaris in the Indian Ocean and Red Sea; Bespoke Luxury locations, and can connect you to hotels, dive schools, fishing agents along the East African Coast.,

My family and close friends are  in the Safari industry: The Safari Collection - Giraffe Manor, Sala's Camp, Solio, Sasaab; Safaris Unlimited - Horse back and personally guided safaris in the Masai Mara and elsewhere; Karisia Walking Safaris in Laikipia;  the Elephant Watch Collection; Lake Naivasha resorts including Ajabu House and many more. 

Fitness:
We have contacts for those interested in Yoga, Off road cycling, running, wildfitness, kick-boxing; horse riding and sailing.

Beauty
We can advise regarding manicures, pedicures, hair-cuts and much more.
description.space:
A cozy private charming cottage set in a lush, tranquil environment. 

The cottage has one ensuite bedroom, a kitchen, verandah and walled garden. The 18 metre swimming pool, garden and outdoor pool house area are shared spaces.

Other areas that can be used if discussed include the trampoline, tennis wall and veggie garden.

The main house, Ol Losowan, is in the same property (where Julie and Otto live) and the  Blue Cottage which retains its privacy. 

In walking distance are the Giraffe Centre, Matt Bronze, Boho Restaurant, Langata Link and Hardy Post stores and shops. The Elephant Orphanage, the Karen Blixen Museum, and the Galleria and Hub shopping malls  are within 10 - 25 mins. Wilson Airport and Jomo Kenyatta International Airport are within 25 - 45 mins, and 30 mins - 1 hour respectively.

This charming cottage is set apart by the wilderness where monkeys and warthogs occasionally come to visit, and the garden is filled with butterflies and variety of birds.

There is a day rate charge of USD 45 for one guest, and USD 55 for two guests if you extend you stay and don't check out before 10 am. With this you are welcome to relax at the pool, leave your bags and use the pool bathroom and shower. The house team will also look after you.

name: Soak in Private Heated Pool in Stylish Open Plan Home
title: Phoenix, Arizona

gallery.caption: Completely remodeled!
Completely remodeled!
Completely remodeled!

hosts.about:
Originally from Quebec City, Canada, Sacha was a professional Figure Skater for many years. After travelling the world, Sacha was intrigued by the beautiful warm and sunny Arizona climate. 

Instantly, Sacha decided to make Phoenix/Scottsdale his permanent home and dedicate his passion for gracious living by purchasing and hosting unique and comfortable short term rentals. Currently, Sacha now hosts over 60 short term rentals in the US, Canada, and California. 

His other passion also now includes representing Buyers (including short term rental investors) and Sellers as an award winning and highly sought after Real Estate Agent since 2004 covering the entire Valley of the Sun. 

Sacha’s success in providing exceptional customer service and an enjoyable guest experience includes his AMAZING team consisting of John who handles client/guest relations and Paul our Supply Manager. Additionally, the Team oversees excellent and highly experienced cleaning teams, 2 full time maintenance technicians, home inspectors, and a well-known local designer.

Extraordinary customer service and beautifully decorated homes has earned Sacha over 5,000 valued guest reviews – demonstrating a commitment to excellence in hospitality and providing a variety of homes for guests to enjoy.

We look forward to hosting your stay at any of our homes, and ensure a smooth and seamless experience whether your travels bring you for business, pleasure or that much needed getaway with family and friends.

recent.comments: We ended it up extending out stay to three weeks. The place is lovely. It was not necessarily easy to work there, but otherwise, it was a good home away from home.

items.comments: We ended it up extending out stay to three weeks. The place is lovely. It was not necessarily easy to work there, but otherwise, it was a good home away from home.

gorgeous home and peaceful surroundings... the pool was everything... perfect for the cool evening. when we needed assistance we were able to text and call the manager John easily and got a speedy reply... excellent and friendly customer service... I'd stay again.
Great little gem for anybody looking for unique spot.
An amazing space!  Immaculate and decorated perfectly.
We stayed here last year and came back again. It’s a great place for relaxing and very private.
Perfect stay, had everything we needed there! Pool and the backyard was amazing!
We really enjoyed our stay and best pet was the heated pool throughout our entire stay! My kids absolutely loved it and it was endless entertainment.

There is weekly pool service at the home. Guests are responsible to maintain the pool in between weekly pool service

hosts.about: Architect turned cartoonist.  More than a touch of wanderlust but without my better half I'd be at a loss for the logistics of travel.  Together we now own a wonderful country home in upstate New York and we hope you'll all come visit (not at the same time).

Hey there- I'm Lily! My husband David and I live in NYC and took a leap in 2017 and purchased our dream house in the forest and we love renting it out to our guests. David is a cartoonist, humorist, and stay-at-home dad, and I work in the music industry as a publicist. We live with our two young sons and understand the difficulties of traveling with children, so we try to have everything you'll need to have an easy stay if you're coming with your kiddos. 

We love hiking, watching TV, and being in nature. We don't travel often due to our hectic work schedules, but hope to discover AirBNBs all over the world someday!

recent.comments: Our stay at Lily’s countryside retreat was a refreshing escape from the city. The saltwater pool and fire pit was the highlight of our trip. The bonus was the fenced in yard for our pups. We enjoyed the stunning mountain views and peaceful surroundings. The house itself was filled with thoughtful touches that made our stay comfortable. Lily was an attentive host, always available to ensure we had everything we needed. Thanks, Lily, for a memorable getaway. We’ll be back!

items.comments: Our stay at Lily’s countryside retreat was a refreshing escape from the city. The saltwater pool and fire pit was the highlight of our trip. The bonus was the fenced in yard for our pups. We enjoyed the stunning mountain views and peaceful surroundings. The house itself was filled with thoughtful touches that made our stay comfortable. Lily was an attentive host, always available to ensure we had everything we needed. Thanks, Lily, for a memorable getaway. We’ll be back!
We had a lovely stay in Kerhonksen. The house is beautifully decorated and comfortable. Lily was incredibly responsive to any issues or questions that we had. It was a great week!

The grounds of the property were beautiful. We traveled with our dogs and felt safe with the fully fenced yard. That extra bit of comfort of going out in the pitch black night really helped! The pool was just what we needed for a great weekend decompression.

The house was clean, spacious, and colorful. The pool was clean and fully fenced in. We loved the space overall. There was a power outage for a few hours at the end of our stay, but the host was proactive and checked in on us.

2 cons were the broken fence around the property and inconvenient location. 1) We expected the yard to be fully fenced from the description, but there were parts of the wire fence that need to be fixed, so we weren’t able to let our dogs free without a leash. Bummer bc it was one of the main reasons we booked this house. 2) The location is a bit remote. The closest place to get decent food in the area is the town diner, which is a 15 min drive down a very windy road. The busier areas with more food options are at least 30 min drive away. We researched this ahead of time, but the drive feels much longer on the mountainous/rural roads.

If you’re looking for a more remote getaway, this is great, but we ended up feeling a bit too removed from the fun stuff.
We had an amazing time at Lily’s place!!! A serene house in the woods perfect for a weekend getaway with friends!

We had THE best time at Lily’s place!!! Where do I even start?! The house is so cozy, bright and had everything we needed. So many windows! We loved watching the birds and the deer families walk across the yard. The beds and linens were soft and comfy. There isn’t a lot of places to put your clothes, so if you are an over packer like me, you’ll have to live out of your suitcase, but it was no big deal, just thought it was something to note. I was a little nervous that the window ac units weren’t going to cool the house, but I was so wrong, with the fans going it actually got quite chilly in there. We had great weather and some awesome thunderstorms that we got to watch from bed in the loft, on clear nights you could also see the Big Dipper! The pool and backyard are definitely the star of the show! Our dog loved exploring the fenced in backyard! The landscaping and trees are so beautiful leading down to the pool. We had the best time by the pool, which is huge and sparkling clean!

Lily's comfortable place is in a beautiful, quiet area located not far from Kingston and Woodstock and other quaint little Catskill towns. The weather was iffy when we were there but did not pose a problem because the kitchen was well equipped and the cozy furniture was perfect for hanging out. When the weather was cooperative we enjoyed spending time at the pool which was sparkling clean with very good lounge chairs. I'd recommend doing a little research before you go so that you have a list of places you'd like to visit since cell reception once you leave the property is not reliable. Best to have a screenshot of your itinerary and some printed materials so you don't miss some of the good stuff, especially the walks! 
We did not eat dinner out but did have lunch in Kerhonkson at the Kerhonkson Diner and outside Kingston at Hickory's BBQ. Both very good! 
Best of all,  Lily was incredibly responsive and kind and really cared that we had a great experience in her home.

description.summary:
Look from the luxurious spa tub at the tranquil countryside oasis atop a rolling knoll on the edge of fir-scented forest land. Take a relaxing stroll down the winding driveway, then snuggle up by the fire under grand cathedral ceilings. 

During summer, swim in the amazing salt water pool & enjoy the fire pit under the stars w/ nothing surrounding you but lush landscaping & quiet. 

Enjoy the stunning natural views as the seasons change, the windows showcasing rolling snowy hills or the vibrant colors of autumn leaves climbing the mountains. Family friendly with everything for an easy stay.

You won't believe your eyes when you see the amazing salt water pool with custom designed patio surrounded by indigenous natural rocks and lush, natural landscaping. Mountain views and forest surround you with no sign of neighbors. Fully renovated! French doors frame the open plan great room with huge cathedral ceilings, floor to ceiling windows, cozy pellet burning stove, filled with light and air, and rustic, wide plank floors. 

New country kitchen and dining area with breakfast bar. Two bedrooms  and one bath with jacuzzi tub and newly renovated shower on the main level. Upstairs is the loft King size master bedroom with additional reading nook, overlooking the great room, with fabulous mountains views and adjoining full bath with claw foot tub. Filled with natural sunlight, this country oasis, built by local craftsmen, offers breathtaking Highpoint mountain views where you can relax and enjoy a quiet cup of tea and a gentle breeze. This home is the perfect weekend gateway for a family or group of friends looking for a short city drive and to exchange the city chaos and noise with the tranquility and sounds of Mother Nature.

Guests will have access to the whole property. Guests will also have access to the TV which has cable, HBO, Roku, Netflix and Hulu.

We will be available via phone or text and have a staff nearby to help if you need anything at all.

The house is secluded enough to feel away from it all, but also close to farms and a small general store for provisions. A short drive to breweries, farms, fine dining, and outdoor activities, this house is the perfect getaway for families with children, couples, or active friend groups who love outdoor adventures. Nearby attractions are Mononk, Kelder Farm, Minnewaska, Woodstock, & Phoenecia.

A sprawling 10 acre countryside oasis with a large yard perfect for dogs to run and children to play.

Will need a car. Plenty of parking available on property.

Things we have for families- 
1 Pack and Play
One baby bouncer
Tummy time play mat
Keekaroo Changing Pad
City Mini GT Stroller
Ergo baby carrier 
One booster chair
Bassinet for infants

hosts.about:
Moro em Brasília e adoro viajar, encontrar amigos, fazer novas amizades, boa gastronomia e curtir muito a família.
É sempre um prazer receber amigos na minha casa e é assim que quero que meus hospedes se sintam.  Acompanho pessoalmente todas as reservas e conto com duas ajudantes para para tornar a experiência com o Airbnb simplesmente perfeita.

recent.comments: Cozy and safe place in a great neighborhood/location - walking distance to amazing bakeries (visit Cecilia and Dna Alexandrina bakeries while there), restaurants, metro and shopping. Great working area with reliable wifi. The place was clean and had all amenities needed. Everson is a great host and easy to communicate with. We will certainly go back!

items.comments: Cozy and safe place in a great neighborhood/location - walking distance to amazing bakeries (visit Cecilia and Dna Alexandrina bakeries while there), restaurants, metro and shopping. Great working area with reliable wifi. The place was clean and had all amenities needed. Everson is a great host and easy to communicate with. We will certainly go back!
A simpatia do anfitrião faz toda diferença
O local é sensacional e o Everson é muito prestativo. Pretendo voltar em breve. Muito obrigado
Sensacional!
Correspondeu plenamente as expectativas.
Everything was great. No complaints.

O apartamento é ótimo. Ventilado e arejado. Boa posição solar. Mobiliário e eletrodomésticos muito bons, em excelente estado de conservação. Tem tudo que é preciso para a estadia, longa ou curta. Roupa de cama, banho e amenidades de boa qualidade. Bairro seguro e tranquilo. Ao lado da Vila Mariana, Itaim, av. paulista etc. Os funcionários do condomínio foram gentis e prestativos. No prédio ainda há um mercado básico, self-service. A localização é excelente. Perto de padarias, supermercados, do pq. Ibiraquera, de farmácias e de fácil acesso do/para o aeroporto CGH. Uber muito fácil de pegar é sempre em menos de 5min. Além disso, o anfitrião foi prestativo e gentil todo o tempo. Enfim, por certo será nossa primeira opção quando retornarmos a SP.

description.summary:
O Duplex Paulistano é uma solução completa para se hospedar na capital, com uso inteligente e sofisticado do espaço para acomodar até 4 pessoas.

O apartamento é composto de dois pavimentos, sendo o superior a área privativa para duas pessoas e a inferior a área social que pode ser usada também para acomodar mais dois hóspedes em um sofá cama.

Está locaizado no Bairro Paraíso entre a Avenida Paulista e o Parque do Ibirapuera, e pertinho do aeroporto de Congonhas.
description.space:
No andar inferior temos duas pequenas salas de estar integradas (em desnível) com 2 sofás, sendo um sofá cama, padrão casal com estrutura de molas - super confortável, TV Smart de 43' com programação a cabo completa, Netflix,  Internet WIFI de alta velocidade, Alexa, além de uma varandinha e um lavabo.

Para os "chefs de plantão", a cozinha americana é super bem equipada com geladeira frost free, microondas, cooktop à gás, forno elétrico, coifa, filtro de água, eletroportáteis novos como: sanduicheira, liquidificador, cafeteira digital programável, além de variados utensílios, panelas e louças para atender até 4 pessoas.

Área de serviço com tanque, lavadora & secadora de última geração , varal, tábua, ferro de passar roupa e aspirador de pó portátil.

No andar superior temos um espaço completo, que lhe proporcionará uma excelente experiência em comodidade. Temos uma suite com TV Smart de 43' com TV à cabo, cama tamanho queen com jogo de cama de 400 fios e travesseiros em pluma. Escritório e closet espaçosos com um minibar equipado com cafeteira Nespresso, frigobar, além de banheiro espaçoso com com secador de cabelo, espelho de aumento com luz de led, balança digital e toalhas em algodão egípcio super fofinhas.
description.access: Os hóspedes podem utilizar toda área social disponível no prédio, como acesso à piscina externa, sauna, academia de ginástica e garagem com estacionamento rotativo (manobrista entre 24h e 8h).
description.neighborhood: Localizado no Paraíso, o duplex fica entre a Avenida Paulista e o Parque do Ibirapuera, e a 15 minutos de carro do aeroporto de Congonhas. Confira os restaurantes, lojas e supermercados próximos, ou conheça os bairros vizinhos dos Jardins e Vila Mariana.
description.transit: Estamos bem servidos de transportes públicos.  Temos a estação Metrô Paraíso muito próximo (Linha 1 Azul e Linha 2 Verde), além de várias linhas de ônibus. O apartamento fica bem próximo das principais vias de acesso da cidade como a Av. Paulista, Av. Vergueiro, Av. 23 de Maio com acesso direto e rápido ao aeroporto de Congonhas.

la atención de Robin y su equipo fue muy buena, desde el inicio él se puso en contacto conmigo y las personas que hicieron el check in me dieron muy bien las instrucciones , además de que todo el tiempo estuvieron al pendiente. description.summary:
Chat on a balcony on turquoise Acapulco chairs (with view of the inner courtyard). Gaze at the hills from a heated rooftop spa pool. This sleek, open-concept home with a clean, contemporary aesthetic has access to a shared gym, a 20m infinity pool, a rooftop pool, two heated jacuzzys as well as indoor and outdoor lounging areas. The brand new Pavilion 211 is located on the second floor and offers modern and luxurious amenities.

The condominio includes high quality and luxury features: 
- KING SIZE bed and KING SIZE sofa bed
- 55'' TV with 4K experience and availability of the latest movies and series
- Super fast and free to use WIFI
- Natural wooden dining table for 6 persons
- Beach towels ready to use
- Wash machine and dryer
- Bedroom with own bathroom (incl. shower)
- Air condition and fans in living room and bedroom
- And much more...

The guests have access to a 20m infinity lap pool and a lounge area on the 5th floor. Ths rooftop offers two jaccuzzys, a pool, a gym as well as a lounge and BBQ area.

The apartment is located in the heart of Puerto Vallarta’s vibrant Romantic Zone, a few blocks from the beach. Restaurants, bars, nightlife, and entertainment are all just steps away. This might include certain ambient noises from the bars and clubs at night.

description.summary:
Spectacular Oceanfront, 8th Floor. Hear the surf as you slide open the floor-to-ceiling glass door. The Boardwalk and beautiful safe swimming beach are at the foot of your building. Join the surfers using our wet suits and our beach cruiser bikes for an easy ride along the Ocean and Mission Bay or stroll along for vibrant people watching. Return to your elegantly appointed condo provisioned to meet your every need.

Everything you need is within 8 blocks along the beautiful California coast!
description.space:
The condo is elegantly appointed with travertine floors, granite counter tops, mirrored walls, wood cabinetry and a 65" TV. The best aspect is being directly on the Ocean, viewing the surfers and magnificent beach from the 8th floor. The Boardwalk and one of the best sandy swimming beaches are at the foot of the building, vibrant with walkers & beach-goers. You will find our kitchen well supplied. The dining area cabinetry contains a work space with office supplies and a printer/scanner. In the cabinet on the other side of the dining area is a full size Murphy bed. The bedroom has a king size bed. There is a full size bed in front of the window to the Ocean. Many restaurants and everything you need are within walking distance.

The condominium complex is well organized for your comfort. There is 24 hour security and access to the building is controlled. A reserved parking space is in secure underground garage.
Hot Tub and Pool Hours are 9:00 am to 10:00 pm. Pool & hot tub are closed for repairs April 9 to May 16, 2018.
The community roof top deck has new barbecue grills and is a great place for a view of the coastline and nearby Sea World with downtown San Diego in the background.  Available for your use we have beach chairs, boogie boards, wetsuits, swim fins and beach toys.

If you look to the right from the window you will see the many surfers at Tourmaline beach. To the left is the Pacific Beach pier.  Near the foot of the pier is JRDNs upscale oceanfront restaurant and bar while east from the pier is Garnet Blvd packed with countless bars and restaurants.
description.access:
The condominium complex is well organized for your comfort. There is 24 hour security and access to the building is controlled. A reserved parking space is in secure underground garage.
Hot Tub and Pool Hours are 9:00 am to 10:00 pm. Pool & hot tub are closed for repairs April 9 to May 16, 2018.
The community roof top deck has new barbecue grills and is a great place for a view of the coastline and nearby Sea World with downtown San Diego in the background.  Available for your use we have beach chairs, boogie boards, wetsuits, swim fins and beach toys.
description.neighborhood:
Look North from the window you will see the many surfers at Tourmaline Beach. 
Six blocks to the South is the Pacific Beach pier. Near the foot of the pier is JRDNs upscale oceanfront restaurant and bar. 
East from the pier is Garnet Blvd packed with countless bars and restaurants. 
We are adjacent to La Jolla, San Diego's upscale village on the Coastline. 
Sea World is visable looking East accross the bay with downtown SD in the background.  
Gelson's gourmet market & spirits is 3/4 mi North.
description.transit: Everything you need is within 8 blocks along a most vibrant people watching area of the California coast.
description.interaction: Myself, Tim, our manager, and Paul, our handyman, are available by phone, text or in person to provide assistance that may be helpful.
description.house_rules:
In case of Emergency Call 911
No smoking allowed anywhere in the condo complex, violators agree to pay $100 HOA automatic fine plus $200 cleaning fee.
Pets are not permitted, violators agree to pay $200 cleaning fee.
Please do not bring sand into the apartment.
Occupancy is limited to four people. Events & parties are not permitted, violators agree to pay a $300 cleaning fee.
Our neighbor, Tony, is a permanent resident of the building. Excessive noise is not permitted, violators unreasonably disturbing Tony agree to pay a $200 mitigation fee. 

Condominium Association Rules:

Each condominium is privately owned and is home to many of our owners. Please be respectful. Owners, renters and guests must all comply with these rules or they may be fined for their own conduct or for the conduct of any of their invitees. Unless otherwise stated.below, all fines start at $50.00 and will double for each additional offense regardless of type. The Capri by the Sea is a secure building and trespassers will be prosecuted.

FRONT LOBBY: Shirts and shoes are required at all times. No bicycles or beach equipment is allowed. Those wearing bathing attire should access the beach and pool through the North Elevators (Bather's Elevators) only. North elevators close at 11 pm & reopen at 6 am

BALCONIES, STAIRWELLS AND ROOF: Throwing or dropping anything from the building will result in an automatic fine of $500.00. No glass containers are allowed on the roof. The stairwells are for emergency use only and accessing them for any other purpose is an automatic $100.00 fine. Nothing may be stored or hung on the balconies or railings. Please do not feed the birds anywhere on the property.

POOL AREA OPEN 9 AM TO 10 PM: Minors under the age of 14 must be supervised by an adult. Minors under the age of 7 are not permitted in the hot tub (spa) or sauna. No jumping or diving into the pool. No surfboards, boogie boards or wet suits are allowed in the pool, spa or sauna. No glass containers are allowed in the pool area. No smoking is allowed in the pool area.

OTHER COMMON AREAS: Smoking is not allowed in the condominium, elevators, lobbies, balconies, walkways, or other common areas and will result in a fine of $250. Washing or repairing vehicles is not allowed anywhere on the property. Do not leave bicycles or personal effects in common areas. Anywhere outside your condo is a common area, including the parking areas and pool area. Unauthorized use of storage lockers or any other space within the Capri by the Sea will result in an automatic fine.

MOTOR VEHICLE PARKING: Vehicles must be parked between all lines and out of fire lanes. Oversize vehicles that infringe upon adjacent parking spaces are not permitted and must either purchase an East Lot pass for $25.00 or find parking on the street. Vehicles without a permit will be fined and/or towed at the owner's expense. All vehicles must be parked so the tires are within 12 inches or less of the tire stops. Bicycle, luggage, and storage racks must be removed or the vehicle must be moved to the East Lot. While unattended, no vehicle shall have any personal property that is not part of the vehicle left on or around the vehicle. Trailers, motor homes and boats are not permitted on the property without permission.

ADDITIONAL PROVISIONS: Unauthorized pets are not allowed in the building and will result in an automatic $100.00 fine. Excessive noise will result in a fine. If police are called due to homeowner or guest behavior, a $200 fine will be assessed. Vandalism will result in an automatic fine of $1,000. Luggage carts must be returned to the front lobby or lower garage (where they were picked up) and not allowed in condos, except briefly while loading and unloading.

description.summary: 064225-Welcome to Paradise! This private, fully furnished villa offers a prime location with Mountain Views. 2 bdrms w/King beds/2 baths (sleeps 6), complete w/2 private terraces, 2 soaking tubs, 2 fireplaces, fully equipped kitchen, queen sofa bed, laundry in unit, high speed WIFI, cable. 12 resort- style salt-water pools w/ cabanas, beach entrance kids pool w/ splash play area, a hammock garden, Jacuzzi's, fully- equipped gym, 13K sq ft clubhouse. 1 block away from The La Quinta Resort!
description.space:
This majestic villa will sweep you away on a whimsical resort vacation from the moment you arrive. Come escape to the private, lush, luxurious oasis of Legacy Villas. Located in Palm Desert nearby the La Quinta Resort & Club, a Waldorf Astoria Resort. 

Legacy Villas has incorporated the best of La Quinta into a beautiful resort perfect for your vacation getaway. Enjoy it's Spanish Hacienda- style Villas among cascading fountains, sparkling pools and majestic mountain views. 

The TWO bedroom fully furnished villa boasts over 1300 square feet of luxury at its finest. The Villa includes 10 ft. high ceilings, soaking tubs, flat screen TV's in each room, full cable and hi speed WIFI throughout, a fully stocked chef's kitchen, two fireplaces perfect for relaxing, pull-out queen sofa in living room, indoor/ outdoor dining areas, TWO private patios overlooking the beautiful lush grounds and mountain views. 

This resort includes 12 pools (including private pools, a resort-style main pool with poolside cabanas, beach entrance kids pool paired with a splash play area, a lap pool, Jacuzzi), a fully- equipped gym in walking distance and an exquisite hammock garden perfect for some quiet and relaxation among beautiful fountains.

You will particularly love this unit, due to it's privacy (no neighbors above), quietness, and serene lush views of the majestic Palm Desert Mountains. 

At Legacy Villas, we have THREE identical TWO bedroom Villas located within a short walk of each other. 

All of our 5- star villas include:

ELECTRONICS:

 - Upgraded Ultra HD (4K) SMART Flat Screen TVs in the Living Room
 - Free high speed WIFI throughout for all your portable devices (Free WIFI at pools)

ENTERTAINMENT CONTENT:

 - Time Warner Cable - Over 100 channels of 1080p quality Digitally-transmitted content on all TVs
 - HBO, Showtime- premium cable stations on ALL TV's

KITCHEN/ DINING AREA:

 - Top-of-the-line Kitchen Aid Appliances - Range, Microwave, Refrigerator, Dishwasher
 - Refrigerator with Filtered Water and Ice Dispenser
 - Fully stocked kitchen loaded with Bar ware, Glassware, Flatware and Dishes 
- Complete set of pots and pans
 - Many convenient small Electric appliances including coffee makers, toasters and carving knives
 - Many serving bowls and platters
 - Private Dining veranda with designer-quality patio furniture
 - barbecue on the Dining patio

LINENS AND TOWELS:

 - Thick woven bath and hand towels
 - Luxury Pool Towels
 - 600+ Thread count linens
 - Designer duvets, shams and duvet comforters
 - Private desks en-suite

MASTER SUITE BEDROOMS:

 - King or Queen-sized Ortho Mattresses for extra back support
 - Kitchenettes including mini-refrigerators in master bedroom
 - Private Patios with high-end patio furniture
 - Entertainment consoles
 - Ceiling Fans in all rooms

ADDITIONAL VILLA AMENITIES:

 - Private single car covered garage and plenty of open parking for guests
 - Fireplaces in the Living Room and Master Suite
 - Washer and Dryer located in the villa with complimentary detergent
 - En-suite bathrooms with Spa Tubs in both Master Suites.
 - Supplies Included for all guests: Washing machine detergent, Liquid dish soap, Liquid hand soap, shampoo, conditioner, body soap, lotion, paper towels, dishwasher detergent, sponges, bath soap, hair dryers. (For any additional needs feel free to contact host, we would be more than happy to provide). 

ACTIVITIES AND ATTRACTIONS:

 - La Quinta Resort and Spa: We love walking next door to the world famous La Quinta Resort and Spa (Waldorf Astoria) for exclusive shopping, gourmet dining and romantic evenings on the manicured grounds. When we're in the mood to treat ourselves, we use the Spa at La Quinta - crowned one of the Top 50 Spas of America - provides a host of tranquility-inducing treatments, using all organic products in a spectacular setting, 
 - Golf: La Quinta Resort features two championship golf courses designed by Pete Dye. Additionally at the nearby PGA West, there are three courses (including TPC Stadium, ranked as one of Golf Digest's 100 greatest public courses) that provide golfers of all levels of play while admiring the breathtaking views of the Santa Rosa Mountains.
 - Dining: We also love biking to downtown La Quinta (1 mile away) for deliciously simple breakfasts and coffee drinks at the Old Town Coffee Company or al fresco dining and evening music at the La Quinta Resort's restaurants.
 - Local Attractions: No stay is complete without a field trip to El Paseo in Palm Desert and the Living Desert Zoo in Rancho Mirage, just 10 minutes away!
description.access:
Guests have access to bbq's around the complex, hammock area's, pools (including lap pool for adults, smaller private pools, etc), Jacuzzi, clubhouse, fully equipped fitness center. 
In close proximity to La Quinta Spa, world renown golfing, hiking, tennis courts, and great dining. Very safe area. Fully secured villa behind a security gate and security guard on duty 24 hours a day. One block away from The La Quinta Resort (A Waldorf Astoria Hotel).
description.notes: A portion of all proceeds will go to "Worthy of Love"- 501(c)3 charitable organization that hosts monthly birthday parties for homeless children that live on Skid Row in Downtown Los Angeles. For more information or for donations please contact host to contribute. Thank You. -Sharona
description.neighborhood:
Welcome to Legacy Villas! This villa is located in Palm Desert in a secured, gated resort with over 12 pools, a hammock garden, and a fully- equipped gym. The neighborhood is in close proximity to the Waldorf Astoria (The La Quinta Resort), where golf, a spa, and fine dining are provided.
You are surrounded by majestic mountain views with your own private patios and an attached private garage. The mountain views bring so much peace and tranquility that you won't want to leave!
description.transit: Taxi's and Uber's are available at all times for your use. Your own private garage should you prefer to drive and bring your own car. Guest spots also available.
description.interaction:
I will be available anytime with questions or concerns and have a complete team in place to help you with  your needs. Your comfort and enjoyment are very important to me and your reviews are very much appreciated.  
-Sharona
description.house_rules:
Please no smoking in the villa. You are more than welcome to smoke in the outside patios. 
Common courtesy to our neighboring villas, please no excessive loud noise after 10 pm. For our furry house guests....$35 p/night pet rental fee (please make sure pets don't shed and are up to date on vaccines). 
We request no air mattresses near the fireplaces as this can be a fire hazard. 
We hope that you enjoy your stay and please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your stay more pleasurable. 

All the Best!

Sharona

hosts.about:
Hi, I'm Danny.  I'm a Realtor in Phoenix and grew up in Alaska.  I've traveled the world far and wide (65 countries and counting!!).  For the last 12 years, I had a life on the road working for a production company that sent me on cruise ships to assist with the productions onboard.  An interesting experience to say the least!!  I'm someday hoping to get back to Australia and spend some more time in the interior.  Also, looking forward to returning to that small ski town in Germany named Garmmisch...what a neat little hideaway.  
Oh, and I have rental properties myself, so I understand the importance of leaving someones home in good condition :) Just saying....

Originally from Quebec City, Canada, Sacha was a professional Figure Skater for many years. After travelling the world, Sacha was intrigued by the beautiful warm and sunny Arizona climate. 

Instantly, Sacha decided to make Phoenix/Scottsdale his permanent home and dedicate his passion for gracious living by purchasing and hosting unique and comfortable short term rentals. Currently, Sacha now hosts over 60 short term rentals in the US, Canada, and California. 

His other passion also now includes representing Buyers (including short term rental investors) and Sellers as an award winning and highly sought after Real Estate Agent since 2004 covering the entire Valley of the Sun. 

Sacha’s success in providing exceptional customer service and an enjoyable guest experience includes his AMAZING team consisting of John who handles client/guest relations and Paul our Supply Manager. Additionally, the Team oversees excellent and highly experienced cleaning teams, 2 full time maintenance technicians, home inspectors, and a well-known local designer.

Extraordinary customer service and beautifully decorated homes has earned Sacha over 5,000 valued guest reviews – demonstrating a commitment to excellence in hospitality and providing a variety of homes for guests to enjoy.

We look forward to hosting your stay at any of our homes, and ensure a smooth and seamless experience whether your travels bring you for business, pleasure or that much needed getaway with family and friends.

description.house_rules:
Smoking inside the home is strictly prohibited, additional charges will be incurred if smoking has happened inside the home.

Pets are welcome but keep them off furniture and pick up after them. If excess pet hair is found on furniture or pet waste found, additional cleaning fees will be charged.

Children MUST be supervised at all times, especially around swimming pool. There is NO lifeguard on duty and the pool is NOT fenced in. Swim at your own risk. Events, parties are strictly prohibited. ONLY registered guests are allowed on the property.

There is weekly pool service at the home. Guests are responsible to maintain the pool in between weekly pool service

recent.comments: Jen and her team were great! They kept in touch with us and are really responsive and helpful. The house however needs some TLC. The baseboards and closets are banged up, carpets are stained but they covered them with a few small mats, patio furniture is old and dingy etc. Nothing was so bad that I wanted to leave, but for what we paid I would have expected the house to be a little more taken care of. This may be a reflection of the owner and not the property management company.

Beautiful place! Extremely spacious, clean, and nice amenities. Thanks!
We loved our stay. The house was beautiful, clean, organized and well stocked. Plenty of room for our three families. Highly recommend!

Loved this house and it exceeded our expectations! It was beautiful, modern, spacious, well maintained and very clean. Beds were comfortable and kitchen was fully equipped. We really enjoyed having the pool/spa in the courtyard for privacy and the backyard had beautiful mountain and golf course views. Experienced  excellent communication with the host too, always quick and helpful replies. It was clear that our host really cared about making our stay enjoyable. For example, the living room TV stopped working and they were quick to get it fixed, having a new one installed that same day! We were impressed with the house and host. We highly recommend this house and definitely plan to stay there again.
Beautiful place!
A beautiful/clean house that is kid friendly & in a great neighborhood. Had a great experience here and the host was great with communication. Would highly recommend staying here!

Jen and her team were communicative, responsive, and accommodating. Her place was perfect for a weekend getaway with a group of friends. The house and guest house were comfortable, expansive, and airy. Love in indoor/outdoor experience!  Would definitely stay here again!

description.space:
Suite-style bedrooms and a patio full of loungers make for resort-inspired living at this course-side La Quinta compound. Spiky palm fronds frame the saltwater pool and spa in the courtyard, while the backyard opens to a firepit, the plush greens of the golf fairways, and mountain views. Put on a favorite song and you might just get to the music festival at the Empire Polo Grounds before it ends.
